engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: Temporary placement to check event progression. Once night activities and quests have been officially added, please delete.
engSearchText:
Temporary placement to check event progression.
Once night activities and quests have been officially
added, please delete.
jpnChrName: イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。 ※クエストが正式入力され接続できるようになりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。
※クエストが正式入力され接続できるようになりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: HP and EP were fully restored!
engSearchText: HP and EP were fully restored!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！

engChrName: What? There was another incident?! Oh, my...
engSearchText: What? There was another incident?! Oh, my...
jpnChrName: なんだかまた事件があったそうね？ う～ん、怖いわね～。
jpnSearchText:
なんだかまた事件があったそうね？
う～ん、怖いわね～。

engChrName: The president said he's going to wrap up the inspection early, so I guess this trip's drawing to a close.
engSearchText:
The president said he's going to wrap up the
inspection early, so I guess this trip's drawing to
a close.
jpnChrName: 社長たちも早めに引き上げるって言ってるし そろそろ旅行も終わりかしら。
jpnSearchText:
社長たちも早めに引き上げるって言ってるし
そろそろ旅行も終わりかしら。

engChrName: Wait. How on earth am I gonna pack all my theater merch? I...may have bought one too many things.
engSearchText:
Wait. How on earth am I gonna pack all my
theater merch? I...may have bought one too
many things.
jpnChrName: 華劇場で買ったグッズがちょっと凄い量だから まずは配送便を手配しないとね。
jpnSearchText:
華劇場で買ったグッズがちょっと凄い量だから
まずは配送便を手配しないとね。

engChrName: Ahaha... I might've gotten just a teensy bit carried away yesterday. So sorry!
engSearchText:
Ahaha... I might've gotten just a teensy bit carried
away yesterday. So sorry!
jpnChrName: いや～アハハ、昨日は情熱のままに 語っちゃってスミマセンでした～！
jpnSearchText:
いや～アハハ、昨日は情熱のままに
語っちゃってスミマセンでした～！

engChrName: Ugh... You went on and on about 'the Eastern Theater' this and 'the Eastern Theater' that while we were out drinking.
engSearchText:
Ugh... You went on and on about 'the Eastern
Theater' this and 'the Eastern Theater' that while we
were out drinking.
jpnChrName: 酒の席でも東方華劇の 話ばかりだったね、君……
jpnSearchText:
酒の席でも東方華劇の
話ばかりだったね、君……

engChrName: I'm getting a hangover just thinking about it...
engSearchText: I'm getting a hangover just thinking about it...
jpnChrName: ま、まあ楽しんでくれと誘ったのは 我々だし、いいんだけどね……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ楽しんでくれと誘ったのは
我々だし、いいんだけどね……

engChrName: I know I said we should enjoy ourselves to the fullest, but everyone's on edge after last night's incident. Let's not get carried away again.
engSearchText:
I know I said we should enjoy ourselves to the fullest,
but everyone's on edge after last night's incident.
Let's not get carried away again.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は事件があったとかで 東方人街もピリピリしてるようだし、ね。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は事件があったとかで
東方人街もピリピリしてるようだし、ね。

engChrName: Fiiiiiine... Guess I can show a little restraint. I'll just stick to rummaging through the theater's gift shop.
engSearchText:
Fiiiiiine... Guess I can show a little restraint. I'll just
stick to rummaging through the theater's gift shop.
jpnChrName: ハイ……自重して グッズ漁りだけにしておきます……
jpnSearchText:
ハイ……自重して
グッズ漁りだけにしておきます……

engChrName: (...I think she's developing an obsession with that place.)
engSearchText:
(...I think she's developing an obsession with
that place.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、結局華劇場には行くのね……）
jpnSearchText: （ああ、結局華劇場には行くのね……）

engChrName: I-I suppose now may not be the best time to sightsee.
engSearchText: I-I suppose now may not be the best time to sightsee.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ観光──もとい 現地視察を楽しむ雰囲気じゃないしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ観光──もとい
現地視察を楽しむ雰囲気じゃないしなぁ。

engChrName: Don't think we should wander around aimlessly, either. It's too scary around here...
engSearchText:
Don't think we should wander around
aimlessly, either. It's too scary around here...
jpnChrName: さすがにウロウロするのも ちょっと怖いですしね。
jpnSearchText:
さすがにウロウロするのも
ちょっと怖いですしね。

engChrName: I'd LOVE to watch another performance and cheer my heart out, but I'll just stick to shopping their wares.
engSearchText:
I'd LOVE to watch another performance and cheer
my heart out, but I'll just stick to shopping
their wares.
jpnChrName: 今日も思いきり黄色い歓声を浴びせたいけど グッズ漁りだけにしておきます……
jpnSearchText:
今日も思いきり黄色い歓声を浴びせたいけど
グッズ漁りだけにしておきます……

engChrName: (...I'm becoming mildly concerned about her.)
engSearchText: (...I'm becoming mildly concerned about her.)
jpnChrName: （この子、完全にハマっちゃったなぁ……）
jpnSearchText: （この子、完全にハマっちゃったなぁ……）

engChrName: *squeal* The Eastern Theater is INCREDIBLE!
engSearchText: *squeal* The Eastern Theater is INCREDIBLE!
jpnChrName: グ、グレイツッッ！！ 東方華劇──なんて刺激的なのっ！？
jpnSearchText:
グ、グレイツッッ！！
東方華劇──なんて刺激的なのっ！？

engChrName: The Eastern charm, the stunning choreography, and those dashing performers...
engSearchText:
The Eastern charm, the stunning choreography, and
those dashing performers...
jpnChrName: 西方文化にはないオリエンタルな魅力が 目を見張る完成度で迫ってくる迫力というか──！！
jpnSearchText:
西方文化にはないオリエンタルな魅力が
目を見張る完成度で迫ってくる迫力というか──！！

engChrName: All right, boys. Back in we go! I can't WAIT to see the next performance!
engSearchText:
All right, boys. Back in we go! I can't WAIT to see
the next performance!
jpnChrName: もう一本観ていきましょ！！ これから別の演目をやるみたいだし……！！
jpnSearchText:
もう一本観ていきましょ！！
これから別の演目をやるみたいだし……！！

engChrName: G-Get a hold of yourself, Melise!
engSearchText: G-Get a hold of yourself, Melise!
jpnChrName: メ、メリーゼ君、勘弁してくれよ～！
jpnSearchText: メ、メリーゼ君、勘弁してくれよ～！

engChrName: We've been watching these nonstop for five hours! Don't make us watch another! Please!
engSearchText:
We've been watching these nonstop for five hours!
Don't make us watch another! Please!
jpnChrName: もうぶっ続けで５時間観てますよ…… 帰りましょ！　ね、メリーゼさん！
jpnSearchText:
もうぶっ続けで５時間観てますよ……
帰りましょ！　ね、メリーゼさん！

engChrName: Theater is the greatest thing in the world! I'm totally hooked!
engSearchText:
Theater is the greatest thing in the world! I'm
totally hooked!
jpnChrName: こんな文化があっただなんて！！ くぅぅぅぅぅ～～～～っ！！！
jpnSearchText:
こんな文化があっただなんて！！
くぅぅぅぅぅ～～～～っ！！！

engChrName: They're putting on a different performance for this next showing, and I HAVE to see it!
engSearchText:
They're putting on a different performance for this
next showing, and I HAVE to see it!
jpnChrName: これは観るっきゃない！！ これから別の演目をやるみたいだし……！！
jpnSearchText:
これは観るっきゃない！！
これから別の演目をやるみたいだし……！！

engChrName: All right. It is time for us to indulge in the greatest part of onsite inspections: partying! Wahahaha!
engSearchText:
All right. It is time for us to indulge in the greatest
part of onsite inspections: partying! Wahahaha!
jpnChrName: いや～っはっはっは！ 現地視察の醍醐味といえばコレでしょ！
jpnSearchText:
いや～っはっはっは！
現地視察の醍醐味といえばコレでしょ！

engChrName: Of course, Mr. President! Let's all enjoy ourselves to the fullest from sun up to sun down!
engSearchText:
Of course, Mr. President! Let's all enjoy ourselves to
the fullest from sun up to sun down!
jpnChrName: ハイ社長！　今日は夜中まで 楽しんじゃいましょう～！！
jpnSearchText:
ハイ社長！　今日は夜中まで
楽しんじゃいましょう～！！

engChrName: I hear the Eastern Quarter's night market is quite something. I'm excited to see what it has to offer!
engSearchText:
I hear the Eastern Quarter's night market is
quite something. I'm excited to see what it has
to offer!
jpnChrName: 東方人街って言えば 噂の《夜市》も見事らしいからねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
東方人街って言えば
噂の《夜市》も見事らしいからねぇ！

engChrName: Hmm? Is something troubling you, Melise? Sorry to make you tag along, but we needed to, erm, liven up this inspection trip. You understand, I hope.
engSearchText:
Hmm? Is something troubling you, Melise? Sorry to
make you tag along, but we needed to, erm, liven up
this inspection trip. You understand, I hope.
jpnChrName: あ、メリーゼ君も付き合わせて悪いね！ だが視察旅行には華がないとね～！
jpnSearchText:
あ、メリーゼ君も付き合わせて悪いね！
だが視察旅行には華がないとね～！

engChrName: Oh, umm, yes, I understand what you mean perfectly. I'm...honored you invited me on this trip.
engSearchText:
Oh, umm, yes, I understand what you mean perfectly.
I'm...honored you invited me on this trip.
jpnChrName: ハ、ハイ～～～…… お声がけいただいて光栄というか……
jpnSearchText:
ハ、ハイ～～～……
お声がけいただいて光栄というか……

engChrName: (Ugh. Like HELL I am! This is sexual harassment! I'm sick of sucking up to these sleezy pigs in suits!)
engSearchText:
(Ugh. Like HELL I am! This is sexual harassment!
I'm sick of sucking up to these sleezy pigs in suits!)
jpnChrName: （んなワケあるか～い！！   確信犯ね、このセクハラ社長がぁ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（んなワケあるか～い！！
確信犯ね、このセクハラ社長がぁ！！）

engChrName: Now, then. I think it's time we begin our sightseeing—err...onsite inspection!
engSearchText:
Now, then. I think it's time we begin our
sightseeing—err...onsite inspection!
jpnChrName: さあさあ、観光── もとい現地視察を楽しもうじゃないかぁ！
jpnSearchText:
さあさあ、観光──
もとい現地視察を楽しもうじゃないかぁ！

engChrName: (I've gotta get away from these two bastards. Maybe I can slip away into the crowd midway through...)
engSearchText:
(I've gotta get away from these two bastards. Maybe I
can slip away into the crowd midway through...)
jpnChrName: （どうにか途中で抜け出す方法は……   ……ぶつぶつ……）
jpnSearchText:
（どうにか途中で抜け出す方法は……
……ぶつぶつ……）

engChrName: I guess it's possible I was just seeing things...
engSearchText: I guess it's possible I was just seeing things...
jpnChrName: うーんでも、昨日見えたあの船…… 見間違いだったのかな、本当に……
jpnSearchText:
うーんでも、昨日見えたあの船……
見間違いだったのかな、本当に……

engChrName: Wait a minute... Isn't Molujia Archipelago just across the sea? There's a rumor about pirates being there.
engSearchText:
Wait a minute... Isn't Molujia Archipelago just across
the sea? There's a rumor about pirates being there.
jpnChrName: はっ……そういえばこの海の向こうにある 《モルジア諸島》には海賊伝説もあるって聞きました！
jpnSearchText:
はっ……そういえばこの海の向こうにある
《モルジア諸島》には海賊伝説もあるって聞きました！

engChrName: Maybe I WAS right all along! If there really is a ghost ship around, that'd be one heck of a scoop!
engSearchText:
Maybe I WAS right all along! If there really is a ghost
ship around, that'd be one heck of a scoop!
jpnChrName: もしかして……その時の幽霊船だったりしないですか！？ それならそれで……大スクープですっ……！
jpnSearchText:
もしかして……その時の幽霊船だったりしないですか！？
それならそれで……大スクープですっ……！

engChrName: Now where did Maxim run off to?
engSearchText: Now where did Maxim run off to?
jpnChrName: ふう、結局マクシム・ルーガンは どこに行ったのでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、結局マクシム・ルーガンは
どこに行ったのでしょう……

engChrName: I thought I saw him earlier, but I think it might've just been a lookalike. This might be tougher than I thought...
engSearchText:
I thought I saw him earlier, but I think it might've
just been a lookalike. This might be tougher than
I thought...
jpnChrName: さっき、遠目には似た人は見ましたが…… 真剣に何か探しているっぽいし、人違いかな……
jpnSearchText:
さっき、遠目には似た人は見ましたが……
真剣に何か探しているっぽいし、人違いかな……

engChrName: But I'm not giving up! If there's a story to tell about him, then darn it, I'm gonna tell it!
engSearchText:
But I'm not giving up! If there's a story to tell about
him, then darn it, I'm gonna tell it!
jpnChrName: でも、わたしは諦めませんよ！　マクシム・ルーガンの スクープにせよ文化面の取材にせよ……
jpnSearchText:
でも、わたしは諦めませんよ！　マクシム・ルーガンの
スクープにせよ文化面の取材にせよ……

engChrName: I'll do whatever it takes to bridge the gap between me and Dingo!
engSearchText:
I'll do whatever it takes to bridge the gap between me
and Dingo!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんに一歩でも近づけるなら、 何だって全力で臨むだけですっ！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんに一歩でも近づけるなら、
何だって全力で臨むだけですっ！

engChrName: Now where did Maxim run off to? I'll get the dirt on him if it's the last thing I do!
engSearchText:
Now where did Maxim run off to? I'll get the dirt on
him if it's the last thing I do!
jpnChrName: 《紅い流星》……一体どこに行ったんでしょう、 スクープがあるなら何とか一言聞かないと……！
jpnSearchText:
《紅い流星》……一体どこに行ったんでしょう、
スクープがあるなら何とか一言聞かないと……！

engChrName: ...Ugh. Now I'm starting to sound like some third-rate gossip columnist.
engSearchText:
...Ugh. Now I'm starting to sound like some
third-rate gossip columnist.
jpnChrName: でも……有名人を追いかけているの、 これじゃあやっぱりゴシップ記者っぽい気も……
jpnSearchText:
でも……有名人を追いかけているの、
これじゃあやっぱりゴシップ記者っぽい気も……

engChrName: But if he really is up to something shady, then it's my job—and duty—to expose it!
engSearchText:
But if he really is up to something shady, then it's my
job—and duty—to expose it!
jpnChrName: でも……もしマクシム・ルーガンにやましい事があるなら それを暴くのもある意味正義の……！
jpnSearchText:
でも……もしマクシム・ルーガンにやましい事があるなら
それを暴くのもある意味正義の……！

engChrName: Aaron kicked so much ass in that fight. Wish I was half as good a fighter as he is.
engSearchText:
Aaron kicked so much ass in that fight. Wish I was
half as good a fighter as he is.
jpnChrName: 今日もアーロンは頼もしかったな。 比べて俺は目立たないもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
今日もアーロンは頼もしかったな。
比べて俺は目立たないもんだ。

engChrName: Probably best not to compare myself to him, though. It's not gonna do my self-esteem any good.
engSearchText:
Probably best not to compare myself to him, though.
It's not gonna do my self-esteem any good.
jpnChrName: ま、腕っ節はまだまだでも 俺ァ鼻が利く。
jpnSearchText:
ま、腕っ節はまだまだでも
俺ァ鼻が利く。

engChrName: Least I got a good nose on me, though. Serves me well when I'm on lookout!
engSearchText:
Least I got a good nose on me, though. Serves me
well when I'm on lookout!
jpnChrName: お前らの分も、見張りとかなら 俺に任せておけい！
jpnSearchText:
お前らの分も、見張りとかなら
俺に任せておけい！

engChrName: Can't wait to hear Aaron's stories tonight!
engSearchText: Can't wait to hear Aaron's stories tonight!
jpnChrName: ハハ、面白い話期待してるぜアーロン！
jpnSearchText: ハハ、面白い話期待してるぜアーロン！

engChrName: I also like gatherin' info while on guide duty, but he's waaay better at that than me.
engSearchText:
I also like gatherin' info while on guide duty, but he's
waaay better at that than me.
jpnChrName: 俺も案内人がてら情報収集してるが、 アーロンの目にはかなわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
俺も案内人がてら情報収集してるが、
アーロンの目にはかなわねぇ。

engChrName: He always pairs up with the best people and has the juiciest stories to tell. How does he do it?!
engSearchText:
He always pairs up with the best people and has the
juiciest stories to tell. How does he do it?!
jpnChrName: アーロンが面白そうって言って関わった奴が 面白くなかった試しなんて無いからな！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンが面白そうって言って関わった奴が
面白くなかった試しなんて無いからな！

engChrName: Oh, hello there! I've never seen you around this place. Are you tourists?
engSearchText:
Oh, hello there! I've never seen you around this place.
Are you tourists?
jpnChrName: おう、見ない顔だな。 観光かい？
jpnSearchText:
おう、見ない顔だな。
観光かい？

engChrName: I'd be more than happy to guide you around the city. The name's Sei, and I'll show you all the best sights Langport has to off—ow!
engSearchText:
I'd be more than happy to guide you around the city.
The name's Sei, and I'll show you all the best sights
Langport has to off—ow!
jpnChrName: 良かったらこの敏腕案内人・セイ様が エスコートしてやろう……って、いてて……
jpnSearchText:
良かったらこの敏腕案内人・セイ様が
エスコートしてやろう……って、いてて……

engChrName: Damn it. My freakin' arms hurt like hell...
engSearchText: Damn it. My freakin' arms hurt like hell...
jpnChrName: 畜生、まだ二の腕が痛みやがる。
jpnSearchText: 畜生、まだ二の腕が痛みやがる。

engChrName: Are you injured? I'm so sorry...
engSearchText: Are you injured? I'm so sorry...
jpnChrName: えと……お怪我をされているようですが、 大丈夫ですか？
jpnSearchText:
えと……お怪我をされているようですが、
大丈夫ですか？

engChrName: Ack! N-No, I'm okay, promise. I just, umm, ran into a bit of trouble, is all. We got someone who has our backs, so I'll be all right.
engSearchText:
Ack! N-No, I'm okay, promise. I just, umm, ran into
a bit of trouble, is all. We got someone who has our
backs, so I'll be all right.
jpnChrName: あー、ちょいとひと悶着あってな。 ま、俺たちには頼れるアイツもついてるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
あー、ちょいとひと悶着あってな。
ま、俺たちには頼れるアイツもついてるんだ。

engChrName: Sometimes, outsider goons come here to stir up trouble, and we have a duty to protect our home from the likes of them!
engSearchText:
Sometimes, outsider goons come here to stir up
trouble, and we have a duty to protect our home from
the likes of them!
jpnChrName: 他所から来た半端モンのする事など、 怖くもねぇし、俺もいつも通りにやるだけさ。
jpnSearchText:
他所から来た半端モンのする事など、
怖くもねぇし、俺もいつも通りにやるだけさ。

engChrName: (Outsiders?)
engSearchText: (Outsiders?)
jpnChrName: （余所者、ねぇ……）
jpnSearchText: （余所者、ねぇ……）

engChrName: (Ah, I think I know what he's talkin' about...)
engSearchText: (Ah, I think I know what he's talkin' about...)
jpnChrName: （そいつらとやり合ってるって事は、   こいつの言ってる奴ってのが……）
jpnSearchText:
（そいつらとやり合ってるって事は、
こいつの言ってる奴ってのが……）

engChrName: We got into a little bit of a scuffle with some outsider goons recently, and we dragged them over the coals.
engSearchText:
We got into a little bit of a scuffle with some outsider
goons recently, and we dragged them over the coals.
jpnChrName: 最近は揉め事もあってな…… こないだ灸をすえてやったってところだ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は揉め事もあってな……
こないだ灸をすえてやったってところだ。

engChrName: Don't you worry about a thing. My friends and I will protect you all from the likes of them.
engSearchText:
Don't you worry about a thing. My friends and I will
protect you all from the likes of them.
jpnChrName: まあ、案内人セイ様はくじけないぜ、 あんたらもどうだい、そこの華劇場とかよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、案内人セイ様はくじけないぜ、
あんたらもどうだい、そこの華劇場とかよ。

engChrName: So, how about that tour? Want me to show you the theater? My buddy performs there, and he's amazing!
engSearchText:
So, how about that tour? Want me to show you
the theater? My buddy performs there, and
he's amazing!
jpnChrName: 俺のイチオシスポットさ、何せ…… アイツが出ているんだ、勧めない理由は無いぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺のイチオシスポットさ、何せ……
アイツが出ているんだ、勧めない理由は無いぜ。

engChrName: Yo, what's up, Aaron? What'cha doin' with that handyman bastard?
engSearchText:
Yo, what's up, Aaron? What'cha doin' with that
handyman bastard?
jpnChrName: おお、アーロンじゃないか。 まさか例の便利屋野郎と一緒にいるとは。
jpnSearchText:
おお、アーロンじゃないか。
まさか例の便利屋野郎と一緒にいるとは。

engChrName: We were all just talkin' about grabbing a bite to eat. Wanna ditch this loser and hang with us?
engSearchText:
We were all just talkin' about grabbing a bite to eat.
Wanna ditch this loser and hang with us?
jpnChrName: 今皆でメシでも食いに行かないかって 話していたところなんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
今皆でメシでも食いに行かないかって
話していたところなんだけど……

engChrName: Pass. I wanna keep an eye on the old fart while he's doing his 'job.'
engSearchText:
Pass. I wanna keep an eye on the old fart while he's
doing his 'job.'
jpnChrName: ハハ、ちとこのおっさんの仕事を 冷かしてみようと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、ちとこのおっさんの仕事を
冷かしてみようと思ってな。

engChrName: Might learn a thing or two.
engSearchText: Might learn a thing or two.
jpnChrName: おっさんの生態観察ってのも、 なかなかどうして面白おかしいもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おっさんの生態観察ってのも、
なかなかどうして面白おかしいもんだぜ。

engChrName: I get'cha, I get'cha. Recon's important and all. I'll keep that in mind while I'm guidin' people around.
engSearchText:
I get'cha, I get'cha. Recon's important and all.
I'll keep that in mind while I'm guidin'
people around.
jpnChrName: なるほど、偵察とかは大事だもんな。 俺も案内がてら、意識してみるか！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、偵察とかは大事だもんな。
俺も案内がてら、意識してみるか！

engChrName: Well, good luck with your mission, Aaron. Catch ya later.
engSearchText:
Well, good luck with your mission, Aaron. Catch
ya later.
jpnChrName: まあ、アーロンが言うなら間違いはねぇんだろうな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、アーロンが言うなら間違いはねぇんだろうな。

engChrName: Wish you could've joined us, though.
engSearchText: Wish you could've joined us, though.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、俺らも待っているから、 アーロンも早く来いよ！
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃ、俺らも待っているから、
アーロンも早く来いよ！

engChrName: Tell you what. The old fart's probably gonna wrap up soon, so I'll join up with you guys after that.
engSearchText:
Tell you what. The old fart's probably gonna wrap up
soon, so I'll join up with you guys after that.
jpnChrName: ああ、このおっさんの仕事ぶりってやつも どうせすぐにわかるさ、そしたら合流するぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、このおっさんの仕事ぶりってやつも
どうせすぐにわかるさ、そしたら合流するぜ。

engChrName: I think an all-out celebration's in order after we kick the crap outta those outsiders. When I get there, let's call over some hot chicks and chill.
engSearchText:
I think an all-out celebration's in order after we
kick the crap outta those outsiders. When I get
there, let's call over some hot chicks and chill.
jpnChrName: 綺麗どころも呼んで、余所者どもとやり合った 疲れを吹っ飛ばそうじゃねぇか！
jpnSearchText:
綺麗どころも呼んで、余所者どもとやり合った
疲れを吹っ飛ばそうじゃねぇか！

engChrName: You better stop callin' me old fart, you little bastard.
engSearchText: You better stop callin' me old fart, you little bastard.
jpnChrName: 何度もおっさん呼ばわりしやがって……
jpnSearchText: 何度もおっさん呼ばわりしやがって……

engChrName: Hell yeah! Tonight's gonna be wild!
engSearchText: Hell yeah! Tonight's gonna be wild!
jpnChrName: ああ、待っているぜアーロン！ 今夜も全員集まれて、良い夜になれそうだ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、待っているぜアーロン！
今夜も全員集まれて、良い夜になれそうだ！

engChrName: I'm excited to hear all the funny stories about the handyman!
engSearchText:
I'm excited to hear all the funny stories about
the handyman!
jpnChrName: その便利屋の事も、面白い話を 期待しているぜ！
jpnSearchText:
その便利屋の事も、面白い話を
期待しているぜ！

engChrName: Our man Aaron scared the freakin' daylights outta those outsiders. Serves them right!
engSearchText:
Our man Aaron scared the freakin' daylights outta
those outsiders. Serves them right!
jpnChrName: あの余所者ども、港でやり合った時も アーロンを見てビビッてやがったな！
jpnSearchText:
あの余所者ども、港でやり合った時も
アーロンを見てビビッてやがったな！

engChrName: Won't be long now till we send those losers packin'.
engSearchText: Won't be long now till we send those losers packin'.
jpnChrName: この調子なら煌都から追い出すのも そう遠くは無さそうってモンだな。
jpnSearchText:
この調子なら煌都から追い出すのも
そう遠くは無さそうってモンだな。

engChrName: I say we throw a party to celebrate our inevitable win. Someone call Aaron right now!
engSearchText:
I say we throw a party to celebrate our inevitable win.
Someone call Aaron right now!
jpnChrName: よし、景気づけに宴会でもやろうじゃねぇか！ 誰かアーロンを呼んで来い！
jpnSearchText:
よし、景気づけに宴会でもやろうじゃねぇか！
誰かアーロンを呼んで来い！

engChrName: Haven't seen those outsiders around here lately. I think they really might be gone for good!
engSearchText:
Haven't seen those outsiders around here lately.
I think they really might be gone for good!
jpnChrName: ここんところあの余所者どもも東方人街には 来なくなったし、早めの祝勝会をやっても良いかもな！
jpnSearchText:
ここんところあの余所者どもも東方人街には
来なくなったし、早めの祝勝会をやっても良いかもな！

engChrName: Time to celebrate! We'll get started with the party once you're done with your thing, Aaron.
engSearchText:
Time to celebrate! We'll get started with the party
once you're done with your thing, Aaron.
jpnChrName: 何はともあれ景気づけだ、アーロンがいなきゃ 締まらねぇってモンよ！
jpnSearchText:
何はともあれ景気づけだ、アーロンがいなきゃ
締まらねぇってモンよ！

engChrName: Let me know when you're ready!
engSearchText: Let me know when you're ready!
jpnChrName: 適当にやってるから、気が向いたら 声かけてくれよアーロン！
jpnSearchText:
適当にやってるから、気が向いたら
声かけてくれよアーロン！

engChrName: All right. I ain't feelin' the pain no more, so I'm getting back into action.
engSearchText:
All right. I ain't feelin' the pain no more, so I'm
getting back into action.
jpnChrName: ふう、大分痛みが引いてきたな…… これならまたやり合えそうだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、大分痛みが引いてきたな……
これならまたやり合えそうだぜ。

engChrName: Aaron was right. Doc's a miracle worker. Didn't take long at all for that wound to heal.
engSearchText:
Aaron was right. Doc's a miracle worker. Didn't take
long at all for that wound to heal.
jpnChrName: しかし、こんなに早く治るとは流石ロンカイ先生だ、 アーロンが贔屓にしているだけあるってモンだな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、こんなに早く治るとは流石ロンカイ先生だ、
アーロンが贔屓にしているだけあるってモンだな。

engChrName: I'm ready to throw myself at those damn outsiders again. As long as we got Aaron by our side, I've got nothin' to fear.
engSearchText:
I'm ready to throw myself at those damn
outsiders again. As long as we got Aaron by our side,
I've got nothin' to fear.
jpnChrName: あの余所者ども、何度来ようが俺たちに アーロンがいる限り何も怖くはねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あの余所者ども、何度来ようが俺たちに
アーロンがいる限り何も怖くはねぇ。

engChrName: That caterpillar skewer really was scrumptious. You don't know what you're missing.
engSearchText:
That caterpillar skewer really was scrumptious.
You don't know what you're missing.
jpnChrName: 折角の美味しいイモムシだったのに 勿体ないなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
折角の美味しいイモムシだったのに
勿体ないなぁ。

engChrName: Well, if you change your mind, I'm always here!
engSearchText: Well, if you change your mind, I'm always here!
jpnChrName: 再挑戦、いつでも待ってるぜ！
jpnSearchText: 再挑戦、いつでも待ってるぜ！

engChrName: I just finished making a delivery to Doctor Longkai's place.
engSearchText:
I just finished making a delivery to Doctor
Longkai's place.
jpnChrName: 今しがたロンカイ先生のところへの 手配が終わったところだ。
jpnSearchText:
今しがたロンカイ先生のところへの
手配が終わったところだ。

engChrName: And now to focus on my usual business...
engSearchText: And now to focus on my usual business...
jpnChrName: これで普段通りの商売に 専念したいところだが……
jpnSearchText:
これで普段通りの商売に
専念したいところだが……

engChrName: ...is what I'd like to say, but I find myself distracted with worry over the mist from yesterday. It's clouded my thoughts.
engSearchText:
...is what I'd like to say, but I find myself distracted
with worry over the mist from yesterday. It's clouded
my thoughts.
jpnChrName: やはり昨晩の霧は気がかりだな…… まったく、こういう事に限って忘れられねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
やはり昨晩の霧は気がかりだな……
まったく、こういう事に限って忘れられねぇ……

engChrName: I heard those kids died horrible deaths...
engSearchText: I heard those kids died horrible deaths...
jpnChrName: しかし例のチンピラ共……随分と酷い 死にざまだって噂も聞くな……
jpnSearchText:
しかし例のチンピラ共……随分と酷い
死にざまだって噂も聞くな……

engChrName: Those punks often gave me a hard time, but I never would have wished this upon them or anyone. It's too cruel.
engSearchText:
Those punks often gave me a hard time, but I never
would have wished this upon them or anyone. It's
too cruel.
jpnChrName: 連中には酷い嫌がらせも受けたが…… 流石にちょっとは同情しちまうな。
jpnSearchText:
連中には酷い嫌がらせも受けたが……
流石にちょっとは同情しちまうな。

engChrName: I feel bad about what happened last night, but now's not the time to close up shop.
engSearchText:
I feel bad about what happened last night, but now's
not the time to close up shop.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は気の毒な事もあったが…… うちは店を閉める気はねぇぜ。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は気の毒な事もあったが……
うちは店を閉める気はねぇぜ。

engChrName: Doctor Longkai placed a rush order for medicine, so I have to get that done as soon as I can.
engSearchText:
Doctor Longkai placed a rush order for medicine, so I
have to get that done as soon as I can.
jpnChrName: だが、ロンカイ先生から生薬の仕入れを 前倒しにして欲しいと言われてな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、ロンカイ先生から生薬の仕入れを
前倒しにして欲しいと言われてな。

engChrName: Either a lot of folks were injured in yesterday's incident, or, like me, he's still thinking about the past...
engSearchText:
Either a lot of folks were injured in yesterday's
incident, or, like me, he's still thinking about
the past...
jpnChrName: 昨日の一件でそれなりにケガ人が出たのか、 それとも、やはり俺と同じで昔の事を……
jpnSearchText:
昨日の一件でそれなりにケガ人が出たのか、
それとも、やはり俺と同じで昔の事を……

engChrName: No, I must be overthinking things. Regardless, I'll be keeping an extra eye out for trouble.
engSearchText:
No, I must be overthinking things. Regardless, I'll be
keeping an extra eye out for trouble.
jpnChrName: いや……流石に考え過ぎだな。 まあ、とにかく用心しておくって事だろう。
jpnSearchText:
いや……流石に考え過ぎだな。
まあ、とにかく用心しておくって事だろう。

engChrName: Hello there, Van. Doing the rounds with Aaron, I see.
engSearchText:
Hello there, Van. Doing the rounds with Aaron,
I see.
jpnChrName: おうヴァン、アーロンと一緒に 夜市巡りとはな。
jpnSearchText:
おうヴァン、アーロンと一緒に
夜市巡りとはな。

engChrName: Fair warning: you're going to need quite a bit of energy to keep pace with him.
engSearchText:
Fair warning: you're going to need quite a bit of
energy to keep pace with him.
jpnChrName: そいつとのペースについて行くなら 結構精力ってモンがいるんじゃないかい？
jpnSearchText:
そいつとのペースについて行くなら
結構精力ってモンがいるんじゃないかい？

engChrName: How about I sell you this tonic powder? It always gives the elderly a spring in their step!
engSearchText:
How about I sell you this tonic powder? It always
gives the elderly a spring in their step!
jpnChrName: この強壮粉末はどうだ、歳喰った奴でも 現役ビンビンに復活できるくらいだ！
jpnSearchText:
この強壮粉末はどうだ、歳喰った奴でも
現役ビンビンに復活できるくらいだ！

engChrName: Damn. Called out.
engSearchText: Damn. Called out.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言われてるぜおっさん。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、言われてるぜおっさん。

engChrName: Hello there, Van. I assume the young ladies have retired for the evening?
engSearchText:
Hello there, Van. I assume the young ladies have
retired for the evening?
jpnChrName: おうヴァン、夜はオナゴは連れとらんのかい？ そういや、夜にうち来るのは初めてか。
jpnSearchText:
おうヴァン、夜はオナゴは連れとらんのかい？
そういや、夜にうち来るのは初めてか。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, you haven't visited us at night, have you?
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, you haven't visited us at
night, have you?
jpnChrName: 夜は夜で、大人を熱く燃え上がらせる モンを色々とお勧めしていてな。
jpnSearchText:
夜は夜で、大人を熱く燃え上がらせる
モンを色々とお勧めしていてな。

engChrName: Why don't you try this tonic powder? It's sure to add a spring in your step. Works wonders for me and my wife.
engSearchText:
Why don't you try this tonic powder? It's sure to add
a spring in your step. Works wonders for me and
my wife.
jpnChrName: 俺もカミさんも、この強壮粉末の お陰で長い事現役ビンビンだった訳でな！
jpnSearchText:
俺もカミさんも、この強壮粉末の
お陰で長い事現役ビンビンだった訳でな！

engChrName: I'll consider it.
engSearchText: I'll consider it.
jpnChrName: ハン、せっかくだから何か 買ってやろうと思ってたが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、せっかくだから何か
買ってやろうと思ってたが……

engChrName: Though that thing looks a bit sketch, to be honest. You're gonna tank your brand if you try to sell that crap.
engSearchText:
Though that thing looks a bit sketch, to be honest.
You're gonna tank your brand if you try to sell
that crap.
jpnChrName: 正直、ンな胡散臭い品見せられると 逆に買う気も失せるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
正直、ンな胡散臭い品見せられると
逆に買う気も失せるんだが。

engChrName: 'Sketch?' 'Crap?!' You wound me, dear sir. I'll have you know my medicine is the finest in all of Langport.
engSearchText:
'Sketch?' 'Crap?!' You wound me, dear sir. I'll have
you know my medicine is the finest in all
of Langport.
jpnChrName: 胡散臭いとは心外な。これでも一応、 薬効とかは最低限理解しててな。
jpnSearchText:
胡散臭いとは心外な。これでも一応、
薬効とかは最低限理解しててな。

engChrName: The clinic buys my herbal medicine at wholesale prices.
engSearchText:
The clinic buys my herbal medicine at
wholesale prices.
jpnChrName: 療法院にも生薬の材料をいくらか卸しているんだぜ。
jpnSearchText: 療法院にも生薬の材料をいくらか卸しているんだぜ。

engChrName: Huh. So why're you sellin' food and ingredients, then? Aren't you leavin' a lot of money on the table by not goin' all in on medicine?
engSearchText:
Huh. So why're you sellin' food and
ingredients, then? Aren't you leavin' a lot of money
on the table by not goin' all in on medicine?
jpnChrName: それは初耳だな……そっちに 専念した方が儲かるんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
それは初耳だな……そっちに
専念した方が儲かるんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Sure, but I enjoy selling food as well. Seeing the looks on unsuspecting customers' faces when they first try out my stuff is a daily delight.
engSearchText:
Sure, but I enjoy selling food as well. Seeing the looks
on unsuspecting customers' faces when they first try
out my stuff is a daily delight.
jpnChrName: まあ、不慣れな客の 反応は見てて楽しいんでね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、不慣れな客の
反応は見てて楽しいんでね。

engChrName: I live for the moments when young women complain about my food being bitter—then end up getting hooked anyway.
engSearchText:
I live for the moments when young women complain
about my food being bitter—then end up getting
hooked anyway.
jpnChrName: 特に若いオナゴが苦味やら見てくれに敬遠して、 でも結局は虜になる様は最高の見物だね。
jpnSearchText:
特に若いオナゴが苦味やら見てくれに敬遠して、
でも結局は虜になる様は最高の見物だね。

engChrName: ...Oookay, then. Won't question your weirdo kinks. Out loud.
engSearchText:
...Oookay, then. Won't question your weirdo kinks.
Out loud.
jpnChrName: ……その趣味も大概にゲテモノだな。
jpnSearchText: ……その趣味も大概にゲテモノだな。

engChrName: Do you find yourself exhausted at night, but don't want to go to sleep? Well, do I have the stuff for you.
engSearchText:
Do you find yourself exhausted at night, but don't
want to go to sleep? Well, do I have the stuff for you.
jpnChrName: 夜は疲れが溜まってるだろ？ 滋養強壮に効くモノはどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
夜は疲れが溜まってるだろ？
滋養強壮に効くモノはどうだい？

engChrName: In particular, this stuff works quite well on folks who...well, you know.
engSearchText:
In particular, this stuff works quite well on folks
who...well, you know.
jpnChrName: 見てくれがアレなヤツに限って 効き目が凄ぇんだな、これが。
jpnSearchText:
見てくれがアレなヤツに限って
効き目が凄ぇんだな、これが。

engChrName: Welcome! We sell all sorts of classic Eastern cuisine: dried snakes, frog meat, boiled grasshoppers, and more.
engSearchText:
Welcome! We sell all sorts of classic Eastern cuisine:
dried snakes, frog meat, boiled grasshoppers,
and more.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい！　東方秘伝の滋養食材だ、 蛇の干物にカエル肉、イナゴの佃煮はいかがかな！
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい！　東方秘伝の滋養食材だ、
蛇の干物にカエル肉、イナゴの佃煮はいかがかな！

engChrName: Oh, and if those don't look particularly appetizing, we've got medicinal porridges as well.
engSearchText:
Oh, and if those don't look particularly appetizing,
we've got medicinal porridges as well.
jpnChrName: 他にも薬膳の粥（かゆ）なんかもあるぜ、 これなら見てくれも気にせず食えるだろう？
jpnSearchText:
他にも薬膳の粥（かゆ）なんかもあるぜ、
これなら見てくれも気にせず食えるだろう？

engChrName: How about it, young lady! Any interest? The nutritional values of these meals are off the charts.
engSearchText:
How about it, young lady! Any interest?
The nutritional values of these meals are off the charts.
jpnChrName: お、そこの嬢ちゃん興味があるのかい？ 健康に良いぞ、騙されたと思って食うと良い！
jpnSearchText:
お、そこの嬢ちゃん興味があるのかい？
健康に良いぞ、騙されたと思って食うと良い！

engChrName: Umm... Is it just me, or are there some survival foods mixed in here...?
engSearchText:
Umm... Is it just me, or are there some survival foods
mixed in here...?
jpnChrName: えと、まるでサバイバル食みたいなものも 混じっているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
えと、まるでサバイバル食みたいなものも
混じっているのですが……

engChrName: This isn't exactly what I imagine when I think 'classic Eastern cuisine.'
engSearchText:
This isn't exactly what I imagine when I think 'classic
Eastern cuisine.'
jpnChrName: 話に聞いていた東方料理の イメージと違うような……
jpnSearchText:
話に聞いていた東方料理の
イメージと違うような……

engChrName: That's because it isn't. Long time no see, La-Kau.
engSearchText: That's because it isn't. Long time no see, La-Kau.
jpnChrName: ……こいつは東方料理の中でも特殊な部類だ。 久しぶりだな、ラーカウの爺さん。
jpnSearchText:
……こいつは東方料理の中でも特殊な部類だ。
久しぶりだな、ラーカウの爺さん。

engChrName: Sellin' your weird-ass food in Langport now, huh? How in the hell are you still in business?
engSearchText:
Sellin' your weird-ass food in Langport now, huh?
How in the hell are you still in business?
jpnChrName: 相変わらず東方人街でも賛否両論な 品まで並べて、まだ潰れずやっていたか。
jpnSearchText:
相変わらず東方人街でも賛否両論な
品まで並べて、まだ潰れずやっていたか。

engChrName: Well, well. If it isn't Van. It's certainly been a while, hasn't it?
engSearchText:
Well, well. If it isn't Van. It's certainly been a while,
hasn't it?
jpnChrName: おお、よく見りゃヴァンじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: おお、よく見りゃヴァンじゃねぇか。

engChrName: I don't recognize the young ones, though.
engSearchText: I don't recognize the young ones, though.
jpnChrName: 久しいと思えば、年端も行かねぇオナゴを 連れて東方人街巡りとはな。
jpnSearchText:
久しいと思えば、年端も行かねぇオナゴを
連れて東方人街巡りとはな。

engChrName: These two are my part-timers. They're new.
engSearchText: These two are my part-timers. They're new.
jpnChrName: そんなんじゃねぇ、ただのバイトだ。 二人もこの爺さんのいう事は気にするなよ。
jpnSearchText:
そんなんじゃねぇ、ただのバイトだ。
二人もこの爺さんのいう事は気にするなよ。

engChrName: Anyway, don't pay him any mind, girls. He's a jerk who sells disgusting crap—and tries to pass it off as medicinal cuisine.
engSearchText:
Anyway, don't pay him any mind, girls. He's a jerk
who sells disgusting crap—and tries to pass it off as
medicinal cuisine.
jpnChrName: 薬膳料理にかこつけてゲテモノまで 売りつけて楽しむような奴だからな。
jpnSearchText:
薬膳料理にかこつけてゲテモノまで
売りつけて楽しむような奴だからな。

engChrName: Hmph. Your taste buds didn't develop past the age of six, so I'm afraid your opinion on this holds little weight.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Your taste buds didn't develop past the age of
six, so I'm afraid your opinion on this holds
little weight.
jpnChrName: まあ、ヴァンは子供舌だからな。 そう言うのも仕方ない。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ヴァンは子供舌だからな。
そう言うのも仕方ない。

engChrName: Trust me, young ladies. Adult delicacies can be found in the most surprising of places.
engSearchText:
Trust me, young ladies. Adult delicacies can be found
in the most surprising of places.
jpnChrName: だが嬢ちゃんたち、大人の珍味ってのは 意外なところにあるもんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
だが嬢ちゃんたち、大人の珍味ってのは
意外なところにあるもんだぜ？

engChrName: Would you like to try some beginner-level frog porridge?
engSearchText:
Would you like to try some beginner-level
frog porridge?
jpnChrName: もしよければ、初心者向けの カエルの粥なんてどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
もしよければ、初心者向けの
カエルの粥なんてどうだい？

engChrName: I-I'm okay. Thank you.
engSearchText: I-I'm okay. Thank you.
jpnChrName: か、考えておきます……
jpnSearchText: か、考えておきます……

engChrName: I enjoy this line of work, but there are some folks with unrefined palates who don't get it at all.
engSearchText:
I enjoy this line of work, but there are some
folks with unrefined palates who don't get it at all.
jpnChrName: まあ、俺もこういう商売楽しくやっちゃいるが、 理解が無い奴もいるし、苦労もあってなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、俺もこういう商売楽しくやっちゃいるが、
理解が無い奴もいるし、苦労もあってなぁ。

engChrName: Last week, some riffraff from outside came and obstructed my business.
engSearchText:
Last week, some riffraff from outside came and
obstructed my business.
jpnChrName: 先週あたりまで、他所の街から来たチンピラ共に、 色々嫌がらせや営業妨害をされちまってよぉ……
jpnSearchText:
先週あたりまで、他所の街から来たチンピラ共に、
色々嫌がらせや営業妨害をされちまってよぉ……

engChrName: Thankfully, some of the locals ran them out over the last few days, so now I can conduct my business as usual.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, some of the locals ran them out over the
last few days, so now I can conduct my business
as usual.
jpnChrName: それでも……ここ数日は地元の連中が追っ払ってくれて、 安心して商売できるように戻ったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも……ここ数日は地元の連中が追っ払ってくれて、
安心して商売できるように戻ったんだ。

engChrName: There isn't a single food in the world that can be universally loved. That's why I don't go for mass appeal. I just make food I think is good.
engSearchText:
There isn't a single food in the world that can be
universally loved. That's why I don't go for
mass appeal. I just make food I think is good.
jpnChrName: そもそも、完璧に万人受けする 食い物ってのはこの世に存在するのかい？
jpnSearchText:
そもそも、完璧に万人受けする
食い物ってのはこの世に存在するのかい？

engChrName: And as the old saying goes, good medicine always tastes bitter. The same applies to food.
engSearchText:
And as the old saying goes, good medicine always
tastes bitter. The same applies to food.
jpnChrName: 良薬は口に苦しって言うだろ、材料の見た目も 同じ事が言えたりするんじゃないのか？
jpnSearchText:
良薬は口に苦しって言うだろ、材料の見た目も
同じ事が言えたりするんじゃないのか？

engChrName: If you wish to refine your palate into that of a culinary connoisseur, stop by my store. My grilled rat dish will whip you into shape.
engSearchText:
If you wish to refine your palate into that of a culinary
connoisseur, stop by my store. My grilled rat dish will
whip you into shape.
jpnChrName: まあ、うちは挑戦者も大歓迎だ。 気が向いたら食っていってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、うちは挑戦者も大歓迎だ。
気が向いたら食っていってくれ。

engChrName: This place serves noodles, right?
engSearchText: This place serves noodles, right?
jpnChrName: このお店は麺処なのかしら？
jpnSearchText: このお店は麺処なのかしら？

engChrName: Is it just me, or do these noodles have a weird shape?
engSearchText: Is it just me, or do these noodles have a weird shape?
jpnChrName: それにしてもこの麺…… なんだか不思議な形をしてるわね？
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもこの麺……
なんだか不思議な形をしてるわね？

engChrName: I prefer the word 'unique.' They're also the best knife-cut noodles you'll ever find!
engSearchText:
I prefer the word 'unique.' They're also the best
knife-cut noodles you'll ever find!
jpnChrName: ああ、この特殊な麺こそが “刀削麺（ダオシャオミェン）”の醍醐味だよ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この特殊な麺こそが
“刀削麺（ダオシャオミェン）”の醍醐味だよ！

engChrName: This dish lets you enjoy classic Eastern flavors while basking in the skills of the master who cut them.
engSearchText:
This dish lets you enjoy classic Eastern flavors while
basking in the skills of the master who cut them.
jpnChrName: 東方伝統の味と匠の技を 同時に楽しめる一品さ。
jpnSearchText:
東方伝統の味と匠の技を
同時に楽しめる一品さ。

engChrName: If you haven't had them before, you should definitely try them once.
engSearchText:
If you haven't had them before, you should definitely
try them once.
jpnChrName: まだ食べた事が無いなら 一度は食べてみた方がいいよ！
jpnSearchText:
まだ食べた事が無いなら
一度は食べてみた方がいいよ！

engChrName: It'd be a waste to let life pass you by without ever having tried knife-cut noodles.
engSearchText:
It'd be a waste to let life pass you by without ever
having tried knife-cut noodles.
jpnChrName: 刀削麺を食べた事が無いなら 勿体ないと思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
刀削麺を食べた事が無いなら
勿体ないと思うよ。

engChrName: It'll make for a great conversation topic, too! Definitely try it out!
engSearchText:
It'll make for a great conversation topic, too!
Definitely try it out!
jpnChrName: 話の種にもなるだろうし、 ぜひ寄って行ってくれ！
jpnSearchText:
話の種にもなるだろうし、
ぜひ寄って行ってくれ！

engChrName: Aaron, I'm...so sorry about Sei and Huang...
engSearchText: Aaron, I'm...so sorry about Sei and Huang...
jpnChrName: アーロン……セイやホアンたちの事は、その……
jpnSearchText: アーロン……セイやホアンたちの事は、その……

engChrName: They were some of the nicest guys I knew. They enjoyed my noodles so much...
engSearchText:
They were some of the nicest guys I knew.
They enjoyed my noodles so much...
jpnChrName: あいつらも、いつもうちの麺を美味しそうに 食べていてくれたのに……
jpnSearchText:
あいつらも、いつもうちの麺を美味しそうに
食べていてくれたのに……

engChrName: I know they did. And don't worry, I'll make damn sure they're avenged.
engSearchText:
I know they did. And don't worry, I'll make damn
sure they're avenged.
jpnChrName: お前は気にすんな……オレは、二度と刀削麺も 食えなくなっちまった連中の仇を討つだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
お前は気にすんな……オレは、二度と刀削麺も
食えなくなっちまった連中の仇を討つだけだ。

engChrName: Got'cha. In that case, I'll whip up the best noodles you'll ever eat and cheer you on.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. In that case, I'll whip up the best noodles
you'll ever eat and cheer you on.
jpnChrName: そう……なら私は、アーロンを信じて 最高の麺を用意して、応援するだけだよ。
jpnSearchText:
そう……なら私は、アーロンを信じて
最高の麺を用意して、応援するだけだよ。

engChrName: Go get 'em, Aaron! Teach those assholes a lesson!
engSearchText: Go get 'em, Aaron! Teach those assholes a lesson!
jpnChrName: 二度とこんなことにならないためにも…… あいつらを懲らしめてきてよアーロン！
jpnSearchText:
二度とこんなことにならないためにも……
あいつらを懲らしめてきてよアーロン！

engChrName: Time to dig into your noodles, everyone!
engSearchText: Time to dig into your noodles, everyone!
jpnChrName: さあ、皆さん今こそ麺を食べてね……！
jpnSearchText: さあ、皆さん今こそ麺を食べてね……！

engChrName: They're smooth, easy to eat, and great for revitalizing stamina. Perfect for a time like this.
engSearchText:
They're smooth, easy to eat, and great for
revitalizing stamina. Perfect for a time like this.
jpnChrName: 麺はスタミナがつくけどツルツル 食べやすいし、こういう時にピッタリだよ。
jpnSearchText:
麺はスタミナがつくけどツルツル
食べやすいし、こういう時にピッタリだよ。

engChrName: When life gets tough, eat noodles! Like the noodle, the path to the future is long and winding, so just take it one step—or slurp—at a time!
engSearchText:
When life gets tough, eat noodles! Like the noodle,
the path to the future is long and winding, so just
take it one step—or slurp—at a time!
jpnChrName: 辛いことがあっても……麺を食べて、 麺の様に真っすぐに進んでいこうよ！
jpnSearchText:
辛いことがあっても……麺を食べて、
麺の様に真っすぐに進んでいこうよ！

engChrName: Master and I are in a funk because of what happened last night. Today, he messed up the noodle prep for the first time in ten years.
engSearchText:
Master and I are in a funk because of what happened
last night. Today, he messed up the noodle prep for
the first time in ten years.
jpnChrName: 昨夜は大変だったね……師匠も混乱したみたいで、 十年ぶりに麺を削るのミスしたって……
jpnSearchText:
昨夜は大変だったね……師匠も混乱したみたいで、
十年ぶりに麺を削るのミスしたって……

engChrName: We've gotta get it together. People's spirits are at an all-time low, so we need to do our best to lift them.
engSearchText:
We've gotta get it together. People's spirits are at an
all-time low, so we need to do our best to lift them.
jpnChrName: この通りで殺人まであったし…… なおの事、私らも、店を閉める訳にはいかないよ。
jpnSearchText:
この通りで殺人まであったし……
なおの事、私らも、店を閉める訳にはいかないよ。

engChrName: Easterners are like chewy noodles. Flexible and strong—but also easy to cut.
engSearchText:
Easterners are like chewy noodles. Flexible and
strong—but also easy to cut.
jpnChrName: 東方人ってのはコシのある麺と同じで、 柔軟で強いけどさっぱり切れる気質なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
東方人ってのはコシのある麺と同じで、
柔軟で強いけどさっぱり切れる気質なんだ。

engChrName: We're going to put smiles back on people's faces with our noodles. We'll get through this together!
engSearchText:
We're going to put smiles back on people's faces with
our noodles. We'll get through this together!
jpnChrName: 最高の麺で皆を元気づけて、この街の東方人の 強さで乗り越えていかないと……！
jpnSearchText:
最高の麺で皆を元気づけて、この街の東方人の
強さで乗り越えていかないと……！

engChrName: Welcome! Would you care for some knife-cut noodles? We also serve ramen if that's more to your liking.
engSearchText:
Welcome! Would you care for some
knife-cut noodles? We also serve ramen if that's more
to your liking.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、夕食にも刀削麺はどう？ 一応、普通の拉麺（ラーミェン）もあるよ。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、夕食にも刀削麺はどう？
一応、普通の拉麺（ラーミェン）もあるよ。

engChrName: Noodles are a staple of Eastern cuisine.
engSearchText: Noodles are a staple of Eastern cuisine.
jpnChrName: 麺類は東方料理の花形だからね。
jpnSearchText: 麺類は東方料理の花形だからね。

engChrName: Though I do hear there are places around the world that use special flour instead of wheat to make soba.
engSearchText:
Though I do hear there are places around the world
that use special flour instead of wheat to make soba.
jpnChrName: 他にも、地域によっては小麦粉の代わりに 特別な穀粉を使う“蕎麦”もあるらしいよね。
jpnSearchText:
他にも、地域によっては小麦粉の代わりに
特別な穀粉を使う“蕎麦”もあるらしいよね。

engChrName: Heya, Aaron! What's up?
engSearchText: Heya, Aaron! What's up?
jpnChrName: あ、アーロンじゃない！
jpnSearchText: あ、アーロンじゃない！

engChrName: If you haven't had any dinner yet, I'd be happy to serve you up some noodles. I'll even give you a nice discount.
engSearchText:
If you haven't had any dinner yet, I'd be happy to
serve you up some noodles. I'll even give you a
nice discount.
jpnChrName: 夕食まだならうちの麺はどう？ アーロンにならおまけするよっ。
jpnSearchText:
夕食まだならうちの麺はどう？
アーロンにならおまけするよっ。

engChrName: Sweet. I might just take you up on your offer later.
engSearchText: Sweet. I might just take you up on your offer later.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そいつは気が利くじゃねぇか。 用が済んだら一杯食いに来ても良いな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そいつは気が利くじゃねぇか。
用が済んだら一杯食いに来ても良いな。

engChrName: Might wanna be careful about who you're being generous with, though.
engSearchText:
Might wanna be careful about who you're being
generous with, though.
jpnChrName: だが、そんな気前良いところ見せて良いのか？
jpnSearchText: だが、そんな気前良いところ見せて良いのか？

engChrName: I might just eat you up along with your noodles.
engSearchText: I might just eat you up along with your noodles.
jpnChrName: 何なら、ミーレンも麺みてぇにツルっと いただいちまっても良いんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
何なら、ミーレンも麺みてぇにツルっと
いただいちまっても良いんだぜ？

engChrName: *sigh* That line again?
engSearchText: *sigh* That line again?
jpnChrName: まーたそういう事言うー。
jpnSearchText: まーたそういう事言うー。

engChrName: Listen, it's not that I don't like you, but you've already got you-know-who.
engSearchText:
Listen, it's not that I don't like you, but you've already
got you-know-who.
jpnChrName: んま、私は別にアーロンは嫌いじゃないけど、 あの子もいる訳だしねー。
jpnSearchText:
んま、私は別にアーロンは嫌いじゃないけど、
あの子もいる訳だしねー。

engChrName: She's a great catch. If you don't ask her out soon, someone else might snatch her up.
engSearchText:
She's a great catch. If you don't ask her out soon,
someone else might snatch her up.
jpnChrName: 幼馴染は大切にするんだよ、麺のスープみたく、 今のうちから熟成した関係が大事なんだし。
jpnSearchText:
幼馴染は大切にするんだよ、麺のスープみたく、
今のうちから熟成した関係が大事なんだし。

engChrName: They can have her. She and I are just friends.
engSearchText: They can have her. She and I are just friends.
jpnChrName: フン、あいつは別にそんなんじゃねぇさ。 まあ、だからって邪険にする気もねぇがよ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、あいつは別にそんなんじゃねぇさ。
まあ、だからって邪険にする気もねぇがよ。

engChrName: I love the way you eat your noodles, Aaron!
engSearchText: I love the way you eat your noodles, Aaron!
jpnChrName: アーロンは麺の食べっぷりが すごくいいんだよね！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンは麺の食べっぷりが
すごくいいんだよね！

engChrName: When you've been in the biz as long as I have, you can tell who's a big shot and who isn't based on how they eat noodles.
engSearchText:
When you've been in the biz as long as I have, you
can tell who's a big shot and who isn't based on how
they eat noodles.
jpnChrName: 私ほどになると麺の食べ方で 大物だってわかるよ！
jpnSearchText:
私ほどになると麺の食べ方で
大物だってわかるよ！

engChrName: And since you look so darn cool—and hot—when you slurp 'em up, I can tell you're the real deal!
engSearchText:
And since you look so darn cool—and hot—when
you slurp 'em up, I can tell you're the real deal!
jpnChrName: あんなに豪快で格好よく食べられる アーロンはただ者じゃないんだ！
jpnSearchText:
あんなに豪快で格好よく食べられる
アーロンはただ者じゃないんだ！

engChrName: Welcome! Would you like to try this knife-cut noodle bowl? It's an Eastern specialty!
engSearchText:
Welcome! Would you like to try this knife-cut
noodle bowl? It's an Eastern specialty!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、数ある東方麺の中でも 匠の技が光る“刀削麺（ダオシャオミェン）”だよ！
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、数ある東方麺の中でも
匠の技が光る“刀削麺（ダオシャオミェン）”だよ！

engChrName: Master makes them in the back with his blade.
engSearchText: Master makes them in the back with his blade.
jpnChrName: この麺、奥で師匠が刃物で シャッシャッって削って作ってるんだ！
jpnSearchText:
この麺、奥で師匠が刃物で
シャッシャッって削って作ってるんだ！

engChrName: I'd love to show you all how the sausage is made, but he doesn't like people being back there. He's a bit fussy about sanitation these days.
engSearchText:
I'd love to show you all how the sausage is made, but
he doesn't like people being back there. He's a bit
fussy about sanitation these days.
jpnChrName: 本当はそれをここで見せたいけど…… 残念ながら最近は衛生面で色々うるさくてね。
jpnSearchText:
本当はそれをここで見せたいけど……
残念ながら最近は衛生面で色々うるさくてね。

engChrName: But I promise you that his noodles are first rate. Give it a try—you won't regret it!
engSearchText:
But I promise you that his noodles are first rate.
Give it a try—you won't regret it!
jpnChrName: でも、味はいつまで経っても逸品だから 是非とも食べていってよ！
jpnSearchText:
でも、味はいつまで経っても逸品だから
是非とも食べていってよ！

engChrName: There are all kinds of Eastern noodles, but knife-cut noodles are the best of them all.
engSearchText:
There are all kinds of Eastern noodles, but knife-cut
noodles are the best of them all.
jpnChrName: 東方麺も色々あるけど、刀削麺は 味もさることながら作り方が凄いんだ。
jpnSearchText:
東方麺も色々あるけど、刀削麺は
味もさることながら作り方が凄いんだ。

engChrName: It's also fun to see how they get made. Back in the day, we used to show off the process as a show.
engSearchText:
It's also fun to see how they get made. Back in the
day, we used to show off the process as a show.
jpnChrName: 昔はここでパフォーマンスとして 見せたりもしてたんだけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
昔はここでパフォーマンスとして
見せたりもしてたんだけどねぇ。

engChrName: My daughter told me she got goosebumps before the mist came out...
engSearchText:
My daughter told me she got goosebumps before the
mist came out...
jpnChrName: ……昨日の霧、娘は真剣な感じで 何かを感じたって言うけど……
jpnSearchText:
……昨日の霧、娘は真剣な感じで
何かを感じたって言うけど……

engChrName: I've also noticed Pao's been lending an ear to my daughter for a little while now.
engSearchText:
I've also noticed Pao's been lending an ear to my
daughter for a little while now.
jpnChrName: そういえば、前からパオ婆さんは娘の 話を真剣に聞いていたっけ……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、前からパオ婆さんは娘の
話を真剣に聞いていたっけ……

engChrName: Pao seemed especially on edge this morning—a rarity for her. Something strange is going on. I just know it.
engSearchText:
Pao seemed especially on edge this morning—a rarity
for her. Something strange is going on. I just know it.
jpnChrName: パオ婆さん、今朝も珍しく慌てていたけど もしかして、本当に何かあるのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
パオ婆さん、今朝も珍しく慌てていたけど
もしかして、本当に何かあるのかしら……

engChrName: What happened yesterday? There was all that mist, and apparently, there was an incident outside... I'm glad we were in the house.
engSearchText:
What happened yesterday? There was all that mist,
and apparently, there was an incident outside...
I'm glad we were in the house.
jpnChrName: 昨日の霧、何だったのかしらね…… 私達は家にいたけど、外で事件もあったって……
jpnSearchText:
昨日の霧、何だったのかしらね……
私達は家にいたけど、外で事件もあったって……

engChrName: But I'm concerned about Linlin. She was in a daze last night—saying she could feel something was wrong.
engSearchText:
But I'm concerned about Linlin. She was in a daze
last night—saying she could feel something
was wrong.
jpnChrName: リンリンも何か感じるって、 戸惑っちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
リンリンも何か感じるって、
戸惑っちゃって……

engChrName: And she said this before the mist appeared... I need to sit down with her and try to figure out what's going on.
engSearchText:
And she said this before the mist appeared... I need to
sit down with her and try to figure out what's
going on.
jpnChrName: 母親として、もっと娘の感性を 理解してあげなくちゃね……
jpnSearchText:
母親として、もっと娘の感性を
理解してあげなくちゃね……

engChrName: Shopping takes so much longer when the market is this crowded. I just need to get some food for dinner...
engSearchText:
Shopping takes so much longer when the market is
this crowded. I just need to get some food
for dinner...
jpnChrName: 今夜のおかずは何にしようかしら…… 観光客が多いと、普段の買い物も賑やかなものね。
jpnSearchText:
今夜のおかずは何にしようかしら……
観光客が多いと、普段の買い物も賑やかなものね。

engChrName: I've noticed that tourists tend to buy up a lot of the stores' inventories. Sometimes on weekends, there isn't much left to buy.
engSearchText:
I've noticed that tourists tend to buy up a lot of the
stores' inventories. Sometimes on weekends, there
isn't much left to buy.
jpnChrName: まあ地元民としては、大量買いは少し困るけどね。 週末とか結構品薄になっちゃう事もあるしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ地元民としては、大量買いは少し困るけどね。
週末とか結構品薄になっちゃう事もあるしねぇ。

engChrName: I'm getting goosebumps again... It's just like yesterday.
engSearchText:
I'm getting goosebumps again... It's just
like yesterday.
jpnChrName: なんか、またきのうみたいなイヤな かんじしてきたかも……
jpnSearchText:
なんか、またきのうみたいなイヤな
かんじしてきたかも……

engChrName: I talked to Pao about it, but she didn't know what was going on, either.
engSearchText:
I talked to Pao about it, but she didn't know what was
going on, either.
jpnChrName: パオおばあちゃんにもソウダンしたけど、 パオおばあちゃんも、こたえられないって……
jpnSearchText:
パオおばあちゃんにもソウダンしたけど、
パオおばあちゃんも、こたえられないって……

engChrName: I don't know what to do. What would the fortune teller lady say?
engSearchText:
I don't know what to do. What would the fortune
teller lady say?
jpnChrName: どうしよう、わかんないよ…… 占いのお姉さんがいたら、なんていうかな……？
jpnSearchText:
どうしよう、わかんないよ……
占いのお姉さんがいたら、なんていうかな……？

engChrName: When the scary mist came out, I got goosebumps.
engSearchText: When the scary mist came out, I got goosebumps.
jpnChrName: きのうキリが出た時、なんだかスゴい ゾワゾワがあったの……
jpnSearchText:
きのうキリが出た時、なんだかスゴい
ゾワゾワがあったの……

engChrName: I also felt like someone was watching me...
engSearchText: I also felt like someone was watching me...
jpnChrName: なんだか、だれかにみられているみたいで……
jpnSearchText: なんだか、だれかにみられているみたいで……

engChrName: Even Pao was looking scared... What's going on?
engSearchText: Even Pao was looking scared... What's going on?
jpnChrName: パオおばあちゃんも、何かこわがっていたみたい だけど……ほんとうになんだったのかな。
jpnSearchText:
パオおばあちゃんも、何かこわがっていたみたい
だけど……ほんとうになんだったのかな。

engChrName: I got to talk with a traveling fortune teller lady a while ago.
engSearchText:
I got to talk with a traveling fortune teller lady a
while ago.
jpnChrName: まえにこの街に、占いのお姉さんが 来たことがあったの。
jpnSearchText:
まえにこの街に、占いのお姉さんが
来たことがあったの。

engChrName: She said, 'I can see into the unknown,' and then she predicted things that actually happened the next day. She was SO cool!
engSearchText:
She said, 'I can see into the unknown,' and then she
predicted things that actually happened the next day.
She was SO cool!
jpnChrName: みんなには見えないものが見えて、 明日のこともわかってすごいんだ！
jpnSearchText:
みんなには見えないものが見えて、
明日のこともわかってすごいんだ！

engChrName: She also said I had the potential...
engSearchText: She also said I had the potential...
jpnChrName: でも、そのときなんかソシツが あるとか言われたけど……
jpnSearchText:
でも、そのときなんかソシツが
あるとか言われたけど……

engChrName: ...but I, uh, have no idea what that means.
engSearchText: ...but I, uh, have no idea what that means.
jpnChrName: どういういみなんだろう？
jpnSearchText: どういういみなんだろう？

engChrName: Tell you what. I'll cut you a sweet deal.
engSearchText: Tell you what. I'll cut you a sweet deal.
jpnChrName: 気前のいいお客さん、 感謝の印にワタシももっと奮発するネ！
jpnSearchText:
気前のいいお客さん、
感謝の印にワタシももっと奮発するネ！

engChrName: If you buy this within the next sixty seconds, I'll throw in this stuffed animal and make it half price. Whaddaya say?!
engSearchText:
If you buy this within the next sixty seconds, I'll
throw in this stuffed animal and make it half price.
Whaddaya say?!
jpnChrName: 今ならこっちのぬいぐるみも セットで半額にしてあげちゃうアルヨ！
jpnSearchText:
今ならこっちのぬいぐるみも
セットで半額にしてあげちゃうアルヨ！

engChrName: Wow! That's cheap!
engSearchText: Wow! That's cheap!
jpnChrName: まあ、なんてお買い得なのかしら……！
jpnSearchText: まあ、なんてお買い得なのかしら……！

engChrName: Don't fall for it.
engSearchText: Don't fall for it.
jpnChrName: 流石にもう止めておけ。
jpnSearchText: 流石にもう止めておけ。

engChrName: I've still got my sights set on those gullible Imperials...
engSearchText: I've still got my sights set on those gullible Imperials...
jpnChrName: 今でも帝国人は狙い目アルが……
jpnSearchText: 今でも帝国人は狙い目アルが……

engChrName: ...but with Heiyue on edge, I prooobably oughta pump the brakes.
engSearchText:
...but with Heiyue on edge, I prooobably oughta
pump the brakes.
jpnChrName: 黒月もピリピリしてるし、あまり調子に 乗ると睨まれちゃうかもアルネ。
jpnSearchText:
黒月もピリピリしてるし、あまり調子に
乗ると睨まれちゃうかもアルネ。

engChrName: I might be better off settin' up shop in the Empire or Crossbell at this rate.
engSearchText:
I might be better off settin' up shop in the Empire or
Crossbell at this rate.
jpnChrName: この際、帝国かクロスベルまで行って 商売するのも手かもしれないアル。
jpnSearchText:
この際、帝国かクロスベルまで行って
商売するのも手かもしれないアル。

engChrName: Maybe I'll lean on my connections in the capital a little, too.
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll lean on my connections in the capital a
little, too.
jpnChrName: 首都の方の筋を頼って 考えてみるのも手アルか。
jpnSearchText:
首都の方の筋を頼って
考えてみるのも手アルか。

engChrName: Thanks to that Imperial moron from yesterday, I made a killing for the first time in ages.
engSearchText:
Thanks to that Imperial moron from yesterday, I
made a killing for the first time in ages.
jpnChrName: ウヒョヒョ、昨日は帝国人のお陰で 久しぶりに儲かったアル。
jpnSearchText:
ウヒョヒョ、昨日は帝国人のお陰で
久しぶりに儲かったアル。

engChrName: I'm not really feeling the luck today, though. Everyone's kinda on edge after last night.
engSearchText:
I'm not really feeling the luck today, though.
Everyone's kinda on edge after last night.
jpnChrName: もう一押ししても良いが、昨日の一件で 皆も不安がってるアルネ。
jpnSearchText:
もう一押ししても良いが、昨日の一件で
皆も不安がってるアルネ。

engChrName: I considered using that to my advantage, but when I heard there were casualties, I thought I'd better not.
engSearchText:
I considered using that to my advantage, but when I
heard there were casualties, I thought I'd better not.
jpnChrName: 最初は不安に乗じるのも手と思ったアルが…… 聞く限り、今回は洒落にならなさそうアル。
jpnSearchText:
最初は不安に乗じるのも手と思ったアルが……
聞く限り、今回は洒落にならなさそうアル。

engChrName: Guess I'll just cooperate with Heiyue for the time being.
engSearchText:
Guess I'll just cooperate with Heiyue for the
time being.
jpnChrName: 黒月に協力できることはする他ないアルね……
jpnSearchText: 黒月に協力できることはする他ないアルね……

engChrName: Heeheehee. Imperials are total suckers.
engSearchText: Heeheehee. Imperials are total suckers.
jpnChrName: ウヒョヒョヒョ、毎度アル。 帝国の人は、文化の理解が良いアルネ。
jpnSearchText:
ウヒョヒョヒョ、毎度アル。
帝国の人は、文化の理解が良いアルネ。

engChrName: ...Oh, I mean, they're my bestest customers! They don't go raisin' a stink about faults in my merchandise.
engSearchText:
...Oh, I mean, they're my bestest customers!
They don't go raisin' a stink about faults in
my merchandise.
jpnChrName: ワタシの品物に変な難癖はつけないで、 素直で純粋なキモチで買ってくれるアル。
jpnSearchText:
ワタシの品物に変な難癖はつけないで、
素直で純粋なキモチで買ってくれるアル。

engChrName: The herbal medicine is TOTALLY safe, and the Moshy brand's completely legit. Any resemblance to other characters is purely coincidental!
engSearchText:
The herbal medicine is TOTALLY safe, and the
Moshy brand's completely legit. Any resemblance to
other characters is purely coincidental!
jpnChrName: 生薬だって多分何も混ざってないし、 キャラが似てしまうのもよくある事アルヨ。
jpnSearchText:
生薬だって多分何も混ざってないし、
キャラが似てしまうのもよくある事アルヨ。

engChrName: If I hear 'Moshy is a Mishy ripoff' one more damn time, I'm gonna lose it.
engSearchText:
If I hear 'Moshy is a Mishy ripoff' one more damn
time, I'm gonna lose it.
jpnChrName: うちの目玉商品“もっしぃ”を“みっしぃ”の パクリだと言うのはやめて欲しいネ。
jpnSearchText:
うちの目玉商品“もっしぃ”を“みっしぃ”の
パクリだと言うのはやめて欲しいネ。

engChrName: This one has a long nose, and the eyes are higher up. They look nothing alike! Moshy's not a knockoff!
engSearchText:
This one has a long nose, and the eyes are higher up.
They look nothing alike! Moshy's not a knockoff!
jpnChrName: 良く見るアル、こっちの方が鼻の下が 長くて、目が上の方についてるアル。
jpnSearchText:
良く見るアル、こっちの方が鼻の下が
長くて、目が上の方についてるアル。

engChrName: Look at my face. Would this face lie to you?
engSearchText: Look at my face. Would this face lie to you?
jpnChrName: どう見ても全くの別物アルネ！
jpnSearchText: どう見ても全くの別物アルネ！

engChrName: Heehee. Hey there, young man. Interested in buyin' some souvenirs?
engSearchText:
Heehee. Hey there, young man. Interested in buyin'
some souvenirs?
jpnChrName: ウヒョヒョ、そこのお兄さん！ お土産はいかがアルか？
jpnSearchText:
ウヒョヒョ、そこのお兄さん！
お土産はいかがアルか？

engChrName: Got some mega-cheap medicinal herbs, affordable fortune vases, and other stuff that's exclusive to my shop!
engSearchText:
Got some mega-cheap medicinal herbs, affordable
fortune vases, and other stuff that's exclusive to
my shop!
jpnChrName: 格安の生薬に幸運の壺…… ここでしか買えないものが目白押しアル。
jpnSearchText:
格安の生薬に幸運の壺……
ここでしか買えないものが目白押しアル。

engChrName: We've even got Moshy merch in stock! It's all the rage with the ladies.
engSearchText:
We've even got Moshy merch in stock! It's all the
rage with the ladies.
jpnChrName: そして極めつけはオナゴに人気の この“もっしぃ”のグッズ！
jpnSearchText:
そして極めつけはオナゴに人気の
この“もっしぃ”のグッズ！

engChrName: Oh, and don't listen to those morons who say he's a ripoff of some mascot from Crossbell. They're just tryin' to drag Moshy's good name!
engSearchText:
Oh, and don't listen to those morons who say he's a
ripoff of some mascot from Crossbell. They're just
tryin' to drag Moshy's good name!
jpnChrName: クロスベルのテーマパークのキャラに似ていると 言う人もいるけど、それは気のせいアルヨ！
jpnSearchText:
クロスベルのテーマパークのキャラに似ていると
言う人もいるけど、それは気のせいアルヨ！

engChrName: (So these things aren't Mishy? But they look so alike...)
engSearchText:
(So these things aren't Mishy? But they look
so alike...)
jpnChrName: （み、“みっしぃ”かと思ったら……）
jpnSearchText: （み、“みっしぃ”かと思ったら……）

engChrName: (Though I suppose it would be strange for a shop here to be selling Crossbell theme park goods...)
engSearchText:
(Though I suppose it would be strange for a shop
here to be selling Crossbell theme park goods...)
jpnChrName: （あのテーマパークのマスコットをここで売っている   のも何か変だなとは思いましたが……）
jpnSearchText:
（あのテーマパークのマスコットをここで売っている
のも何か変だなとは思いましたが……）

engChrName: (Nearly fooled you, didn't he? If he kept his mouth shut, he might've gotten a sale.)
engSearchText:
(Nearly fooled you, didn't he? If he kept his mouth
shut, he might've gotten a sale.)
jpnChrName: （まあ……最近は減ったと思ったが、   まだこの手合いもいるもんだからな。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ……最近は減ったと思ったが、
まだこの手合いもいるもんだからな。）

engChrName: (Well, you can buy his stuff if you want, but just know he only sells knockoff goods. Could still be useful, though.)
engSearchText:
(Well, you can buy his stuff if you want, but just
know he only sells knockoff goods. Could still be
useful, though.)
jpnChrName: （とりあえず、パチモンを売る商人のようだ、   買っても良いがほどほどにな。）
jpnSearchText:
（とりあえず、パチモンを売る商人のようだ、
買っても良いがほどほどにな。）

engChrName: Oooh, I smell an Imperial tourist over there.
engSearchText: Oooh, I smell an Imperial tourist over there.
jpnChrName: ウヒョヒョヒョ、あっちから 帝国のお客の匂いするアルネ。
jpnSearchText:
ウヒョヒョヒョ、あっちから
帝国のお客の匂いするアルネ。

engChrName: Imperials aren't used to Eastern culture, so they make for good targets—err... I mean, good customers!
engSearchText:
Imperials aren't used to Eastern culture, so they make
for good targets—err... I mean, good customers!
jpnChrName: 帝国人は東方文化に不慣れ。 だから良いお客になるアル！
jpnSearchText:
帝国人は東方文化に不慣れ。
だから良いお客になるアル！

engChrName: As I understand it, there was an incident out here while I was at the inn. I might've underestimated yesterday's phenomenon.
engSearchText:
As I understand it, there was an incident out here
while I was at the inn. I might've underestimated
yesterday's phenomenon.
jpnChrName: 聞けば、僕が宿にいる間に事件があったというが…… 昨日の現象を不謹慎に捉え過ぎていたかもな。
jpnSearchText:
聞けば、僕が宿にいる間に事件があったというが……
昨日の現象を不謹慎に捉え過ぎていたかもな。

engChrName: Perhaps I should be getting back home.
engSearchText: Perhaps I should be getting back home.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、僕はもうそろそろ帰らないといけない。
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、僕はもうそろそろ帰らないといけない。

engChrName: It's not like I can do much else here, anyway. Other than, well, spend money.
engSearchText:
It's not like I can do much else here, anyway.
Other than, well, spend money.
jpnChrName: まあ、僕に出来るのは残念ながら観光で ミラを落とすことくらいだしね……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、僕に出来るのは残念ながら観光で
ミラを落とすことくらいだしね……

engChrName: I've fallen in love with Eastern culture all over again. I'm definitely going to come back, and I'll probably bring a friend with me, too.
engSearchText:
I've fallen in love with Eastern culture all over again.
I'm definitely going to come back, and I'll probably
bring a friend with me, too.
jpnChrName: 東方文化も改めて好きになれたし、 応援も兼ねて次は友達と一緒に来るよ。
jpnSearchText:
東方文化も改めて好きになれたし、
応援も兼ねて次は友達と一緒に来るよ。

engChrName: Things got a little strange last night with the mist. Is this one of the mystical wonders of the East? Is it a common occurrence here?
engSearchText:
Things got a little strange last night with the mist.
Is this one of the mystical wonders of the East? Is it a
common occurrence here?
jpnChrName: 昨夜は何か霧が出たりして妙な雰囲気だったけど、 これも東方の神秘ってやつなのかい？
jpnSearchText:
昨夜は何か霧が出たりして妙な雰囲気だったけど、
これも東方の神秘ってやつなのかい？

engChrName: Regardless, it was quite the sight. I would have taken some pictures, but my camera suddenly broke on me. It's too bad, really.
engSearchText:
Regardless, it was quite the sight. I would have taken
some pictures, but my camera suddenly broke on me.
It's too bad, really.
jpnChrName: なかなか幻想的な光景だったね、 カメラが急に壊れたのが悔やまれるよ。
jpnSearchText:
なかなか幻想的な光景だったね、
カメラが急に壊れたのが悔やまれるよ。

engChrName: Oh, well. I've got a treasure trove of stories to tell when I get home, and that's good enough for me.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. I've got a treasure trove of stories to tell
when I get home, and that's good enough for me.
jpnChrName: あれも東方じゃあ日常なのかな？ 面白い土産話が増えたね。
jpnSearchText:
あれも東方じゃあ日常なのかな？
面白い土産話が増えたね。

engChrName: I've been spending most of my night talking with this kind merchant here.
engSearchText:
I've been spending most of my night talking with this
kind merchant here.
jpnChrName: いやあ、夜市をどう回ろうか迷っていたけど、 僕ってばラッキーだよ！
jpnSearchText:
いやあ、夜市をどう回ろうか迷っていたけど、
僕ってばラッキーだよ！

engChrName: He's been teaching me all about Eastern culture.
engSearchText: He's been teaching me all about Eastern culture.
jpnChrName: この親切な商人の方に 色々と教えてもらえてさ。
jpnSearchText:
この親切な商人の方に
色々と教えてもらえてさ。

engChrName: And thanks to him, I'm loaded up on medicinal herbs, and I bought a holy vase for an absurdly cheap price.
engSearchText:
And thanks to him, I'm loaded up on medicinal
herbs, and I bought a holy vase for an absurdly
cheap price.
jpnChrName: おまけに、健康に良い生薬や聖なる壺も、 信じられないほど安く売ってくれたんだ！
jpnSearchText:
おまけに、健康に良い生薬や聖なる壺も、
信じられないほど安く売ってくれたんだ！

engChrName: This Moshy character is awesome! I really hit the jackpot today!
engSearchText:
This Moshy character is awesome! I really hit the
jackpot today!
jpnChrName: この“もっしぃ”ってキャラクターも ナイスなセンスだね！
jpnSearchText:
この“もっしぃ”ってキャラクターも
ナイスなセンスだね！

engChrName: I feel like I've seen the character before, but the merchant says it's a hundred percent original. And a merchant never lies, so it must be true!
engSearchText:
I feel like I've seen the character before, but the
merchant says it's a hundred percent original. And a
merchant never lies, so it must be true!
jpnChrName: どこかで見た気もするけど、 全くのオリジナルなんだってね！
jpnSearchText:
どこかで見た気もするけど、
全くのオリジナルなんだってね！

engChrName: Finally! The Eastern Quarter at last!
engSearchText: Finally! The Eastern Quarter at last!
jpnChrName: おお、ここが噂に聞く東方人街！
jpnSearchText: おお、ここが噂に聞く東方人街！

engChrName: This place is beautiful and exotic in all the right ways. It's a far cry from any town or city in the Empire— but in a good way!
engSearchText:
This place is beautiful and exotic in all the right ways.
It's a far cry from any town or city in the Empire—
but in a good way!
jpnChrName: 帝国には無いエキゾチック、素晴らしい！ でも……少しイメージと違うね。
jpnSearchText:
帝国には無いエキゾチック、素晴らしい！
でも……少しイメージと違うね。

engChrName: Though it is a little different from what I expected. I'd heard the people here had pet pandas.
engSearchText:
Though it is a little different from what I expected.
I'd heard the people here had pet pandas.
jpnChrName: 僕が聞いた話じゃ、センニンがパンダを 連れて歩いているとか……
jpnSearchText:
僕が聞いた話じゃ、センニンがパンダを
連れて歩いているとか……

engChrName: I also heard about a festival where folks dressed up like dragons and danced till sundown.
engSearchText:
I also heard about a festival where folks dressed up
like dragons and danced till sundown.
jpnChrName: 龍のコスプレをして踊るお祭りがあるって 聞いていたんだけどなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
龍のコスプレをして踊るお祭りがあるって
聞いていたんだけどなぁ。

engChrName: (Who in the hell fed him that bullcrap?)
engSearchText: (Who in the hell fed him that bullcrap?)
jpnChrName: （一体誰だよ、ンな事吹き込んでるのは……）
jpnSearchText: （一体誰だよ、ンな事吹き込んでるのは……）

engChrName: Still, my first impression is positive overall. I'm stoked to finally be here in the flesh!
engSearchText:
Still, my first impression is positive overall. I'm stoked
to finally be here in the flesh!
jpnChrName: まあ、それでも非日常に変わりはない！
jpnSearchText: まあ、それでも非日常に変わりはない！

engChrName: Now, where can I find a guide? Oh, and I'd love to visit a souvenir shop, too.
engSearchText:
Now, where can I find a guide? Oh, and I'd love to
visit a souvenir shop, too.
jpnChrName: どこかに親切なガイドや お土産屋さんはいないかな？
jpnSearchText:
どこかに親切なガイドや
お土産屋さんはいないかな？

engChrName: I'd heard that the tour guides were kimono-wearing women. I've got to find them!
engSearchText:
I'd heard that the tour guides were
kimono-wearing women. I've got to find them!
jpnChrName: 着飾った女の人が観光案内してくれるって 聞いていたんだけどなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
着飾った女の人が観光案内してくれるって
聞いていたんだけどなぁ。

engChrName: Why are these vegetables soaked in this red...stuff. What IS this?
engSearchText:
Why are these vegetables soaked in this red...stuff.
What IS this?
jpnChrName: この真っ赤な何かに漬けられた お野菜は何なのかしら……？
jpnSearchText:
この真っ赤な何かに漬けられた
お野菜は何なのかしら……？

engChrName: Well, whatever this dish is, it certainly looks appetizing!
engSearchText:
Well, whatever this dish is, it certainly
looks appetizing!
jpnChrName: よく分からないけど、 とっても美味しそうね！
jpnSearchText:
よく分からないけど、
とっても美味しそうね！

engChrName: Good eye, miss. This is a traditional Eastern fermented food plate.
engSearchText:
Good eye, miss. This is a traditional Eastern
fermented food plate.
jpnChrName: 奥さん、お目が高いね。 こいつは東方伝統の発酵食品さ。
jpnSearchText:
奥さん、お目が高いね。
こいつは東方伝統の発酵食品さ。

engChrName: It's quite the rarity here, so if you're curious, I definitely recommend buying some.
engSearchText:
It's quite the rarity here, so if you're curious, I
definitely recommend buying some.
jpnChrName: 他の地域には出回ってないから、 気になるなら買って行くといいよ。
jpnSearchText:
他の地域には出回ってないから、
気になるなら買って行くといいよ。

engChrName: Hmm... It's certainly tempting.
engSearchText: Hmm... It's certainly tempting.
jpnChrName: うふふ、それならお土産に 買わせてもらおうかしら！
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、それならお土産に
買わせてもらおうかしら！

engChrName: But I might have to pass. The smell is a tad overbearing for a to-go meal.
engSearchText:
But I might have to pass. The smell is a tad
overbearing for a to-go meal.
jpnChrName: 道中、ちょっと匂い過ぎて しまいそうだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
道中、ちょっと匂い過ぎて
しまいそうだけどね。

engChrName: Yeah, it's a package deal: weird smell but good taste.
engSearchText: Yeah, it's a package deal: weird smell but good taste.
jpnChrName: ハッ、まあこの強い匂いがウリだからな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、まあこの強い匂いがウリだからな。

engChrName: I heard there was an incident at the port. That's not good.
engSearchText:
I heard there was an incident at the port. That's
not good.
jpnChrName: 今度は港の方でも事件があったって……？
jpnSearchText: 今度は港の方でも事件があったって……？

engChrName: Back-to–back crises will lead to a drop in tourists...
engSearchText: Back-to–back crises will lead to a drop in tourists...
jpnChrName: こうも物騒な事が重なると、そのうち 観光客も減りやしないか心配だな。
jpnSearchText:
こうも物騒な事が重なると、そのうち
観光客も減りやしないか心配だな。

engChrName: That would be devastating for merchants like me. We get most of our sales from them.
engSearchText:
That would be devastating for merchants like me.
We get most of our sales from them.
jpnChrName: この市場の連中にとっては、今や収入の 何割かは観光客が落としてくれるミラだしな。
jpnSearchText:
この市場の連中にとっては、今や収入の
何割かは観光客が落としてくれるミラだしな。

engChrName: It's hard to believe that some of our own were murdered on this very street...
engSearchText:
It's hard to believe that some of our own were
murdered on this very street...
jpnChrName: まさかこの通りで殺人事件が起こるなんて…… こんな事、今まで無かったのに……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこの通りで殺人事件が起こるなんて……
こんな事、今まで無かったのに……

engChrName: I even knew the boys who were killed. Everyone's shaken, including myself.
engSearchText:
I even knew the boys who were killed.
Everyone's shaken, including myself.
jpnChrName: 死んだ連中も顔見知りばかりだし 流石にみんなショックを受けてるみたいだ……
jpnSearchText:
死んだ連中も顔見知りばかりだし
流石にみんなショックを受けてるみたいだ……

engChrName: I'll just try to focus on my work. All I can do to help is make food that will hopefully cheer people up.
engSearchText:
I'll just try to focus on my work. All I can do to help
is make food that will hopefully cheer people up.
jpnChrName: うちとしてはせめて、皆を元気づけられるよう 美味い食材を売るしかできないが……
jpnSearchText:
うちとしてはせめて、皆を元気づけられるよう
美味い食材を売るしかできないが……

engChrName: Spicy fermented food does especially well during the evening hours. It pairs well with alcohol.
engSearchText:
Spicy fermented food does especially well during the
evening hours. It pairs well with alcohol.
jpnChrName: 夜は夜で発酵食品はよく売れてな、 特に辛めのは酒の肴に合うって事で。
jpnSearchText:
夜は夜で発酵食品はよく売れてな、
特に辛めのは酒の肴に合うって事で。

engChrName: The same can be said of dried fish, which is also on the menu. Why don't you give it a try?
engSearchText:
The same can be said of dried fish, which is also on
the menu. Why don't you give it a try?
jpnChrName: 他にも乾物やら香辛料やら、酒に合う 東方食材があるから見ていってくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
他にも乾物やら香辛料やら、酒に合う
東方食材があるから見ていってくれよ。

engChrName: Welcome, friends!
engSearchText: Welcome, friends!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、珍しい香りに惹かれたかい？
jpnSearchText: いらっしゃい、珍しい香りに惹かれたかい？

engChrName: Were you drawn in by the tantalizing scent of our fresh Eastern ingredients? One can hardly blame you.
engSearchText:
Were you drawn in by the tantalizing scent of our
fresh Eastern ingredients? One can hardly blame you.
jpnChrName: それもそのはず、うちは ありとあらゆる東方食材も扱っていてな。
jpnSearchText:
それもそのはず、うちは
ありとあらゆる東方食材も扱っていてな。

engChrName: I've got this fermented food that's normally only available in a few regions of the East.
engSearchText:
I've got this fermented food that's normally only
available in a few regions of the East.
jpnChrName: 例えばこっちの発酵食品、こいつは 東方でも一部の地域に伝わる珍しい料理さ。
jpnSearchText:
例えばこっちの発酵食品、こいつは
東方でも一部の地域に伝わる珍しい料理さ。

engChrName: It might have an odd smell, but don't let that fool you. I promise you it's quite addicting.
engSearchText:
It might have an odd smell, but don't let that
fool you. I promise you it's quite addicting.
jpnChrName: 匂いにはクセがあるが、 慣れれば病みつき間違いなしさ。
jpnSearchText:
匂いにはクセがあるが、
慣れれば病みつき間違いなしさ。

engChrName: We handle all sorts of Eastern foods here. If you have any questions, fire away.
engSearchText:
We handle all sorts of Eastern foods here. If you have
any questions, fire away.
jpnChrName: うちは東方食材を手広く扱ってるんだ。 何だって聞いてくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
うちは東方食材を手広く扱ってるんだ。
何だって聞いてくれよ。

engChrName: Oh, and if you wish to taste test our dishes before committing, you are more than welcome to do so!
engSearchText:
Oh, and if you wish to taste test our dishes before
committing, you are more than welcome to do so!
jpnChrName: ははっ、食べ比べだって大歓迎さ！
jpnSearchText: ははっ、食べ比べだって大歓迎さ！

engChrName: Last night, an older customer told me a little known fact, and I think I should share it with you.
engSearchText:
Last night, an older customer told me a little known
fact, and I think I should share it with you.
jpnChrName: ……昨晩の事、客の老人に聞いてみたけど、 皆少ししか教えてくれなかったネ……
jpnSearchText:
……昨晩の事、客の老人に聞いてみたけど、
皆少ししか教えてくれなかったネ……

engChrName: Everything that's transpired in the last two days has been eerily similar to the commotion in the Eastern Quarter forty years ago.
engSearchText:
Everything that's transpired in the last two days has
been eerily similar to the commotion in the Eastern
Quarter forty years ago.
jpnChrName: 何でも４０年前の東方人街で 一波乱あった時に似ていたみたいネ。
jpnSearchText:
何でも４０年前の東方人街で
一波乱あった時に似ていたみたいネ。

engChrName: Apparently, Heiyue is going to 'handle it,' but I don't know how. This is all so confusing.
engSearchText:
Apparently, Heiyue is going to 'handle it,' but I don't
know how. This is all so confusing.
jpnChrName: でも、そんなの黒月がどうにかして おわりになりそうなのに……訳わかんないヨ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、そんなの黒月がどうにかして
おわりになりそうなのに……訳わかんないヨ。

engChrName: Ugh. I'm too scared to go out, but not having a grasp of the situation is frightening in its own right.
engSearchText:
Ugh. I'm too scared to go out, but not having a grasp
of the situation is frightening in its own right.
jpnChrName: うう……事件も怖いけど…… 自分が知らない事はこうも怖いものネ……
jpnSearchText:
うう……事件も怖いけど……
自分が知らない事はこうも怖いものネ……

engChrName: The strange mist left me completely unsettled... Grandpa never told me about this.
engSearchText:
The strange mist left me completely unsettled...
Grandpa never told me about this.
jpnChrName: おかしな霧、老人の聞きなれない話…… あんなのじいじも教えてくれなかったヨ……
jpnSearchText:
おかしな霧、老人の聞きなれない話……
あんなのじいじも教えてくれなかったヨ……

engChrName: In times like these, I normally lock myself in my room and read a book to calm my nerves, but I think I'll seek some wisdom from someone older.
engSearchText:
In times like these, I normally lock myself in my room
and read a book to calm my nerves, but I think I'll
seek some wisdom from someone older.
jpnChrName: 改めて他の老人にも話を聞いたり、 古書を調べ直した方が良いのかもネ……
jpnSearchText:
改めて他の老人にも話を聞いたり、
古書を調べ直した方が良いのかもネ……

engChrName: I thought I was the smartest person in the room, but the fact that I didn't listen to the words of others shows that I was the ignorant one...
engSearchText:
I thought I was the smartest person in the room, but
the fact that I didn't listen to the words of others
shows that I was the ignorant one...
jpnChrName: フーリン、自分の教養は一番と思って 人の話を聞いてこなかったネ……
jpnSearchText:
フーリン、自分の教養は一番と思って
人の話を聞いてこなかったネ……

engChrName: Nighttime here is unbelievably chaotic. Why can't tourists flock to other towns? Langport isn't the only place that's representative of the East.
engSearchText:
Nighttime here is unbelievably chaotic. Why can't
tourists flock to other towns? Langport isn't the only
place that's representative of the East.
jpnChrName: 煌都の夜、見ての通り猥雑だけど、 同じ東方系でも雰囲気の違う街もあるネ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都の夜、見ての通り猥雑だけど、
同じ東方系でも雰囲気の違う街もあるネ。

engChrName: For instance, there's Longlai, a village on the eastern border that is very much like the Far East. The nights there are evidently quite serene.
engSearchText:
For instance, there's Longlai, a village on the eastern
border that is very much like the Far East. The nights
there are evidently quite serene.
jpnChrName: 例えば東の国境の町《龍來》は極東とかの 文化の影響もあって、夜も落ち着いているネ。
jpnSearchText:
例えば東の国境の町《龍來》は極東とかの
文化の影響もあって、夜も落ち着いているネ。

engChrName: Eastern culture is wide and varied. If you believe Langport encapsulates the East in its entirety, then your perspective is as shallow as a puddle.
engSearchText:
Eastern culture is wide and varied. If you believe
Langport encapsulates the East in its entirety, then
your perspective is as shallow as a puddle.
jpnChrName: 東方文化も色々ネ、煌都が全てと思うと、 知識の浅さ露呈するヨ。
jpnSearchText:
東方文化も色々ネ、煌都が全てと思うと、
知識の浅さ露呈するヨ。

engChrName: Even a child can be a tourist.
engSearchText: Even a child can be a tourist.
jpnChrName: ただ観光するだけなら 子どもでも出来るネ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ観光するだけなら
子どもでも出来るネ。

engChrName: If someone truly has interest in Eastern culture, they would be better off reading a book if they wish to fill in their knowledge gaps.
engSearchText:
If someone truly has interest in Eastern culture, they
would be better off reading a book if they wish to fill
in their knowledge gaps.
jpnChrName: 本当に東方文化に興味があるなら、 本を読んで知識を蓄えるといいヨ。
jpnSearchText:
本当に東方文化に興味があるなら、
本を読んで知識を蓄えるといいヨ。

engChrName: Hmph. You're a new face. If any of my books catch your fancy, feel free to buy them up.
engSearchText:
Hmph. You're a new face. If any of my books catch
your fancy, feel free to buy them up.
jpnChrName: フン、見慣れないお客ネ？ まあ、本ならうちで見るが良いヨ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、見慣れないお客ネ？
まあ、本ならうちで見るが良いヨ。

engChrName: The vast majority of the books I inherited from Grandpa are one of a kind. You won't find them anywhere else in the world.
engSearchText:
The vast majority of the books I inherited from
Grandpa are one of a kind. You won't find them
anywhere else in the world.
jpnChrName: じいじから継いだこの書店の品、 他ではお目にかかれないものも多いネ。
jpnSearchText:
じいじから継いだこの書店の品、
他ではお目にかかれないものも多いネ。

engChrName: I've absorbed all the knowledge they have to share. It's why I'm a great deal more intelligent than anyone else my age.
engSearchText:
I've absorbed all the knowledge they have to share.
It's why I'm a great deal more intelligent than anyone
else my age.
jpnChrName: 何より、その本で得たフーリンの知識、 同年代のオナゴの遥か上を行くネ。
jpnSearchText:
何より、その本で得たフーリンの知識、
同年代のオナゴの遥か上を行くネ。

engChrName: If you have any inquiries about Eastern culture, I am more than happy—and perfectly qualified—to answer every one of your questions.
engSearchText:
If you have any inquiries about Eastern culture, I am
more than happy—and perfectly qualified—to answer
every one of your questions.
jpnChrName: 東方文化については、類稀なる教養を持つ このフーリンに聞くが良いヨ。
jpnSearchText:
東方文化については、類稀なる教養を持つ
このフーリンに聞くが良いヨ。

engChrName: Hey, miss. Anything catch your eye?
engSearchText: Hey, miss. Anything catch your eye?
jpnChrName: なんだい奥さん。 骨董品に興味があるのか？
jpnSearchText:
なんだい奥さん。
骨董品に興味があるのか？

engChrName: As it so happens, yes! There are all kinds of antiques here I've never seen in Oración.
engSearchText:
As it so happens, yes! There are all kinds of antiques
here I've never seen in Oración.
jpnChrName: ええ、オラシオンでは見かけない 様式のものばかりだから！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、オラシオンでは見かけない
様式のものばかりだから！

engChrName: Oooh, these are really nice! I might grab one or two of them myself.
engSearchText:
Oooh, these are really nice! I might grab one or two
of them myself.
jpnChrName: わぁ～本当ですね！ 掘り出し物も沢山ありそうですっ。
jpnSearchText:
わぁ～本当ですね！
掘り出し物も沢山ありそうですっ。

engChrName: Glad to hear it. We've got everything from basic souvenirs to proper antiques.
engSearchText:
Glad to hear it. We've got everything from basic
souvenirs to proper antiques.
jpnChrName: まぁな、本格的な骨董品から 土産用の安い物まで置いてある。
jpnSearchText:
まぁな、本格的な骨董品から
土産用の安い物まで置いてある。

engChrName: It's all used, but I've put a lot of elbow grease into restoring 'em all. Let me know if you want any.
engSearchText:
It's all used, but I've put a lot of elbow grease into
restoring 'em all. Let me know if you want any.
jpnChrName: 中古品ばかりだが手入れにも力を入れてるぜ。 ゆっくり見て行ってくれよな。
jpnSearchText:
中古品ばかりだが手入れにも力を入れてるぜ。
ゆっくり見て行ってくれよな。

engChrName: We'll ship the larger antiques right to your doorstep.
engSearchText: We'll ship the larger antiques right to your doorstep.
jpnChrName: 必要とあらば、大きな骨董品は 配達も受け付けてるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
必要とあらば、大きな骨董品は
配達も受け付けてるぜ。

engChrName: That's the least we can do for tourists like you.
engSearchText: That's the least we can do for tourists like you.
jpnChrName: 観光客相手に売るには それくらいサービスよくしねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
観光客相手に売るには
それくらいサービスよくしねえとな。

engChrName: I couldn't find any info about the mist, but I did learn an interesting tidbit about something unrelated.
engSearchText:
I couldn't find any info about the mist, but I did learn
an interesting tidbit about something unrelated.
jpnChrName: 霧の事は分からなかったが……どうも最近は、 黒月も古物方面で何かしてるっぽいのがわかってな。
jpnSearchText:
霧の事は分からなかったが……どうも最近は、
黒月も古物方面で何かしてるっぽいのがわかってな。

engChrName: Apparently, Heiyue did some covert antiquities trading recently—utilizing a trade route they don't normally use.
engSearchText:
Apparently, Heiyue did some covert antiquities
