trading recently—utilizing a trade route they don't
normally use.
jpnChrName: 黒月が絡むならあんまり首は突っ込みたくねぇが、 普段は使わねぇルートにも絡んでいたみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
黒月が絡むならあんまり首は突っ込みたくねぇが、
普段は使わねぇルートにも絡んでいたみたいで……

engChrName: I don't wanna stick my head into their business any further, but it's eyebrow-raising for sure, especially after the Harbor District incident.
engSearchText:
I don't wanna stick my head into their business any
further, but it's eyebrow-raising for sure, especially
after the Harbor District incident.
jpnChrName: 港湾区のアイツが狙われた件もあるし、 色々と気になるな……
jpnSearchText:
港湾区のアイツが狙われた件もあるし、
色々と気になるな……

engChrName: So Almata wasn't the only one lookin' into antiques... What the hell is Heiyue up to?
engSearchText:
So Almata wasn't the only one lookin' into antiques...
What the hell is Heiyue up to?
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりアルマータだけじゃなく、 黒月も何かしていたのか……
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱりアルマータだけじゃなく、
黒月も何かしていたのか……

engChrName: Thanks for the tip, Jigen. Might be best to steer clear of this whole affair from here, though.
engSearchText:
Thanks for the tip, Jigen. Might be best to steer clear
of this whole affair from here, though.
jpnChrName: 記憶にとどめておくとするか。 ジゲンのおっさんも気をつけろよ。
jpnSearchText:
記憶にとどめておくとするか。
ジゲンのおっさんも気をつけろよ。

engChrName: You don't have to tell me twice. I'm not about to go poking the bear.
engSearchText:
You don't have to tell me twice. I'm not about to go
poking the bear.
jpnChrName: ああ、これ以上は首を 突っ込まない事にするよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、これ以上は首を
突っ込まない事にするよ。

engChrName: I love takin' risks, but not when my neck is on the line.
engSearchText:
I love takin' risks, but not when my neck is on
the line.
jpnChrName: 一応、この街で立ち回る処世術くらいは わかっているつもりだしな。
jpnSearchText:
一応、この街で立ち回る処世術くらいは
わかっているつもりだしな。

engChrName: I don't know all the details, but Almata wasn't the only one looking into the antiques. Heiyue was, too.
engSearchText:
I don't know all the details, but Almata wasn't the
only one looking into the antiques. Heiyue was, too.
jpnChrName: 詳しくは判らんが、例のマフィアだけでなく 黒月もそれなりに古物屋を調べていたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
詳しくは判らんが、例のマフィアだけでなく
黒月もそれなりに古物屋を調べていたらしい。

engChrName: What in the world could they be plotting? I've got a bad feeling about this...
engSearchText:
What in the world could they be plotting? I've got a
bad feeling about this...
jpnChrName: どっちも何のつもりかは知らねぇが、 偶然って事もねぇだろうし気味が悪いな……
jpnSearchText:
どっちも何のつもりかは知らねぇが、
偶然って事もねぇだろうし気味が悪いな……

engChrName: Last night was rough. Always hard to hear about young ones passing on so soon.
engSearchText:
Last night was rough. Always hard to hear about
young ones passing on so soon.
jpnChrName: 昨夜は参ったな……訳の分からん 濃霧が出たと思えば、殺しまで……
jpnSearchText:
昨夜は参ったな……訳の分からん
濃霧が出たと思えば、殺しまで……

engChrName: Not sure what was going on with the mist. I asked the older folks about it, but they were as silent as the grave. It's like they know something...
engSearchText:
Not sure what was going on with the mist. I asked the
older folks about it, but they were as silent as
the grave. It's like they know something...
jpnChrName: しかし、年寄り連中は何か口を噤んでるが…… どうにも解せないな……昔に何かあったのか？
jpnSearchText:
しかし、年寄り連中は何か口を噤んでるが……
どうにも解せないな……昔に何かあったのか？

engChrName: Wouldn't surprise me if this is all connected to a past incident. I'll do some digging.
engSearchText:
Wouldn't surprise me if this is all connected to a
past incident. I'll do some digging.
jpnChrName: 何か過去の事件が関係してるんなら、 古物方面に何か情報は無いか調べておくか。
jpnSearchText:
何か過去の事件が関係してるんなら、
古物方面に何か情報は無いか調べておくか。

engChrName: An antique merchant got beaten to hell and back by some gangsters at the port.
engSearchText:
An antique merchant got beaten to hell and back by
some gangsters at the port.
jpnChrName: そういや港の方の不届きな古物商は 半グレ共にボコられてたんだってな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや港の方の不届きな古物商は
半グレ共にボコられてたんだってな。

engChrName: He might just pull out of the biz. Normally, I'd be fine with less competition, but this just isn't right.
engSearchText:
He might just pull out of the biz. Normally, I'd be
fine with less competition, but this just isn't right.
jpnChrName: 正直せいせいすると言いたいところだが……
jpnSearchText: 正直せいせいすると言いたいところだが……

engChrName: Also, if they're targeting antique dealers, I could be next. I'll have to start sleepin' with one eye open.
engSearchText:
Also, if they're targeting antique dealers, I could
be next. I'll have to start sleepin' with one eye open.
jpnChrName: 例のマフィア共が古物商を狙うってのは 気味が悪いな……俺も気をつけねばな。
jpnSearchText:
例のマフィア共が古物商を狙うってのは
気味が悪いな……俺も気をつけねばな。

engChrName: I'm always dealin' with distributors, and a lot of them are talkers. Pays to be a good listener.
engSearchText:
I'm always dealin' with distributors, and a lot of them
are talkers. Pays to be a good listener.
jpnChrName: 交易都市で骨董品の売買してりゃ、 流通の情報はあちこちで手に入る。
jpnSearchText:
交易都市で骨董品の売買してりゃ、
流通の情報はあちこちで手に入る。

engChrName: A lot of the info I feed you comes straight from them. Hopefully it's been of use.
engSearchText:
A lot of the info I feed you comes straight from them.
Hopefully it's been of use.
jpnChrName: ヴァンにはその手の情報を提供しつつ、 困り事があれば世話にもなっているんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンにはその手の情報を提供しつつ、
困り事があれば世話にもなっているんだが……

engChrName: Though I haven't been able to kick back and listen as much. I'm a little under the gun 'cause of those damn mafia goons.
engSearchText:
Though I haven't been able to kick back and listen
as much. I'm a little under the gun 'cause of those
damn mafia goons.
jpnChrName: 最近は例の余所者のマフィアのせいで、 古物売買も少し圧迫されててな。
jpnSearchText:
最近は例の余所者のマフィアのせいで、
古物売買も少し圧迫されててな。

engChrName: They're putting a lot of pressure on some of us. Hasn't been fun.
engSearchText:
They're putting a lot of pressure on some of us.
Hasn't been fun.
jpnChrName: 迂闊な事も出来ねぇし、 参ったもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
迂闊な事も出来ねぇし、
参ったもんだよ。

engChrName: Hmph. I'm jealous of you 'free as a bird' types. Wish I could fly the coop, but if I tried, the old ball and chain would throw a fit.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I'm jealous of you 'free as a bird' types. Wish I
could fly the coop, but if I tried, the old ball and
chain would throw a fit.
jpnChrName: ふん、お前ときたら相変わらずの 自由気ままっぷりで羨ましい限りだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ふん、お前ときたら相変わらずの
自由気ままっぷりで羨ましい限りだぜ。

engChrName: Speaking of, don't you have family, too? Should you really be leavin' your kids to fend for themselves?
engSearchText:
Speaking of, don't you have family, too? Should you
really be leavin' your kids to fend for themselves?
jpnChrName: 子供たちの事は放ったらかしで良いのかい？
jpnSearchText: 子供たちの事は放ったらかしで良いのかい？

engChrName: Oh, I'm not worried about them one bit. They're perfectly independent.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm not worried about them one bit.
They're perfectly independent.
jpnChrName: ははは、それは心配ご無用。
jpnSearchText: ははは、それは心配ご無用。

engChrName: I think they'd be more annoyed if I wasn't out and about. They get a kick out of the fun stories and rare stuff I bring back from my travels.
engSearchText:
I think they'd be more annoyed if I wasn't out
and about. They get a kick out of the fun stories and
rare stuff I bring back from my travels.
jpnChrName: あの子らも自立できているし、 何より土産話と珍品に首を長くしているさ。
jpnSearchText:
あの子らも自立できているし、
何より土産話と珍品に首を長くしているさ。

engChrName: I'm sure you'd be disappointed if I hung my hat and rested on my laurels, too. Don't you love hearing about my adventures?
engSearchText:
I'm sure you'd be disappointed if I hung my hat and
rested on my laurels, too. Don't you love hearing
about my adventures?
jpnChrName: それに、僕の旅の成果を楽しみにしてるのは あなたも一緒だろう、ジゲンさん。
jpnSearchText:
それに、僕の旅の成果を楽しみにしてるのは
あなたも一緒だろう、ジゲンさん。

engChrName: I mean, sure, but what you're doing is still dangerous.
engSearchText: I mean, sure, but what you're doing is still dangerous.
jpnChrName: それは違ぇねぇが…… 危なっかしいのは確かだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それは違ぇねぇが……
危なっかしいのは確かだぜ。

engChrName: And word of advice: you should carve out some more time for your kids. They're gonna get sick of your antics eventually.
engSearchText:
And word of advice: you should carve out some more
time for your kids. They're gonna get sick of your
antics eventually.
jpnChrName: だが、あの子たちもいい加減呆れてるだろうし、 ほどほどにしとけよな？
jpnSearchText:
だが、あの子たちもいい加減呆れてるだろうし、
ほどほどにしとけよな？

engChrName: Hahaha. You may very well be right.
engSearchText: Hahaha. You may very well be right.
jpnChrName: ははは、せいぜいご忠告は 受け取っておこう。
jpnSearchText:
ははは、せいぜいご忠告は
受け取っておこう。

engChrName: (I remember seeing this guy at the inn...)
engSearchText: (I remember seeing this guy at the inn...)
jpnChrName: （このおっさんは確か、同じ宿酒場にいた……）
jpnSearchText: （このおっさんは確か、同じ宿酒場にいた……）

engChrName: (So he's pals with Jigen, huh?)
engSearchText: (So he's pals with Jigen, huh?)
jpnChrName: （ジゲンのおっさんも知り合いだったのか。）
jpnSearchText: （ジゲンのおっさんも知り合いだったのか。）

engChrName: Where are you guys off to in such a hurry?
engSearchText: Where are you guys off to in such a hurry?
jpnChrName: 皆さん、これからどこかへ行かれるんですか？
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、これからどこかへ行かれるんですか？

engChrName: Oh. You're leaving, aren't you? To fight for the city... and for the people who are gone now...
engSearchText:
Oh. You're leaving, aren't you? To fight for the city...
and for the people who are gone now...
jpnChrName: きっと皆さんは……アーロンさんは…… 街とホアンさん達のために戦いに行くのでしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
きっと皆さんは……アーロンさんは……
街とホアンさん達のために戦いに行くのでしょうが……

engChrName: You better come back to us.
engSearchText: You better come back to us.
jpnChrName: 絶対に無事に帰って来てくださいね。
jpnSearchText: 絶対に無事に帰って来てくださいね。

engChrName: There's still so many things I need you to teach me, Aaron.
engSearchText:
There's still so many things I need you to teach
me, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロンさんに教えて欲しい事は まだいっぱいあるんです。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんに教えて欲しい事は
まだいっぱいあるんです。

engChrName: Heh. Who the hell do you think I am? I'm not gonna kick the bucket, so don't worry.
engSearchText:
Heh. Who the hell do you think I am? I'm not gonna
kick the bucket, so don't worry.
jpnChrName: ハッ……オレを誰だと思っている、 帰らねぇはずがねぇだろ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……オレを誰だと思っている、
帰らねぇはずがねぇだろ？

engChrName: I'll be back in a jiff. Once the bad men and women are toast, you and I can do some training.
engSearchText:
I'll be back in a jiff. Once the bad men and women
are toast, you and I can do some training.
jpnChrName: 稽古なら付き合ってやる、 普通に待っていやがれば良いさ。
jpnSearchText:
稽古なら付き合ってやる、
普通に待っていやがれば良いさ。

engChrName: Okay. I'll hold you to that!
engSearchText: Okay. I'll hold you to that!
jpnChrName: はい……信じています！
jpnSearchText: はい……信じています！

engChrName: When I think about what happened yesterday, I get worried about more people dying...
engSearchText:
When I think about what happened yesterday, I get
worried about more people dying...
jpnChrName: 昨日の事を思って、また誰かが いなくならないか不安でしたが……
jpnSearchText:
昨日の事を思って、また誰かが
いなくならないか不安でしたが……

engChrName: But I know you won't lose, Aaron. I believe in you!
engSearchText: But I know you won't lose, Aaron. I believe in you!
jpnChrName: そうですよね、アーロンさんに限って 負けるはずなんてないですよね。
jpnSearchText:
そうですよね、アーロンさんに限って
負けるはずなんてないですよね。

engChrName: Now go beat up those bad guys! Show them that you don't mess with us!
engSearchText:
Now go beat up those bad guys! Show them that you
don't mess with us!
jpnChrName: 僕は信じています、アーロンさんが あいつらを倒して、無事に帰って来るのを。
jpnSearchText:
僕は信じています、アーロンさんが
あいつらを倒して、無事に帰って来るのを。

engChrName: I can't believe it. Huang and the other guys are...gone? It can't be!
engSearchText:
I can't believe it. Huang and the other guys
are...gone? It can't be!
jpnChrName: まさか、ホアンさん達が 亡くなるなんて……そんな……！
jpnSearchText:
まさか、ホアンさん達が
亡くなるなんて……そんな……！

engChrName: They were so strong. This just doesn't feel real...
engSearchText: They were so strong. This just doesn't feel real...
jpnChrName: 皆さん、とても頼もしかったばかりに 未だに信じられない気持ちで……
jpnSearchText:
皆さん、とても頼もしかったばかりに
未だに信じられない気持ちで……

engChrName: But that's all the more reason why I have to train. Someone has to protect this town...and Xin.
engSearchText:
But that's all the more reason why I have to train.
Someone has to protect this town...and Xin.
jpnChrName: ……でも、だからこそ僕も 少しでも強くならないと……
jpnSearchText:
……でも、だからこそ僕も
少しでも強くならないと……

engChrName: I won't stop pushing myself until I'm on the same level as Aaron!
engSearchText:
I won't stop pushing myself until I'm on the same
level as Aaron!
jpnChrName: そして、アーロンさんのように強くなって シンさんも守れるようにならないと……！
jpnSearchText:
そして、アーロンさんのように強くなって
シンさんも守れるようにならないと……！

engChrName: Oh, hi, Aaron! I heard about what went down in the Harbor District. I wish I got to see you kick those guys' butts!
engSearchText:
Oh, hi, Aaron! I heard about what went down in the
Harbor District. I wish I got to see you kick those
guys' butts!
jpnChrName: あっ、アーロンさんこんばんは！ 港湾区での活躍、聞きましたよ！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、アーロンさんこんばんは！
港湾区での活躍、聞きましたよ！

engChrName: You didn't miss much. I pulverized them in no time at all.
engSearchText:
You didn't miss much. I pulverized them in no time
at all.
jpnChrName: ハッ、あんな半端者どもは 相手にもならねぇからな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、あんな半端者どもは
相手にもならねぇからな。

engChrName: Even you could've beat them with one hand tied behind your back.
engSearchText:
Even you could've beat them with one hand tied
behind your back.
jpnChrName: 何ならお前の稽古相手でも してる方が練習になるってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
何ならお前の稽古相手でも
してる方が練習になるってモンだ。

engChrName: I-I don't know about that. I'm sure you could pull that off, but I'm nowhere near as tough as you.
engSearchText:
I-I don't know about that. I'm sure you could pull
that off, but I'm nowhere near as tough as you.
jpnChrName: 凄い余裕……僕もそれくらい できるようになれるかな！
jpnSearchText:
凄い余裕……僕もそれくらい
できるようになれるかな！

engChrName: But I want to be someday. That's why, umm...I'd like to train with you again—when you're not busy, of course!
engSearchText:
But I want to be someday. That's why, umm...I'd like
to train with you again—when you're not busy,
of course!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、またいつか 稽古をつけてください！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、またいつか
稽古をつけてください！

engChrName: Sure thing. Got some stuff to take care of, but after that, I'm down to spar.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. Got some stuff to take care of, but after
that, I'm down to spar.
jpnChrName: ああ、この悶着がひと段落したらな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、この悶着がひと段落したらな。

engChrName: Until then, you can just review the notes you took when you were watching me do my fancy moves.
engSearchText:
Until then, you can just review the notes you took
when you were watching me do my fancy moves.
jpnChrName: それまではせいぜい、オレの活躍を 参考にでもしやがればいい。
jpnSearchText:
それまではせいぜい、オレの活躍を
参考にでもしやがればいい。

engChrName: (He did what now? Man, this kid practically worships the ground he walks on...)
engSearchText:
(He did what now? Man, this kid practically worships
the ground he walks on...)
jpnChrName: （こんなガキにも慕われてるのか……   なるほどな。）
jpnSearchText:
（こんなガキにも慕われてるのか……
なるほどな。）

engChrName: I should ask Aaron for some pointers. He knows martial arts, and everyone looks up to him.
engSearchText:
I should ask Aaron for some pointers. He knows
martial arts, and everyone looks up to him.
jpnChrName: アーロンさんも僕の目標の一つなんです。 武術も出来て皆に慕われてて……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんも僕の目標の一つなんです。
武術も出来て皆に慕われてて……

engChrName: I'm going to become just as strong as him one day. Then I'll definitely be able to protect the city with Xin.
engSearchText:
I'm going to become just as strong as him one day.
Then I'll definitely be able to protect the city
with Xin.
jpnChrName: 僕もああいう強さをいつか身につけて、 シンさんと一緒に街を守りたいんです。
jpnSearchText:
僕もああいう強さをいつか身につけて、
シンさんと一緒に街を守りたいんです。

engChrName: Maybe Aaron would be willing to train with me again...
engSearchText:
Maybe Aaron would be willing to train with
me again...
jpnChrName: アーロンさん、 また稽古をつけて欲しいなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさん、
また稽古をつけて欲しいなぁ……

engChrName: Aaron and I go to the same Gekka school, so I've been able to see him in action.
engSearchText:
Aaron and I go to the same Gekka school, so I've
been able to see him in action.
jpnChrName: 僕はアーロンさんと同じで月華流の 拳法を修練しているんですが……
jpnSearchText:
僕はアーロンさんと同じで月華流の
拳法を修練しているんですが……

engChrName: He's mainly a swordsman, but he's a master of unarmed martial arts, too. He's also a great teacher!
engSearchText:
He's mainly a swordsman, but he's a master of
unarmed martial arts, too. He's also a great teacher!
jpnChrName: アーロンさんは、普段は剣を使うのに体術の 方も上手で、教え方もわかりやすいんです！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんは、普段は剣を使うのに体術の
方も上手で、教え方もわかりやすいんです！

engChrName: Hmm... My dojo instructor told me that while I'm on the right track, I need to take another step forward on my own.
engSearchText:
Hmm... My dojo instructor told me that while I'm on
the right track, I need to take another step forward on
my own.
jpnChrName: うーん、筋は良いけど、あと一歩…… 道場でまた言われちゃったな。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、筋は良いけど、あと一歩……
道場でまた言われちゃったな。

engChrName: I've got to search within myself and find the path only I can take.
engSearchText:
I've got to search within myself and find the path only
I can take.
jpnChrName: 早く足りないところを補って、 自分の功夫の道を見つけたいな。
jpnSearchText:
早く足りないところを補って、
自分の功夫の道を見つけたいな。

engChrName: If I want to support Xin, I have to become a Gekka school martial artist. He's been hitting the books abroad, so I'll have to work hard, too.
engSearchText:
If I want to support Xin, I have to become a Gekka
school martial artist. He's been hitting the books
abroad, so I'll have to work hard, too.
jpnChrName: シンさんも留学先で頑張っている。 あの人を支える“月華流”の拳士になるためにも……
jpnSearchText:
シンさんも留学先で頑張っている。
あの人を支える“月華流”の拳士になるためにも……

engChrName: (He's studying Gekka? Wow. It's cool to see that Calvardians are studying Eastern martial arts.)
engSearchText:
(He's studying Gekka? Wow. It's cool to see that
Calvardians are studying Eastern martial arts.)
jpnChrName: （東方の有名な拳法……   やはり修めている方も多いみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（東方の有名な拳法……
やはり修めている方も多いみたいですね。）

engChrName: (He mentioned the name Xin, didn't he?)
engSearchText: (He mentioned the name Xin, didn't he?)
jpnChrName: （……しかし“シンさん”か……）
jpnSearchText: （……しかし“シンさん”か……）

engChrName: (Probably talking about the kid from the Lu Family. Interesting.)
engSearchText:
(Probably talking about the kid from the Lu Family.
Interesting.)
jpnChrName: （その名前は確かルウ家の……   早くも頭角を見せてるって事か。）
jpnSearchText:
（その名前は確かルウ家の……
早くも頭角を見せてるって事か。）

engChrName: Xin's around the same age as me, but he's already got his path figured out. He knows he's going to be the future elder.
engSearchText:
Xin's around the same age as me, but he's already got
his path figured out. He knows he's going to be the
future elder.
jpnChrName: シンさんは僕と大して違わない歳なのに、 もう未来の長老の自覚があるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
シンさんは僕と大して違わない歳なのに、
もう未来の長老の自覚があるんですよ。

engChrName: I heard he used to be a snot-nosed brat, but he's grown up since then.
engSearchText:
I heard he used to be a snot-nosed brat, but he's
grown up since then.
jpnChrName: 昔は未熟で無茶もしていたみたいだけど、 今は落ち着いて色々考えているみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
昔は未熟で無茶もしていたみたいだけど、
今は落ち着いて色々考えているみたいで……

engChrName: Can't wait for him to get back from his study trip!
engSearchText: Can't wait for him to get back from his study trip!
jpnChrName: 留学から帰ってくるのが楽しみです！
jpnSearchText: 留学から帰ってくるのが楽しみです！

engChrName: You and Aaron are the most dependable youngsters I've seen in a very long time.
engSearchText:
You and Aaron are the most dependable youngsters
I've seen in a very long time.
jpnChrName: アーロンにヴァン……若人たちがここまで 頼もしく見えたのはいつぶりかのう。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンにヴァン……若人たちがここまで
頼もしく見えたのはいつぶりかのう。

engChrName: Don't let the sins of the past hang over you. Just look forward and do what you must to protect our city.
engSearchText:
Don't let the sins of the past hang over you. Just look
forward and do what you must to protect our city.
jpnChrName: 過去の報いも一筋縄ではいかんじゃろうが…… 街の事を頼むからのう、二人共……
jpnSearchText:
過去の報いも一筋縄ではいかんじゃろうが……
街の事を頼むからのう、二人共……

engChrName: I hope you take that to heart, Aaron. Stay calm and face that which lies ahead.
engSearchText:
I hope you take that to heart, Aaron. Stay calm and
face that which lies ahead.
jpnChrName: 特にアーロン……あんたは、自分をしっかり 持って目の前の事に向き合うのじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
特にアーロン……あんたは、自分をしっかり
持って目の前の事に向き合うのじゃ……

engChrName: I believe you can overcome this without losing yourself.
engSearchText:
I believe you can overcome this without
losing yourself.
jpnChrName: アーロンなら、己を見失わずに 乗り越えられると信じておるぞえ……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンなら、己を見失わずに
乗り越えられると信じておるぞえ……

engChrName: I-I can't believe it... I never thought I'd live to see this all happen again...
engSearchText:
I-I can't believe it... I never thought I'd live to see this
all happen again...
jpnChrName: ああ、何て事…… 生きてる間にまたこんな事が……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何て事……
生きてる間にまたこんな事が……！

engChrName: Uhh. You okay, Pao? It's pretty rare to see you freak out like this.
engSearchText:
Uhh. You okay, Pao? It's pretty rare to see you freak
out like this.
jpnChrName: パオ婆さん、大丈夫か……？ あんたが取り乱すなんて珍しいじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
パオ婆さん、大丈夫か……？
あんたが取り乱すなんて珍しいじゃねぇか。

engChrName: I-I'm all right. I was just caught up thinking about the past. That's all.
engSearchText:
I-I'm all right. I was just caught up thinking about
the past. That's all.
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫じゃ…… ちょいと昔を思い出して……
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫じゃ……
ちょいと昔を思い出して……

engChrName: I've seen that mist a long time ago—during a very dark chapter in my life.
engSearchText:
I've seen that mist a long time ago—during a very
dark chapter in my life.
jpnChrName: 昨晩の霧……若い頃にあった、 大変な時期の空気を思い出してのう……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩の霧……若い頃にあった、
大変な時期の空気を思い出してのう……

engChrName: That why you and the older people around here are all out of it? Did something happen back then?
engSearchText:
That why you and the older people around here are
all out of it? Did something happen back then?
jpnChrName: ……そういえば他の爺さん婆さんも 混乱しているみたいだが……過去に何か？
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば他の爺さん婆さんも
混乱しているみたいだが……過去に何か？

engChrName: I... Well, you see...it's not my place to tell you, I'm afraid. Please forgive me.
engSearchText:
I... Well, you see...it's not my place to tell you,
I'm afraid. Please forgive me.
jpnChrName: それは……く、詳しく私の口から 話す訳にはいかないんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
それは……く、詳しく私の口から
話す訳にはいかないんじゃ……

engChrName: (The hell? Why's she bein' so tight-lipped about this?)
engSearchText:
(The hell? Why's she bein' so tight-lipped
about this?)
jpnChrName: （何か禁忌でもあるみてぇな口ぶりだが……   一応、覚えておいた方が良いか。）
jpnSearchText:
（何か禁忌でもあるみてぇな口ぶりだが……
一応、覚えておいた方が良いか。）

engChrName: Now that I think about it, though, he's...very much like...
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, though, he's...very
much like...
jpnChrName: でも……やっぱり思えばあの子も…… あの者に……
jpnSearchText:
でも……やっぱり思えばあの子も……
あの者に……

engChrName: No, I must be wrong. I'm letting my anxieties get the best of me.
engSearchText:
No, I must be wrong. I'm letting my anxieties get the
best of me.
jpnChrName: いんや、流石に考え過ぎかのう……
jpnSearchText: いんや、流石に考え過ぎかのう……

engChrName: Sorry, I think reminiscing about that time in my life is giving rise to some irrational thoughts.
engSearchText:
Sorry, I think reminiscing about that time in my life
is giving rise to some irrational thoughts.
jpnChrName: すまないのう、昔の大変だった 時期を思い出してしまったんじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
すまないのう、昔の大変だった
時期を思い出してしまったんじゃ。

engChrName: I can't believe I doubted that child for even a moment. It's utterly shameful.
engSearchText:
I can't believe I doubted that child for even
a moment. It's utterly shameful.
jpnChrName: それにしても、可愛がっていたあの子を 疑ってしまうとはのう……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、可愛がっていたあの子を
疑ってしまうとはのう……

engChrName: I must go to the temple and meditate. Perhaps that will ease my troubled heart.
engSearchText:
I must go to the temple and meditate. Perhaps that
will ease my troubled heart.
jpnChrName: 取り乱していたとは言え、恥ずかしい事…… 寺院に行って心を鎮めねばのう……
jpnSearchText:
取り乱していたとは言え、恥ずかしい事……
寺院に行って心を鎮めねばのう……

engChrName: I know you're intimately familiar with the Eastern Quarter...
engSearchText:
I know you're intimately familiar with the
Eastern Quarter...
jpnChrName: ヴァン、あんたも東方人街にゃ 詳しい方じゃけど……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、あんたも東方人街にゃ
詳しい方じゃけど……

engChrName: ...but its storied history holds many secrets.
engSearchText: ...but its storied history holds many secrets.
jpnChrName: 東方人街にはあんたが来る ずっと前からの歴史があってのう。
jpnSearchText:
東方人街にはあんたが来る
ずっと前からの歴史があってのう。

engChrName: Secrets that even the citizens aren't privy to.
engSearchText: Secrets that even the citizens aren't privy to.
jpnChrName: 中には、街の人ですら ほとんど知らない事も……
jpnSearchText:
中には、街の人ですら
ほとんど知らない事も……

engChrName: It may behoove you to look to its past someday. I think you will find some points of interest.
engSearchText:
It may behoove you to look to its past someday.
I think you will find some points of interest.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、久しぶりに来た訳だし、 今一度見方を変えて色々感じてみな……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、久しぶりに来た訳だし、
今一度見方を変えて色々感じてみな……

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Aaron. I didn't know you were friends with Van.
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't Aaron. I didn't know you were friends
with Van.
jpnChrName: おやアーロンじゃないか。 あんた、ヴァンとお友達だったのかい？
jpnSearchText:
おやアーロンじゃないか。
あんた、ヴァンとお友達だったのかい？

engChrName: Though I shouldn't be surprised. You get along with just about everyone.
engSearchText:
Though I shouldn't be surprised. You get along with
just about everyone.
jpnChrName: あんたは誰とでも打ち解けるからのう。
jpnSearchText: あんたは誰とでも打ち解けるからのう。

engChrName: Nah, you got it wrong. I'm just following him around to see what kinda stupid crap he gets into.
engSearchText:
Nah, you got it wrong. I'm just following him around
to see what kinda stupid crap he gets into.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そんなんじゃねぇよ。 ちと、このおっさんの仕事に興味湧いただけさ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そんなんじゃねぇよ。
ちと、このおっさんの仕事に興味湧いただけさ。

engChrName: Anyway, shouldn't you be heading on inside? It's getting kinda late.
engSearchText:
Anyway, shouldn't you be heading on inside?
It's getting kinda late.
jpnChrName: パオ婆も、そろそろ家に入ったらどうだ？
jpnSearchText: パオ婆も、そろそろ家に入ったらどうだ？

engChrName: I know you're just looking after the town and its people, but my bros and I have got that covered.
engSearchText:
I know you're just looking after the town and its
people, but my bros and I have got that covered.
jpnChrName: 街が気になるのは判るが、そっちはオレら 若いのに任せとけや。
jpnSearchText:
街が気になるのは判るが、そっちはオレら
若いのに任せとけや。

engChrName: You boys are certainly dependable. We didn't have people like you back when I was running the inn, so I had to watch over the town by myself.
engSearchText:
You boys are certainly dependable. We didn't have
people like you back when I was running the inn, so I
had to watch over the town by myself.
jpnChrName: ほほ……親切な事じゃ……。 宿屋やってた癖か、人通りは見守りたくてのう。
jpnSearchText:
ほほ……親切な事じゃ……。
宿屋やってた癖か、人通りは見守りたくてのう。

engChrName: I'll take your advice, though, since things have been getting rather dangerous as of late. The town is in safe hands with you on the prowl.
engSearchText:
I'll take your advice, though, since things have been
getting rather dangerous as of late. The town is in
safe hands with you on the prowl.
jpnChrName: どれ、それじゃあもうじき家に戻ろうかね…… 最近は物騒じゃが、アーロンなら心配無いしのう。
jpnSearchText:
どれ、それじゃあもうじき家に戻ろうかね……
最近は物騒じゃが、アーロンなら心配無いしのう。

engChrName: Be a good friend to Aaron, Van. I've been watching him since he was a child, and despite the trouble he causes, he's a kind boy at heart.
engSearchText:
Be a good friend to Aaron, Van. I've been watching
him since he was a child, and despite the trouble he
causes, he's a kind boy at heart.
jpnChrName: ヴァンも、この子と仲良くしてやっとくれ。 昔から見とるが、こう見えて優しい子じゃからな……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンも、この子と仲良くしてやっとくれ。
昔から見とるが、こう見えて優しい子じゃからな……

engChrName: I'll take your word for it.
engSearchText: I'll take your word for it.
jpnChrName: ま、一応こいつを見ておくのも仕事だしな。
jpnSearchText: ま、一応こいつを見ておくのも仕事だしな。

engChrName: And hey, I'd love to get along with him if I could.
engSearchText: And hey, I'd love to get along with him if I could.
jpnChrName: 俺としちゃあ、パオ婆の言うように仲良くしても 手間は省けるってもんなんだが……？
jpnSearchText:
俺としちゃあ、パオ婆の言うように仲良くしても
手間は省けるってもんなんだが……？

engChrName: Yeah, not happening.
engSearchText: Yeah, not happening.
jpnChrName: だから友達じゃねぇって…… おっさんも乗っかるんじゃねぇよ。
jpnSearchText:
だから友達じゃねぇって……
おっさんも乗っかるんじゃねぇよ。

engChrName: I've been watching Aaron since he was a small child. He's always been a rebel, but he's very kind and has many friends supporting him.
engSearchText:
I've been watching Aaron since he was a small child.
He's always been a rebel, but he's very kind and has
many friends supporting him.
jpnChrName: アーロンの事は昔から見ておってな…… 昔からやんちゃじゃが、友達も多くてのう。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンの事は昔から見ておってな……
昔からやんちゃじゃが、友達も多くてのう。

engChrName: He also had a mother who truly loved him...
engSearchText: He also had a mother who truly loved him...
jpnChrName: この子の母親も、本当に アーロンを愛しておった……
jpnSearchText:
この子の母親も、本当に
アーロンを愛しておった……

engChrName: I know he can look after himself, but I still worry about him sometimes. Everyone needs a guiding hand in their lives.
engSearchText:
I know he can look after himself, but I still worry
about him sometimes. Everyone needs a guiding hand
in their lives.
jpnChrName: それ故、何かないかは心配なものでのう。 強い子だってのは分かっとるが……
jpnSearchText:
それ故、何かないかは心配なものでのう。
強い子だってのは分かっとるが……

engChrName: Van? Is that really you?
engSearchText: Van? Is that really you?
jpnChrName: おやヴァン……ヴァンじゃないかい。
jpnSearchText: おやヴァン……ヴァンじゃないかい。

engChrName: Oh, it's been much too long! Have you gotten taller? You have, haven't you?
engSearchText:
Oh, it's been much too long! Have you gotten taller?
You have, haven't you?
jpnChrName: 久しぶりじゃ、いつぶりじゃろう。 また大きくなったんじゃないかの？
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりじゃ、いつぶりじゃろう。
また大きくなったんじゃないかの？

engChrName: I, uh, don't think so. It wasn't that long ago since I last dropped by.
engSearchText:
I, uh, don't think so. It wasn't that long ago since I
last dropped by.
jpnChrName: 大袈裟な……前回来た時にも 一応会ってるだろ、婆さん。
jpnSearchText:
大袈裟な……前回来た時にも
一応会ってるだろ、婆さん。

engChrName: Who's this nice lady, Van?
engSearchText: Who's this nice lady, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、この方は？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、この方は？

engChrName: This is Pao. She helped me big time when I was just starting out.
engSearchText:
This is Pao. She helped me big time when I was just
starting out.
jpnChrName: 下積み時代に世話になったパオ婆だ。
jpnSearchText: 下積み時代に世話になったパオ婆だ。

engChrName: She ran an inn back in the day, but she closed it down. How's retirement treatin' you?
engSearchText:
She ran an inn back in the day, but she closed it down.
How's retirement treatin' you?
jpnChrName: まあ、もう下宿していた宿は畳んで 隠居してるみたいだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、もう下宿していた宿は畳んで
隠居してるみたいだけどな。

engChrName: Quite well, in fact. It's nice to take things easy for once.
engSearchText:
Quite well, in fact. It's nice to take things easy
for once.
jpnChrName: ええ、今はのんびりしながら、 街の皆を見守らせてもらっとる。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、今はのんびりしながら、
街の皆を見守らせてもらっとる。

engChrName: Though I still lend an ear to those in need. I rather enjoy helping the young ones along their journey.
engSearchText:
Though I still lend an ear to those in need. I rather
enjoy helping the young ones along their journey.
jpnChrName: それでも、こんな隠居の身相手に 色々相談に来る人も多いがのう。
jpnSearchText:
それでも、こんな隠居の身相手に
色々相談に来る人も多いがのう。

engChrName: You sound just like someone I know. There's a wise old lady in a village near mine.
engSearchText:
You sound just like someone I know. There's a wise
old lady in a village near mine.
jpnChrName: お婆さんの知恵袋…… 里の近くの村にもいましたね。
jpnSearchText:
お婆さんの知恵袋……
里の近くの村にもいましたね。

engChrName: Heehee. Makes me feel warm and fuzzy knowing there's other people just like her.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Makes me feel warm and fuzzy knowing
there's other people just like her.
jpnChrName: ふふ、こういう何気ないものも故郷と一緒だと、 何か温かい気持ちになりますね……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、こういう何気ないものも故郷と一緒だと、
何か温かい気持ちになりますね……

engChrName: I appreciate you bringing the case to a swift end. Thank you for all your help.
engSearchText:
I appreciate you bringing the case to a swift end.
Thank you for all your help.
jpnChrName: ほほ、先程は世話になったのう。 解決屋の方も順調なようでなによりじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ほほ、先程は世話になったのう。
解決屋の方も順調なようでなによりじゃ。

engChrName: Sounds like your fixer business is panning out nicely. Here's hoping you have many bright years ahead of you!
engSearchText:
Sounds like your fixer business is panning out nicely.
Here's hoping you have many bright years ahead
of you!
jpnChrName: 応援しとるから 怪我の無いように頑張っておくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
応援しとるから
怪我の無いように頑張っておくれよ。

engChrName: If you're on the case, then Neil's got nothing to fear.
engSearchText: If you're on the case, then Neil's got nothing to fear.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達が力になってくれるのなら、 ニールの事は一安心じゃな。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達が力になってくれるのなら、
ニールの事は一安心じゃな。

engChrName: I appreciate you for looking out for him.
engSearchText: I appreciate you for looking out for him.
jpnChrName: 世話をかけて悪いが、よろしく頼むのう。
jpnSearchText: 世話をかけて悪いが、よろしく頼むのう。

engChrName: Have you had a chance to check the bulletin board?
engSearchText: Have you had a chance to check the bulletin board?
jpnChrName: そういえば、東方人街の 掲示板は見てくれたかの？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、東方人街の
掲示板は見てくれたかの？

engChrName: There's something I'd like to talk to you about...
engSearchText: There's something I'd like to talk to you about...
jpnChrName: ちょいと相談したい事があるんだが……
jpnSearchText: ちょいと相談したい事があるんだが……

engChrName: What's up? You have a request for me?
engSearchText: What's up? You have a request for me?
jpnChrName: なに、婆さんが依頼を？
jpnSearchText: なに、婆さんが依頼を？

engChrName: I actually haven't checked it yet, sorry. Let me do that real quick.
engSearchText:
I actually haven't checked it yet, sorry. Let me do that
real quick.
jpnChrName: そういやまだ確認してなかったな。 また出直して来るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そういやまだ確認してなかったな。
また出直して来るぜ。

engChrName: I ran an inn for fifty years, so I've met people of all walks of life.
engSearchText:
I ran an inn for fifty years, so I've met people of all
walks of life.
jpnChrName: 半世紀も宿をやってたから、 いろんな人を見てきてのう。
jpnSearchText:
半世紀も宿をやってたから、
いろんな人を見てきてのう。

engChrName: Many immigrants from the East came to my humble establishment back then. They felt alone and isolated, which is why I helped guide them along.
engSearchText:
Many immigrants from the East came to my humble
establishment back then. They felt alone and isolated,
which is why I helped guide them along.
jpnChrName: 昔は東方から来る移民も多くて、 そういう人は心細かっただろうしの……
jpnSearchText:
昔は東方から来る移民も多くて、
そういう人は心細かっただろうしの……

engChrName: Hopefully my presence in their lives was a small comfort to them.
engSearchText:
Hopefully my presence in their lives was a small
comfort to them.
jpnChrName: “まとめ役”がいる事は、どういう形であれ 心強かったのじゃろう……
jpnSearchText:
“まとめ役”がいる事は、どういう形であれ
心強かったのじゃろう……

engChrName: *sigh* I'm so dead...
engSearchText: *sigh* I'm so dead...
jpnChrName: はぁ……生きた心地がしませんよ……
jpnSearchText: はぁ……生きた心地がしませんよ……

engChrName: I can't believe I'm being hunted by Heiyue. Where did my life go so wrong?
engSearchText:
I can't believe I'm being hunted by Heiyue.
Where did my life go so wrong?
jpnChrName: まさかあの《黒月》に 追われる日が来るだなんて。
jpnSearchText:
まさかあの《黒月》に
追われる日が来るだなんて。

engChrName: You guys are my only hope. Please save me!
engSearchText: You guys are my only hope. Please save me!
jpnChrName: 皆さんが僕の命綱です…… 依頼の方、どうかよろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText:
皆さんが僕の命綱です……
依頼の方、どうかよろしくお願いします！

engChrName: I assume you're looking into last night's incident?
engSearchText: I assume you're looking into last night's incident?
jpnChrName: 解決事務所の方々にアーロン…… 昨晩の件に関して探っているところですか。
jpnSearchText:
解決事務所の方々にアーロン……
昨晩の件に関して探っているところですか。

engChrName: Damn right I am. I'm not waiting for Heiyue's slow ass to move.
engSearchText:
Damn right I am. I'm not waiting for Heiyue's slow
ass to move.
jpnChrName: 当然だ……お前ら黒月の伺っている 機なんざ待っちゃいられねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
当然だ……お前ら黒月の伺っている
機なんざ待っちゃいられねぇ。

engChrName: I'm gonna go out there and settle this whether you guys act or not.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna go out there and settle this whether you
guys act or not.
jpnChrName: お前らが動かなくても、オレはオレなりに ケリをつけてくる。
jpnSearchText:
お前らが動かなくても、オレはオレなりに
ケリをつけてくる。

engChrName: I thought as much.
engSearchText: I thought as much.
jpnChrName: そうですか、あなたらしいですね。
jpnSearchText: そうですか、あなたらしいですね。

engChrName: Well, I haven't received any orders to stop you, so I won't stand in your way.
engSearchText:
Well, I haven't received any orders to stop you, so I
won't stand in your way.
jpnChrName: 私も、あなたの行動については何も 言われておりません──干渉は致しません。
jpnSearchText:
私も、あなたの行動については何も
言われておりません──干渉は致しません。

engChrName: However, I will issue a warning.
engSearchText: However, I will issue a warning.
jpnChrName: ですが──これについては注意して おいた方が良いでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ですが──これについては注意して
おいた方が良いでしょう。

engChrName: Heiyue never stays its hand without reason. If they aren't making any moves, it's because the elders already have a play in mind.
engSearchText:
Heiyue never stays its hand without reason. If they
aren't making any moves, it's because the elders
already have a play in mind.
jpnChrName: 黒月は、何も無意味に日和見などしない…… 動かぬも、長老方に考えあってのものと言う事を。
jpnSearchText:
黒月は、何も無意味に日和見などしない……
動かぬも、長老方に考えあってのものと言う事を。

engChrName: ...Thanks for the heads up.
engSearchText: ...Thanks for the heads up.
jpnChrName: ……忠告は受け取っておいてやるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……忠告は受け取っておいてやるぜ。

engChrName: But I don't give a shit about what they're up to. It's got nothing to do with my plan to avenge my bros.
engSearchText:
But I don't give a shit about what they're up to.
It's got nothing to do with my plan to avenge
my bros.
jpnChrName: だが、長老の企みなんざ、 あいつらを弔うのには関係ねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、長老の企みなんざ、
あいつらを弔うのには関係ねぇ。

engChrName: Understood. I respect your resolve.
engSearchText: Understood. I respect your resolve.
jpnChrName: そうですか……それでは、 私はあなたの決意を尊重するまで。
jpnSearchText:
そうですか……それでは、
私はあなたの決意を尊重するまで。

engChrName: Then do what you must, Aaron.
engSearchText: Then do what you must, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロン、君は君にしか出来ない事を 為すが良いでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、君は君にしか出来ない事を
為すが良いでしょう。

engChrName: (Why would the elders not want to act? We should get to the bottom of this.)
engSearchText:
(Why would the elders not want to act? We should
get to the bottom of this.)
jpnChrName: （長老会の動かぬ理由か……   少し見極めた方が良さそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（長老会の動かぬ理由か……
少し見極めた方が良さそうだな。）

engChrName: I'm merely an escort, so my opinion doesn't count for much.
engSearchText:
I'm merely an escort, so my opinion doesn't count
for much.
jpnChrName: 私は一介の護衛に過ぎないので、 あまり出過ぎた事は言えませんが……
jpnSearchText:
私は一介の護衛に過ぎないので、
あまり出過ぎた事は言えませんが……

engChrName: But I don't care for the way the current elders deal with Aaron. It's worrying.
engSearchText:
But I don't care for the way the current elders deal
with Aaron. It's worrying.
jpnChrName: どうにも現長老方のアーロンへの 接し方が少しばかり気掛かりです。
jpnSearchText:
どうにも現長老方のアーロンへの
接し方が少しばかり気掛かりです。

engChrName: At least Fan expects good things from him.
engSearchText: At least Fan expects good things from him.
jpnChrName: ファン大人などは私と同様、アーロンの 将来を有望視されているようですが……
jpnSearchText:
ファン大人などは私と同様、アーロンの
将来を有望視されているようですが……

engChrName: It pains my heart to hear about what happened to Aaron's friends...
engSearchText:
It pains my heart to hear about what happened to
Aaron's friends...
jpnChrName: 昨晩犠牲となったアーロンの友人たち…… 聞くだけでも痛ましい限りですが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩犠牲となったアーロンの友人たち……
聞くだけでも痛ましい限りですが……

engChrName: I can't provide any specifics, but according to Heiyue's investigation, they suffered unnatural deaths.
engSearchText:
I can't provide any specifics, but according to
Heiyue's investigation, they suffered
unnatural deaths.
jpnChrName: 黒月内での検分の話を聞く限り、 どうにも不自然な死に方をしているようで……
jpnSearchText:
黒月内での検分の話を聞く限り、
どうにも不自然な死に方をしているようで……

engChrName: We're currently strengthening our security in light of this event.
engSearchText:
We're currently strengthening our security in light of
this event.
jpnChrName: 詳しくは申せませんが、我々としても 一層警戒を強めざるを得ない状況です。
jpnSearchText:
詳しくは申せませんが、我々としても
一層警戒を強めざるを得ない状況です。

engChrName: After last night, Heiyue decided to strengthen its security.
engSearchText:
After last night, Heiyue decided to strengthen
its security.
jpnChrName: 昨夜の一件を受けて黒月も警戒を強めています。
jpnSearchText: 昨夜の一件を受けて黒月も警戒を強めています。

engChrName: I will do everything I can to protect the Lu family.
engSearchText: I will do everything I can to protect the Lu family.
jpnChrName: 私もファン家を守護するために 使命を全うするつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
私もファン家を守護するために
使命を全うするつもりです。

engChrName: I've heard Aaron is looking to get revenge... I understand how he's feeling, but I fear he will act recklessly, should he walk this path.
engSearchText:
I've heard Aaron is looking to get revenge...
I understand how he's feeling, but I fear he will act
recklessly, should he walk this path.
jpnChrName: それにしてもアーロンは一人で復讐に行く つもりのようで……気持ちは判るのですが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもアーロンは一人で復讐に行く
つもりのようで……気持ちは判るのですが……

engChrName: Looks like Fan has come home for once.
engSearchText: Looks like Fan has come home for once.
jpnChrName: ファン大人は先ほどお帰りになったばかりです。
jpnSearchText: ファン大人は先ほどお帰りになったばかりです。

engChrName: If you have anything to discuss with him, now's the time.
engSearchText:
If you have anything to discuss with him, now's
the time.
jpnChrName: ファン大人もこの後はオフタイムですので、 何か直接のご用事があれば今のうちにお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
ファン大人もこの後はオフタイムですので、
何か直接のご用事があれば今のうちにお願いします。

engChrName: Good evening, Aaron. I heard about your recent exploits at the port.
engSearchText:
Good evening, Aaron. I heard about your recent
exploits at the port.
jpnChrName: アーロンではありませんか。 港の方での活躍は聞きましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンではありませんか。
港の方での活躍は聞きましたよ。

engChrName: Everyone in Heiyue is impressed with your natural talents and leadership abilities. I hope you will consider joining us in the future.
engSearchText:
Everyone in Heiyue is impressed with your natural
talents and leadership abilities. I hope you will
consider joining us in the future.
jpnChrName: 君の腕前と統率力…… やはり黒月でこそ活かしてみては。
jpnSearchText:
君の腕前と統率力……
やはり黒月でこそ活かしてみては。

engChrName: Hard pass. Being tied down to an organization isn't really my thing.
engSearchText:
Hard pass. Being tied down to an organization isn't
really my thing.
jpnChrName: ハッ、期待されんのは嫌じゃねぇが 組織に縛られんのは性に合わなくてね。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、期待されんのは嫌じゃねぇが
組織に縛られんのは性に合わなくてね。

engChrName: And just when the elders finally stop pushing the invites down my throat...
engSearchText:
And just when the elders finally stop pushing the
invites down my throat...
jpnChrName: それに……最近は長老方も誘ってこねぇし、 言うほど急がなくても良いんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
それに……最近は長老方も誘ってこねぇし、
言うほど急がなくても良いんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: ...I apologize for speaking out of turn.
engSearchText: ...I apologize for speaking out of turn.
jpnChrName: ……そうでしたね。 少々出過ぎた事を言いました。
jpnSearchText:
……そうでしたね。
少々出過ぎた事を言いました。

engChrName: Well, you do have plenty of time to change your mind.
engSearchText:
Well, you do have plenty of time to change
your mind.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、長老方も君への期待は 失われてはいないはず。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、長老方も君への期待は
失われてはいないはず。

engChrName: The elders expect great things from you.
engSearchText: The elders expect great things from you.
jpnChrName: もし気が変われば、遠慮なく我々に 声をかけてくれると良いでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
もし気が変われば、遠慮なく我々に
声をかけてくれると良いでしょう。

engChrName: We're all expecting great things from you, Aaron.
engSearchText: We're all expecting great things from you, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロン、君に期待していますよ。
jpnSearchText: アーロン、君に期待していますよ。

engChrName: But if you wish to follow your own path, I'll respect that decision.
engSearchText:
But if you wish to follow your own path, I'll respect
that decision.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、今はまだ己が進みたい道があるのなら、 私はそれを尊重するとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、今はまだ己が進みたい道があるのなら、
私はそれを尊重するとしましょう。

engChrName: Greetings. You're Arkride Solutions, yes? I've heard much about you from Fan.
engSearchText:
Greetings. You're Arkride Solutions, yes? I've heard
much about you from Fan.
jpnChrName: お疲れ様です、解決事務所の方々ですね。 ファン大人よりあなた方の事は伺っております。
jpnSearchText:
お疲れ様です、解決事務所の方々ですね。
ファン大人よりあなた方の事は伺っております。

engChrName: This is the Lu family's mansion. What brings you here today?
engSearchText:
This is the Lu family's mansion. What brings you
here today?
jpnChrName: こちらはルゥ家のお屋敷になりますが、 何かご入用でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
こちらはルゥ家のお屋敷になりますが、
何かご入用でしょうか？

engChrName: Oh, nothing in particular. Just wanderin' around.
engSearchText: Oh, nothing in particular. Just wanderin' around.
jpnChrName: いや、特には無いが一応場所を 確認しに来たってところだな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、特には無いが一応場所を
確認しに来たってところだな。

engChrName: Is that so? Well, if there's anything I can help you with, please let me know.
engSearchText:
Is that so? Well, if there's anything I can help you
with, please let me know.
jpnChrName: 左様ですか、それでは何かあれば 私に伝えてください。
jpnSearchText:
左様ですか、それでは何かあれば
私に伝えてください。

engChrName: Fan is rarely at home, so if you have a message for him, I'd be happy to deliver it for you.
engSearchText:
Fan is rarely at home, so if you have a message for
him, I'd be happy to deliver it for you.
jpnChrName: ファン大人はお忙しく、御在宅でない事も多い。 我らが言伝を預かります故。
jpnSearchText:
ファン大人はお忙しく、御在宅でない事も多い。
我らが言伝を預かります故。

engChrName: By the way, I apologize for tailing you earlier.
engSearchText: By the way, I apologize for tailing you earlier.
jpnChrName: ところで、先ほどの尾行については悪しからず。
jpnSearchText: ところで、先ほどの尾行については悪しからず。

engChrName: We had to ensure Lady Ashen's safety. Fan's orders.
engSearchText: We had to ensure Lady Ashen's safety. Fan's orders.
jpnChrName: ファン大人よりアシェン様の護衛には 念を入れる様に命じられています故。
jpnSearchText:
ファン大人よりアシェン様の護衛には
念を入れる様に命じられています故。

engChrName: Those measures may seem drastic, but they're absolutely necessary. I will do what I must to protect her.
engSearchText:
Those measures may seem drastic, but they're
absolutely necessary. I will do what I must to
protect her.
jpnChrName: 実際、私としてもその必要性は重々承知…… 如何なる時も見守り、守護いたします。
jpnSearchText:
実際、私としてもその必要性は重々承知……
如何なる時も見守り、守護いたします。

engChrName: Aaron may be reluctant to join Heiyue, but I truly believe that when the time comes, he shall step up to the plate and lead us.
engSearchText:
Aaron may be reluctant to join Heiyue, but I truly
believe that when the time comes, he shall step up to
the plate and lead us.
jpnChrName: アーロンはあのような性分ではあるが、一皮むければ 間違いなく黒月を導くに相応しくなるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンはあのような性分ではあるが、一皮むければ
間違いなく黒月を導くに相応しくなるだろう。

engChrName: I have faith that he will one day look inward and realize his true calling.
engSearchText:
I have faith that he will one day look inward and
realize his true calling.
jpnChrName: 我の強い人間も、然るべき機会に自らを見直せば、 強みを生かせるように成長するものだからね。
jpnSearchText:
我の強い人間も、然るべき機会に自らを見直せば、
強みを生かせるように成長するものだからね。

engChrName: Just like my son did.
engSearchText: Just like my son did.
jpnChrName: 留学中の私の息子にも、そういう側面はあると言える。
jpnSearchText: 留学中の私の息子にも、そういう側面はあると言える。

engChrName: Well, well. If it isn't Arkride. I heard from my daughter that you met Aaron.
engSearchText:
Well, well. If it isn't Arkride. I heard from my
daughter that you met Aaron.
jpnChrName: おや、アークライド君ではないか。 アーロンと会えた件は娘からも聞いている。
jpnSearchText:
おや、アークライド君ではないか。
アーロンと会えた件は娘からも聞いている。

engChrName: We apologize that your encounter with him was so...combative.
engSearchText:
We apologize that your encounter with him was
so...combative.
jpnChrName: まあ、今私達が懸念している彼はあんな感じでね。 少々、驚いたかもしれないが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今私達が懸念している彼はあんな感じでね。
少々、驚いたかもしれないが……

engChrName: Aaron can be quite intemperate sometimes, not to mention stubborn.
engSearchText:
Aaron can be quite intemperate sometimes, not to
mention stubborn.
jpnChrName: 夕方はアーロンが喧嘩吹っ掛けちゃった みたいでごめんね、あいつ意地っ張りだから……
jpnSearchText:
夕方はアーロンが喧嘩吹っ掛けちゃった
みたいでごめんね、あいつ意地っ張りだから……

engChrName: Yeah, I got that much from our fight.
engSearchText: Yeah, I got that much from our fight.
jpnChrName: まあ、聞いていた以上の跳ね返りっぷりなのは わかったが……実力も確かだったな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、聞いていた以上の跳ね返りっぷりなのは
わかったが……実力も確かだったな。

engChrName: His strength is the real deal, though. I can see why you guys struggle to rein him in.
engSearchText:
His strength is the real deal, though. I can see why
you guys struggle to rein him in.
jpnChrName: あんた達がこの状況で扱いに困るのも 改めて納得がいった。
jpnSearchText:
あんた達がこの状況で扱いに困るのも
改めて納得がいった。

engChrName: I promise you that he's not a bad guy at all. Just a little rough around the edges.
engSearchText:
I promise you that he's not a bad guy at all. Just a
little rough around the edges.
jpnChrName: まあ、でも決して悪いヤツじゃないって事は、 幼馴染として言っておくわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、でも決して悪いヤツじゃないって事は、
幼馴染として言っておくわ。

engChrName: He's always looking after his friends, and—while he'll never admit it to your face—he is very kind to the children and the elderly.
engSearchText:
He's always looking after his friends, and—while he'll
never admit it to your face—he is very kind to the
children and the elderly.
jpnChrName: 仲間の面倒見はいいし、お年寄りにもなんやかんやで 親切なところもあるし、誤解はしないで欲しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
仲間の面倒見はいいし、お年寄りにもなんやかんやで
親切なところもあるし、誤解はしないで欲しいわ。

engChrName: It's just as she says. Were it not for those qualities, we wouldn't put so much faith in him.
engSearchText:
It's just as she says. Were it not for those qualities, we
wouldn't put so much faith in him.
jpnChrName: そうでなければ、私達も彼を 買うような事はしないからね。
jpnSearchText:
そうでなければ、私達も彼を
買うような事はしないからね。

engChrName: He also has a vast array of knowledge and possesses great leadership skills—which will serve him well should he become an elder of Heiyue.
engSearchText:
He also has a vast array of knowledge and possesses
great leadership skills—which will serve him well
should he become an elder of Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 黒月で活躍して上を目指すなら、ある程度の 統率力と視野の広さはあって然るべきだ。
jpnSearchText:
黒月で活躍して上を目指すなら、ある程度の
統率力と視野の広さはあって然るべきだ。

engChrName: My eldest son wishes to climb the ladder of Heiyue, so he desires those attributes. That is why he is studying abroad as we speak.
engSearchText:
My eldest son wishes to climb the ladder of Heiyue,
so he desires those attributes. That is why he is
studying abroad as we speak.
jpnChrName: 私の長男でさえ、それを改めて見極めさせるために 国外留学で見識を広めさせているくらいだからね。
jpnSearchText:
私の長男でさえ、それを改めて見極めさせるために
国外留学で見識を広めさせているくらいだからね。

engChrName: Got'cha. Well, don't worry about Aaron and me. I never judge a book by its cover.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Well, don't worry about Aaron and me.
I never judge a book by its cover.
jpnChrName: ええ、一応人となりは表面だけで 判断しない主義ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、一応人となりは表面だけで
判断しない主義ですしね。

engChrName: Gotta at least make it to the midpoint before I make a call.
engSearchText:
Gotta at least make it to the midpoint before I make
a call.
jpnChrName: その辺りも含めて、見極めたうえで どうするかは判断しますよ。
jpnSearchText:
その辺りも含めて、見極めたうえで
どうするかは判断しますよ。

engChrName: And it looks like I'll have a chance to get a good, long look at him and his actions soon.
engSearchText:
And it looks like I'll have a chance to get a good, long
look at him and his actions soon.
jpnChrName: まあ、早いうちに近くで見極める 機会があると……何かと良さそうですがね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、早いうちに近くで見極める
機会があると……何かと良さそうですがね。

engChrName: Haha. It's just as I heard. You may seem brash on the surface, but you're actually very observant.
engSearchText:
Haha. It's just as I heard. You may seem brash on the
surface, but you're actually very observant.
jpnChrName: はは、やはり大胆に見えて慎重に ものを見通すスタンスは思った通りだな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、やはり大胆に見えて慎重に
ものを見通すスタンスは思った通りだな。

engChrName: Well, then. I shall leave this matter in your capable hands.
engSearchText:
Well, then. I shall leave this matter in your
capable hands.
jpnChrName: 見込んだ通りだ、改めてよろしく頼むよ。
jpnSearchText: 見込んだ通りだ、改めてよろしく頼むよ。

engChrName: Heiyue hasn't caught wind of where the attackers from last night are lurking. At least, not as far as I know.
engSearchText:
Heiyue hasn't caught wind of where the attackers
from last night are lurking. At least, not as far as
I know.
jpnChrName: やっぱりどこの物件も黒月の“目”に 引っかかっていないのは気になるわね……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりどこの物件も黒月の“目”に
引っかかっていないのは気になるわね……

engChrName: Personally, I'm willing to bet the elders have figured something out.
engSearchText:
Personally, I'm willing to bet the elders have figured
something out.
jpnChrName: うーん、でもどんな形であれ長老達なら 何か掴んでいそうな気もするけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、でもどんな形であれ長老達なら
何か掴んでいそうな気もするけど……

engChrName: But in case I'm wrong, I'm going to lay out all the information I have on hand and try to come to the conclusion myself.
engSearchText:
But in case I'm wrong, I'm going to lay out all the
information I have on hand and try to come to the
conclusion myself.
jpnChrName: とにかく、あたしの方でも もう少し情報を整理し直すから。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、あたしの方でも
もう少し情報を整理し直すから。

engChrName: If you guys find them before us, then be careful, all right?
engSearchText:
If you guys find them before us, then be careful,
all right?
jpnChrName: アーロンとヴァンさん達も…… 気をつけながら探ってみて。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンとヴァンさん達も……
気をつけながら探ってみて。

engChrName: If you would, please watch over Aaron in my stead. Also, while this is just my opinion...
engSearchText:
If you would, please watch over Aaron in my stead.
Also, while this is just my opinion...
jpnChrName: アーロンの事、よろしくお願いね。 まあ、これはあたしの私見なんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンの事、よろしくお願いね。
まあ、これはあたしの私見なんだけど……

engChrName: ...I get the feeling that if you and Aaron work together on something, you'll get along quite well.
engSearchText:
...I get the feeling that if you and Aaron work
together on something, you'll get along quite well.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんとアーロン、案外組んで何かを やってみたら、結構息が合う気もしてね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんとアーロン、案外組んで何かを
やってみたら、結構息が合う気もしてね。

engChrName: (Syd... I promise I'll get revenge for you...and the rest of the bros.)
engSearchText:
(Syd... I promise I'll get revenge for you...and the rest
of the bros.)
jpnChrName: （シド……ホアン達の仇は絶対にオレが   討ってきてやるからな……）
jpnSearchText:
（シド……ホアン達の仇は絶対にオレが
討ってきてやるからな……）

engChrName: (So hurry and wake up already...please. I wanna be able to tell you about how I beat their asses down.)
engSearchText:
(So hurry and wake up already...please. I wanna be
able to tell you about how I beat their asses down.)
jpnChrName: （だから……早く目を覚ましてくれ、   連中をぶっ倒したって話を聞かせてやるからよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（だから……早く目を覚ましてくれ、
連中をぶっ倒したって話を聞かせてやるからよ。）

engChrName: I promise to keep him alive until we can get him to the hospital. Heiyue has already contacted them.
engSearchText:
I promise to keep him alive until we can get him to
the hospital. Heiyue has already contacted them.
jpnChrName: ……黒月が手配した病院に運ぶまでは 儂が責任を持って命を繋いでおく。
jpnSearchText:
……黒月が手配した病院に運ぶまでは
儂が責任を持って命を繋いでおく。

engChrName: In return, I only ask that you keep Aaron company.
engSearchText: In return, I only ask that you keep Aaron company.
jpnChrName: お前さん達はこやつのためにも…… アーロンを追うが良い。
jpnSearchText:
お前さん達はこやつのためにも……
アーロンを追うが良い。

engChrName: Man, that was refreshing as hell!
engSearchText: Man, that was refreshing as hell!
jpnChrName: 昼間のアレはスカッとしたよな！
jpnSearchText: 昼間のアレはスカッとしたよな！

engChrName: We really showed those gangsters and outsiders that we mean business. Aaron must've had them quaking in their boots!
engSearchText:
We really showed those gangsters and outsiders that
we mean business. Aaron must've had them quaking
in their boots!
jpnChrName: 半グレだけじゃねぇ、首都の出しゃばり屋も 少しはアーロンの力を思い知ったんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
半グレだけじゃねぇ、首都の出しゃばり屋も
少しはアーロンの力を思い知ったんじゃないか？

engChrName: Shame that blonde chick had to ruin it all. Things were just about to get interesting.
engSearchText:
Shame that blonde chick had to ruin it all.
Things were just about to get interesting.
jpnChrName: まったく、あの女が首突っ込んでこなきゃ、 もっと面白くなりそうだったのになァ！
jpnSearchText:
まったく、あの女が首突っ込んでこなきゃ、
もっと面白くなりそうだったのになァ！

engChrName: We're gonna wait around and kill time.
engSearchText: We're gonna wait around and kill time.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ俺らは待ってるとするぜ、 なに、暇潰しなんざいくらでもできる。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ俺らは待ってるとするぜ、
なに、暇潰しなんざいくらでもできる。

engChrName: Aaron's never done us wrong. Following that guy always leads to some interesting shit.
engSearchText:
Aaron's never done us wrong. Following that guy
always leads to some interesting shit.
jpnChrName: アーロンの言う事には間違いはねぇしな、 そいつに同行するのも面白い事に繋がるだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンの言う事には間違いはねぇしな、
そいつに同行するのも面白い事に繋がるだろうしな。

engChrName: Damn those punks. They think they can get one over us with surprise ambushes? Well, I'll show them!
engSearchText:
Damn those punks. They think they can get one over
us with surprise ambushes? Well, I'll show them!
jpnChrName: クソ、あのチンピラ共め…… 毎回卑劣な不意打ちばかりしやがって。
jpnSearchText:
クソ、あのチンピラ共め……
毎回卑劣な不意打ちばかりしやがって。

engChrName: I'm gonna catch their asses and wipe those stupid grins off their faces! I'mma make Aaron proud!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna catch their asses and wipe those stupid
grins off their faces! I'mma make Aaron proud!
jpnChrName: 見ていろ、次こそ俺がとっ捕まえてやらぁ！ これ以上アーロンに手間かけさせるかよ！
jpnSearchText:
見ていろ、次こそ俺がとっ捕まえてやらぁ！
これ以上アーロンに手間かけさせるかよ！

engChrName: I gotta handle this on my own—or I'll never be able to look him in the eye again.
engSearchText:
I gotta handle this on my own—or I'll never be able
to look him in the eye again.
jpnChrName: 俺とてアーロンの同門だ、 何なら一人でもやってやる！
jpnSearchText:
俺とてアーロンの同門だ、
何なら一人でもやってやる！

engChrName: The strange mist last night reminded me of the darkest days of my life...
engSearchText:
The strange mist last night reminded me of the
darkest days of my life...
jpnChrName: 昨晩の霧といい妙な気配といい…… 今になって思い出させられるとはな……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩の霧といい妙な気配といい……
今になって思い出させられるとはな……

engChrName: The most awful memories will stalk you wherever you go...and they will only give up the chase once you enter the grave.
engSearchText:
The most awful memories will stalk you wherever you
go...and they will only give up the chase once you
enter the grave.
jpnChrName: 全く、嫌なものに限って忘れられねぇ…… 思い出の場所を奪われた時なんてよ……
jpnSearchText:
全く、嫌なものに限って忘れられねぇ……
思い出の場所を奪われた時なんてよ……

engChrName: I remember that mist all too well...and it's reared its ugly head into our lives once more...
engSearchText:
I remember that mist all too well...and it's reared its
ugly head into our lives once more...
jpnChrName: あの霧といい空気といい…… あの時そのもんじゃねぇか……
jpnSearchText:
あの霧といい空気といい……
あの時そのもんじゃねぇか……

engChrName: When it appeared back then, many of us lost so many things we held dear...
engSearchText:
When it appeared back then, many of us lost so many
things we held dear...
jpnChrName: あの時、俺や他の連中は多くのものを 失っちまったが……
jpnSearchText:
あの時、俺や他の連中は多くのものを
失っちまったが……

engChrName: Will history repeat itself? Has it come to take even more from us? When will it ever be satisfied?
engSearchText:
Will history repeat itself? Has it come to take even
more from us? When will it ever be satisfied?
jpnChrName: まさか、また俺たちは大切なものを 奪われなきゃならんのか……？
jpnSearchText:
まさか、また俺たちは大切なものを
奪われなきゃならんのか……？

engChrName: I had no trouble finding work after quitting the mining job.
engSearchText:
I had no trouble finding work after quitting the
mining job.
jpnChrName: 鉱員を辞めた後も、 仕事には困らんかったな。
jpnSearchText:
鉱員を辞めた後も、
仕事には困らんかったな。

engChrName: Trade and finance were on the rise at the time, so there were all sorts of carrier jobs available.
engSearchText:
Trade and finance were on the rise at the time, so
there were all sorts of carrier jobs available.
jpnChrName: 何せ貿易も金融も好調だったからな、 運びの仕事がいくらでもあってな。
jpnSearchText:
何せ貿易も金融も好調だったからな、
運びの仕事がいくらでもあってな。

engChrName: It replaced the mining business here, and thus the mine was drowned in the ever-changing tide of the economy.
engSearchText:
It replaced the mining business here, and thus the
mine was drowned in the ever-changing tide of
the economy.
jpnChrName: だが……あんな理由で鉱山が 消えちまったからなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
だが……あんな理由で鉱山が
消えちまったからなぁ……

engChrName: That place held a great many memories, so perhaps that is why I was saddled with regrets...
engSearchText:
That place held a great many memories, so perhaps
that is why I was saddled with regrets...
jpnChrName: 思い出の仕事場だからか、 心残りは消えんかったな……
jpnSearchText:
思い出の仕事場だからか、
心残りは消えんかったな……

engChrName: You still out here being all melancholic, Ouran? That's not gonna put a smile on your old lady's face, y'know.
engSearchText:
You still out here being all melancholic, Ouran?
That's not gonna put a smile on your old lady's
face, y'know.
jpnChrName: オウラン、また黄昏れてやがんのか。 そんなん、あの婆さんも喜びやしねぇぜ。
jpnSearchText:
オウラン、また黄昏れてやがんのか。
そんなん、あの婆さんも喜びやしねぇぜ。

engChrName: Blunt as ever, aren't you, Aaron? Still, your words ring true.
engSearchText:
Blunt as ever, aren't you, Aaron? Still, your words
ring true.
jpnChrName: おお、アーロンか。 相変わらず手厳しい若者だな。
jpnSearchText:
おお、アーロンか。
相変わらず手厳しい若者だな。

engChrName: The fact that I'm chained down by the past must be filling her with sorrow, but I want her to look down on me with pride.
engSearchText:
The fact that I'm chained down by the past must be
filling her with sorrow, but I want her to look down
on me with pride.
jpnChrName: まあ、過去に縛られてちゃ、天上聖母のところの 妻が安心できねぇってのはもっともだぜ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、過去に縛られてちゃ、天上聖母のところの
妻が安心できねぇってのはもっともだぜ……

engChrName: Perhaps if I had that endless vitality of yours, I could rid myself of these shackles and be free once more.
engSearchText:
Perhaps if I had that endless vitality of yours, I could
rid myself of these shackles and be free once more.
jpnChrName: お前さんの、底無しの活力を分けて もらいてぇくらいだよ。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんの、底無しの活力を分けて
もらいてぇくらいだよ。

engChrName: You're waxing poetic more than usual, which means something's troubling you. What's on your mind?
engSearchText:
You're waxing poetic more than usual, which means
something's troubling you. What's on your mind?
jpnChrName: ……んで、どうしたってんだよ爺さん。 いつも以上じゃねぇか、ここで萎びてんのもよ。
jpnSearchText:
……んで、どうしたってんだよ爺さん。
いつも以上じゃねぇか、ここで萎びてんのもよ。

engChrName: Hmph. Can't hide a thing from you, can I?
engSearchText: Hmph. Can't hide a thing from you, can I?
jpnChrName: フン、お前さんにゃ隠し事も通じんな……
jpnSearchText: フン、お前さんにゃ隠し事も通じんな……

engChrName: I've been consumed with worry—over things like losing everything that's ever been important to me... once again.
engSearchText:
I've been consumed with worry—over things like
losing everything that's ever been important to me...
once again.
jpnChrName: まあ……急に不安になっちまってな。 また何か、昔みてぇに失っちまう気がしてよ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……急に不安になっちまってな。
また何か、昔みてぇに失っちまう気がしてよ……

engChrName: C'mon, not this again. You need to kick back, relax, and enjoy the years you got left. Leave the worrying to my generation.
engSearchText:
C'mon, not this again. You need to kick back, relax,
and enjoy the years you got left. Leave the worrying
to my generation.
jpnChrName: ハッ、またその事か。 爺さんは安心して余生楽しんでりゃいいんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、またその事か。
爺さんは安心して余生楽しんでりゃいいんだよ。

engChrName: If hell breaks loose in this town, we'll be the ones to shut its gates.
engSearchText:
If hell breaks loose in this town, we'll be the ones to
shut its gates.
jpnChrName: 今何かがあったら、何とかすんのはオレら 若いもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
今何かがあったら、何とかすんのはオレら
若いもんだ。

engChrName: I've got no idea about what went down with you and your job back in the day, but I say let it go and do whatever the hell you want now.
engSearchText:
I've got no idea about what went down with you and
your job back in the day, but I say let it go and do
whatever the hell you want now.
jpnChrName: 昔の職場だか何だか知らねぇが、 今は好きにしてりゃ良いんじゃねぇか、爺さんよ。
jpnSearchText:
昔の職場だか何だか知らねぇが、
今は好きにしてりゃ良いんじゃねぇか、爺さんよ。

engChrName: Heh. You've got a lot of nerve.
engSearchText: Heh. You've got a lot of nerve.
jpnChrName: フン、偉そうな事を言いやがって……
jpnSearchText: フン、偉そうな事を言いやがって……

engChrName: You're absolutely right, though. I can't let the memories of the past tie me down.
engSearchText:
You're absolutely right, though. I can't let the
memories of the past tie me down.
jpnChrName: だが、こればっかりはその通りだな。 悪い思い出に捕らわれてちゃ、若ェのに悪いってとこか。
jpnSearchText:
だが、こればっかりはその通りだな。
悪い思い出に捕らわれてちゃ、若ェのに悪いってとこか。

engChrName: Aaron's words are sharper than any blade, but I respect his willingness to lay into us older folks.
engSearchText:
Aaron's words are sharper than any blade, but I
respect his willingness to lay into us older folks.
jpnChrName: アーロンは生意気に見えて、ワシら老人にも 言う事言ってくれるからなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンは生意気に見えて、ワシら老人にも
言う事言ってくれるからなぁ……

engChrName: We may whine about it from time to time, but sometimes, we need a dose of bitter truth to make the pain go away.
engSearchText:
We may whine about it from time to time, but
sometimes, we need a dose of bitter truth to make the
pain go away.
jpnChrName: 何やかんや言って、そいつが荒療治になる 爺連中も多いってところだ……
jpnSearchText:
何やかんや言って、そいつが荒療治になる
爺連中も多いってところだ……

engChrName: He may be immature, but we know he means well.
engSearchText: He may be immature, but we know he means well.
jpnChrName: まあ、だから嫌いになれねぇってモンだぜ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、だから嫌いになれねぇってモンだぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* The salty breeze reminds me of that mine... I think I'm the only one left who remembers it.
engSearchText:
*sigh* The salty breeze reminds me of that mine...
I think I'm the only one left who remembers it.
jpnChrName: 潮風に吹かれて、あの鉱山を思い出すのも もうワシくらいになったか……
jpnSearchText:
潮風に吹かれて、あの鉱山を思い出すのも
もうワシくらいになったか……

engChrName: Looking back, my job there was tough as nails, but I wouldn't've met my wife had it not been for that place.
engSearchText:
Looking back, my job there was tough as nails, but I
wouldn't've met my wife had it not been for
that place.
jpnChrName: 今思えばつらい仕事だったが…… 妻と逢えたのも、あの職場のお陰だったしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
今思えばつらい仕事だったが……
妻と逢えたのも、あの職場のお陰だったしなぁ。

engChrName: I'll never forget about it, no matter how many decades pass me by. It's where I spent much of my youth.
engSearchText:
I'll never forget about it, no matter how many decades
pass me by. It's where I spent much of my youth.
jpnChrName: やはり……何十年も経っても忘れられねぇ。 青春の場所ってヤツだったのかね、ワシの……
jpnSearchText:
やはり……何十年も経っても忘れられねぇ。
青春の場所ってヤツだったのかね、ワシの……

engChrName: (I didn't know Langport had a mine. I thought it was just a trading city.)
engSearchText:
(I didn't know Langport had a mine. I thought it was
just a trading city.)
jpnChrName: （鉱山……ラングポートと言えば   貿易都市のイメージでしたが……）
jpnSearchText:
（鉱山……ラングポートと言えば
貿易都市のイメージでしたが……）

engChrName: (Well, there used to be a mine here way back when.)
engSearchText: (Well, there used to be a mine here way back when.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、大分昔には鉱山もあったらしいな。）
jpnSearchText: （ああ、大分昔には鉱山もあったらしいな。）

engChrName: (But it was shut down and sealed away. No clue why that happened.)
engSearchText:
(But it was shut down and sealed away. No clue why
that happened.)
jpnChrName: （何で封鎖されちまったのかまでは、   俺も知らねぇんだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（何で封鎖されちまったのかまでは、
俺も知らねぇんだが……）

engChrName: Back when the mine was still around, I was young and filled with hopes and dreams.
engSearchText:
Back when the mine was still around, I was young
and filled with hopes and dreams.
jpnChrName: 鉱山があった時は……あれはあれで 活気ってモンがあったなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
鉱山があった時は……あれはあれで
活気ってモンがあったなぁ……

engChrName: I worked there so I could earn and save money. I was hoping I could make a name for myself one day.
engSearchText:
I worked there so I could earn and save money. I was
hoping I could make a name for myself one day.
jpnChrName: ワシも鉱山で金を貯めて、 何か一旗揚げようと思っていたっけか……
jpnSearchText:
ワシも鉱山で金を貯めて、
何か一旗揚げようと思っていたっけか……

engChrName: In the end, however, I lost everything...
engSearchText: In the end, however, I lost everything...
jpnChrName: 結局、何もかも無くなっちまったがなぁ……
jpnSearchText: 結局、何もかも無くなっちまったがなぁ……

engChrName: We're holding off on reopening tours for a while longer.
engSearchText:
We're holding off on reopening tours for a
while longer.
jpnChrName: うーむ、やっぱりツアーの再開は慎重に やらざるを得なさそうだな……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ、やっぱりツアーの再開は慎重に
やらざるを得なさそうだな……

engChrName: After hearing about the incident at the port, I decided it'd be best to prioritize the people's safety, even if we lose money in the short run.
engSearchText:
After hearing about the incident at the port, I decided
it'd be best to prioritize the people's safety, even if we
lose money in the short run.
jpnChrName: 港の方でも事件があったって話だし、 当分の間は様子を見た方が良いか……
jpnSearchText:
港の方でも事件があったって話だし、
当分の間は様子を見た方が良いか……

engChrName: But I don't have any issues with renting a boat to you guys. Just say the word, and the keys are yours.
engSearchText:
But I don't have any issues with renting a boat to
you guys. Just say the word, and the keys are yours.
jpnChrName: まあ、あんたらに協力するのはやぶさかじゃねぇ、 必要ならボートも貸すからな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あんたらに協力するのはやぶさかじゃねぇ、
必要ならボートも貸すからな。

engChrName: Plans to jumpstart the tour business again were halted. We've got a mountain of issues to deal with because of last night.
engSearchText:
Plans to jumpstart the tour business again
were halted. We've got a mountain of issues to deal
with because of last night.
jpnChrName: ツアー再開の準備を始められると思ったら…… 事件もあったし、まだまだ問題は山積みだな。
jpnSearchText:
ツアー再開の準備を始められると思ったら……
事件もあったし、まだまだ問題は山積みだな。

engChrName: Heiyue put me in charge of tourist safety, so how we proceed with the rental business is up to me...
engSearchText:
Heiyue put me in charge of tourist safety, so how we
proceed with the rental business is up to me...
jpnChrName: まあ観光客の安全に関しちゃ俺も黒月に責任を 任されてるし、慎重にやっていかないとな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ観光客の安全に関しちゃ俺も黒月に責任を
任されてるし、慎重にやっていかないとな。

engChrName: How's it going, Aaron? It's rare to see you doing the night rounds with an outsider.
engSearchText:
How's it going, Aaron? It's rare to see you doing the
night rounds with an outsider.
jpnChrName: おお、アーロンじゃないか。 余所者と一緒に夜回りとは珍しいな。
jpnSearchText:
おお、アーロンじゃないか。
余所者と一緒に夜回りとは珍しいな。

engChrName: I'm just curious about how this guy runs his business.
engSearchText: I'm just curious about how this guy runs his business.
jpnChrName: ハン、しゃしゃり出てきたこのおっさんの 稼業ってのをちょいと見極めようと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、しゃしゃり出てきたこのおっさんの
稼業ってのをちょいと見極めようと思ってな。

engChrName: Kinda surprised to see you here so late at night. When'd you become such a hard worker?
engSearchText:
Kinda surprised to see you here so late at night.
When'd you become such a hard worker?
jpnChrName: あんたこそ、こんな遅くまで舟のお守りったぁ 相変わらず精の出る事じゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
あんたこそ、こんな遅くまで舟のお守りったぁ
相変わらず精の出る事じゃねぇか。

engChrName: When Heiyue put me in charge, of course.
engSearchText: When Heiyue put me in charge, of course.
jpnChrName: ハハ、黒月に任せて貰えてる以上はな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、黒月に任せて貰えてる以上はな。

engChrName: That said, the Eroded Cave is dangerous at night, so there won't be any more tours today.
engSearchText:
That said, the Eroded Cave is dangerous at night, so
there won't be any more tours today.
jpnChrName: まあ、とはいえ流石に夜の海蝕洞は危ねぇし、 ツアーはもうお終いの時間だが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、とはいえ流石に夜の海蝕洞は危ねぇし、
ツアーはもうお終いの時間だが……

engChrName: Unless you want to take a trip there. I'll always make an exception for a tough guy like you.
engSearchText:
Unless you want to take a trip there. I'll always make
an exception for a tough guy like you.
jpnChrName: ま、アンタみたいに腕の立つ奴なら いつ連れて行っても別に構わねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アンタみたいに腕の立つ奴なら
いつ連れて行っても別に構わねぇが。

engChrName: Cool. When I get some free time, I might head over there to train.
engSearchText:
Cool. When I get some free time, I might head over
there to train.
jpnChrName: ハン、そんじゃあ暇な時でもあったら また海蝕洞で腕試しでもさせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、そんじゃあ暇な時でもあったら
また海蝕洞で腕試しでもさせてもらうわ。

engChrName: A long time ago, I took Aaron to the Eroded Cave because he wanted to test his abilities...
engSearchText:
A long time ago, I took Aaron to the Eroded Cave
because he wanted to test his abilities...
jpnChrName: アーロンは大分前に海蝕洞まで腕試しのために 連れて行ったことがあってなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンは大分前に海蝕洞まで腕試しのために
連れて行ったことがあってなぁ……

engChrName: ...and I was captivated by the way he fought.
engSearchText: ...and I was captivated by the way he fought.
jpnChrName: あの時も魔獣相手に大立ち回りして、 見惚れちまったってモンよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの時も魔獣相手に大立ち回りして、
見惚れちまったってモンよ。

engChrName: Heiyue's never happy when an incident occurs in the Eroded Cave. Hurts their bottom line.
engSearchText:
Heiyue's never happy when an incident occurs in the
Eroded Cave. Hurts their bottom line.
jpnChrName: 俺も海蝕洞で事故でもあった日にゃ、 黒月に睨まれちまうし、収入も無くなっちまう。
jpnSearchText:
俺も海蝕洞で事故でもあった日にゃ、
黒月に睨まれちまうし、収入も無くなっちまう。

engChrName: Things get dangerous there at night, so for my sake, don't even think about going there right now.
engSearchText:
Things get dangerous there at night, so for my sake,
don't even think about going there right now.
jpnChrName: ま、あんたらも夜には無理に 行こうとは思わない事だな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あんたらも夜には無理に
行こうとは思わない事だな。

engChrName: Oh, you guys the problem solvers I've heard about?
engSearchText: Oh, you guys the problem solvers I've heard about?
jpnChrName: おお、あんた達が例の 解決屋ってやつかい？
jpnSearchText:
おお、あんた達が例の
解決屋ってやつかい？

engChrName: You look tough. I get why Heiyue has their eye on you.
engSearchText:
You look tough. I get why Heiyue has their eye
on you.
jpnChrName: 聞いた通り、確かに色々と頼れそうだな。 なるほど、黒月の方が目を付けるだけある。
jpnSearchText:
聞いた通り、確かに色々と頼れそうだな。
なるほど、黒月の方が目を付けるだけある。

engChrName: Wait, you're a part of Heiyue?
engSearchText: Wait, you're a part of Heiyue?
jpnChrName: その口ぶりからして、もしかして あなたも黒月の……？
jpnSearchText:
その口ぶりからして、もしかして
あなたも黒月の……？

engChrName: Not exactly. I'm just a simple ferryman.
engSearchText: Not exactly. I'm just a simple ferryman.
jpnChrName: 別に回し者ってほどのモンでもねぇ、 俺ァただの渡し守兼案内人よ。
jpnSearchText:
別に回し者ってほどのモンでもねぇ、
俺ァただの渡し守兼案内人よ。

engChrName: But us guides don't want tourists wandering off in the wrong places and causing trouble—and neither do they.
engSearchText:
But us guides don't want tourists wandering off in the
wrong places and causing trouble—and neither
do they.
jpnChrName: ただ、色々ある街だから観光客が変な 所に行ってトラブルになってもいかんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、色々ある街だから観光客が変な
所に行ってトラブルになってもいかんだろ。

engChrName: So we work together to some degree. It's a mutually beneficial arrangement.
engSearchText:
So we work together to some degree. It's a mutually
beneficial arrangement.
jpnChrName: だから俺らガイドも黒月とはそれなりに よろしくやっているってわけさ。
jpnSearchText:
だから俺らガイドも黒月とはそれなりに
よろしくやっているってわけさ。

engChrName: Draw a distinction all you like, but the way I see it, you're a Heiyue member through and through.
engSearchText:
Draw a distinction all you like, but the way I see it,
you're a Heiyue member through and through.
jpnChrName: ま、大して変わらねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText: ま、大して変わらねぇだろう。

engChrName: Your job's to look out for spies disguised as tourists and serve as a liaison between Heiyue and people who wanna contact them.
engSearchText:
Your job's to look out for spies disguised as tourists
and serve as a liaison between Heiyue and people who
wanna contact them.
jpnChrName: 十中八九、観光客に紛れたスパイの監視や 黒月と接触したい奴の仲介もしてるだろうよ。
jpnSearchText:
十中八九、観光客に紛れたスパイの監視や
黒月と接触したい奴の仲介もしてるだろうよ。

engChrName: You're well informed. Still, I do this work in part to prevent tourist trouble on the ocean—of which there is plenty.
engSearchText:
You're well informed. Still, I do this work in part to
prevent tourist trouble on the ocean—of which there
is plenty.
jpnChrName: まあ、そう警戒するなって。 海の方の観光もトラブルはあるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そう警戒するなって。
海の方の観光もトラブルはあるからよ。

engChrName: And I usually end up involved with any requests on that end.
engSearchText:
And I usually end up involved with any requests on
that end.
jpnChrName: そっち方面の依頼は俺も関わるだろうし、 ちと確認しておきたかっただけさ。
jpnSearchText:
そっち方面の依頼は俺も関わるだろうし、
ちと確認しておきたかっただけさ。

engChrName: Now, this is a fine boat. Are we able to rent it?
engSearchText: Now, this is a fine boat. Are we able to rent it?
jpnChrName: あら、もしかして…… ここにある船って乗れるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
あら、もしかして……
ここにある船って乗れるのかしら？

engChrName: You can, yeah.
engSearchText: You can, yeah.
jpnChrName: ええ、ここにあるのは 貸し出し用の船ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ここにあるのは
貸し出し用の船ですよ。

engChrName: Tourists like you typically use it to see the Eroded Cave.
engSearchText:
Tourists like you typically use it to see the
Eroded Cave.
jpnChrName: 海蝕洞のツアーなんかで よく使われてるんですがね。
jpnSearchText:
海蝕洞のツアーなんかで
よく使われてるんですがね。

engChrName: Unfortunately, there's been a little bit of trouble there, so tours to that place are on pause.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, there's been a little bit of trouble
there, so tours to that place are on pause.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら今はトラブルがあって、 ツアーは中止してましてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら今はトラブルがあって、
ツアーは中止してましてねぇ。

engChrName: Aww... What a shame.
engSearchText: Aww... What a shame.
jpnChrName: そう……ツアーには興味があったけど 仕方ないわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そう……ツアーには興味があったけど
仕方ないわねぇ。

engChrName: (He has to be talking about his request.)
engSearchText: (He has to be talking about his request.)
jpnChrName: （それってきっと、 　あの依頼の件ですよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（それってきっと、
　あの依頼の件ですよね。）

engChrName: (It's gonna be a while till the monsters withdraw from the cave.)
engSearchText:
(It's gonna be a while till the monsters withdraw from
the cave.)
jpnChrName: （魔獣が海蝕洞から引くまで 　それなりに時間がかかるだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（魔獣が海蝕洞から引くまで
　それなりに時間がかかるだろ。）

engChrName: (Don't think we have time to handle it, though.)
engSearchText: (Don't think we have time to handle it, though.)
jpnChrName: （少なくとも今日中の復帰は 　無理なんじゃねえか？）
jpnSearchText:
（少なくとも今日中の復帰は
　無理なんじゃねえか？）

engChrName: (He's talking about his request, right?)
engSearchText: (He's talking about his request, right?)
jpnChrName: （それってきっと、 　あの依頼の件ですよね……？）
jpnSearchText:
（それってきっと、
　あの依頼の件ですよね……？）

engChrName: (Yeah. If we have time, let's help out later.)
engSearchText: (Yeah. If we have time, let's help out later.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、後で余裕があれば 　手伝ってやるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、後で余裕があれば
　手伝ってやるか。）

engChrName: (What kind of trouble is he talking about?)
engSearchText: (What kind of trouble is he talking about?)
jpnChrName: （トラブルって何の事でしょうか……？）
jpnSearchText: （トラブルって何の事でしょうか……？）

engChrName: (Pretty curious myself, to be honest. When we finish this request, let's try asking him.)
engSearchText:
(Pretty curious myself, to be honest. When we finish
this request, let's try asking him.)
jpnChrName: （気にはなるよな…… 　この依頼が終わったら話をしてみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（気にはなるよな……
　この依頼が終わったら話をしてみるか。）

engChrName: Sorry, but the Eroded Cave tours are currently on hold.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but the Eroded Cave tours are currently
on hold.
jpnChrName: 申し訳ありませんね、 海蝕洞のツアーは中止になってるんでさぁ。
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ありませんね、
海蝕洞のツアーは中止になってるんでさぁ。

engChrName: Tours around this area are fair game, though.
engSearchText: Tours around this area are fair game, though.
jpnChrName: そこら辺を漕いでみるってだけでも 貸し出してるんで検討してみてくだせえ。
jpnSearchText:
そこら辺を漕いでみるってだけでも
貸し出してるんで検討してみてくだせえ。

engChrName: There are many interesting sights to see in Langport, such as the Eroded Cave.
engSearchText:
There are many interesting sights to see in Langport,
such as the Eroded Cave.
jpnChrName: ラングポートは海蝕洞とか入り組んだ ところにも結構見所があってな。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートは海蝕洞とか入り組んだ
ところにも結構見所があってな。

engChrName: It's my job to guide people who want to go to those places...
engSearchText:
It's my job to guide people who want to go to
those places...
jpnChrName: そういう所に行きたい人らを 案内すんのが基本的には俺の生業さ。
jpnSearchText:
そういう所に行きたい人らを
案内すんのが基本的には俺の生業さ。

engChrName: ...as well as veer them away from areas they shouldn't enter.
engSearchText:
...as well as veer them away from areas they
shouldn't enter.
jpnChrName: ついでに、入っちゃならねぇところに 客が入らんよう見張れってのが黒月のお達しさ。
jpnSearchText:
ついでに、入っちゃならねぇところに
客が入らんよう見張れってのが黒月のお達しさ。

engChrName: Your vehicle's in the best of hands, I assure you.
engSearchText: Your vehicle's in the best of hands, I assure you.
jpnChrName: お前さんの車なら、しっかりと ムラ無く化粧しておいてやるぞよ。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんの車なら、しっかりと
ムラ無く化粧しておいてやるぞよ。

engChrName: I've been doing this job since before you youngins were in diapers.
engSearchText:
I've been doing this job since before you youngins
were in diapers.
jpnChrName: こんな仕事じゃが、ワシも始めて 長いものでな。
jpnSearchText:
こんな仕事じゃが、ワシも始めて
長いものでな。

engChrName: I'll leave her better than you found her.
engSearchText: I'll leave her better than you found her.
jpnChrName: それなりの誇りは持っちゃおるのじゃ、 まあ、心配せず任せておくが良い。
jpnSearchText:
それなりの誇りは持っちゃおるのじゃ、
まあ、心配せず任せておくが良い。

engChrName: ...The members of the theater are in mourning after last night's incident.
engSearchText:
...The members of the theater are in mourning after
last night's incident.
jpnChrName: ……劇団の者達も昨晩の事件には 胸を痛めているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……劇団の者達も昨晩の事件には
胸を痛めているんだ。

engChrName: We're putting together a performance of remembrance in honor of those boys.
engSearchText:
We're putting together a performance of
remembrance in honor of those boys.
jpnChrName: 華劇場の全員で祈りを込めて 追悼の演出を行わせてもらうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
華劇場の全員で祈りを込めて
追悼の演出を行わせてもらうとしよう。

engChrName: It's said that the spring lily grows deep within the Eroded Cave.
engSearchText:
It's said that the spring lily grows deep within the
Eroded Cave.
jpnChrName: 『清翠（せいすい）の百合』は海蝕洞の奥に 生えていると言われていてね。
jpnSearchText:
『清翠（せいすい）の百合』は海蝕洞の奥に
生えていると言われていてね。

engChrName: If you all end up going there, please look for it.
engSearchText: If you all end up going there, please look for it.
jpnChrName: もし君たちが海蝕洞に行く事があったら 探してもらえると助かるよ。
jpnSearchText:
もし君たちが海蝕洞に行く事があったら
探してもらえると助かるよ。

engChrName: ...Although, I suppose there's little reason for anyone to head there under these circumstances.
engSearchText:
...Although, I suppose there's little reason for anyone
to head there under these circumstances.
jpnChrName: ……なんて、滅多な事がなければ この状況で行く用事もないだろうけどね……
jpnSearchText:
……なんて、滅多な事がなければ
この状況で行く用事もないだろうけどね……

engChrName: We managed to conclude this morning's performances without incident...
engSearchText:
We managed to conclude this morning's
performances without incident...
jpnChrName: 今朝の公演も無事に終えることが出来た……
jpnSearchText: 今朝の公演も無事に終えることが出来た……

engChrName: I'm glad people were able to enjoy them as usual.
engSearchText: I'm glad people were able to enjoy them as usual.
jpnChrName: 街の皆も、普段通りに劇を 楽しんでくれていて何よりだよ。
jpnSearchText:
街の皆も、普段通りに劇を
楽しんでくれていて何よりだよ。

engChrName: There's no need for you to be concerned with us, Aaron. Do what you need to do.
engSearchText:
There's no need for you to be concerned with
us, Aaron. Do what you need to do.
jpnChrName: アーロン君、華劇場の事は心配する事は無い。 今は、やるべき事をやってきて欲しい。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン君、華劇場の事は心配する事は無い。
今は、やるべき事をやってきて欲しい。

engChrName: I wasn't worried about you in the first place.
engSearchText: I wasn't worried about you in the first place.
jpnChrName: ハッ、別に心配しちゃいねぇよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、別に心配しちゃいねぇよ。

engChrName: You guys aren't the types to lose heart so easily.
engSearchText: You guys aren't the types to lose heart so easily.
jpnChrName: あんたら劇場の連中が簡単には へこたれねぇ事はわかっているからな。
jpnSearchText:
あんたら劇場の連中が簡単には
へこたれねぇ事はわかっているからな。

engChrName: Heh. True enough, I suppose.
engSearchText: Heh. True enough, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ふふ、君も相変わらずで何より。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、君も相変わらずで何より。

engChrName: We all want to see you on the stage again soon...
engSearchText: We all want to see you on the stage again soon...
jpnChrName: ともあれ、無事に戻ってきたら、 是非再び舞台に上がって欲しい……
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、無事に戻ってきたら、
是非再び舞台に上がって欲しい……

engChrName: ...so promise me you'll make it back safely.
engSearchText: ...so promise me you'll make it back safely.
jpnChrName: 私達も皆、君が五体満足で帰ってくると 信じているからね……
jpnSearchText:
私達も皆、君が五体満足で帰ってくると
信じているからね……

engChrName: Sure thing. I'm already itching to make my grand return.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. I'm already itching to make my
grand return.
jpnChrName: ……そうだな。 せいぜい、また楽しませてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
……そうだな。
せいぜい、また楽しませてもらうとするか。

engChrName: I know you have things to take care of...
engSearchText: I know you have things to take care of...
jpnChrName: アーロン君には、為すべきことがあるんだろう……
jpnSearchText: アーロン君には、為すべきことがあるんだろう……

engChrName: ...but we believe that when you finish your business, you'll come back to the stage and take the world by storm once more!
engSearchText:
...but we believe that when you finish your business,
you'll come back to the stage and take the world by
storm once more!
jpnChrName: 私達は皆、アーロン君がそれを成し遂げて、 再び舞台に上がってくれると信じているからね……！
jpnSearchText:
私達は皆、アーロン君がそれを成し遂げて、
再び舞台に上がってくれると信じているからね……！

engChrName: I'm still in shock over what happened to Aaron's friends...
engSearchText:
