I'm still in shock over what happened to
Aaron's friends...
jpnChrName: 昨晩の事件については聞いている…… まさかアーロン君の友人達が……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩の事件については聞いている……
まさかアーロン君の友人達が……

engChrName: Those boys used to come by this place all the time...
engSearchText: Those boys used to come by this place all the time...
jpnChrName: あの子たちもよく劇場に顔を 出してくれていたというのに……
jpnSearchText:
あの子たちもよく劇場に顔を
出してくれていたというのに……

engChrName: I considered canceling our performances for today, but...I don't believe they would want that. They loved our theater more than anyone.
engSearchText:
I considered canceling our performances for today,
but...I don't believe they would want that. They loved
our theater more than anyone.
jpnChrName: 彼らも華劇は好きだったし、不謹慎と言われようが 公演を自粛するなど彼らも望んではいないだろう……
jpnSearchText:
彼らも華劇は好きだったし、不謹慎と言われようが
公演を自粛するなど彼らも望んではいないだろう……

engChrName: We will do our utmost to put on the greatest shows this theater has ever seen. That is the best way we can honor their memory.
engSearchText:
We will do our utmost to put on the greatest shows
this theater has ever seen. That is the best way we can
honor their memory.
jpnChrName: 彼らの為にも、今日もいつも通りに最高の 華劇を見せるよう、私達も精一杯努力するよ。
jpnSearchText:
彼らの為にも、今日もいつも通りに最高の
華劇を見せるよう、私達も精一杯努力するよ。

engChrName: You did an exceptional job this afternoon, Aaron. Although, I would appreciate it if you shared the spotlight with your peers next time.
engSearchText:
You did an exceptional job this afternoon, Aaron.
Although, I would appreciate it if you shared the
spotlight with your peers next time.
jpnChrName: アーロン君、昼の公演では見事だったよ。 ただ、もう少し周りにも華を持たせて欲しい気も……
jpnSearchText:
アーロン君、昼の公演では見事だったよ。
ただ、もう少し周りにも華を持たせて欲しい気も……

engChrName: Sorry, but that isn't how I roll. We've been over this.
engSearchText: Sorry, but that isn't how I roll. We've been over this.
jpnChrName: ハッ、あれがオレのやり方ってモンだ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、あれがオレのやり方ってモンだ。

engChrName: My presence gets asses into seats, and my acting makes the crowd go wild. What more do you want?
engSearchText:
My presence gets asses into seats, and my acting
makes the crowd go wild. What more do you want?
jpnChrName: 実際、あの演技で観客も盛り上がっているんだ、 華劇って言うのは本来そういうモンだろ？
jpnSearchText:
実際、あの演技で観客も盛り上がっているんだ、
華劇って言うのは本来そういうモンだろ？

engChrName: *sigh* You've got me there, I suppose.
engSearchText: *sigh* You've got me there, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ふう、君にはかなわないな…… まあ、生まれながらの才があるのは確かだが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、君にはかなわないな……
まあ、生まれながらの才があるのは確かだが……

engChrName: You're equally as talented as your mother, yet your skillset differs greatly from hers. That's part of what makes you so fascinating.
engSearchText:
You're equally as talented as your mother, yet your
skillset differs greatly from hers. That's part of what
makes you so fascinating.
jpnChrName: お母さまとは随分と違う方向性だけど…… それが君の魅力なのも確かなんだろうね……
jpnSearchText:
お母さまとは随分と違う方向性だけど……
それが君の魅力なのも確かなんだろうね……

engChrName: The final performance of the day is coming up. Our actors will likely be playing to a full house.
engSearchText:
The final performance of the day is coming up.
Our actors will likely be playing to a full house.
jpnChrName: もうじき今日の最終公演なのだけど、 今夜はいつも以上にお客さんが来てくれている。
jpnSearchText:
もうじき今日の最終公演なのだけど、
今夜はいつも以上にお客さんが来てくれている。

engChrName: Many of our guests have been from out of town as of late.
engSearchText:
Many of our guests have been from out of town as
of late.
jpnChrName: 最近では他の街から見に来てくれる 人も多いものでね……
jpnSearchText:
最近では他の街から見に来てくれる
人も多いものでね……

engChrName: Having our culture and traditions accepted and embraced by others is truly a joyous thing.
engSearchText:
Having our culture and traditions accepted and
embraced by others is truly a joyous thing.
jpnChrName: 伝統の形を残していくためにも、 広く受け入れてもらえるのは喜ばしい事だよ……
jpnSearchText:
伝統の形を残していくためにも、
広く受け入れてもらえるのは喜ばしい事だよ……

engChrName: I hope you enjoyed today's show. Everyone always comes away with big smiles whenever Aaron is part of the cast.
engSearchText:
I hope you enjoyed today's show. Everyone always
comes away with big smiles whenever Aaron is part of
the cast.
jpnChrName: 本日の華劇はお楽しみいただけましたか？ アーロン君の人気も相変わらずなもので……
jpnSearchText:
本日の華劇はお楽しみいただけましたか？
アーロン君の人気も相変わらずなもので……

engChrName: He is an understudy for that particular role, but his popularity exceeds that of the main actor.
engSearchText:
He is an understudy for that particular role, but his
popularity exceeds that of the main actor.
jpnChrName: 大トリを務めたアーロン君は、 あれでも正規の役者ではなくてね。
jpnSearchText:
大トリを務めたアーロン君は、
あれでも正規の役者ではなくてね。

engChrName: While I don't particularly care for his excessive ad libs, I can't deny he is an excellent performer.
engSearchText:
While I don't particularly care for his excessive ad
libs, I can't deny he is an excellent performer.
jpnChrName: 派手なアドリブを好むから、 ヒヤヒヤする事もあるが実力は確かで……
jpnSearchText:
派手なアドリブを好むから、
ヒヤヒヤする事もあるが実力は確かで……

engChrName: His appearances are sparse, however, so anyone who gets to see him on stage should count themselves lucky.
engSearchText:
His appearances are sparse, however, so anyone who
gets to see him on stage should count
themselves lucky.
jpnChrName: まあ、出演も不定期だし、彼の演技を見れた お客さん方はラッキーなものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、出演も不定期だし、彼の演技を見れた
お客さん方はラッキーなものですよ。

engChrName: Eastern theater may be a cultural tradition with a storied history, but its dazzling choreography and vibrant performances give it a modern feel.
engSearchText:
Eastern theater may be a cultural tradition with a
storied history, but its dazzling choreography and
vibrant performances give it a modern feel.
jpnChrName: 東方華劇は伝統芸能ではあるけど、 あの通り華やかでエネルギッシュでもある。
jpnSearchText:
東方華劇は伝統芸能ではあるけど、
あの通り華やかでエネルギッシュでもある。

engChrName: I believe that's why it's so popular among young people today.
engSearchText:
I believe that's why it's so popular among young
people today.
jpnChrName: それもあって今でも、他の伝統芸能に比べて 若い人らに根強い人気があるのだが……
jpnSearchText:
それもあって今でも、他の伝統芸能に比べて
若い人らに根強い人気があるのだが……

engChrName: Aaron is a shining star amidst his generation. Actors like him are hard to come by.
engSearchText:
Aaron is a shining star amidst his generation.
Actors like him are hard to come by.
jpnChrName: 流石にアーロン君ほど派手に演じる人は あの世代でもなかなかいないものでねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
流石にアーロン君ほど派手に演じる人は
あの世代でもなかなかいないものでねぇ……

engChrName: All the young members of the troupe were able to give it their all earlier.
engSearchText:
All the young members of the troupe were able to
give it their all earlier.
jpnChrName: 先の講演では若い団員も皆、 落ち着いて全力を出せて良かったわ……
jpnSearchText:
先の講演では若い団員も皆、
落ち着いて全力を出せて良かったわ……

engChrName: Even in the midst of a tragedy, we still have to entertain our audience—to give them a reprieve from the harshness of reality.
engSearchText:
Even in the midst of a tragedy, we still have to
entertain our audience—to give them a reprieve from
the harshness of reality.
jpnChrName: あんな事があっても……あたしらはプロ。 お客さんたちを楽しませなきゃいけない。
jpnSearchText:
あんな事があっても……あたしらはプロ。
お客さんたちを楽しませなきゃいけない。

engChrName: That's why I'm so proud of everyone here.
engSearchText: That's why I'm so proud of everyone here.
jpnChrName: 若い役者も、しっかり観客が落ち着いて 観劇できるように、演じ切っていたわ。
jpnSearchText:
若い役者も、しっかり観客が落ち着いて
観劇できるように、演じ切っていたわ。

engChrName: ...If you're worried about us, Aaron, don't be. Just come back to us safely, all right?
engSearchText:
...If you're worried about us, Aaron, don't be.
Just come back to us safely, all right?
jpnChrName: ……だからアーロン、あたしらは心配ないわ。 アーロンも、やるべき事をやり通しなさい。
jpnSearchText:
……だからアーロン、あたしらは心配ないわ。
アーロンも、やるべき事をやり通しなさい。

engChrName: I just can't believe those kids are gone now... They used to come here quite a lot...
engSearchText:
I just can't believe those kids are gone now...
They used to come here quite a lot...
jpnChrName: まさか華劇場にも顔を出してくれていた子たちが あんな事件に遭うなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさか華劇場にも顔を出してくれていた子たちが
あんな事件に遭うなんて……

engChrName: I hope Aaron's okay. He loved them all like family...
engSearchText: I hope Aaron's okay. He loved them all like family...
jpnChrName: アーロンも大丈夫かしら…… 仲間たちの事をすごく大切にしてたのに……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンも大丈夫かしら……
仲間たちの事をすごく大切にしてたのに……

engChrName: Fancy seeing you here, Aaron. I can't remember the last time I saw you show up twice in one day.
engSearchText:
Fancy seeing you here, Aaron. I can't remember the
last time I saw you show up twice in one day.
jpnChrName: アーロンじゃない、急に夜の公演にでも 出てくれるつもりになったのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
アーロンじゃない、急に夜の公演にでも
出てくれるつもりになったのかしら？

engChrName: Well, I'm not here to perform, so sorry if I got your hopes up. I found some other entertainment for the night.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm not here to perform, so sorry if I got your
hopes up. I found some other entertainment for
the night.
jpnChrName: 期待させて悪ィな、 今宵はちと他の遊びを見つけちまった。
jpnSearchText:
期待させて悪ィな、
今宵はちと他の遊びを見つけちまった。

engChrName: But if the mood strikes me, I'll drop by and take the stage again.
engSearchText:
But if the mood strikes me, I'll drop by and take the
stage again.
jpnChrName: ま、気が向いたらまた出てやるよ。
jpnSearchText: ま、気が向いたらまた出てやるよ。

engChrName: Oh, right. I forgot that you are normally 'busy' at night. Or rather, 'occupied' might be the more accurate term.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. I forgot that you are normally 'busy'
at night. Or rather, 'occupied' might be the more
accurate term.
jpnChrName: あはは、それもそうね。 アーロンは夜こそ“忙しい”もんね、いつも。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、それもそうね。
アーロンは夜こそ“忙しい”もんね、いつも。

engChrName: Either way, you should consider stopping by if you can. The last time you performed at night, the crowd was in love with you.
engSearchText:
Either way, you should consider stopping by if
you can. The last time you performed at night, the
crowd was in love with you.
jpnChrName: でも、以前夜の公演に参加してくれた時も アーロンは人気だったし、来てくれると盛り上がるわ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、以前夜の公演に参加してくれた時も
アーロンは人気だったし、来てくれると盛り上がるわ。

engChrName: You were especially popular with middle-aged men.
engSearchText: You were especially popular with middle-aged men.
jpnChrName: ……中年男性にやたらとウケていたって話は 意外だったけどね。
jpnSearchText:
……中年男性にやたらとウケていたって話は
意外だったけどね。

engChrName: Wait, for real? I mean...of course I was! I'm loved by all types.
engSearchText:
Wait, for real? I mean...of course I was! I'm loved by
all types.
jpnChrName: マジかよ、そいつは…… 嬉しくはねぇが面白そうではあるな。
jpnSearchText:
マジかよ、そいつは……
嬉しくはねぇが面白そうではあるな。

engChrName: All that's left is today's final show. We'll end it all with a bang.
engSearchText:
All that's left is today's final show. We'll end it all
with a bang.
jpnChrName: さて、この後は今日の最終公演…… 一日の締め括りは一層気合を入れないと。
jpnSearchText:
さて、この後は今日の最終公演……
一日の締め括りは一層気合を入れないと。

engChrName: Our theater is usually packed with older guests late at night, so the content of the production is more mature to match.
engSearchText:
Our theater is usually packed with older guests late at
night, so the content of the production is more
mature to match.
jpnChrName: 夜は客層も違ってくるし、劇の内容も 大人向けのが増えてくるからね。
jpnSearchText:
夜は客層も違ってくるし、劇の内容も
大人向けのが増えてくるからね。

engChrName: Being able to adjust your performance to suit the tastes and preferences of your present audience is the mark of a true professional.
engSearchText:
Being able to adjust your performance to suit the
tastes and preferences of your present audience is the
mark of a true professional.
jpnChrName: それをしっかり演じ分けてこそ、 一人前の華劇役者ってものよ。
jpnSearchText:
それをしっかり演じ分けてこそ、
一人前の華劇役者ってものよ。

engChrName: Aaron was as impressive as ever. It might've even been his best performance yet.
engSearchText:
Aaron was as impressive as ever. It might've even
been his best performance yet.
jpnChrName: アーロンは今日も相変わらずの華だね。 いや、前回より一層磨きがかかったかな？
jpnSearchText:
アーロンは今日も相変わらずの華だね。
いや、前回より一層磨きがかかったかな？

engChrName: I've been in this industry for over ten years, but when he first came here and showed his stuff, even I became self-conscious.
engSearchText:
I've been in this industry for over ten years, but when
he first came here and showed his stuff, even I
became self-conscious.
jpnChrName: あたしも十年以上役者してるけど、 あの子が来た時は見惚れたものでねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしも十年以上役者してるけど、
あの子が来た時は見惚れたものでねぇ。

engChrName: His movements were precise and graceful, and his acting ability would put most professionals to shame.
engSearchText:
His movements were precise and graceful, and his
acting ability would put most professionals to shame.
jpnChrName: あの華と冴えた動きの両立、 普通は一昼夜で成るもんじゃないからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あの華と冴えた動きの両立、
普通は一昼夜で成るもんじゃないからねぇ。

engChrName: If he became a full-fledged member and polished his skills further, he would soar to greater heights than we could ever imagine.
engSearchText:
If he became a full-fledged member and polished his
skills further, he would soar to greater heights than
we could ever imagine.
jpnChrName: 劇団に入って更に磨けば、どこまでも 高みを目指せそうなものなのにねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
劇団に入って更に磨けば、どこまでも
高みを目指せそうなものなのにねぇ……

engChrName: Male performers playing female characters is a practice that has existed for many, many years.
engSearchText:
Male performers playing female characters is a
practice that has existed for many, many years.
jpnChrName: 初めて観た人は驚くけど“女形”自体は 昔からあって、別にアーロンだけでもないのよ。
jpnSearchText:
初めて観た人は驚くけど“女形”自体は
昔からあって、別にアーロンだけでもないのよ。

engChrName: Aaron likes doing it—and he's become quite popular as a result.
engSearchText:
Aaron likes doing it—and he's become quite popular
as a result.
jpnChrName: まあ、最近はアーロンが一番人気だけどね。
jpnSearchText: まあ、最近はアーロンが一番人気だけどね。

engChrName: People were raving about my sword dance.
engSearchText: People were raving about my sword dance.
jpnChrName: 今日の俺の剣舞……いつも以上に 良かったと皆に言ってもらえたよ。
jpnSearchText:
今日の俺の剣舞……いつも以上に
良かったと皆に言ってもらえたよ。

engChrName: I just tried following my instincts this time, and I ended up performing better than usual.
engSearchText:
I just tried following my instincts this time, and I
ended up performing better than usual.
jpnChrName: 俺なりに直感に従ってやってみたが…… こんな時なのに普段より冴えていてな。
jpnSearchText:
俺なりに直感に従ってやってみたが……
こんな時なのに普段より冴えていてな。

engChrName: I'm finally ready to challenge you, Aaron. So don't go and get yourself hurt out there!
engSearchText:
I'm finally ready to challenge you, Aaron. So don't go
and get yourself hurt out there!
jpnChrName: だからアーロン、今度改めて勝負しよう。 そのためにも、また劇場に戻って来い！
jpnSearchText:
だからアーロン、今度改めて勝負しよう。
そのためにも、また劇場に戻って来い！

engChrName: ...All right, tough guy. You're on.
engSearchText: ...All right, tough guy. You're on.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、戻れたらな。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、戻れたらな。

engChrName: Till then, keep practicing. You'll need to if you wanna beat me.
engSearchText:
Till then, keep practicing. You'll need to if you wanna
beat me.
jpnChrName: お前もそれまで、腕をなまらせるなよ？
jpnSearchText: お前もそれまで、腕をなまらせるなよ？

engChrName: I've finally found my own way of sword dancing.
engSearchText: I've finally found my own way of sword dancing.
jpnChrName: この状況で、俺も俺なりに新しい 剣舞のやり方を見つけられそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
この状況で、俺も俺なりに新しい
剣舞のやり方を見つけられそうだ。

engChrName: That's why I wanna challenge Aaron again—and this time, I'll win!
engSearchText:
That's why I wanna challenge Aaron again—and this
time, I'll win!
jpnChrName: だから、改めてアーロンと勝負する── そして今度こそ勝って見せる！
jpnSearchText:
だから、改めてアーロンと勝負する──
そして今度こそ勝って見せる！

engChrName: We're all down—but we're not out. I'm gonna perform my heart out because that's what those guys would've wanted me to do.
engSearchText:
We're all down—but we're not out. I'm gonna
perform my heart out because that's what those guys
would've wanted me to do.
jpnChrName: あんな事件があったからこそ…… 俺達は全力で劇に挑まねば。
jpnSearchText:
あんな事件があったからこそ……
俺達は全力で劇に挑まねば。

engChrName: I'm not sure if Aaron's ever going to perform again after what happened last night...
engSearchText:
I'm not sure if Aaron's ever going to perform again
after what happened last night...
jpnChrName: 特に、殺されたのがアーロンの友人なら、 アーロンが今後出演できるかもわからない。
jpnSearchText:
特に、殺されたのがアーロンの友人なら、
アーロンが今後出演できるかもわからない。

engChrName: ...so I'm going to sword dance in his stead. This is where us pros have to show our stuff!
engSearchText:
...so I'm going to sword dance in his stead. This is
where us pros have to show our stuff!
jpnChrName: だが、ここがプロの意地の見せどころだ！ 彼の分も俺が見事な剣舞をやってみせる！
jpnSearchText:
だが、ここがプロの意地の見せどころだ！
彼の分も俺が見事な剣舞をやってみせる！

engChrName: I heard about the fight at the dock.
engSearchText: I heard about the fight at the dock.
jpnChrName: アーロン、港の方での大立ち回りは 聞いているぞ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、港の方での大立ち回りは
聞いているぞ。

engChrName: Glad to see you didn't get injured. I bet that Gekka style came in handy.
engSearchText:
Glad to see you didn't get injured. I bet that Gekka
style came in handy.
jpnChrName: 君に限っては目立つ傷を負う 心配も無いだろうけど……
jpnSearchText:
君に限っては目立つ傷を負う
心配も無いだろうけど……

engChrName: Speaking of which, is your sword dancing based on your swordsmanship?
engSearchText:
Speaking of which, is your sword dancing based on
your swordsmanship?
jpnChrName: やっぱり、君の剣舞は実際の 剣術も参考になっているのか？
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、君の剣舞は実際の
剣術も参考になっているのか？

engChrName: That's random.
engSearchText: That's random.
jpnChrName: さて、どうだろうな。 これといって意識した事もねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さて、どうだろうな。
これといって意識した事もねぇ。

engChrName: Well, I guess I never really thought about it. I just follow my instincts when I dance.
engSearchText:
Well, I guess I never really thought about it. I just
follow my instincts when I dance.
jpnChrName: 自分の直感のままに舞ってりゃ、 どっちも今の通りに出来るってモンよ。
jpnSearchText:
自分の直感のままに舞ってりゃ、
どっちも今の通りに出来るってモンよ。

engChrName: I haven't been to the Gekka dojo in ages, so if my moves are influenced by it, then it's all ingrained.
engSearchText:
I haven't been to the Gekka dojo in ages, so if my
moves are influenced by it, then it's all ingrained.
jpnChrName: 月華の道場だって、 もうロクに行っちゃいねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
月華の道場だって、
もうロクに行っちゃいねぇしな。

engChrName: Ugh. Your natural talent is on another level.
engSearchText: Ugh. Your natural talent is on another level.
jpnChrName: くっ、やはりセンスの違いってヤツか……！ 悔しいが俺には無いのだろうか……
jpnSearchText:
くっ、やはりセンスの違いってヤツか……！
悔しいが俺には無いのだろうか……

engChrName: But that's all the more reason why I need to polish my skills as much as possible.
engSearchText:
But that's all the more reason why I need to polish my
skills as much as possible.
jpnChrName: だが、俺とて吸収すべきものは吸収し、 磨けるものはなんだって磨いていくんだ！
jpnSearchText:
だが、俺とて吸収すべきものは吸収し、
磨けるものはなんだって磨いていくんだ！

engChrName: I'm gonna surpass you one of these days. Just you wait!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna surpass you one of these days. Just
you wait!
jpnChrName: アーロン、いつか俺はプロの役者として 君を越えて見せるからな！
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、いつか俺はプロの役者として
君を越えて見せるからな！

engChrName: Heh. Good luck with that, bud.
engSearchText: Heh. Good luck with that, bud.
jpnChrName: ハッ、勝負ならいつでも受けて立つぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、勝負ならいつでも受けて立つぜ。

engChrName: I heard Aaron took care of a bunch of good-for-nothings again.
engSearchText:
I heard Aaron took care of a bunch of
good-for-nothings again.
jpnChrName: アーロン、また与太者共を 見事に打ちのめしたってな。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、また与太者共を
見事に打ちのめしたってな。

engChrName: He must have downed them all with his Gekka style.
engSearchText: He must have downed them all with his Gekka style.
jpnChrName: 月華流の剣術を修めているのは知ってるが、 あの剣舞もそこから来るものなのか？
jpnSearchText:
月華流の剣術を修めているのは知ってるが、
あの剣舞もそこから来るものなのか？

engChrName: ...Wait, is that where he learned his sword dancing techniques? If I learned swordsmanship, would I be able to dance as well as him?
engSearchText:
...Wait, is that where he learned his sword
dancing techniques? If I learned swordsmanship,
would I be able to dance as well as him?
jpnChrName: 俺も、実際に剣を振るう事の何たるかを 判れば剣舞も上手くなれるのかな……
jpnSearchText:
俺も、実際に剣を振るう事の何たるかを
判れば剣舞も上手くなれるのかな……

engChrName: I should ask him about that later, but for now, I gotta focus on the performance ahead of me.
engSearchText:
I should ask him about that later, but for now, I gotta
focus on the performance ahead of me.
jpnChrName: まあ、今はとにかく目の前の舞台に 集中するとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今はとにかく目の前の舞台に
集中するとしよう。

engChrName: I hate to admit it, but Aaron's talent is the real deal.
engSearchText: I hate to admit it, but Aaron's talent is the real deal.
jpnChrName: 正規の劇団員でもないのにアーロンの剣舞は 最早俺を越えているな……
jpnSearchText:
正規の劇団員でもないのにアーロンの剣舞は
最早俺を越えているな……

engChrName: He isn't even an official member of the troupe, and he's already left me in the dust. Guess that means I'm not pushing myself hard enough...
engSearchText:
He isn't even an official member of the troupe, and
he's already left me in the dust. Guess that means I'm
not pushing myself hard enough...
jpnChrName: 悔しいが実力は実力、認めざるを得ない。 俺の精進が足りないって事だろう。
jpnSearchText:
悔しいが実力は実力、認めざるを得ない。
俺の精進が足りないって事だろう。

engChrName: But I'll show him up one of these days! I'm gonna watch him even closer than before so I can absorb all his skills!
engSearchText:
But I'll show him up one of these days! I'm gonna
watch him even closer than before so I can absorb all
his skills!
jpnChrName: だが……それなら俺も彼の技術を盗んで見返すだけさ。 後輩だろうが不定期だろうが、参考にすべきはするのみ！
jpnSearchText:
だが……それなら俺も彼の技術を盗んで見返すだけさ。
後輩だろうが不定期だろうが、参考にすべきはするのみ！

engChrName: U-Umm... E-Excuse me, Aaron!
engSearchText: U-Umm... E-Excuse me, Aaron!
jpnChrName: あ、アーロンしゃんっ！？ そ、その……
jpnSearchText:
あ、アーロンしゃんっ！？
そ、その……

engChrName: A-About your friends... I'm... I-I'm...
engSearchText: A-About your friends... I'm... I-I'm...
jpnChrName: お、お友達の事は……ッ （パクパク）
jpnSearchText:
お、お友達の事は……ッ
（パクパク）

engChrName: Still freezing up, eh? Well, I know what you're trying to say. Thanks.
engSearchText:
Still freezing up, eh? Well, I know what you're trying
to say. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ……相変わらず固まってやがる お前に言って聞こえてるかは判らねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
……相変わらず固まってやがる
お前に言って聞こえてるかは判らねぇが……

engChrName: And don't worry about me, all right? I'm gonna be gone for a bit, but I'll be back. That's a promise.
engSearchText:
And don't worry about me, all right? I'm gonna be
gone for a bit, but I'll be back. That's a promise.
jpnChrName: オレはオレなりにかたをつけてくる。 それが済んだらまた顔は見せるさ。
jpnSearchText:
オレはオレなりにかたをつけてくる。
それが済んだらまた顔は見せるさ。

engChrName: ...Although, I dunno if I'll be able to take the stage the same way I used to.
engSearchText:
...Although, I dunno if I'll be able to take the stage
the same way I used to.
jpnChrName: ……舞台の上で同じ顔を 見せられるかはともかくな。
jpnSearchText:
……舞台の上で同じ顔を
見せられるかはともかくな。

engChrName: A-Aaron...
engSearchText: A-Aaron...
jpnChrName: ……あ、あーろんしゃん しょ、しょ……
jpnSearchText:
……あ、あーろんしゃん
しょ、しょ……

engChrName: Aaron! I-I, umm... I believe in you!
engSearchText: Aaron! I-I, umm... I believe in you!
jpnChrName: アーロンさん！ その、私信じていますっ！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさん！
その、私信じていますっ！

engChrName: Hah. Finally managed to get the words out.
engSearchText: Hah. Finally managed to get the words out.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ちゃんと言えるじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ちゃんと言えるじゃねぇか。

engChrName: That's one less thing for me to worry about.
engSearchText: That's one less thing for me to worry about.
jpnChrName: ま、心配が一つ減ったとでも 思っておいてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、心配が一つ減ったとでも
思っておいてやるよ。

engChrName: I don't know what you're leaving for—and it's certainly not my place to ask.
engSearchText:
I don't know what you're leaving for—and it's
certainly not my place to ask.
jpnChrName: あ、アーロンさんがどうかたをつけるのかは 私の知るところではないですが……
jpnSearchText:
あ、アーロンさんがどうかたをつけるのかは
私の知るところではないですが……

engChrName: But I'll hold you to your promise. Please come back to us safe and sound!
engSearchText:
But I'll hold you to your promise. Please come back to
us safe and sound!
jpnChrName: それでも私はファンとして、劇場の者として アーロンさんが戻るのを信じています！
jpnSearchText:
それでも私はファンとして、劇場の者として
アーロンさんが戻るのを信じています！

engChrName: The performers are working extra hard to cheer up the locals.
engSearchText:
The performers are working extra hard to cheer up
the locals.
jpnChrName: 皆さん前向きに考えられて 凄いですね……
jpnSearchText:
皆さん前向きに考えられて
凄いですね……

engChrName: And Amalia's been thinking about starting up her fan club so she can share some positivity.
engSearchText:
And Amalia's been thinking about starting up her fan
club so she can share some positivity.
jpnChrName: 街を元気づけようとする役者の方々と、 愛好会の意義を見つけるアマリアさん……
jpnSearchText:
街を元気づけようとする役者の方々と、
愛好会の意義を見つけるアマリアさん……

engChrName: They're all so amazing—unlike me. I'm just so worried about Aaron, I can't think of anything else...
engSearchText:
They're all so amazing—unlike me. I'm just so
worried about Aaron, I can't think of anything else...
jpnChrName: 私なんて、アーロンさんの身の心配以外、 何も考えられてないですよ。
jpnSearchText:
私なんて、アーロンさんの身の心配以外、
何も考えられてないですよ。

engChrName: Welcome! How ma—A-A-Aaron?!
engSearchText: Welcome! How ma—A-A-Aaron?!
jpnChrName: あ、あなた様はあ、あ、あ…… アーロンしゃん！？
jpnSearchText:
あ、あなた様はあ、あ、あ……
アーロンしゃん！？

engChrName: Ah, umm... Uhh...
engSearchText: Ah, umm... Uhh...
jpnChrName: あーー、うー、もごもご……
jpnSearchText: あーー、うー、もごもご……

engChrName: Well, that's one way to greet your guests. Last time I was here, you were a bit more chill.
engSearchText:
Well, that's one way to greet your guests. Last time I
was here, you were a bit more chill.
jpnChrName: あん？　接客だってのに酷いアガりようだな。 前に来た時はもう少し落ち着いてた気がするが……
jpnSearchText:
あん？　接客だってのに酷いアガりようだな。
前に来た時はもう少し落ち着いてた気がするが……

engChrName: This girl's one of my many fans, but she's a cut above the rest. Took things to the next level by getting a job here.
engSearchText:
This girl's one of my many fans, but she's a cut above
the rest. Took things to the next level by getting a
job here.
jpnChrName: ンまあ、オレのファンってやつでな。 それが高じてここに就職したらしいが……
jpnSearchText:
ンまあ、オレのファンってやつでな。
それが高じてここに就職したらしいが……

engChrName: I don't talk with her much, but when I do, it's pretty damn entertaining.
engSearchText:
I don't talk with her much, but when I do, it's pretty
damn entertaining.
jpnChrName: クク、これはこれで見ていて面白いから、 敢えて放っておいているんだけどなァ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、これはこれで見ていて面白いから、
敢えて放っておいているんだけどなァ？

engChrName: A-Ah... C-Can I help y-you, sir?
engSearchText: A-Ah... C-Can I help y-you, sir?
jpnChrName: あ、あー…… お、な、何かごようでしゅかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
あ、あー……
お、な、何かごようでしゅかっ！？

engChrName: D-Do you want to talk to the manager or something?
engSearchText: D-Do you want to talk to the manager or something?
jpnChrName: し、支配人さんへの取次とか！？
jpnSearchText: し、支配人さんへの取次とか！？

engChrName: I'll d-do anything for you, A-Aaron!
engSearchText: I'll d-do anything for you, A-Aaron!
jpnChrName: あ、アーロンしゃんでしたら、 にゃ、にゃんなりとっ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、アーロンしゃんでしたら、
にゃ、にゃんなりとっ！

engChrName: Today's final performance is about to begin. Our night shows are usually packed.
engSearchText:
Today's final performance is about to begin.
Our night shows are usually packed.
jpnChrName: この後は本日の最終公演です。 夜も変わらず盛況で有難いばかりですよ。
jpnSearchText:
この後は本日の最終公演です。
夜も変わらず盛況で有難いばかりですよ。

engChrName: That's partially because we have many regulars like Amalia who see multiple shows a day.
engSearchText:
That's partially because we have many regulars like
Amalia who see multiple shows a day.
jpnChrName: アマリアさんみたいな常連のファンの方など、 １日に何度も観てくれますし。
jpnSearchText:
アマリアさんみたいな常連のファンの方など、
１日に何度も観てくれますし。

engChrName: She's planning to start up a fan club on the orbal net to create an online community for our theater.
engSearchText:
She's planning to start up a fan club on the orbal net
to create an online community for our theater.
jpnChrName: それにしてもアマリアさんの ファンクラブ構想……凄いですね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもアマリアさんの
ファンクラブ構想……凄いですね。

engChrName: It's an ingenious idea! Amalia is so inventive.
engSearchText: It's an ingenious idea! Amalia is so inventive.
jpnChrName: 痒い所に手が届くというか…… いかにも今風の発想って感じですっ。
jpnSearchText:
痒い所に手が届くというか……
いかにも今風の発想って感じですっ。

engChrName: Welcome! The last show was incredible, wasn't it?
engSearchText: Welcome! The last show was incredible, wasn't it?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、先ほどの公演も 見事だったでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、先ほどの公演も
見事だったでしょう？

engChrName: I've been working on staff for a year now, but I'm still SO excited to be here! I've loved each and every production this theater has put on!
engSearchText:
I've been working on staff for a year now, but I'm still
SO excited to be here! I've loved each and every
production this theater has put on!
jpnChrName: 私も一年間スタッフとして働いてるけど、 まだ毎回興奮してしまっていて……！
jpnSearchText:
私も一年間スタッフとして働いてるけど、
まだ毎回興奮してしまっていて……！

engChrName: When I was just a fan, the thought of seeing the performers backstage was just an idle pipe dream— but now I get to do it every day!
engSearchText:
When I was just a fan, the thought of seeing the
performers backstage was just an idle pipe dream—
but now I get to do it every day!
jpnChrName: 役者さんたちの楽屋での顔を 見る時なんて、毎日感動してもう……！
jpnSearchText:
役者さんたちの楽屋での顔を
見る時なんて、毎日感動してもう……！

engChrName: And sometimes I even get a peek at Aaron! Every time I see his gorgeous face, my heart skips a beat! *swoon*
engSearchText:
And sometimes I even get a peek at Aaron!
Every time I see his gorgeous face, my heart skips
a beat! *swoon*
jpnChrName: それに、花形のアーロン様は……！ アーロン様に会うたびに私は……！
jpnSearchText:
それに、花形のアーロン様は……！
アーロン様に会うたびに私は……！

engChrName: (Aww... She has a crush on Aaron. That's so sweet!)
engSearchText: (Aww... She has a crush on Aaron. That's so sweet!)
jpnChrName: （あのアーロンという人が……   余程お好きなんですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（あのアーロンという人が……
余程お好きなんですね……）

engChrName: (That guy's every bit the ladykiller I've heard...)
engSearchText: (That guy's every bit the ladykiller I've heard...)
jpnChrName: （聞いていた通り随分と罪作りな野郎だな……）
jpnSearchText: （聞いていた通り随分と罪作りな野郎だな……）

engChrName: *cough* A-Anyway, I love Eastern theater from the bottom of my heart, which is why I work here.
engSearchText:
*cough* A-Anyway, I love Eastern theater from the
bottom of my heart, which is why I work here.
jpnChrName: コホン……と、とにかく私は東方華劇を 心から愛して、ここで働いているんです。
jpnSearchText:
コホン……と、とにかく私は東方華劇を
心から愛して、ここで働いているんです。

engChrName: I want the whole world to know about it—and that's why I'd be delighted if you purchased some of our anniversary goods.
engSearchText:
I want the whole world to know about it—and that's
why I'd be delighted if you purchased some of our
anniversary goods.
jpnChrName: 皆様にも是非とも東方華劇をもっと 知って欲しい。
jpnSearchText:
皆様にも是非とも東方華劇をもっと
知って欲しい。

engChrName: Buy some for your friends and spread the love.
engSearchText: Buy some for your friends and spread the love.
jpnChrName: ですので、私が担当している物販でも 是非記念品を買って頂けると嬉しいです。
jpnSearchText:
ですので、私が担当している物販でも
是非記念品を買って頂けると嬉しいです。

engChrName: The performers went all out for this morning's show. They poured their hearts and souls into it.
engSearchText:
The performers went all out for this morning's show.
They poured their hearts and souls into it.
jpnChrName: 今朝の公演、役者さんたちもいつも以上に 気合が入っていたわね……熱意も凄く伝わって……
jpnSearchText:
今朝の公演、役者さんたちもいつも以上に
気合が入っていたわね……熱意も凄く伝わって……

engChrName: I could feel their impassioned spirits...as well as their desire to share their radiant energy with everyone in the Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
I could feel their impassioned spirits...as well as their
desire to share their radiant energy with everyone in
the Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: きっと、劇団の人達も東方人街の皆に少しでも 活力を与えようとしてくれているのよね……！
jpnSearchText:
きっと、劇団の人達も東方人街の皆に少しでも
活力を与えようとしてくれているのよね……！

engChrName: We—the audience—and they—the performers— truly became one, and that's a sensation you can only get in the theater.
engSearchText:
We—the audience—and they—the performers—
truly became one, and that's a sensation you can only
get in the theater.
jpnChrName: そういう気持ちが感じられるのも、 華劇の代えがたい魅力よね……！
jpnSearchText:
そういう気持ちが感じられるのも、
華劇の代えがたい魅力よね……！

engChrName: The performers are all thinking of ways to raise people's spirits after last night...
engSearchText:
The performers are all thinking of ways to raise
people's spirits after last night...
jpnChrName: すぐ近くで事件があったのに、役者さんたちは 皆を元気づけるんだって意気込んでいて……
jpnSearchText:
すぐ近くで事件があったのに、役者さんたちは
皆を元気づけるんだって意気込んでいて……

engChrName: They really have an amazing strength of spirit. That might be why they're always able to put on such spectacular performances.
engSearchText:
They really have an amazing strength of spirit.
That might be why they're always able to put on such
spectacular performances.
jpnChrName: 本当にすごい役者魂よね……だからこそ あんなに凄い劇ができるんだろうけど……
jpnSearchText:
本当にすごい役者魂よね……だからこそ
あんなに凄い劇ができるんだろうけど……

engChrName: Maybe it's insensitive for me to think about the fan club idea now, but...I really want to spread those positive vibes to the people that need them.
engSearchText:
Maybe it's insensitive for me to think about the fan
club idea now, but...I really want to spread those
positive vibes to the people that need them.
jpnChrName: 不謹慎かもだけど、より一層 この素晴らしさを広めていきたくなってきたわ。
jpnSearchText:
不謹慎かもだけど、より一層
この素晴らしさを広めていきたくなってきたわ。

engChrName: I can't wait for the show tonight. It's always a treat to see the more provocative productions this place puts on.
engSearchText:
I can't wait for the show tonight. It's always a treat to
see the more provocative productions this place
puts on.
jpnChrName: うーん、夜の公演も楽しみね。 刺激的な演目も華劇の華なのよねー。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、夜の公演も楽しみね。
刺激的な演目も華劇の華なのよねー。

engChrName: I'm lucky that I can come here whenever I want. People who live outside of Langport don't have that privilege.
engSearchText:
I'm lucky that I can come here whenever I want.
People who live outside of Langport don't have
that privilege.
jpnChrName: でも、遠くから来ている人は、 見たいときにすぐに見れないのが可哀想よね……
jpnSearchText:
でも、遠くから来ている人は、
見たいときにすぐに見れないのが可哀想よね……

engChrName: If only there was some way they could be part of the experience, too...
engSearchText:
If only there was some way they could be part of the
experience, too...
jpnChrName: そうだ、導力ネット上でファンクラブを 作るとかはどうかしら？
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、導力ネット上でファンクラブを
作るとかはどうかしら？

engChrName: Wait, I know! I'll make a fan club on the orbal net. We can create a nice, wholesome community of fans all over the continent.
engSearchText:
Wait, I know! I'll make a fan club on the orbal net.
We can create a nice, wholesome community of fans
all over the continent.
jpnChrName: それなら普段いない人とも情報交換できるし、 遠くの人にもお勧めできたりするわよね。
jpnSearchText:
それなら普段いない人とも情報交換できるし、
遠くの人にもお勧めできたりするわよね。

engChrName: Phew... Another breathtaking show!
engSearchText: Phew... Another breathtaking show!
jpnChrName: はぁぁああ…… 今日の公演も素晴らしかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
はぁぁああ……
今日の公演も素晴らしかったわ。

engChrName: One of the reasons I love theater is that I get to share the same space with the performers. It's like I become a part of their world.
engSearchText:
One of the reasons I love theater is that I get to share
the same space with the performers. It's like I become
a part of their world.
jpnChrName: やっぱり華劇は、舞台の役者さんたちと 一体になってお芝居の世界に入れるようで……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり華劇は、舞台の役者さんたちと
一体になってお芝居の世界に入れるようで……

engChrName: Fuuka gets me there. We're both theater geeks, so after every show, I drop by to share my impressions with her.
engSearchText:
Fuuka gets me there. We're both theater geeks, so
after every show, I drop by to share my impressions
with her.
jpnChrName: 毎回感想を聞いてくれるフーカさんとも 良いお友達になれたし……
jpnSearchText:
毎回感想を聞いてくれるフーカさんとも
良いお友達になれたし……

engChrName: After last night, I realized I gotta protect what's precious to me—and that's this store.
engSearchText:
After last night, I realized I gotta protect what's
precious to me—and that's this store.
jpnChrName: 色々騒ぎがありましたが…… 自分に出来る事は店を守る事だけです。
jpnSearchText:
色々騒ぎがありましたが……
自分に出来る事は店を守る事だけです。

engChrName: The Eastern Quarter's been through some tough times, but my predecessors always pulled through and kept the store up and runnin'.
engSearchText:
The Eastern Quarter's been through some tough
times, but my predecessors always pulled through and
kept the store up and runnin'.
jpnChrName: 東方人街は昔から色々あったけど、 先代もそれを乗り越えて店を存続させた……
jpnSearchText:
東方人街は昔から色々あったけど、
先代もそれを乗り越えて店を存続させた……

engChrName: And they passed the torch to me, so I'm gonna make darn sure I carry it to the end! I'll make sure this place never closes down!
engSearchText:
And they passed the torch to me, so I'm gonna make
darn sure I carry it to the end! I'll make sure this place
never closes down!
jpnChrName: 自分もうじうじしてられませんな。 東方人街のためにも、商売を頑張っていきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
自分もうじうじしてられませんな。
東方人街のためにも、商売を頑張っていきましょう。

engChrName: *sigh* I got all nervous again when I was asked to chase people away this morning.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I got all nervous again when I was asked to
chase people away this morning.
jpnChrName: ふう……いやはや、今朝に人払いを 頼まれた時はまたしても緊張しましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……いやはや、今朝に人払いを
頼まれた時はまたしても緊張しましたよ。

engChrName: How the heck did those assassins sneak in here without me knowin'?
engSearchText:
How the heck did those assassins sneak in here
without me knowin'?
jpnChrName: それにしても、まさか知らぬ間に凶手まで うちの店に入っていたとは……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、まさか知らぬ間に凶手まで
うちの店に入っていたとは……

engChrName: I'm always gonna be thankful to Heiyue for lookin' out for this old place...
engSearchText:
I'm always gonna be thankful to Heiyue for lookin'
out for this old place...
jpnChrName: 黒月には守っていただいてる恩義もありますし、 協力はやぶさかではないですが……
jpnSearchText:
黒月には守っていただいてる恩義もありますし、
協力はやぶさかではないですが……

engChrName: ...but I won't lie. It felt like my heart stopped for a sec when I caught a glimpse of Master Gien pretending to be a servant.
engSearchText:
...but I won't lie. It felt like my heart stopped for a sec
when I caught a glimpse of Master Gien pretending
to be a servant.
jpnChrName: 流石に昨日、ギエン様が下働きに 成り済ました時は心臓が止まりそうでした……
jpnSearchText:
流石に昨日、ギエン様が下働きに
成り済ました時は心臓が止まりそうでした……

engChrName: Whew. Sorry for bein' all anxious earlier this afternoon. Just a bout of the jitters, that's all.
engSearchText:
Whew. Sorry for bein' all anxious earlier
this afternoon. Just a bout of the jitters, that's all.
jpnChrName: ふう、昼間は見苦しい所を見せて申し訳ない。 少しばかり気がかりがありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、昼間は見苦しい所を見せて申し訳ない。
少しばかり気がかりがありましてね。

engChrName: So what's the word? You takin' a nighttime stroll through town?
engSearchText:
So what's the word? You takin' a nighttime stroll
through town?
jpnChrName: ともあれ、お客さんも 夜の街を散策されるので？
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、お客さんも
夜の街を散策されるので？

engChrName: Don't blame ya. It gets nice and lively at night. Plenty of ways to have some fun.
engSearchText:
Don't blame ya. It gets nice and lively at night.
Plenty of ways to have some fun.
jpnChrName: 夜は夜で、昼とは違った賑やかさですし 楽しめると思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
夜は夜で、昼とは違った賑やかさですし
楽しめると思いますよ。

engChrName: Be sure to stay away from those outsider punks, though, y'hear? They've been poppin' up here more lately.
engSearchText:
Be sure to stay away from those outsider punks,
though, y'hear? They've been poppin' up here
more lately.
jpnChrName: ただ、最近は他所から来たチンピラも いるようなので、くれぐれもお気をつけて。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、最近は他所から来たチンピラも
いるようなので、くれぐれもお気をつけて。

engChrName: Things've gotten mighty dangerous 'round these parts. You better watch your back out there.
engSearchText:
Things've gotten mighty dangerous 'round
these parts. You better watch your back out there.
jpnChrName: 最近は物騒だし、夜の散策も一応は 用心する事をおすすめしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は物騒だし、夜の散策も一応は
用心する事をおすすめしますよ。

engChrName: Oh, you got Aaron with ya? Never mind, then. You're as safe as a baby in a crib.
engSearchText:
Oh, you got Aaron with ya? Never mind, then.
You're as safe as a baby in a crib.
jpnChrName: っと、アーロンが一緒でしたか。 それなら心配はご無用かもしれないですね。
jpnSearchText:
っと、アーロンが一緒でしたか。
それなら心配はご無用かもしれないですね。

engChrName: That boy'll beat the snot outta any scumbag who wishes you ill will.
engSearchText:
That boy'll beat the snot outta any scumbag who
wishes you ill will.
jpnChrName: 彼は腕も立つし、色んな所に 顔も利くから頼りになるものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
彼は腕も立つし、色んな所に
顔も利くから頼りになるものですよ。

engChrName: No one's gonna harm a hair on your head with him by your side. He's a tough lad.
engSearchText:
No one's gonna harm a hair on your head with him
by your side. He's a tough lad.
jpnChrName: はは、お客さんは最高の案内人に出会えたようで。
jpnSearchText: はは、お客さんは最高の案内人に出会えたようで。

engChrName: That's right. Praise me more.
engSearchText: That's right. Praise me more.
jpnChrName: フン、あんたも相変わらず苦労してそうな ツラしてんなウーハンのおっさん。
jpnSearchText:
フン、あんたも相変わらず苦労してそうな
ツラしてんなウーハンのおっさん。

engChrName: As long as I'm in town, you guys have nothing to worry about.
engSearchText:
As long as I'm in town, you guys have nothing to
worry about.
jpnChrName: ま、あんたのところの宿泊客、 せいぜい引っ張り回してやんよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あんたのところの宿泊客、
せいぜい引っ張り回してやんよ。

engChrName: Things've gotten dangerous lately, but if Aaron's with you, you'll be as safe as a bird in a cage.
engSearchText:
Things've gotten dangerous lately, but if Aaron's with
you, you'll be as safe as a bird in a cage.
jpnChrName: 最近は物騒ですが、アーロンが一緒なら 夜道も安心でしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
最近は物騒ですが、アーロンが一緒なら
夜道も安心でしょうね。

engChrName: I heard he chased those outsider punks right outta town.
engSearchText:
I heard he chased those outsider punks right
outta town.
jpnChrName: この前まで街で嫌がらせを働いていた与太者も、 最近では現れなくなりましたし……
jpnSearchText:
この前まで街で嫌がらせを働いていた与太者も、
最近では現れなくなりましたし……

engChrName: And good riddance to 'em!
engSearchText: And good riddance to 'em!
jpnChrName: 聞けばそれもアーロンたちが彼らを 追い払ってくれたおかげだったとか。
jpnSearchText:
聞けばそれもアーロンたちが彼らを
追い払ってくれたおかげだったとか。

engChrName: O-Oh, you heading out?
engSearchText: O-Oh, you heading out?
jpnChrName: お、お出かけですか……？
jpnSearchText: お、お出かけですか……？

engChrName: Take care, then.
engSearchText: Take care, then.
jpnChrName: それでしたら、色々とお気を付けて……
jpnSearchText: それでしたら、色々とお気を付けて……

engChrName: I-If you have any questions, just...lemme know.
engSearchText: I-If you have any questions, just...lemme know.
jpnChrName: な、なにか気になる事があれば…… お答えしますが……
jpnSearchText:
な、なにか気になる事があれば……
お答えしますが……

engChrName: (He seems weirdly on edge.)
engSearchText: (He seems weirdly on edge.)
jpnChrName: （やけに緊張してやがるな……）
jpnSearchText: （やけに緊張してやがるな……）

engChrName: (Or maybe he's just havin' a bout of the jitters. Happens.)
engSearchText:
(Or maybe he's just havin' a bout of the jitters.
Happens.)
jpnChrName: （ま、この街じゃ珍しくはない事か。   今は触れないで置いてやろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、この街じゃ珍しくはない事か。
今は触れないで置いてやろう。）

engChrName: T-Take care out there.
engSearchText: T-Take care out there.
jpnChrName: あ、改めてお帰りをお待ちしてます。
jpnSearchText: あ、改めてお帰りをお待ちしてます。

engChrName: O-Oh! You want t-takeout?
engSearchText: O-Oh! You want t-takeout?
jpnChrName: その……ご、ご飯もありますので！
jpnSearchText: その……ご、ご飯もありますので！

engChrName: Phew. I'm relieved to see my husband's finally motivated. Guess my scolding did the trick.
engSearchText:
Phew. I'm relieved to see my husband's
finally motivated. Guess my scolding did the trick.
jpnChrName: ふん、旦那もやる気を出して何よりね。 あたしが喝入れたんだから当然だけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふん、旦那もやる気を出して何よりね。
あたしが喝入れたんだから当然だけど。

engChrName: By the way, I heard that Heiyue is on the move. Let's hope they get to the bottom of this.
engSearchText:
By the way, I heard that Heiyue is on the move.
Let's hope they get to the bottom of this.
jpnChrName: まあ、今朝の一件を見る限り黒月の方々も 動いているようだし……きっと事件も解決するわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今朝の一件を見る限り黒月の方々も
動いているようだし……きっと事件も解決するわ。

engChrName: In the meantime, my husband and I are going to do our best to live up to Heiyue's expectations and ensure this business continues.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, my husband and I are going to do
our best to live up to Heiyue's expectations and
ensure this business continues.
jpnChrName: 黒月の信任に応えるためにも、あたしらも しっかり商売を続けて行かないとね。
jpnSearchText:
黒月の信任に応えるためにも、あたしらも
しっかり商売を続けて行かないとね。

engChrName: My husband may seem a bit aloof at times, but he's the type who always gets the job done.
engSearchText:
My husband may seem a bit aloof at times, but he's
the type who always gets the job done.
jpnChrName: うちの夫はあんなんに見えて、 何やかんや、しっかり義理は通すのよね。
jpnSearchText:
うちの夫はあんなんに見えて、
何やかんや、しっかり義理は通すのよね。

engChrName: That's part of why Guihua Fandian is still flourishing.
engSearchText:
That's part of why Guihua Fandian is
still flourishing.
jpnChrName: まあ、そこら辺もこの桂花飯店が 繁盛してる理由なのさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そこら辺もこの桂花飯店が
繁盛してる理由なのさ。

engChrName: ...I'm still in shock over the horrible incident from last night.
engSearchText:
...I'm still in shock over the horrible incident from
last night.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、昨晩はあんなに 悲惨な事件もあったし……
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、昨晩はあんなに
悲惨な事件もあったし……

engChrName: Stay safe, you all. It's a dangerous world out there.
engSearchText: Stay safe, you all. It's a dangerous world out there.
jpnChrName: この先何があるか判らないし、 お客さんらも気をつけてね。
jpnSearchText:
この先何があるか判らないし、
お客さんらも気をつけてね。

engChrName: Have you had dinner yet? There are plenty of good places to eat around here.
engSearchText:
Have you had dinner yet? There are plenty of good
places to eat around here.
jpnChrName: あら、夕飯はもう食べてきたのかしら。 この街は美味しい所がいっぱいだからね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、夕飯はもう食べてきたのかしら。
この街は美味しい所がいっぱいだからね。

engChrName: If you want my personal recommendation...well, I'd suggest staying here and having our food! Not biased at all.
engSearchText:
If you want my personal recommendation...well, I'd
suggest staying here and having our food! Not biased
at all.
jpnChrName: もしまだ食べられるなら、せっかくなんだし 是非うちの夕飯も食べていったらどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
もしまだ食べられるなら、せっかくなんだし
是非うちの夕飯も食べていったらどうだい？

engChrName: Our Guihua Fandian dish—which is named after our fine establishment—has been beloved by people here for half a century.
engSearchText:
Our Guihua Fandian dish—which is named after
our fine establishment—has been beloved by people
here for half a century.
jpnChrName: この桂花飯店、地元民に愛されて半世紀。 味は東方人街の皆のお墨付きだからさ。
jpnSearchText:
この桂花飯店、地元民に愛されて半世紀。
味は東方人街の皆のお墨付きだからさ。

engChrName: I apologize on behalf of my husband. His behavior right now is unacceptable.
engSearchText:
I apologize on behalf of my husband. His behavior
right now is unacceptable.
jpnChrName: お客さん、主人が見苦しくて悪いねぇ。 もっとシャキッとして欲しいもんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
お客さん、主人が見苦しくて悪いねぇ。
もっとシャキッとして欲しいもんだよね。

engChrName: I really wish he would get his act together. He should be used to this by now...
engSearchText:
I really wish he would get his act together. He should
be used to this by now...
jpnChrName: いい加減慣れても良い頃合いだろうに……
jpnSearchText: いい加減慣れても良い頃合いだろうに……

engChrName: Oh, look at me prattling on. I shouldn't be bothering you with my problems.
engSearchText:
Oh, look at me prattling on. I shouldn't be bothering
you with my problems.
jpnChrName: ああ、お客さんたちは気にしないでね。 ありゃ、うちの事情だからさ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、お客さんたちは気にしないでね。
ありゃ、うちの事情だからさ。

engChrName: Feel free to order anything you want. Maybe my husband will snap out of his funk if he can focus on his work.
engSearchText:
Feel free to order anything you want. Maybe my
husband will snap out of his funk if he can focus on
his work.
jpnChrName: まあ、気にせず注文でもしなさいな。 主人も仕事で気が紛れるだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、気にせず注文でもしなさいな。
主人も仕事で気が紛れるだろうし。

engChrName: Well, it's been fun, but I must be off now. I think I'll hop on tonight's ship and head for the Central East.
engSearchText:
Well, it's been fun, but I must be off now. I think
I'll hop on tonight's ship and head for the
Central East.
jpnChrName: さて、僕は夕方の便の船で 改めて中東を目指すとしようかね。
jpnSearchText:
さて、僕は夕方の便の船で
改めて中東を目指すとしようかね。

engChrName: Elsaim sounds like a lovely place to start. Perhaps after that, I'll challenge myself with a trek to northern Valis.
engSearchText:
Elsaim sounds like a lovely place to start. Perhaps
after that, I'll challenge myself with a trek to
northern Valis.
jpnChrName: エルザイム近辺も良いが……せっかくだし、 ヴァリス北方の辺りにもチャレンジしようか。
jpnSearchText:
エルザイム近辺も良いが……せっかくだし、
ヴァリス北方の辺りにもチャレンジしようか。

engChrName: Both spots are a tad unstable, so they're not popular tourist destinations. Meaning, they're likely chock-full of discoveries to be made.
engSearchText:
Both spots are a tad unstable, so they're not
popular tourist destinations. Meaning, they're
likely chock-full of discoveries to be made.
jpnChrName: ふふ、あの辺りはまだ情勢不安定ではあるけど、 その分新しい発見がきっと……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、あの辺りはまだ情勢不安定ではあるけど、
その分新しい発見がきっと……

engChrName: It was a surprise to see people being cleared out so early in the morning.
engSearchText:
It was a surprise to see people being cleared out
so early in the morning.
jpnChrName: ははは、さっきは朝っぱらからの 人払いで僕も驚いたな。
jpnSearchText:
ははは、さっきは朝っぱらからの
人払いで僕も驚いたな。

engChrName: Maybe I should hole up in my room today and plan my next trip.
engSearchText:
Maybe I should hole up in my room today and plan
my next trip.
jpnChrName: まあ、ああいう時は部屋に入って大人しく 旅の予定でも立ててるのに限る。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ああいう時は部屋に入って大人しく
旅の予定でも立ててるのに限る。

engChrName: After all, I'd rather not do anything that would make me come off as suspicious.
engSearchText:
After all, I'd rather not do anything that would
make me come off as suspicious.
jpnChrName: 下手に動いたりしても怪しまれるしな。
jpnSearchText: 下手に動いたりしても怪しまれるしな。

engChrName: Over my travels, I've learned to keep to myself when trouble starts a-brewing.
engSearchText:
Over my travels, I've learned to keep to myself when
trouble starts a-brewing.
jpnChrName: まあ、僕も色々旅してきたし この程度の事は慣れっこなのさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、僕も色々旅してきたし
この程度の事は慣れっこなのさ。

engChrName: Unlike me, Jigen has firmly planted his feet into the ground and spread his roots.
engSearchText:
Unlike me, Jigen has firmly planted his feet into the
ground and spread his roots.
jpnChrName: ジゲンさんは僕と違って、何やかんやで ここに足をつけて頑張ってるからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ジゲンさんは僕と違って、何やかんやで
ここに足をつけて頑張ってるからねぇ。

engChrName: That approach has its perks, I'll admit. Having a consistent clientele must be nice.
engSearchText:
That approach has its perks, I'll admit. Having a
consistent clientele must be nice.
jpnChrName: どこかに留まってこそ得られる情報や、 お得意様相手の取引は流石なものさ。
jpnSearchText:
どこかに留まってこそ得られる情報や、
お得意様相手の取引は流石なものさ。

engChrName: I can't blame him for wanting stability, but me? I like my freedom too much to change course.
engSearchText:
I can't blame him for wanting stability, but me?
I like my freedom too much to change course.
jpnChrName: まあ、その意味では自由な物探しこそ 生きがいな僕とは対極と言えば対極かな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その意味では自由な物探しこそ
生きがいな僕とは対極と言えば対極かな。

engChrName: Hello, there. Do you have an interest in rare goods and esoteric knick-knacks from all over the world?
engSearchText:
Hello, there. Do you have an interest in rare goods
and esoteric knick-knacks from all over the world?
jpnChrName: やあ、各地の珍品やジャンクなどには 興味があったりするかな。
jpnSearchText:
やあ、各地の珍品やジャンクなどには
興味があったりするかな。

engChrName: Well, you're in luck, because I run a used goods business. I have all sorts of obscure gems.
engSearchText:
Well, you're in luck, because I run a used
goods business. I have all sorts of obscure gems.
jpnChrName: 僕はこう見えて中古品屋の端くれでな、 風のままに流れつつ珍品を探している。
jpnSearchText:
僕はこう見えて中古品屋の端くれでな、
風のままに流れつつ珍品を探している。

engChrName: From strange machinery to priceless antiques. You name it, I've got it.
engSearchText:
From strange machinery to priceless antiques.
You name it, I've got it.
jpnChrName: 希少な機械類から、旅先で見繕った 骨董品もそれなりにあるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
希少な機械類から、旅先で見繕った
骨董品もそれなりにあるんだが……

engChrName: I'm still mid-journey, but I'll let you take a look at what I have on me.
engSearchText:
I'm still mid-journey, but I'll let you take a look at
what I have on me.
jpnChrName: まだ旅の途中だが、手持ちで良ければ 何か見ていくかい？
jpnSearchText:
まだ旅の途中だが、手持ちで良ければ
何か見ていくかい？

engChrName: When it comes to the Republic, the Eastern Quarter is the place to be. It really feels like home for me.
engSearchText:
When it comes to the Republic, the Eastern Quarter
is the place to be. It really feels like home for me.
jpnChrName: やはり東方人街とて共和国。 今となっては実家の様に落ち着くね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり東方人街とて共和国。
今となっては実家の様に落ち着くね。

engChrName: I've been to all kinds of places: small nations in the Central East, North Ambrian slums, and more old cities in the East than I could name.
engSearchText:
I've been to all kinds of places: small nations in the
Central East, North Ambrian slums, and more old
cities in the East than I could name.
jpnChrName: 中東の小国にノーザンブリアのスラム、 そして東方のいくつかの古い都市。
jpnSearchText:
中東の小国にノーザンブリアのスラム、
そして東方のいくつかの古い都市。

engChrName: But there's still so much more to see.
engSearchText: But there's still so much more to see.
jpnChrName: 色々行ってきたが、他にも刺激のある 土地は残っているだろう。
jpnSearchText:
色々行ってきたが、他にも刺激のある
土地は残っているだろう。

engChrName: One of these days, I'd like to make my way into uncharted territory. That's my dream.
engSearchText:
One of these days, I'd like to make my way into
uncharted territory. That's my dream.
jpnChrName: 近いうちに改めて、未だ見ぬ地を 踏破しにいきたいところだね。
jpnSearchText:
近いうちに改めて、未だ見ぬ地を
踏破しにいきたいところだね。

engChrName: The preparations for the funeral are complete. It will be held tomorrow.
engSearchText:
The preparations for the funeral are complete. It will
be held tomorrow.
jpnChrName: ホアン達の葬儀の準備は整いつつあります。 しかし、他の方々も酷く混乱しておられる。
jpnSearchText:
ホアン達の葬儀の準備は整いつつあります。
しかし、他の方々も酷く混乱しておられる。

engChrName: I hope that this ceremony will give the people some much-needed comfort.
engSearchText:
I hope that this ceremony will give the people some
much-needed comfort.
jpnChrName: 葬儀も速やかに行いますが、少しでも早く 皆が平静を取り戻せるよう計らいましょう。
jpnSearchText:
葬儀も速やかに行いますが、少しでも早く
皆が平静を取り戻せるよう計らいましょう。

engChrName: Yeah... Give my bros a good send off. I want them to go on their journey in peace.
engSearchText:
Yeah... Give my bros a good send off. I want them to
go on their journey in peace.
jpnChrName: ああ……あいつらが安心して 旅立てるよう頼むぜ……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……あいつらが安心して
旅立てるよう頼むぜ……

engChrName: I plan on settling the score before then.
engSearchText: I plan on settling the score before then.
jpnChrName: オレも、葬式までにはケリをつけてくる。
jpnSearchText: オレも、葬式までにはケリをつけてくる。

engChrName: Very well. Just leave things here to me.
engSearchText: Very well. Just leave things here to me.
jpnChrName: ええ、お任せください。
jpnSearchText: ええ、お任せください。

engChrName: It's our job to put the people at ease and provide guidance for lost souls.
engSearchText:
It's our job to put the people at ease and provide
guidance for lost souls.
jpnChrName: 皆の不安を取り除き、前向きに生きる 手助けをするのも私達の役目です故。
jpnSearchText:
皆の不安を取り除き、前向きに生きる
手助けをするのも私達の役目です故。

engChrName: ...By the way, am I the only one who felt like the older civilians were familiar with last night's strange phenomena?
engSearchText:
...By the way, am I the only one who felt like the
older civilians were familiar with last night's
strange phenomena?
jpnChrName: ……しかし昨夜の異変は、一部の老人に 覚えがあるように見受けられるのが気になります。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし昨夜の異変は、一部の老人に
覚えがあるように見受けられるのが気になります。

engChrName: Now that I think on it, I believe my predecessor mentioned something about a taboo...
engSearchText:
Now that I think on it, I believe my predecessor
mentioned something about a taboo...
jpnChrName: そう言えば、先代教区長も何やら禁忌のような ものがあると仰っていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば、先代教区長も何やら禁忌のような
ものがあると仰っていましたが……

engChrName: I've finished the funeral arrangements and greeted the families of the deceased. Tomorrow, we will be sending them on their final journey...
engSearchText:
I've finished the funeral arrangements and greeted the
families of the deceased. Tomorrow, we will be
sending them on their final journey...
jpnChrName: 葬式の段取りとご遺族への挨拶も進んでいます。 明日には彼らを送れる事でしょう……
jpnSearchText:
葬式の段取りとご遺族への挨拶も進んでいます。
明日には彼らを送れる事でしょう……

engChrName: It will be an open casket funeral, and there will be time for you to come up and say your goodbyes.
engSearchText:
It will be an open casket funeral, and there will be
time for you to come up and say your goodbyes.
jpnChrName: あなたが皆に最後の別れを告げられるよう、 しかと葬儀の場を整えておきます。
jpnSearchText:
あなたが皆に最後の別れを告げられるよう、
しかと葬儀の場を整えておきます。

engChrName: Please come back safely, Aaron. Your friends would want you to be here to see them off.
engSearchText:
Please come back safely, Aaron. Your friends would
want you to be here to see them off.
jpnChrName: アーロン、あなたも共に彼らを送るためにも、 無事に帰ってくるのですよ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、あなたも共に彼らを送るためにも、
無事に帰ってくるのですよ。

engChrName: What happened to Sei, Huang, and the other victims fills me with great sorrow. I truly hope their souls can rest in peace.
engSearchText:
What happened to Sei, Huang, and the other victims
fills me with great sorrow. I truly hope their souls
can rest in peace.
jpnChrName: セイやホアンたちについては残念でした。 街を守ろうとした彼らの魂に安らぎを……
jpnSearchText:
セイやホアンたちについては残念でした。
街を守ろうとした彼らの魂に安らぎを……

engChrName: We will perform our duty and send them to the heavens above. That is the best way we can honor their courage and their memories.
engSearchText:
We will perform our duty and send them to the
heavens above. That is the best way we can honor
their courage and their memories.
jpnChrName: ……今の私達は彼らを丁重に天上聖母の元へ 送る使命を果たす事で彼らに報いましょう。
jpnSearchText:
……今の私達は彼らを丁重に天上聖母の元へ
送る使命を果たす事で彼らに報いましょう。

engChrName: In accordance with the wishes of the surviving families, we've arranged to collect their bodies once Heiyue has finished performing the autopsies.
engSearchText:
In accordance with the wishes of the surviving
families, we've arranged to collect their bodies
once Heiyue has finished performing the autopsies.
jpnChrName: ご遺族の意向もあり、ご遺体も検分が終わり次第 早めに引き取れるよう黒月側と話を纏めました。
jpnSearchText:
ご遺族の意向もあり、ご遺体も検分が終わり次第
早めに引き取れるよう黒月側と話を纏めました。

engChrName: I will make arrangements for the funeral while caring for the citizens' mental states.
engSearchText:
I will make arrangements for the funeral while caring
for the citizens' mental states.
jpnChrName: 不安を覚えている住民の方々のケアもしつつ、 葬儀の段取りも進めていく予定です。
jpnSearchText:
不安を覚えている住民の方々のケアもしつつ、
葬儀の段取りも進めていく予定です。

engChrName: Tourists often ask me about the temple's place in the Eastern Quarter's history.
engSearchText:
Tourists often ask me about the temple's place in the
Eastern Quarter's history.
jpnChrName: 東方人街の歴史の中での寺院の在り方も、 観光の方によく聞かれます。
jpnSearchText:
東方人街の歴史の中での寺院の在り方も、
観光の方によく聞かれます。

engChrName: Long before the Calvardian Revolution, this place was a humble trading town.
engSearchText:
Long before the Calvardian Revolution, this place was
a humble trading town.
jpnChrName: カルバード革命の遥か前より、交易による 小さな東方人町はこの地にありましてな。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード革命の遥か前より、交易による
小さな東方人町はこの地にありましてな。

engChrName: But about a century ago, many immigrants flocked here due to the chaos in the East, and those people founded this temple.
engSearchText:
But about a century ago, many immigrants flocked
here due to the chaos in the East, and those
people founded this temple.
jpnChrName: しかし一世紀ほど前、東方の混乱により多くの 移民が海路でなだれ込み、今の姿になったのです。
jpnSearchText:
しかし一世紀ほど前、東方の混乱により多くの
移民が海路でなだれ込み、今の姿になったのです。

engChrName: I heard you got into yet another fight, Aaron.
engSearchText: I heard you got into yet another fight, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロン、またしても件の 狼藉者たちと戦ったと聞きますが……
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、またしても件の
狼藉者たちと戦ったと聞きますが……

engChrName: I understand that you're driven to protect the people here, but if you resort to violence every time, then you're stooping to their level.
engSearchText:
I understand that you're driven to protect the people
here, but if you resort to violence every time, then
you're stooping to their level.
jpnChrName: 君が街の皆を守りたいという意思は大いにわかります、 ですが、自らも暴力を以て抗している事は忘れぬよう……
jpnSearchText:
君が街の皆を守りたいという意思は大いにわかります、
ですが、自らも暴力を以て抗している事は忘れぬよう……

engChrName: I'm worried that you will one day be consumed by anger and hatred—and lose control of yourself in the process.
engSearchText:
I'm worried that you will one day be consumed by
anger and hatred—and lose control of yourself in
the process.
jpnChrName: 怒りや憎しみに飲まれ、自らを律する事を忘れる…… そうならないか心配なものです。
jpnSearchText:
怒りや憎しみに飲まれ、自らを律する事を忘れる……
そうならないか心配なものです。

engChrName: I'll keep that in mind. Your word is gospel, after all.
engSearchText: I'll keep that in mind. Your word is gospel, after all.
jpnChrName: 忠告は受け取っておくぜ。 一応は恩師だしな。
jpnSearchText:
忠告は受け取っておくぜ。
一応は恩師だしな。

engChrName: Don't worry, though. I won't get the temple wrapped up in any of this.
engSearchText:
Don't worry, though. I won't get the temple wrapped
up in any of this.
jpnChrName: だが、それについちゃあんたの寺を煩わせる 気もねぇから安心しな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、それについちゃあんたの寺を煩わせる
気もねぇから安心しな。

engChrName: If it'll make you feel better, I can start going easy on those weaklings from now on.
engSearchText:
If it'll make you feel better, I can start going easy on
those weaklings from now on.
jpnChrName: あんな連中、オレが本気になるまでも ねぇってもんだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
あんな連中、オレが本気になるまでも
ねぇってもんだからよ。

engChrName: Back in the day, I used to teach Aaron and his friends at Sunday School.
engSearchText:
Back in the day, I used to teach Aaron and his friends
at Sunday School.
jpnChrName: アーロン君たちには昔、日曜学校で 教えておりましてね。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン君たちには昔、日曜学校で
教えておりましてね。

engChrName: He was just as unpredictable then as he is now. Honestly, it worries me that that hasn't changed.
engSearchText:
He was just as unpredictable then as he is now.
Honestly, it worries me that that hasn't changed.
jpnChrName: 破天荒なところも、昔から変わらず、 時に危うく感じますが……
jpnSearchText:
破天荒なところも、昔から変わらず、
時に危うく感じますが……

engChrName: Welcome to the Langport temple. I'm guessing you all are tourists, yes?
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Langport temple. I'm guessing you
all are tourists, yes?
jpnChrName: ようこそラングポート寺院へ。 観光の方ですね、どうぞご参拝下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ようこそラングポート寺院へ。
観光の方ですね、どうぞご参拝下さい。

engChrName: Our customs may differ from the churches you're accustomed to, but we make sure to teach them to any and all who visit.
engSearchText:
Our customs may differ from the churches you're
accustomed to, but we make sure to teach them to
any and all who visit.
jpnChrName: 様式やしきたりは違いますが、 そうした事も丁寧にお教えしております故。
jpnSearchText:
様式やしきたりは違いますが、
そうした事も丁寧にお教えしております故。

engChrName: You must be used to dealing with tourists.
engSearchText: You must be used to dealing with tourists.
jpnChrName: あはは……前に来た際も思いましたけど、 随分と観光対応に慣れてらっしゃるというか。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……前に来た際も思いましたけど、
随分と観光対応に慣れてらっしゃるというか。

engChrName: Indeed. While this temple primarily exists to support Easterners, we still get many visitors from the western side of the continent.
engSearchText:
Indeed. While this temple primarily exists to support
Easterners, we still get many visitors from the western
side of the continent.
jpnChrName: ええ、この寺院が本来東方人たちの心の支え たるものとはいえ、今では観光の方も多い。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、この寺院が本来東方人たちの心の支え
たるものとはいえ、今では観光の方も多い。

engChrName: Personally, I see it as an excellent opportunity to help others understand the values of the East.
engSearchText:
Personally, I see it as an excellent opportunity to help
others understand the values of the East.
jpnChrName: 私どもも、東方の価値観を理解していただき 歩み寄る機会と捉えております。
jpnSearchText:
私どもも、東方の価値観を理解していただき
歩み寄る機会と捉えております。

engChrName: Nothing makes me happier than seeing people become interested in Eastern history and culture.
engSearchText:
Nothing makes me happier than seeing people
become interested in Eastern history and culture.
jpnChrName: 私達の価値観や歴史、文化などについても 気になる事があれば何なりと。
jpnSearchText:
私達の価値観や歴史、文化などについても
気になる事があれば何なりと。

engChrName: In the East, the Goddess of the Sky is referred to as the Heavenly Mother.
engSearchText:
In the East, the Goddess of the Sky is referred to as
the Heavenly Mother.
jpnChrName: 東方においては、空の女神は “天上聖母”の名で語り継がれております。
jpnSearchText:
東方においては、空の女神は
“天上聖母”の名で語り継がれております。

engChrName: Many of the teachings and events recorded in scripture have taken on different forms in other places...
engSearchText:
Many of the teachings and events recorded in
scripture have taken on different forms in
other places...
jpnChrName: 他にも聖典に記された概念や行事の多くが、 形を変えて古くから伝わっておりますが……
jpnSearchText:
他にも聖典に記された概念や行事の多くが、
形を変えて古くから伝わっておりますが……

engChrName: ...but I believe the Goddess of the Sky and the Heavenly Mother are one and the same.
engSearchText:
...but I believe the Goddess of the Sky and the
Heavenly Mother are one and the same.
jpnChrName: それが紛れもなく同じ女神様を 意味している事は疑う余地もありません。
jpnSearchText:
それが紛れもなく同じ女神様を
意味している事は疑う余地もありません。

engChrName: The older people in town have confused expressions on their faces.
engSearchText:
The older people in town have confused expressions
on their faces.
jpnChrName: 街のお年寄りたちが、何やら過去を 想起して混乱しているようですが……
jpnSearchText:
街のお年寄りたちが、何やら過去を
想起して混乱しているようですが……

engChrName: They are troubled over something from the past, apparently, but they haven't let me in on their secret.
engSearchText:
They are troubled over something from the past,
apparently, but they haven't let me in on their secret.
jpnChrName: お年寄りの中でも一種の秘め事らしく、 私も詳しい事は存じ上げません。
jpnSearchText:
お年寄りの中でも一種の秘め事らしく、
私も詳しい事は存じ上げません。

engChrName: Regardless, I'll do my best to calm their nerves.
engSearchText: Regardless, I'll do my best to calm their nerves.
jpnChrName: だとしても……今はお年寄りの方々の不安も 少しでも取り除いて差し上げたいところです。
jpnSearchText:
だとしても……今はお年寄りの方々の不安も
少しでも取り除いて差し上げたいところです。

engChrName: I... I just can't believe it... My former students are...dead?
engSearchText:
I... I just can't believe it... My former students
are...dead?
jpnChrName: まさか教え子だったあの子たちが こんな事に……そんな……
jpnSearchText:
まさか教え子だったあの子たちが
こんな事に……そんな……

engChrName: And Aaron's run off to get revenge...
engSearchText: And Aaron's run off to get revenge...
jpnChrName: アーロンの方も心配です。 何でも一人で復讐に向かったとか……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンの方も心配です。
何でも一人で復讐に向かったとか……

engChrName: I'm barely keeping it together. This is just too cruel...
engSearchText: I'm barely keeping it together. This is just too cruel...
jpnChrName: これ以上、教え子の皆が 傷つく様は見るに堪えません。
jpnSearchText:
これ以上、教え子の皆が
傷つく様は見るに堪えません。

engChrName: Oh, Heavenly Mother, please watch over Aaron, as well as my remaining students...
engSearchText:
Oh, Heavenly Mother, please watch over Aaron, as
well as my remaining students...
jpnChrName: 天上聖母様……どうか、生き残った アーロンたちをお守りくださいますよう……
jpnSearchText:
天上聖母様……どうか、生き残った
アーロンたちをお守りくださいますよう……

engChrName: I heard Aaron got into yet another fight.
engSearchText: I heard Aaron got into yet another fight.
jpnChrName: 今日も港湾区の方でアーロンが 大立ち回りをしたようですね。
jpnSearchText:
今日も港湾区の方でアーロンが
大立ち回りをしたようですね。

engChrName: He was one of my former students. Quite the troublemaker, that one.
engSearchText:
He was one of my former students. Quite the
troublemaker, that one.
jpnChrName: 彼には日曜学校で教えていたのですが、 破天荒なところは昔からで。
jpnSearchText:
彼には日曜学校で教えていたのですが、
破天荒なところは昔からで。

engChrName: I know he cares deeply for his friends—as well as this town—but he still worries me.
engSearchText:
I know he cares deeply for his friends—as well as this
town—but he still worries me.
jpnChrName: この街とお友達を思う気持ちも 変わらないですが、少し心配にもなります。
jpnSearchText:
この街とお友達を思う気持ちも
変わらないですが、少し心配にもなります。

engChrName: May the blessings of the Heavenly Mother be with him and his friends.
engSearchText:
May the blessings of the Heavenly Mother be with
him and his friends.
jpnChrName: どうか、彼とお友達に天上聖母の 御加護がありますように……
jpnSearchText:
どうか、彼とお友達に天上聖母の
御加護がありますように……

engChrName: Oh? It's not often I see you with outsiders, Aaron.
engSearchText: Oh? It's not often I see you with outsiders, Aaron.
jpnChrName: おや、アーロンが他の街の方と 一緒にいるのは珍しいですね。
jpnSearchText:
おや、アーロンが他の街の方と
一緒にいるのは珍しいですね。

engChrName: Normally, you're with Huang and Syd around this time of night.
engSearchText:
Normally, you're with Huang and Syd around this
time of night.
jpnChrName: ホアンやシドたちは どうされたのですか？
jpnSearchText:
ホアンやシドたちは
どうされたのですか？

engChrName: Hey, even I gotta switch things up every now and then.
engSearchText:
Hey, even I gotta switch things up every now
and then.
jpnChrName: なに、このおっさんの仕事を 冷かしてやろうと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
なに、このおっさんの仕事を
冷かしてやろうと思ってな。

engChrName: I'll probably join up with them later. Once I'm bored with this guy, I'll ditch his ass.
engSearchText:
I'll probably join up with them later. Once I'm bored
with this guy, I'll ditch his ass.
jpnChrName: ダチ共も好きにやってるさ、オレも おっさん観察が飽きたら連中と一杯やるさ。
jpnSearchText:
ダチ共も好きにやってるさ、オレも
おっさん観察が飽きたら連中と一杯やるさ。

engChrName: Swearin' in a church, huh? Damn. You got no class.
engSearchText: Swearin' in a church, huh? Damn. You got no class.
jpnChrName: 何度もおっさんと繰り返しやがって……
jpnSearchText: 何度もおっさんと繰り返しやがって……

engChrName: But you just... *sigh* Never mind.
engSearchText: But you just... *sigh* Never mind.
jpnChrName: まあ、あなたの事は信頼していますが、 ほどほどにしてくださいね、アーロン。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あなたの事は信頼していますが、
ほどほどにしてくださいね、アーロン。

engChrName: Anyway, I trust you, Aaron, but please ease up on the violence. Remember that you and your friends are sacred children of our Heavenly Mother.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I trust you, Aaron, but please ease up on
the violence. Remember that you and your friends are
sacred children of our Heavenly Mother.
jpnChrName: あなたもお友達も……天上聖母の子として 尊い存在である事には変わりないのですから。
jpnSearchText:
あなたもお友達も……天上聖母の子として
尊い存在である事には変わりないのですから。

engChrName: I only taught Aaron for one year at Sunday School, but he certainly made an impression.
engSearchText:
I only taught Aaron for one year at Sunday School,
but he certainly made an impression.
jpnChrName: アーロンの事は一年間だけ 日曜学校で見ておりましたが……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンの事は一年間だけ
日曜学校で見ておりましたが……

engChrName: He was a mischievous child...and now he's a mischievous teenager. It worries me that he hasn't changed.
engSearchText:
He was a mischievous child...and now he's a
mischievous teenager. It worries me that he
hasn't changed.
jpnChrName: 本当に、やんちゃなところも変わらなくて、 時折心配にはなりますが……
jpnSearchText:
本当に、やんちゃなところも変わらなくて、
時折心配にはなりますが……

engChrName: But I'm glad his desire to protect his friends and the town still burns bright. I always feel safe when he's around.
engSearchText:
But I'm glad his desire to protect his friends and the
town still burns bright. I always feel safe when
he's around.
jpnChrName: それでも、いつもお友達を守っていましたし、 安心感も同時にあるから不思議なものです。
jpnSearchText:
それでも、いつもお友達を守っていましたし、
安心感も同時にあるから不思議なものです。

engChrName: Welcome. This is where we revere our Heavenly Mother. Are you here to pray?
engSearchText:
Welcome. This is where we revere our
Heavenly Mother. Are you here to pray?
jpnChrName: “天上聖母”様を奉る場へ ようこそいらっしゃいました。
jpnSearchText:
“天上聖母”様を奉る場へ
ようこそいらっしゃいました。

engChrName: Oh? Is something the matter?
engSearchText: Oh? Is something the matter?
jpnChrName: ご参拝でしたら、作法等のご案内を…… おや、どうかされましたか？
jpnSearchText:
ご参拝でしたら、作法等のご案内を……
おや、どうかされましたか？

engChrName: Umm... I kinda feel out of my element. I thought this place would be like the churches back home, but it's totally different.
engSearchText:
Umm... I kinda feel out of my element. I thought this
place would be like the churches back home, but it's
totally different.
jpnChrName: えと……“寺院”とは聞いてましたが、 私の馴染みのある寺院とは全然違うなって。
jpnSearchText:
えと……“寺院”とは聞いてましたが、
私の馴染みのある寺院とは全然違うなって。

engChrName: Heehee. I understand. Well, don't be shy.
engSearchText: Heehee. I understand. Well, don't be shy.
jpnChrName: ふふ、緊張しなくても大丈夫ですよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、緊張しなくても大丈夫ですよ。

engChrName: We may call her the Heavenly Mother, but She is undoubtedly the same Goddess you worship.
engSearchText:
We may call her the Heavenly Mother, but She is
undoubtedly the same Goddess you worship.
jpnChrName: “天上聖母”の名で語り継がれているといえ、 信ずる対象は同じ女神様です。
jpnSearchText:
“天上聖母”の名で語り継がれているといえ、
信ずる対象は同じ女神様です。

engChrName: Regardless of race or borders, we all share the same belief in the Goddess.
engSearchText:
Regardless of race or borders, we all share the same
belief in the Goddess.
jpnChrName: 天上聖母を──女神様を信じる気持ちに、 人種や国境の違いなどありませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
天上聖母を──女神様を信じる気持ちに、
人種や国境の違いなどありませんよ。

engChrName: The air about this place is definitely different from a Central Eastern temple, but it's the same at its core.
engSearchText:
The air about this place is definitely different from a
Central Eastern temple, but it's the same at its core.
jpnChrName: ま、中東の寺院とも大分雰囲気は違うが、 根っこにあるものは同じだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、中東の寺院とも大分雰囲気は違うが、
根っこにあるものは同じだからな。

engChrName: So there's no need to clam up.
engSearchText: So there's no need to clam up.
jpnChrName: 肩肘張る事もねぇ、普段通りに頼って 良いと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
肩肘張る事もねぇ、普段通りに頼って
良いと思うぜ。

engChrName: G-Got it.
engSearchText: G-Got it.
jpnChrName: な、なるほど…… ふふ、何だか不思議な感じがします。
jpnSearchText:
な、なるほど……
ふふ、何だか不思議な感じがします。

engChrName: Many children from the city's New Town come here for Sunday School.
engSearchText:
Many children from the city's New Town come here
for Sunday School.
jpnChrName: 日曜学校では新市街から来てくれる子も それなりにいるものでしてね。
jpnSearchText:
日曜学校では新市街から来てくれる子も
それなりにいるものでしてね。

engChrName: As a result, I'm quite used to explaining the differences in customs between the different churches across the continent.
engSearchText:
As a result, I'm quite used to explaining the
differences in customs between the different churches
across the continent.
jpnChrName: それもあって、様式の差異なども含めて お教えする事には慣れているつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
それもあって、様式の差異なども含めて
お教えする事には慣れているつもりです。

engChrName: If you have any questions about the subject, please don't hesitate to ask.
engSearchText:
If you have any questions about the subject, please
don't hesitate to ask.
jpnChrName: どんな細かい事でも聞いてくださいね。
jpnSearchText: どんな細かい事でも聞いてくださいね。

engChrName: I came to pray for luck, and then two back-to-back incidents happened... Not a good sign.
engSearchText:
I came to pray for luck, and then two back-to-back
incidents happened... Not a good sign.
jpnChrName: せっかく商運向上のために来たというのに、 立て続けに事件が起きるなんて縁起悪いよ……
jpnSearchText:
せっかく商運向上のために来たというのに、
立て続けに事件が起きるなんて縁起悪いよ……

engChrName: At this rate, I'm worried something might happen to me on my way home.
engSearchText:
At this rate, I'm worried something might happen to
me on my way home.
jpnChrName: この分じゃあ、帰りにも何かがありそうな気が して不安でならない……
jpnSearchText:
この分じゃあ、帰りにも何かがありそうな気が
して不安でならない……

engChrName: Should I make a hasty retreat or wait here patiently? Oh, Goddess! Tell me what to do!
engSearchText:
Should I make a hasty retreat or wait here patiently?
Oh, Goddess! Tell me what to do!
jpnChrName: さっさと帰るべきか、大人しくしておくべきか…… 女神様ァ……お助け下され女神様ァ……
jpnSearchText:
さっさと帰るべきか、大人しくしておくべきか……
女神様ァ……お助け下され女神様ァ……

engChrName: Why did I get caught up in such a horrible tragedy?
engSearchText: Why did I get caught up in such a horrible tragedy?
jpnChrName: 商運向上のために来たのに、まさか あんな騒ぎを見る羽目になるとは……
jpnSearchText:
商運向上のために来たのに、まさか
あんな騒ぎを見る羽目になるとは……

engChrName: I'm not even worried about my business right now. I just wanna get home safely...
engSearchText:
I'm not even worried about my business right now.
I just wanna get home safely...
jpnChrName: うう、何だか急に自信が無くなってきた。 商運だけでなく、無事に帰れるかも……
jpnSearchText:
うう、何だか急に自信が無くなってきた。
商運だけでなく、無事に帰れるかも……

engChrName: Oh, Goddess! Oh, Heavenly Mother!
engSearchText: Oh, Goddess! Oh, Heavenly Mother!
jpnChrName: 女神様ァ！　天上聖母様ァ！ 聞いておられるのですか……！
jpnSearchText:
女神様ァ！　天上聖母様ァ！
聞いておられるのですか……！

engChrName: Please save meeeeee!
engSearchText: Please save meeeeee!
jpnChrName: どうか……どうかこの惨めな 私をお守り下されェ……
jpnSearchText:
どうか……どうかこの惨めな
私をお守り下されェ……

engChrName: After a full day of non-stop prayer, I finally decided to go back to the inn and rest...buuut I'm too stressed to sleep.
engSearchText:
After a full day of non-stop prayer, I finally decided
to go back to the inn and rest...buuut I'm too stressed
to sleep.
jpnChrName: 一度宿に戻ったが……不安でたまらず、 また参拝に来てしまったよ。
jpnSearchText:
一度宿に戻ったが……不安でたまらず、
また参拝に来てしまったよ。

engChrName: If my business doesn't turn around soon, my life's gonna be in shambles!
engSearchText:
If my business doesn't turn around soon, my life's
gonna be in shambles!
jpnChrName: 何とか、何とか商運を…… 私にはもう後が無いんだ……！
jpnSearchText:
何とか、何とか商運を……
私にはもう後が無いんだ……！

engChrName: Oh, Goddess! Oh, Heavenly Mother! Please take pity on this poor, debt-ridden soul and smite those vile, underhanded consultants!
engSearchText:
Oh, Goddess! Oh, Heavenly Mother! Please take pity
on this poor, debt-ridden soul and smite those vile,
underhanded consultants!
jpnChrName: 女神様ァ、天上聖母様ァ！　悪質コンサルタントの 借金塗れなこの私を、どうか憐れみ下されェ！
jpnSearchText:
女神様ァ、天上聖母様ァ！　悪質コンサルタントの
借金塗れなこの私を、どうか憐れみ下されェ！

engChrName: When I heard about a divine blessing for luck in business, I came here in a flash.
engSearchText:
When I heard about a divine blessing for luck in
business, I came here in a flash.
jpnChrName: この東方寺院には……商運向上のご利益が あると聞いて飛んできたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この東方寺院には……商運向上のご利益が
あると聞いて飛んできたんだ。

engChrName: I pored through the texts related to the Eastern style of prayer and committed them all to memory.
engSearchText:
I pored through the texts related to the Eastern style
of prayer and committed them all to memory.
jpnChrName: 東方式の祈り方も抜かりなく調べてきた。 これでどうにか祈りが通じてくれれば……
jpnSearchText:
東方式の祈り方も抜かりなく調べてきた。
これでどうにか祈りが通じてくれれば……

engChrName: Now I just gotta get through to the Goddess. If even She abandons me, I'm doomed!
engSearchText:
Now I just gotta get through to the Goddess. If even
She abandons me, I'm doomed!
jpnChrName: 女神様にまで見放されてしまったら 私は……私は……！
jpnSearchText:
女神様にまで見放されてしまったら
私は……私は……！

engChrName: Once the salve wears off, you won't be able to move for the next half month, give or take.
engSearchText:
Once the salve wears off, you won't be able to move
for the next half month, give or take.
jpnChrName: 秘伝の軟膏の副作用故、向こう半月は 自由が利かなくなるじゃろうが……
jpnSearchText:
秘伝の軟膏の副作用故、向こう半月は
自由が利かなくなるじゃろうが……

engChrName: I'll stay with you through the duration of your rehab.
engSearchText: I'll stay with you through the duration of your rehab.
jpnChrName: 医者として、リハビリには責任を 持って付き合うつもりじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
医者として、リハビリには責任を
持って付き合うつもりじゃ。

engChrName: I can promise you'll make a swift—and full— recovery, but only if you make it back here in one piece.
engSearchText:
I can promise you'll make a swift—and full—
recovery, but only if you make it back here in
one piece.
jpnChrName: アーロンよ、五体満足で帰って来い。 儂がしっかり再び動けるようにしてやる。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンよ、五体満足で帰って来い。
儂がしっかり再び動けるようにしてやる。

engChrName: And I will, Doc. I'm not planning on getting any more injuries, and I sure as hell won't die out there.
engSearchText:
And I will, Doc. I'm not planning on getting any
more injuries, and I sure as hell won't die out there.
jpnChrName: ああ、心配すんな先生。 オレは傷の治りが早いって知ってるだろ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、心配すんな先生。
オレは傷の治りが早いって知ってるだろ？

engChrName: I'll get back on my feet in no time at all, so you got nothing to worry about.
engSearchText:
I'll get back on my feet in no time at all, so you got
nothing to worry about.
jpnChrName: あんたならすぐに復調させてくれるだろうしな、 まだてめぇの身体を捨てる気もさらさらねぇさ。
jpnSearchText:
あんたならすぐに復調させてくれるだろうしな、
まだてめぇの身体を捨てる気もさらさらねぇさ。

engChrName: Very well. I'll let you be on your way, then.
engSearchText: Very well. I'll let you be on your way, then.
jpnChrName: うむ……それなら良いのじゃが……
jpnSearchText: うむ……それなら良いのじゃが……

engChrName: But allow me to leave you with some parting words: the truest of threats often come from the places you'd least expect.
engSearchText:
But allow me to leave you with some parting words:
the truest of threats often come from the places you'd
least expect.
jpnChrName: 真なる脅威は……予想だにしない ところより出ずるものじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
真なる脅威は……予想だにしない
ところより出ずるものじゃ。

engChrName: Be vigilant of your surroundings—and of yourself.
engSearchText: Be vigilant of your surroundings—and of yourself.
jpnChrName: アーロン……己以外の全てに気をつける くらいの気構えで行くのじゃぞ？
jpnSearchText:
アーロン……己以外の全てに気をつける
くらいの気構えで行くのじゃぞ？

engChrName: The mist from last night reminded me of what transpired forty years ago...
engSearchText:
The mist from last night reminded me of what
transpired forty years ago...
jpnChrName: しかし、昨晩の霧は誠に不可解…… ４０年前の一件を思い出すが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、昨晩の霧は誠に不可解……
４０年前の一件を思い出すが……

engChrName: The elders had the same thought as well.
engSearchText: The elders had the same thought as well.
jpnChrName: 長老方にはどうにも、これを受けて 考えがあるようにも見えてな。
jpnSearchText:
長老方にはどうにも、これを受けて
考えがあるようにも見えてな。

engChrName: Don't be distracted by the enemy in front of you, Aaron.
engSearchText:
Don't be distracted by the enemy in front of
you, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロンよ……目の前の敵にのみ 捉われるでないぞ……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンよ……目の前の敵にのみ
捉われるでないぞ……

engChrName: I'll keep him alive until we can move him to a proper hospital.
engSearchText:
I'll keep him alive until we can move him to a
proper hospital.
jpnChrName: ……大病院に移るまで、こやつの命は 儂がしっかりと繋いでおく、案ずるな。
jpnSearchText:
……大病院に移るまで、こやつの命は
儂がしっかりと繋いでおく、案ずるな。

engChrName: I only wish I could do more for Aaron... Please look after him if you can.
engSearchText:
I only wish I could do more for Aaron... Please look
after him if you can.
jpnChrName: 気掛かりなのは……やはりアーロンの想いじゃな。 お前さん達……あの小僧の事をよろしく頼むぞ。
jpnSearchText:
気掛かりなのは……やはりアーロンの想いじゃな。
お前さん達……あの小僧の事をよろしく頼むぞ。

engChrName: I won't be able to leave here for some time, but if you need a doctor, I'm your man.
engSearchText:
I won't be able to leave here for some time, but if you
need a doctor, I'm your man.
jpnChrName: 儂は当分ここを離れられぬが……その分、 お前さん達も何かあれば医者として力になるからの。
jpnSearchText:
儂は当分ここを離れられぬが……その分、
お前さん達も何かあれば医者として力になるからの。

engChrName: I heard you went on one of your rampages again, Aaron.
engSearchText:
I heard you went on one of your rampages
again, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロン……またひと暴れしたと聞いたぞ。 近頃は他所の与太者共も暴れてはおるが……
jpnSearchText:
アーロン……またひと暴れしたと聞いたぞ。
近頃は他所の与太者共も暴れてはおるが……

engChrName: I know you're protecting us from the outsiders, but promise me you'll take better care of your body. Don't make your mother cry up there.
engSearchText:
I know you're protecting us from the outsiders, but
promise me you'll take better care of your body.
Don't make your mother cry up there.
jpnChrName: あまり身体を酷使するものではない、 死んだ母親が悲しむぞ？
jpnSearchText:
あまり身体を酷使するものではない、
死んだ母親が悲しむぞ？

engChrName: Spare me the lecture, Doc. I know my limits better than anyone.
engSearchText:
Spare me the lecture, Doc. I know my limits better
than anyone.
jpnChrName: みなまで言うな、先生。 自分の限界ならオレが判っている。
jpnSearchText:
みなまで言うな、先生。
自分の限界ならオレが判っている。

engChrName: I also know Heiyue's twiddling their thumbs. If they don't wanna protect the people, then I gotta take up the mantle.
engSearchText:
I also know Heiyue's twiddling their thumbs. If they
don't wanna protect the people, then I gotta take up
the mantle.
jpnChrName: それに黒月があのチンピラ共から皆を守らねぇ ってんなら、オレ達がやるしかねぇだろ？
jpnSearchText:
それに黒月があのチンピラ共から皆を守らねぇ
ってんなら、オレ達がやるしかねぇだろ？

engChrName: *sigh* There's no getting through to you, is there?
engSearchText: *sigh* There's no getting through to you, is there?
jpnChrName: ふう、相変わらずじゃな……
jpnSearchText: ふう、相変わらずじゃな……

engChrName: Just try to control yourself. You may be tough, but you're not invincible.
engSearchText:
Just try to control yourself. You may be tough, but
you're not invincible.
jpnChrName: お前も腕が立つ事は知っておるが…… くれぐれも己を律するのじゃぞ？
jpnSearchText:
お前も腕が立つ事は知っておるが……
くれぐれも己を律するのじゃぞ？

engChrName: We're done for the day, so if you have any business with us, make it quick.
engSearchText:
We're done for the day, so if you have any business
with us, make it quick.
jpnChrName: もう診察時間も終わりじゃが、 何か入用かのう？
jpnSearchText:
もう診察時間も終わりじゃが、
何か入用かのう？

engChrName: I plan to start preparing tomorrow's medicines as soon as we close.
engSearchText:
I plan to start preparing tomorrow's medicines as
soon as we close.
jpnChrName: 街は何かと騒がしいと聞くが…… 儂は儂の仕事をするのみじゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
街は何かと騒がしいと聞くが……
儂は儂の仕事をするのみじゃよ。

engChrName: Hopefully work will lighten up over the coming days, but with violence continuing to break out on the streets, I'm not holding my breath.
engSearchText:
Hopefully work will lighten up over the coming days,
but with violence continuing to break out on the
streets, I'm not holding my breath.
jpnChrName: さて、診療所を閉めたら 明日の分の調薬にでもとりかかろうかの。
jpnSearchText:
さて、診療所を閉めたら
明日の分の調薬にでもとりかかろうかの。

engChrName: Is...that you, Arkride? What a surprise. I thought you weren't coming to Langport for work anymore.
engSearchText:
Is...that you, Arkride? What a surprise. I thought you
weren't coming to Langport for work anymore.
jpnChrName: お前さんは……アークライドか。 久しいな、もう煌都には出張せんと思っとったぞ。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんは……アークライドか。
久しいな、もう煌都には出張せんと思っとったぞ。
