jpnSearchText: 噂か……ふむ………

engChrName: It was way back, but there was some rumor about a fancy orbal watch being sold off.
engSearchText:
It was way back, but there was some rumor about a
fancy orbal watch being sold off.
jpnChrName: 導力器なら、結構昔に“とある筋”が 奇妙な古い装置を手放した事があるらしい。
jpnSearchText:
導力器なら、結構昔に“とある筋”が
奇妙な古い装置を手放した事があるらしい。

engChrName: Then, there's a long stretch of no news at all...
engSearchText: Then, there's a long stretch of no news at all...
jpnChrName: いつの間にか噂は聞かなくなったが……
jpnSearchText: いつの間にか噂は聞かなくなったが……

engChrName: ...until just recently. I heard of something matching that description being sold down by the docks.
engSearchText:
...until just recently. I heard of something matching
that description being sold down by the docks.
jpnChrName: どうも最近、港湾区の露店あたりで 見かけたってぇ話を聞いたな。
jpnSearchText:
どうも最近、港湾区の露店あたりで
見かけたってぇ話を聞いたな。

engChrName: Any idea who sold it in the first place?
engSearchText: Any idea who sold it in the first place?
jpnChrName: ……その“とある筋”というのは？
jpnSearchText: ……その“とある筋”というのは？

engChrName: Couldn't tell ya.
engSearchText: Couldn't tell ya.
jpnChrName: 知らん。
jpnSearchText: 知らん。

engChrName: But maybe the fact that even I don't know oughta tell you something.
engSearchText:
But maybe the fact that even I don't know oughta tell
you something.
jpnChrName: ただ俺が知らねぇっつーことは…… 分かるよな？
jpnSearchText:
ただ俺が知らねぇっつーことは……
分かるよな？

engChrName: No kidding.
engSearchText: No kidding.
jpnChrName: ああ、その道のプロである アンタすら知らねえなら──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、その道のプロである
アンタすら知らねえなら──

engChrName: If an expert like you is totally in the dark, something must be going on here...
engSearchText:
If an expert like you is totally in the dark, something
must be going on here...
jpnChrName: 自ずと範囲は絞られる。
jpnSearchText: 自ずと範囲は絞られる。

engChrName: Well, whatever it is, thanks for the tip.
engSearchText: Well, whatever it is, thanks for the tip.
jpnChrName: とにかく助かった。 他の線でも調べてみるわ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく助かった。
他の線でも調べてみるわ。

engChrName: Any time. Good luck out there, Van.
engSearchText: Any time. Good luck out there, Van.
jpnChrName: おお、頑張れよ、裏解決屋！
jpnSearchText: おお、頑張れよ、裏解決屋！

engChrName: Well, well. Look what the cat dragged in.
engSearchText: Well, well. Look what the cat dragged in.
jpnChrName: おいおい、こりゃまた随分と 可愛らしい客が来たもんだな？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、こりゃまた随分と
可愛らしい客が来たもんだな？

engChrName: You should know better than to come to a place like this.
engSearchText:
You should know better than to come to a place
like this.
jpnChrName: よぉ、お嬢ちゃんたち！ 良い子はこんなトコに来るモンじゃねえぞ！
jpnSearchText:
よぉ、お嬢ちゃんたち！
良い子はこんなトコに来るモンじゃねえぞ！

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: Heeeya, girlies... *hic* How 'bout weez buys youse twos a drink?
engSearchText:
Heeeya, girlies... *hic* How 'bout weez buys youse
twos a drink?
jpnChrName: まあまあ、折角来たんだから楽しまねぇと！ 俺たちと一緒に飲もうぜぇ？
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、折角来たんだから楽しまねぇと！
俺たちと一緒に飲もうぜぇ？

engChrName: Yeh, we'll treat ya ta' the tayshtie shtuff...
engSearchText: Yeh, we'll treat ya ta' the tayshtie shtuff...
jpnChrName: そうそうそう、オジサンたちが 面白い話、いっぱい聞かせてやるからよ～！
jpnSearchText:
そうそうそう、オジサンたちが
面白い話、いっぱい聞かせてやるからよ～！

engChrName: Wha...?
engSearchText: Wha...?
jpnChrName: んあ？
jpnSearchText: んあ？

engChrName: Aaagh! Aidios above, yer gonna break it!
engSearchText: Aaagh! Aidios above, yer gonna break it!
jpnChrName: あいててててぇぇ！ 折れる折れるぅ──！！
jpnSearchText:
あいててててぇぇ！
折れる折れるぅ──！！

engChrName: Go easy on them, kiddo. Just a couple of lousy drunks.
engSearchText:
Go easy on them, kiddo. Just a couple of
lousy drunks.
jpnChrName: その辺にしておけ、 単に酔っぱらってるだけだろ。
jpnSearchText:
その辺にしておけ、
単に酔っぱらってるだけだろ。

engChrName: Are you sure?
engSearchText: Are you sure?
jpnChrName: そうですか？
jpnSearchText: そうですか？

engChrName: Seriously? Again with this?
engSearchText: Seriously? Again with this?
jpnChrName: コラ！　酔っ払いが何やってるの！
jpnSearchText: コラ！　酔っ払いが何やってるの！

engChrName: How many times do I have to tell you two not to bother folks?
engSearchText:
How many times do I have to tell you two not to
bother folks?
jpnChrName: お客さんにちょっかいを出すなら、 店から叩き出すわよ？
jpnSearchText:
お客さんにちょっかいを出すなら、
店から叩き出すわよ？

engChrName: Aww, c'mon, Halle! We were just tryin' to spook 'em.
engSearchText: Aww, c'mon, Halle! We were just tryin' to spook 'em.
jpnChrName: おいおいハルちゃん、ひでぇよ。 俺たちだって客だろ？
jpnSearchText:
おいおいハルちゃん、ひでぇよ。
俺たちだって客だろ？

engChrName: The li'l one nearly took ma' arm clean off!
engSearchText: The li'l one nearly took ma' arm clean off!
jpnChrName: しかもやられてるのはこっちじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText: しかもやられてるのはこっちじゃねぇか？

engChrName: And what if you deserved it?
engSearchText: And what if you deserved it?
jpnChrName: フン、自業自得でしょう？
jpnSearchText: フン、自業自得でしょう？

engChrName: She's right, y'know!
engSearchText: She's right, y'know!
jpnChrName: そうだそうだ！　自業自得だ！
jpnSearchText: そうだそうだ！　自業自得だ！

engChrName: What kind of a loser almost gets their arm broken by a kid?
engSearchText:
What kind of a loser almost gets their arm broken by
a kid?
jpnChrName: てかあんな小さい子にやられるとか、 情けなさすぎだろ！
jpnSearchText:
てかあんな小さい子にやられるとか、
情けなさすぎだろ！

engChrName: That guy!
engSearchText: That guy!
jpnChrName: まったくだ！
jpnSearchText: まったくだ！

engChrName: Bwahaha!
engSearchText: Bwahaha!
jpnChrName: ワハハハハハハハハハッ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ワハハハハハハハハハッ！！

engChrName: Times may change, but the drunks here stay the same.
engSearchText:
Times may change, but the drunks here stay
the same.
jpnChrName: ったく、ここの連中は 相変わらず酒癖が悪ぃな……
jpnSearchText:
ったく、ここの連中は
相変わらず酒癖が悪ぃな……

engChrName: I'm so sorry about them. The sailors all come to get rowdy during their breaks.
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry about them. The sailors all come to get
rowdy during their breaks.
jpnChrName: 船乗りも多いから、陸（おか）に上がると 思わずはしゃぎたくなるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
船乗りも多いから、陸（おか）に上がると
思わずはしゃぎたくなるのよ。

engChrName: They're a bunch only a mother could love, but try to forgive them, okay?
engSearchText:
They're a bunch only a mother could love, but try to
forgive them, okay?
jpnChrName: ゴメンね、大目に見てあげて？
jpnSearchText: ゴメンね、大目に見てあげて？

engChrName: O-Of course...
engSearchText: O-Of course...
jpnChrName: は、はい……
jpnSearchText: は、はい……

engChrName: It reminds me of the grown-ups back home who couldn't handle their drinks.
engSearchText:
It reminds me of the grown-ups back home who
couldn't handle their drinks.
jpnChrName: ふふ、里の大人にもいましたね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、里の大人にもいましたね。

engChrName: Heh. Nice seeing you, Halle.
engSearchText: Heh. Nice seeing you, Halle.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりだな、ハル。
jpnSearchText: 久しぶりだな、ハル。

engChrName: Good to see you, too. I hear you've landed a real toughie of a job this time.
engSearchText:
Good to see you, too. I hear you've landed a real
toughie of a job this time.
jpnChrName: 貴方もね、ヴァン。 また厄介事を頼まれたそうじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
貴方もね、ヴァン。
また厄介事を頼まれたそうじゃない？

engChrName: Oh, you two know each other?
engSearchText: Oh, you two know each other?
jpnChrName: あ……お知り合いですか？
jpnSearchText: あ……お知り合いですか？

engChrName: Yup.
engSearchText: Yup.
jpnChrName: まあな。
jpnSearchText: まあな。

engChrName: Let me show you to your table.
engSearchText: Let me show you to your table.
jpnChrName: とりあえず奥へどうぞ。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず奥へどうぞ。

engChrName: My name's Halle. When I'm not serving drinks, I'm dealing cards around these parts.
engSearchText:
My name's Halle. When I'm not serving drinks, I'm
dealing cards around these parts.
jpnChrName: 私はハル、ここのウェイトレスよ。 たまに外でディーラーの仕事もするけど。
jpnSearchText:
私はハル、ここのウェイトレスよ。
たまに外でディーラーの仕事もするけど。

engChrName: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Agnès Claudel.
engSearchText: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Agnès Claudel.
jpnChrName: アニエス・クローデルと申します。
jpnSearchText: アニエス・クローデルと申します。

engChrName: I work for Van's company part time to... Well, actually, it's kind of complicated.
engSearchText:
I work for Van's company part time to...
Well, actually, it's kind of complicated.
jpnChrName: まだ学生ですが、訳あってヴァンさんの お仕事を手伝わせていただいています。
jpnSearchText:
まだ学生ですが、訳あってヴァンさんの
お仕事を手伝わせていただいています。

engChrName: And my name is Ferida Al-Fayed.
engSearchText: And my name is Ferida Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: えと、フェリーダ・アルファイドです。
jpnSearchText: えと、フェリーダ・アルファイドです。

engChrName: I'm here to train and pay back Van for his help.
engSearchText: I'm here to train and pay back Van for his help.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんへの恩返しと修行の一環として “あるばいと”をさせてもらってます。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんへの恩返しと修行の一環として
“あるばいと”をさせてもらってます。

engChrName: The pleasure's all mine. When did you become such a mama duck?
engSearchText:
The pleasure's all mine.
When did you become such a mama duck?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、よろしくね！ どこでこんな可愛い助手を見つけたの？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、よろしくね！
どこでこんな可愛い助手を見つけたの？

engChrName: Life's been real weird to me lately, okay?
engSearchText: Life's been real weird to me lately, okay?
jpnChrName: ま、色々あってな。
jpnSearchText: ま、色々あってな。

engChrName: So, your partner hanging around here somewhere? Or did he finally kick the bucket?
engSearchText:
So, your partner hanging around here somewhere?
Or did he finally kick the bucket?
jpnChrName: それよりお前さんの“相棒”はどうした？ 聞きたい事があるんだが遂にくたばったか？
jpnSearchText:
それよりお前さんの“相棒”はどうした？
聞きたい事があるんだが遂にくたばったか？

engChrName: Nope. Just hanging out on Gehenna's doorstep like usual.
engSearchText:
Nope. Just hanging out on Gehenna's doorstep
like usual.
jpnChrName: そこでくたばってるよ。
jpnSearchText: そこでくたばってるよ。

engChrName: You better not be talking about me. This hangover's nothin'.
engSearchText:
You better not be talking about me. This
hangover's nothin'.
jpnChrName: 誰がくたばってるだぁ……？ 二日酔いってだけだっつーの……
jpnSearchText:
誰がくたばってるだぁ……？
二日酔いってだけだっつーの……

engChrName: It really been two years already?
engSearchText: It really been two years already?
jpnChrName: ２年ぶりくらいか。
jpnSearchText: ２年ぶりくらいか。

engChrName: Since last meeting in person, yeah.
engSearchText: Since last meeting in person, yeah.
jpnChrName: 直接会うのはな。
jpnSearchText: 直接会うのはな。

engChrName: Times really are changing, huh? The lone wolf's got himself some pups.
engSearchText:
Times really are changing, huh? The lone wolf's got
himself some pups.
jpnChrName: にしても美少女二人も助手に雇うとは、 お前も偉くなったモンだなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
にしても美少女二人も助手に雇うとは、
お前も偉くなったモンだなぁ～。

engChrName: Shut it.
engSearchText: Shut it.
jpnChrName: 言ってろ。
jpnSearchText: 言ってろ。

engChrName: Name's Jack. Jack Trevor.
engSearchText: Name's Jack. Jack Trevor.
jpnChrName: 俺はジャック・トレバー。
jpnSearchText: 俺はジャック・トレバー。

engChrName: Ain't a gambler out there who doesn't know my name.
engSearchText:
Ain't a gambler out there who doesn't know
my name.
jpnChrName: ここらのカジノでは知らねえヤツがいねぇ 凄腕のギャンブラーだ、よろしくな。
jpnSearchText:
ここらのカジノでは知らねえヤツがいねぇ
凄腕のギャンブラーだ、よろしくな。

engChrName: I-It's nice to meet you, sir.
engSearchText: I-It's nice to meet you, sir.
jpnChrName: よ、よろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText: よ、よろしくお願いします。

engChrName: Wow. You must be quite skilled.
engSearchText: Wow. You must be quite skilled.
jpnChrName: スゴ腕のギャンブラー……
jpnSearchText: スゴ腕のギャンブラー……

engChrName: I know it's hard to believe, but he's tellin' the truth.
engSearchText: I know it's hard to believe, but he's tellin' the truth.
jpnChrName: ホラ吹いてるようにしか見えねぇだろうが 一応は本当だ。
jpnSearchText:
ホラ吹いてるようにしか見えねぇだろうが
一応は本当だ。

engChrName: These two have a real reputation as a gambling duo.
engSearchText: These two have a real reputation as a gambling duo.
jpnChrName: そこのハルと２人で、 その界隈じゃ結構知られてるコンビでな。
jpnSearchText:
そこのハルと２人で、
その界隈じゃ結構知られてるコンビでな。

engChrName: Ooh! That's exciting.
engSearchText: Ooh! That's exciting.
jpnChrName: わぁ…… ずいぶん歳の離れたコンビですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……
ずいぶん歳の離れたコンビですねっ。

engChrName: Call it a duo, but it's more like I'm on a leash here...
engSearchText: Call it a duo, but it's more like I'm on a leash here...
jpnChrName: コンビを組んだつもりはねぇんだが……
jpnSearchText: コンビを組んだつもりはねぇんだが……

engChrName: Got a problem with that?
engSearchText: Got a problem with that?
jpnChrName: なにか言った？
jpnSearchText: なにか言った？

engChrName: Haha...
engSearchText: Haha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: They travel around to casinos all over the place.
engSearchText: They travel around to casinos all over the place.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、２人はあちこちのカジノに 出向くことが多いのもあって──
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、２人はあちこちのカジノに
出向くことが多いのもあって──

engChrName: Which lets 'em trade all the info they pick up along the way.
engSearchText:
Which lets 'em trade all the info they pick up along
the way.
jpnChrName: 裏で“情報屋”もやっている。
jpnSearchText: 裏で“情報屋”もやっている。

engChrName: Being an informant is just a side gig.
engSearchText: Being an informant is just a side gig.
jpnChrName: あくまで副業だがな。
jpnSearchText: あくまで副業だがな。

engChrName: Then, what's your real job? 'Alcohol Enthusiast'?
engSearchText: Then, what's your real job? 'Alcohol Enthusiast'?
jpnChrName: それを言うなら、ジャックの本業は 無職になるじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
それを言うなら、ジャックの本業は
無職になるじゃない。

engChrName: Gambling's a real job...
engSearchText: Gambling's a real job...
jpnChrName: 俺にはギャンブラーという立派な本業がだな……
jpnSearchText: 俺にはギャンブラーという立派な本業がだな……

engChrName: Suuure. Anyway, what did you want to ask about, Van?
engSearchText:
Suuure. Anyway, what did you want to ask
about, Van?
jpnChrName: はいはい。 それでヴァン、何が聞きたいの？
jpnSearchText:
はいはい。
それでヴァン、何が聞きたいの？

engChrName: Two years back, I started hearin' about some guy, but apparently he's a real local celebrity these days.
engSearchText:
Two years back, I started hearin' about some guy, but
apparently he's a real local celebrity these days.
jpnChrName: アーロン・ウェイという若造について 詳しく教えてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン・ウェイという若造について
詳しく教えてくれ。

engChrName: The name 'Aaron Wei' ring any bells?
engSearchText: The name 'Aaron Wei' ring any bells?
jpnChrName: ２年前も小耳に挟んだことはあったが 今じゃ相当有名人らしいな？
jpnSearchText:
２年前も小耳に挟んだことはあったが
今じゃ相当有名人らしいな？

engChrName: Ever the lucky sleuth, aren'tcha?
engSearchText: Ever the lucky sleuth, aren'tcha?
jpnChrName: あいつか……
jpnSearchText: あいつか……

engChrName: As it happens, this bar is one of his usual haunts.
engSearchText: As it happens, this bar is one of his usual haunts.
jpnChrName: ま、ちょうどいい。 ちょくちょくこの店にも顔を出すしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ちょうどいい。
ちょくちょくこの店にも顔を出すしな。

engChrName: Really?!
engSearchText: Really?!
jpnChrName: ホントですか……！
jpnSearchText: ホントですか……！

engChrName: Can you tell us about him? According to Ashen, he sounds like quite the character.
engSearchText:
Can you tell us about him? According to Ashen, he
sounds like quite the character.
jpnChrName: アシェンさんからの話だと、 かなり強烈な方のようですが……
jpnSearchText:
アシェンさんからの話だと、
かなり強烈な方のようですが……

engChrName: He's always one bad fight away from ending up injured, but that never-say-die attitude is part of his charm.
engSearchText:
He's always one bad fight away from ending up
injured, but that never-say-die attitude is part of
his charm.
jpnChrName: 危なっかしい所はあるけど、 そこも含めての魅力かもね。
jpnSearchText:
危なっかしい所はあるけど、
そこも含めての魅力かもね。

engChrName: You'll be hard-pressed to find anyone talking poorly about him around here.
engSearchText:
You'll be hard-pressed to find anyone talking poorly
about him around here.
jpnChrName: あんまり悪い噂は聞かないし。
jpnSearchText: あんまり悪い噂は聞かないし。

engChrName: He's a hot-blooded guy, for sure.
engSearchText: He's a hot-blooded guy, for sure.
jpnChrName: ここら一帯の血気盛んな 若いモンたちを取り纏めてる。
jpnSearchText:
ここら一帯の血気盛んな
若いモンたちを取り纏めてる。

engChrName: It'd be easy to brand him as a no-good gang leader...
engSearchText: It'd be easy to brand him as a no-good gang leader...
jpnChrName: チンピラたちの 親玉っていう見方もできるが……
jpnSearchText:
チンピラたちの
親玉っていう見方もできるが……

engChrName: ...but, honestly, those kids would be way worse off without him.
engSearchText:
...but, honestly, those kids would be way worse off
without him.
jpnChrName: 実際はあいつがいなかったら もっと悪さをするような連中だったろ。
jpnSearchText:
実際はあいつがいなかったら
もっと悪さをするような連中だったろ。

engChrName: Even old folks give him kudos for keepin' things in line.
engSearchText:
Even old folks give him kudos for keepin' things
in line.
jpnChrName: 年寄りたちにも感謝されるくらいだ。
jpnSearchText: 年寄りたちにも感謝されるくらいだ。

engChrName: Ain't that somethin'.
engSearchText: Ain't that somethin'.
jpnChrName: なるほど、大したモンだな。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、大したモンだな。

engChrName: Pretty good gambler, too. Sometimes he'll challenge me and Halle to a game.
engSearchText:
Pretty good gambler, too. Sometimes he'll challenge
me and Halle to a game.
jpnChrName: ギャンブルのセンスも半端ねぇ。 たまに俺やハルに勝負を挑んでくるが……
jpnSearchText:
ギャンブルのセンスも半端ねぇ。
たまに俺やハルに勝負を挑んでくるが……

engChrName: Believe it or not, he wins a third of the time.
engSearchText: Believe it or not, he wins a third of the time.
jpnChrName: ３回に１回は勝ちやがる。
jpnSearchText: ３回に１回は勝ちやがる。

engChrName: You're kidding!
engSearchText: You're kidding!
jpnChrName: ！　そいつは相当だな……！？
jpnSearchText: ！　そいつは相当だな……！？

engChrName: Don't talk like you haven't given me a run for my mira, too.
engSearchText:
Don't talk like you haven't given me a run for my
mira, too.
jpnChrName: ……てめえも裏技で 相当食い下がってただろうが。
jpnSearchText:
……てめえも裏技で
相当食い下がってただろうが。

engChrName: The more I hear about Aaron, the more he reminds me of Van.
engSearchText:
The more I hear about Aaron, the more he reminds
me of Van.
jpnChrName: アーロンという方、聞いてる限りでは ちょっとヴァンさんに似てるような……？
jpnSearchText:
アーロンという方、聞いてる限りでは
ちょっとヴァンさんに似てるような……？

engChrName: Difference is Aaron's actually got looks. Heheh.
engSearchText: Difference is Aaron's actually got looks. Heheh.
jpnChrName: クク…… あっちの方が遙かに美形だがな。
jpnSearchText:
クク……
あっちの方が遙かに美形だがな。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, Van's what you'd get if you combined Jack and Aaron.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, Van's what you'd get if you
combined Jack and Aaron.
jpnChrName: うーん、ジャックとアーロンを 足して割るとヴァンになるって感じかも？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ジャックとアーロンを
足して割るとヴァンになるって感じかも？

engChrName: The hell's that supposed to mean?
engSearchText: The hell's that supposed to mean?
jpnChrName: こらハル、どういう意味だ！？
jpnSearchText: こらハル、どういう意味だ！？

engChrName: ...Let's talk about what's really wrong here.
engSearchText: ...Let's talk about what's really wrong here.
jpnChrName: ……実際、どうなんだ？
jpnSearchText: ……実際、どうなんだ？

engChrName: Jack's face?
engSearchText: Jack's face?
jpnChrName: 顔のこと？
jpnSearchText: 顔のこと？

engChrName: Fair, but I mean something important.
engSearchText: Fair, but I mean something important.
jpnChrName: いやジャックの冴えないツラのことは どうでもいいんだが……
jpnSearchText:
いやジャックの冴えないツラのことは
どうでもいいんだが……

engChrName: C'mon!
engSearchText: C'mon!
jpnChrName: ってオイ！？
jpnSearchText: ってオイ！？

engChrName: Bet you guys know the Messeldam Trading Company, right?
engSearchText:
Bet you guys know the Messeldam Trading
Company, right?
jpnChrName: 《メッセルダム商事》は知ってんだろ。
jpnSearchText: 《メッセルダム商事》は知ってんだろ。

engChrName: Tell me, what're the odds Aaron gives up on running them outta town?
engSearchText:
Tell me, what're the odds Aaron gives up on running
them outta town?
jpnChrName: その若造が、このまま大人しくして、 これ以上の騒ぎを起こさない可能性は？
jpnSearchText:
その若造が、このまま大人しくして、
これ以上の騒ぎを起こさない可能性は？

engChrName: Zero.
engSearchText: Zero.
jpnChrName: それは……ないわね。
jpnSearchText: それは……ないわね。

engChrName: Way I see it, you've got two options.
engSearchText: Way I see it, you've got two options.
jpnChrName: あいつが何かやらかす前に 今回のことにケリを付けるか……
jpnSearchText:
あいつが何かやらかす前に
今回のことにケリを付けるか……

engChrName: One: Take care of business before the kid goes and does something crazy.
engSearchText:
One: Take care of business before the kid goes and
does something crazy.
jpnChrName: もしくは直接あいつと会って 何らかの落とし所を納得させるか……
jpnSearchText:
もしくは直接あいつと会って
何らかの落とし所を納得させるか……

engChrName: Two: Make him compromise with you.
engSearchText: Two: Make him compromise with you.
jpnChrName: 目があるとしたらどっちかだろ。
jpnSearchText: 目があるとしたらどっちかだろ。

engChrName: Both sound rather difficult...
engSearchText: Both sound rather difficult...
jpnChrName: どちらも難しそうですね……
jpnSearchText: どちらも難しそうですね……

engChrName: And how's A doing?
engSearchText: And how's A doing?
jpnChrName: だろうな。 ──で、《Ａ》の方は？
jpnSearchText:
だろうな。
──で、《Ａ》の方は？

engChrName: They're more unhinged than Aaron, that's for sure.
engSearchText: They're more unhinged than Aaron, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: あっちはあっちでアーロンの暴走より 遙かにヤバイんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
あっちはあっちでアーロンの暴走より
遙かにヤバイんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Word is the thugs they're hiring are the worst of the worst.
engSearchText:
Word is the thugs they're hiring are the worst of
the worst.
jpnChrName: 半グレ共もタチの悪いのばかりだし、 別の狙いもあるとしか思えねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
半グレ共もタチの悪いのばかりだし、
別の狙いもあるとしか思えねぇ。

engChrName: They haven't shown their faces in the Eastern Quarter since Aaron whooped their butts.
engSearchText:
They haven't shown their faces in the Eastern
Quarter since Aaron whooped their butts.
jpnChrName: アーロンたちに撃退されてから 東方人街には入ってきてないけど……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンたちに撃退されてから
東方人街には入ってきてないけど……

engChrName: It's hard to rest easy, though. With them still hanging around the other districts, they're clearly planning SOMETHING.
engSearchText:
It's hard to rest easy, though. With them still hanging
around the other districts, they're clearly
planning SOMETHING.
jpnChrName: 新市街には未だたむろしてるし 不穏な気配がプンプンするよね。
jpnSearchText:
新市街には未だたむろしてるし
不穏な気配がプンプンするよね。

engChrName: I know the guild's got their eyes peeled, but I'm not sure there's much they can do.
engSearchText:
I know the guild's got their eyes peeled, but I'm not
sure there's much they can do.
jpnChrName: ギルドが一応警戒してるみたいだけど どこまで抑えられるやら。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドが一応警戒してるみたいだけど
どこまで抑えられるやら。

engChrName: Speakin' of which, I hear you've been getting buddy-buddy with the bracers lately.
engSearchText:
Speakin' of which, I hear you've been getting
buddy-buddy with the bracers lately.
jpnChrName: そういやお前、最近ギルドに 協力してるそうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
そういやお前、最近ギルドに
協力してるそうじゃねえか？

engChrName: What's up with that? You gonna visit the branch in town?
engSearchText:
What's up with that? You gonna visit the branch
in town?
jpnChrName: どういう風の吹き回しか知らねえが 一応顔を出してきたらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
どういう風の吹き回しか知らねえが
一応顔を出してきたらどうだ？

engChrName: Bermotti must've told you, huh? I'm just pickin' up some slack for them, that's all.
engSearchText:
Bermotti must've told you, huh? I'm just pickin' up
some slack for them, that's all.
jpnChrName: ……ベルモッティから聞いたのか。 たまに下請けやってるだけだっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
……ベルモッティから聞いたのか。
たまに下請けやってるだけだっつーの。

engChrName: Whatever you say.
engSearchText: Whatever you say.
jpnChrName: クク、そういう事にしてやるよ。
jpnSearchText: クク、そういう事にしてやるよ。

engChrName: With all this going on, I've gotta wonder what Heiyue is thinking.
engSearchText:
With all this going on, I've gotta wonder what
Heiyue is thinking.
jpnChrName: ──ま、キナ臭いネタは多いが 俺としちゃ《黒月》も気になるがな。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、キナ臭いネタは多いが
俺としちゃ《黒月》も気になるがな。

engChrName: We're more or less safe since this bar's a neutral zone, but otherwise, Heiyue runs the show around here.
engSearchText:
We're more or less safe since this bar's a neutral zone,
but otherwise, Heiyue runs the show around here.
jpnChrName: この酒場は中立地帯みたいなモンだが 文字通り煌都を支配している連中だ。
jpnSearchText:
この酒場は中立地帯みたいなモンだが
文字通り煌都を支配している連中だ。

engChrName: And let me tell you, some of their elders are real monsters—not to mention Cao Lee.
engSearchText:
And let me tell you, some of their elders are real
monsters—not to mention Cao Lee.
jpnChrName: 長老たちの中にもヤバイのがいるし、 何よりあの《白蘭竜（ツァオ・リー）》がいるからな。
jpnSearchText:
長老たちの中にもヤバイのがいるし、
何よりあの《白蘭竜（ツァオ・リー）》がいるからな。

engChrName: Yeah, we can't get too comfortable around that guy.
engSearchText: Yeah, we can't get too comfortable around that guy.
jpnChrName: うん、あれは相当なクセ者だよね。
jpnSearchText: うん、あれは相当なクセ者だよね。

engChrName: I'd say it's good that he's in Crossbell right now, but he's probably there to call up Yin.
engSearchText:
I'd say it's good that he's in Crossbell right now, but
he's probably there to call up Yin.
jpnChrName: クロスベルに行ってるみたいだけど 多分《銀（イン）》を呼び寄せるためだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
クロスベルに行ってるみたいだけど
多分《銀（イン）》を呼び寄せるためだろうし。

engChrName: Figures...
engSearchText: Figures...
jpnChrName: ……だろうな。
jpnSearchText: ……だろうな。

engChrName: Yin?
engSearchText: Yin?

engChrName: I feel like I've heard that name before...
engSearchText: I feel like I've heard that name before...
jpnChrName: どこかでその名前を 聞いたことがあるような……
jpnSearchText:
どこかでその名前を
聞いたことがあるような……

engChrName: The legendary xiongshou—an assassin of sorts. Some call Yin the demon of the Eastern Quarter.
engSearchText:
The legendary xiongshou—an assassin of sorts.
Some call Yin the demon of the Eastern Quarter.
jpnChrName: 東方人街の魔人なんて言われてた 伝説の凶手──暗殺者でね。
jpnSearchText:
東方人街の魔人なんて言われてた
伝説の凶手──暗殺者でね。

engChrName: Supposedly they moved over to Crossbell a few years back.
engSearchText:
Supposedly they moved over to Crossbell a few
years back.
jpnChrName: 数年前に西のクロスベル自治州に 拠点を移したなんて言われてるの。
jpnSearchText:
数年前に西のクロスベル自治州に
拠点を移したなんて言われてるの。

engChrName: They haven't been nearly as active, but Yin's name always pops up when something big is going down.
engSearchText:
They haven't been nearly as active, but Yin's name
always pops up when something big is going down.
jpnChrName: 最近は活動してないみたいだけど…… たまに大きな事件の時に聞くかな？
jpnSearchText:
最近は活動してないみたいだけど……
たまに大きな事件の時に聞くかな？

engChrName: Huh...
engSearchText: Huh...
jpnChrName: そんな人が……
jpnSearchText: そんな人が……

engChrName: I wonder if my people have fought with them before.
engSearchText: I wonder if my people have fought with them before.
jpnChrName: ……昔、戦士団が やり合った相手かもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
……昔、戦士団が
やり合った相手かもしれません。

engChrName: Were I a betting man, I'd say the demon ain't the only ace up their sleeve, either.
engSearchText:
Were I a betting man, I'd say the demon ain't the
only ace up their sleeve, either.
jpnChrName: ま、その鬼札（ジョーカー）以外にも 色々と手を用意してるだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、その鬼札（ジョーカー）以外にも
色々と手を用意してるだろうな。

engChrName: Assumin' the rumors I've heard are true, course.
engSearchText: Assumin' the rumors I've heard are true, course.
jpnChrName: “裏”の使い手どもを 抱えてるっつう話も聞くしよ。
jpnSearchText:
“裏”の使い手どもを
抱えてるっつう話も聞くしよ。

engChrName: Ugh. Don't make me think about all that creepy shit.
engSearchText: Ugh. Don't make me think about all that creepy shit.
jpnChrName: ……その話はやめとけ。 《銀（イン）》以上にシャレにならん。
jpnSearchText:
……その話はやめとけ。
《銀（イン）》以上にシャレにならん。

engChrName: All I know is this: this town's on a collision course with bloodshed.
engSearchText:
All I know is this: this town's on a collision course
with bloodshed.
jpnChrName: ま、どう転ぶにせよ、 煌都が血の色に染まりそうだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、どう転ぶにせよ、
煌都が血の色に染まりそうだぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* Unless something's done, at least.
engSearchText: *sigh* Unless something's done, at least.
jpnChrName: ふう、このまま行くとね。
jpnSearchText: ふう、このまま行くとね。

engChrName: Lemme know if you hear anything, all right?
engSearchText: Lemme know if you hear anything, all right?
jpnChrName: また何か掴んだら、連絡をくれ。
jpnSearchText: また何か掴んだら、連絡をくれ。

engChrName: Will do. You're stayin' at Guihua Fandian, yeah?
engSearchText: Will do. You're stayin' at Guihua Fandian, yeah?
jpnChrName: おう、桂花飯店だったな。
jpnSearchText: おう、桂花飯店だったな。

engChrName: Shame we couldn't squeeze in a game or two.
engSearchText: Shame we couldn't squeeze in a game or two.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりに勝負してみたかったが 忙しいみてぇだし後回しか。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりに勝負してみたかったが
忙しいみてぇだし後回しか。

engChrName: Gotta save that for off-hours. Don't wanna corrupt the kiddos, y'know.
engSearchText:
Gotta save that for off-hours. Don't wanna corrupt
the kiddos, y'know.
jpnChrName: ま、子供の教育に悪いし そういうのは大人の時間にな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、子供の教育に悪いし
そういうのは大人の時間にな。

engChrName: Please visit again sometime. I'll make sure you get a warm welcome next time.
engSearchText:
Please visit again sometime. I'll make sure you get a
warm welcome next time.
jpnChrName: アニエスとフェリもまた来てね。 歓迎するよ。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスとフェリもまた来てね。
歓迎するよ。

engChrName: Thank you! We will.
engSearchText: Thank you! We will.
jpnChrName: はい、機会があれば是非。
jpnSearchText: はい、機会があれば是非。

engChrName: I wanna hear lots of old stories about Van.
engSearchText: I wanna hear lots of old stories about Van.
jpnChrName: その時はヴァンさんの昔話を 聞かせてくださいっ。
jpnSearchText:
その時はヴァンさんの昔話を
聞かせてくださいっ。

engChrName: Oh, I've got some real juicy ones.
engSearchText: Oh, I've got some real juicy ones.
jpnChrName: 結構あるよ、面白いエピソード♪
jpnSearchText: 結構あるよ、面白いエピソード♪

engChrName: Better keep those to yourself, ya hear?
engSearchText: Better keep those to yourself, ya hear?
jpnChrName: いらん事話すなっつーの。
jpnSearchText: いらん事話すなっつーの。

engChrName: It was still early, but feeling tired from their first day of work, the group chose to return to the hotel.
engSearchText:
It was still early, but feeling tired from their first day
of work, the group chose to return to the hotel.
jpnChrName: まだ宵の口だったが初日の疲れもあったため、 そのまま桂花飯店に戻り、一日目の行動を終えた。
jpnSearchText:
まだ宵の口だったが初日の疲れもあったため、
そのまま桂花飯店に戻り、一日目の行動を終えた。

engChrName: ...Yeah. Not a problem.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. Not a problem.
jpnChrName: ………ああ、問題ない。
jpnSearchText: ………ああ、問題ない。

engChrName: Be there in a sec.
engSearchText: Be there in a sec.
jpnChrName: 分かった──すぐ行く。
jpnSearchText: 分かった──すぐ行く。

engChrName: A flush. Looks like I win this one.
engSearchText: A flush. Looks like I win this one.
jpnChrName: フラッシュ──俺の勝ちだな。
jpnSearchText: フラッシュ──俺の勝ちだな。

engChrName: Bah. Was feelin' lucky tonight, too.
engSearchText: Bah. Was feelin' lucky tonight, too.
jpnChrName: ちっ、今夜はいけると思ったが……
jpnSearchText: ちっ、今夜はいけると思ったが……

engChrName: You mighta had a shot if you hadn't gone all in at the end there.
engSearchText:
You mighta had a shot if you hadn't gone all in at the
end there.
jpnChrName: さすが搦め手で食い下がりやがったが 最後のオールインは勝負を焦りすぎたな。
jpnSearchText:
さすが搦め手で食い下がりやがったが
最後のオールインは勝負を焦りすぎたな。

engChrName: A win's a win, though. You're paying double for your info this time.
engSearchText:
A win's a win, though. You're paying double for your
info this time.
jpnChrName: これで今回の情報料はダブル、 異存はねーな？
jpnSearchText:
これで今回の情報料はダブル、
異存はねーな？

engChrName: Yeah, whatever. Your booze fund was looking pretty dry anyway.
engSearchText:
Yeah, whatever. Your booze fund was looking pretty
dry anyway.
jpnChrName: はいはい、アンタの酒代に 貢献してやるよ、たく。
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、アンタの酒代に
貢献してやるよ、たく。

engChrName: By the way, I heard Elaine's in town.
engSearchText: By the way, I heard Elaine's in town.
jpnChrName: 話は変わるが、エレインの嬢ちゃんが 来てるそうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
話は変わるが、エレインの嬢ちゃんが
来てるそうじゃねえか？

engChrName: Oh, right—forgot you knew her. Yeah, just got here this evening.
engSearchText:
Oh, right—forgot you knew her. Yeah, just got here
this evening.
jpnChrName: そういや知り合いだったか…… ああ、夕方来たらしい。
jpnSearchText:
そういや知り合いだったか……
ああ、夕方来たらしい。

engChrName: Heh heh.
engSearchText: Heh heh.
jpnChrName: クククッ。
jpnSearchText: クククッ。

engChrName: What's with the creepy laugh?
engSearchText: What's with the creepy laugh?
jpnChrName: なんだよ、気色悪いな。
jpnSearchText: なんだよ、気色悪いな。

engChrName: Ain't it tough bein' so popular? Everywhere ya turn there's another girl vying for your attention.
engSearchText:
Ain't it tough bein' so popular? Everywhere ya turn
there's another girl vying for your attention.
jpnChrName: モテる男は大変だって思ってな。 色々板挟みで大変なんじゃねーか？
jpnSearchText:
モテる男は大変だって思ってな。
色々板挟みで大変なんじゃねーか？

engChrName: You have too much to drink, bud?
engSearchText: You have too much to drink, bud?
jpnChrName: はぁ？　夜なのにまだボケてんのか。
jpnSearchText: はぁ？　夜なのにまだボケてんのか。

engChrName: Like you've got any right to talk when we all know your 'old pal' is—
engSearchText:
Like you've got any right to talk when we all know
your 'old pal' is—
jpnChrName: つーか人のこと言えんのかよ。 例の曰く付きの昔馴染みっつーのは──
jpnSearchText:
つーか人のこと言えんのかよ。
例の曰く付きの昔馴染みっつーのは──

engChrName: Nope! We're done talkin' about this!
engSearchText: Nope! We're done talkin' about this!
jpnChrName: やめだ、この話はやめ！
jpnSearchText: やめだ、この話はやめ！

engChrName: Talking about what?
engSearchText: Talking about what?
jpnChrName: なになに、何の話？
jpnSearchText: なになに、何の話？

engChrName: It's guy stuff. Way too dirty for the likes of you. Now, shoo.
engSearchText:
It's guy stuff. Way too dirty for the likes of you.
Now, shoo.
jpnChrName: しっしっ、男の話に首を突っ込むんじゃねえ。 夜のお楽しみ情報だ。
jpnSearchText:
しっしっ、男の話に首を突っ込むんじゃねえ。
夜のお楽しみ情報だ。

engChrName: Ugh. Why are men like this?
engSearchText: Ugh. Why are men like this?
jpnChrName: こ、これだから男ってのは……！
jpnSearchText: こ、これだから男ってのは……！

engChrName: Asshole!
engSearchText: Asshole!
jpnChrName: バーカ！
jpnSearchText: バーカ！

engChrName: Anyway, what I've got for you is way heavier than the stuff you were workin' on this afternoon.
engSearchText:
Anyway, what I've got for you is way heavier than the
stuff you were workin' on this afternoon.
jpnChrName: 昼間よりディープなネタだ。
jpnSearchText: 昼間よりディープなネタだ。

engChrName: Doubt blondie and the kid are ready for it, to be honest.
engSearchText:
Doubt blondie and the kid are ready for it, to
be honest.
jpnChrName: あの嬢ちゃんたち、特に金髪の方には ちっと刺激が強いかもしれねえが。
jpnSearchText:
あの嬢ちゃんたち、特に金髪の方には
ちっと刺激が強いかもしれねえが。

engChrName: Why do you think I came alone?
engSearchText: Why do you think I came alone?
jpnChrName: だから一人で来たんだろうが。
jpnSearchText: だから一人で来たんだろうが。

engChrName: (Con artists working with A, huh? Yeah, that's a mess, all right.)
engSearchText:
(Con artists working with A, huh? Yeah, that's a
mess, all right.)
jpnChrName: （《Ａ》と繋がりのあるイカサマ師か……   確かに厄介そうな案件だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（《Ａ》と繋がりのあるイカサマ師か……
確かに厄介そうな案件だな。）

engChrName: Well, see ya around.
engSearchText: Well, see ya around.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、またな。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ、またな。

engChrName: You're goin' alone?
engSearchText: You're goin' alone?
jpnChrName: 一人で行くのか？
jpnSearchText: 一人で行くのか？

engChrName: That's the plan.
engSearchText: That's the plan.
jpnChrName: ああ。
jpnSearchText: ああ。

engChrName: I know you're tough and all, but wanderin' around this town late at night by your lonesome ain't the brightest idea.
engSearchText:
I know you're tough and all, but wanderin' around
this town late at night by your lonesome ain't the
brightest idea.
jpnChrName: いくらお前でも、この状況下で 夜の一人歩きはオススメしねえな。
jpnSearchText:
いくらお前でも、この状況下で
夜の一人歩きはオススメしねえな。

engChrName: Now—don't bite my head off—why not ask Elaine to come along?
engSearchText:
Now—don't bite my head off—why not ask Elaine to
come along?
jpnChrName: 冗談抜きに、エレインの嬢ちゃんでも 誘ったらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
冗談抜きに、エレインの嬢ちゃんでも
誘ったらどうだ？

engChrName: Like I've got any right to do that...
engSearchText: Like I've got any right to do that...
jpnChrName: それこそ冗談だろ。 ……今更どのツラ下げて……
jpnSearchText:
それこそ冗談だろ。
……今更どのツラ下げて……

engChrName: I can handle this myself. I've got the best nose in the biz, y'know.
engSearchText:
I can handle this myself. I've got the best nose in the
biz, y'know.
jpnChrName: とにかく慎重に動くさ。 鼻が利くのが取り柄だからな。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく慎重に動くさ。
鼻が利くのが取り柄だからな。

engChrName: Don't work that sniffer too hard, ya hear?
engSearchText: Don't work that sniffer too hard, ya hear?
jpnChrName: フッ、違いねぇ。 適当に頑張れよ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、違いねぇ。
適当に頑張れよ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

engChrName: Jack, what's going on?!
engSearchText: Jack, what's going on?!
jpnChrName: な、なにこれ！？
jpnSearchText: な、なにこれ！？

engChrName: Dunno, but I don't like it. Go hide out in the bar!
engSearchText: Dunno, but I don't like it. Go hide out in the bar!
jpnChrName: よく分からんがヤバそうだな…… ──店に入っとけ！
jpnSearchText:
よく分からんがヤバそうだな……
──店に入っとけ！

engChrName: We shouldn't be getting sea fog at this time of year...
engSearchText: We shouldn't be getting sea fog at this time of year...
jpnChrName: か、海霧……！？ でもそんな季節じゃ……
jpnSearchText:
か、海霧……！？
でもそんな季節じゃ……

engChrName: Even if it's a freak off-season incident, it shouldn't be this dense.
engSearchText:
Even if it's a freak off-season incident, it shouldn't be
this dense.
jpnChrName: ああ…… しかも濃さが尋常ではない。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
しかも濃さが尋常ではない。

engChrName: Contact the other families! I need men stationed at every district!
engSearchText:
Contact the other families! I need men stationed at
every district!
jpnChrName: ──各家に連絡を！ 二番、三番街にも人を出せ！
jpnSearchText:
──各家に連絡を！
二番、三番街にも人を出せ！

engChrName: Yes, sir!
engSearchText: Yes, sir!
jpnSearchText: ハ……！

engChrName: To think it'd return after forty long years...
engSearchText: To think it'd return after forty long years...
jpnChrName: ──４０年ぶりか。
jpnSearchText: ──４０年ぶりか。

engChrName: Yéye?
engSearchText: Yéye?
jpnChrName: 爷爷（イェイェ）（おじいちゃん）！
jpnSearchText: 爷爷（イェイェ）（おじいちゃん）！

engChrName: Are you saying this has happened before?
engSearchText: Are you saying this has happened before?
jpnChrName: 父上、それは一体……！？
jpnSearchText: 父上、それは一体……！？

engChrName: I'm not surprised you have forgotten. You were only a child when this fog last descended upon us.
engSearchText:
I'm not surprised you have forgotten. You were only a
child when this fog last descended upon us.
jpnChrName: お前はまだ幼かったからな。
jpnSearchText: お前はまだ幼かったからな。

engChrName: Assemble the xiongshou. We must fortify our defenses at once.
engSearchText:
Assemble the xiongshou. We must fortify our
defenses at once.
jpnChrName: ──“凶手”どもを集めよ。 守りを固めるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──“凶手”どもを集めよ。
守りを固めるぞ。

engChrName: Hurry back to your homes!
engSearchText: Hurry back to your homes!
jpnChrName: 早く家や店の中に入れ！
jpnSearchText: 早く家や店の中に入れ！

engChrName: Stay in and don't come out! It's too dangerous outside!
engSearchText:
Stay in and don't come out! It's too
dangerous outside!
jpnChrName: 危険だから今夜は もう外出しないでくれ！
jpnSearchText:
危険だから今夜は
もう外出しないでくれ！

engChrName: Hey! Do you know where Aaron is? I can't find him anywhere!
engSearchText:
Hey! Do you know where Aaron is? I can't find
him anywhere!
jpnChrName: アーロンはどうしたんだ？ 早く合流しねえと！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンはどうしたんだ？
早く合流しねえと！

engChrName: He went to go keep an eye on that outsider Heiyue hired.
engSearchText:
He went to go keep an eye on that outsider
Heiyue hired.
jpnChrName: あのヨソ者を見張って 新市街に行ったみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
あのヨソ者を見張って
新市街に行ったみてぇだが。

engChrName: Wh-What about this fog? I've never seen anything lik—GUH!
engSearchText:
Wh-What about this fog? I've never seen
anything lik—GUH!
jpnChrName: だ、だがこんな霧、今まで一度も──ぐあッ！？
jpnSearchText: だ、だがこんな霧、今まで一度も──ぐあッ！？

engChrName: Syd! Hang in there! Say something!
engSearchText: Syd! Hang in there! Say something!
jpnChrName: お、おい！ ウソだろ、しっかりしろ！
jpnSearchText:
お、おい！
ウソだろ、しっかりしろ！

engChrName: You bastards!
engSearchText: You bastards!
jpnChrName: てめえら！！
jpnSearchText: てめえら！！

engChrName: Well, lookie here! The whole bunch of 'em in one place.
engSearchText:
Well, lookie here! The whole bunch of 'em in
one place.
jpnChrName: ジャストタイミングじゃねえか、 探す手間も省けたぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ジャストタイミングじゃねえか、
探す手間も省けたぜ！

engChrName: Our job of paintin' these streets red just got a lot easier!
engSearchText:
Our job of paintin' these streets red just got a
lot easier!
jpnChrName: 連中のオーダー通り、 全員血祭りにあげんぞ！
jpnSearchText:
連中のオーダー通り、
全員血祭りにあげんぞ！

engChrName: Hahaha!
engSearchText: Hahaha!
jpnChrName: クハハハハハハ────！
jpnSearchText: クハハハハハハ────！

engChrName: Sei! Huang!
engSearchText: Sei! Huang!
jpnChrName: セイ！　 ホアン！？
jpnSearchText: セイ！　 ホアン！？

engChrName: Damn it all!
engSearchText: Damn it all!
jpnChrName: クソがああああああっ！！
jpnSearchText: クソがああああああっ！！

engChrName: Oh, great...
engSearchText: Oh, great...
jpnChrName: チッ…… 人形兵器だと！？
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
人形兵器だと！？

engChrName: I'll take point!
engSearchText: I'll take point!
jpnChrName: 片付けましょう！
jpnSearchText: 片付けましょう！

engChrName: Wow!
engSearchText: Wow!
jpnChrName: すごい……！
jpnSearchText: すごい……！

engChrName: They're perfectly in sync!
engSearchText: They're perfectly in sync!
jpnChrName: 見事な連携です！
jpnSearchText: 見事な連携です！

engChrName: Look alive!
engSearchText: Look alive!
jpnChrName: まだ来るぞ！
jpnSearchText: まだ来るぞ！

engChrName: It's not over yet.
engSearchText: It's not over yet.
jpnChrName: 数が多い…… 連携するわよ！
jpnSearchText:
数が多い……
連携するわよ！

engChrName: What are they doing here...?
engSearchText: What are they doing here...?
jpnChrName: っ…… こんな街中で……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……
こんな街中で……！

engChrName: Let's go!
engSearchText: Let's go!
jpnChrName: 撃破しますっ！
jpnSearchText: 撃破しますっ！

engChrName: Outta my way!
engSearchText: Outta my way!
jpnChrName: どきやがれッ！！
jpnSearchText: どきやがれッ！！

engChrName: Argh. Go to hell!
engSearchText: Argh. Go to hell!
jpnChrName: ッ、邪魔だああああッ───！！
jpnSearchText: ッ、邪魔だああああッ───！！

engChrName: Hang on, guys! I'm coming!
engSearchText: Hang on, guys! I'm coming!
jpnChrName: 待ってろよお前ら！　いま加勢に──
jpnSearchText: 待ってろよお前ら！　いま加勢に──

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnSearchText: …………ぁ？

engChrName: The enemy has been routed!
engSearchText: The enemy has been routed!
jpnChrName: 今のが最後ですっ！
jpnSearchText: 今のが最後ですっ！

engChrName: *pant*...*pant*... What if there are more hiding in the mist?
engSearchText:
*pant*...*pant*... What if there are more hiding in
the mist?
jpnChrName: はあはあ……霧の中に まだ潜んでいたりは……？
jpnSearchText:
はあはあ……霧の中に
まだ潜んでいたりは……？

engChrName: Don't think so—the fog's clearing.
engSearchText: Don't think so—the fog's clearing.
jpnChrName: その心配は無さそうだ。 ……晴れるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
その心配は無さそうだ。
……晴れるぞ。

engChrName: Did you hear that?
engSearchText: Did you hear that?
jpnChrName: 今のは……！
jpnSearchText: 今のは……！

engChrName: About ten people just fled the combat zone!
engSearchText: About ten people just fled the combat zone!
jpnChrName: 十数名が戦域を離脱していきます！
jpnSearchText: 十数名が戦域を離脱していきます！

engChrName: We need to hurry!
engSearchText: We need to hurry!
jpnChrName: とにかく急ぐぞ！
jpnSearchText: とにかく急ぐぞ！

engChrName: Oh, Aidios...
engSearchText: Oh, Aidios...
jpnChrName: ……こ、これって………
jpnSearchText: ……こ、これって………

engChrName: This isn't even a battlefield...
engSearchText: This isn't even a battlefield...
jpnChrName: っ……戦場でもこんな……
jpnSearchText: っ……戦場でもこんな……

engChrName: Stay back, both of you.
engSearchText: Stay back, both of you.
jpnChrName: ……お前らは下がってろ。
jpnSearchText: ……お前らは下がってろ。

engChrName: ...Let's go make sure.
engSearchText: ...Let's go make sure.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァン、手伝って！
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァン、手伝って！

engChrName: I...don't like these odds.
engSearchText: I...don't like these odds.
jpnChrName: ああ……無駄そうだがな。
jpnSearchText: ああ……無駄そうだがな。

engChrName: Aaron...
engSearchText: Aaron...
jpnChrName: ……アーロン………
jpnSearchText: ……アーロン………

engChrName: Those bastards...
engSearchText: Those bastards...
jpnSearchText: ………………るさねぇ……

engChrName: ...Even if it's the last thing I do...they're gonna—
engSearchText: ...Even if it's the last thing I do...they're gonna—
jpnChrName: ……ゆるさねぇゆるさねぇゆるさねぇゆるさねぇ──
jpnSearchText: ……ゆるさねぇゆるさねぇゆるさねぇゆるさねぇ──

engChrName: RAAAAAAH!
engSearchText: RAAAAAAH!
jpnChrName: オオオオオオオオオオオオオッッッ！！！
jpnSearchText: オオオオオオオオオオオオオッッッ！！！

engChrName: THEY'LL PAY! I'LL MAKE THEM ALL PAY!
engSearchText:
THEY'LL PAY! I'LL MAKE THEM
ALL PAY!
jpnChrName: 赦さねえ！　絶対に、赦さねぇぞおおおおお！！！！
jpnSearchText: 赦さねえ！　絶対に、赦さねぇぞおおおおお！！！！

engChrName: The next morning...
engSearchText: The next morning...
jpnChrName: 翌朝──
jpnSearchText: 翌朝──

engChrName: September 21st, 1208, 8:12AM
engSearchText: September 21st, 1208, 8:12AM

engChrName: Allow me to formally introduce myself. My name is Gien Lu.
engSearchText:
Allow me to formally introduce myself. My name is
Gien Lu.
jpnChrName: 改めてになるが名乗っておこう。 ──ギエン・ルウという者だ。
jpnSearchText:
改めてになるが名乗っておこう。
──ギエン・ルウという者だ。

engChrName: 'Lu'? Then, that makes you...
engSearchText: 'Lu'? Then, that makes you...
jpnChrName: “ルウ”、ということは……
jpnSearchText: “ルウ”、ということは……

engChrName: I figured there was more going on with you, but I wouldn't have guessed you were THAT important.
engSearchText:
I figured there was more going on with you, but I
wouldn't have guessed you were THAT important.
jpnChrName: ……ちょいと引っかかりはしたが まさかそこまでの大物とはな。
jpnSearchText:
……ちょいと引っかかりはしたが
まさかそこまでの大物とはな。

engChrName: Can't believe an elder from Heiyue waxed my ride.
engSearchText: Can't believe an elder from Heiyue waxed my ride.
jpnChrName: 黒月を代表するルウ家の現当主、 “現長老”の一人ってことか。
jpnSearchText:
黒月を代表するルウ家の現当主、
“現長老”の一人ってことか。

engChrName: Wait... Oh, it IS the same guy!
engSearchText: Wait... Oh, it IS the same guy!
jpnChrName: し、下働きのおじいさんじゃ なかったんですかっ？
jpnSearchText:
し、下働きのおじいさんじゃ
なかったんですかっ？

engChrName: Heheh. You still have much to learn, young Van.
engSearchText: Heheh. You still have much to learn, young Van.
jpnChrName: フフ…… まだまだ青いな、ヴァンとやら。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
まだまだ青いな、ヴァンとやら。

engChrName: Weird hearing that from you, but I take it you didn't invite us just for that big reveal.
engSearchText:
Weird hearing that from you, but I take it you didn't
invite us just for that big reveal.
jpnChrName: 褒め言葉として受け取っとくぜ。 ──それで、話ってのは？
jpnSearchText:
褒め言葉として受け取っとくぜ。
──それで、話ってのは？

engChrName: Of course. Naturally, we must discuss last night's events.
engSearchText:
Of course. Naturally, we must discuss last
night's events.
jpnChrName: 無論、昨夜のことについてだ。
jpnSearchText: 無論、昨夜のことについてだ。

engChrName: Allow me to inform you of the elders' decision.
engSearchText: Allow me to inform you of the elders' decision.
jpnChrName: 長老会の決定を伝えよう。
jpnSearchText: 長老会の決定を伝えよう。

engChrName: Heiyue will remain on standby until further notice.
engSearchText: Heiyue will remain on standby until further notice.
jpnChrName: ──今日のうちに 黒月が動くつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
──今日のうちに
黒月が動くつもりはない。

engChrName: Even after that bloodbath?
engSearchText: Even after that bloodbath?
jpnChrName: この期に及んで、か……
jpnSearchText: この期に及んで、か……

engChrName: Father, are you sure this is the most prudent course?
engSearchText: Father, are you sure this is the most prudent course?
jpnChrName: 父上……本当に それで宜しいのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
父上……本当に
それで宜しいのでしょうか？

engChrName: Today, we must bide our time and prepare our forces. In the interim, no one must mount an attack.
engSearchText:
Today, we must bide our time and prepare our forces.
In the interim, no one must mount an attack.
jpnChrName: 諸々の準備が整うのは明日だ。 それまでの手出しは許さん。
jpnSearchText:
諸々の準備が整うのは明日だ。
それまでの手出しは許さん。

engChrName: On the morrow, Cao will return, and we as an organization will resolve this matter in one fell swoop.
engSearchText:
On the morrow, Cao will return, and we as an
organization will resolve this matter in one fell swoop.
jpnChrName: 今日は守りに入り明朝、 ツァオが戻った時点で全てを片付ける。
jpnSearchText:
今日は守りに入り明朝、
ツァオが戻った時点で全てを片付ける。

engChrName: Whether Yin chooses to help us is no longer relevant.
engSearchText: Whether Yin chooses to help us is no longer relevant.
jpnChrName: 《銀》が来るかは、もはやどうでもいい。
jpnSearchText: 《銀》が来るかは、もはやどうでもいい。

engChrName: How can you expect us to sit idly by and accept that?!
engSearchText:
How can you expect us to sit idly by and
accept that?!
jpnChrName: で、でも納得できないわ──！
jpnSearchText: で、でも納得できないわ──！

engChrName: Never mind the people of Langport! What about Aaron?
engSearchText:
Never mind the people of Langport! What
about Aaron?
jpnChrName: 街のみんなもそうだけど、 このままアーロンが黙ってるわけない！
jpnSearchText:
街のみんなもそうだけど、
このままアーロンが黙ってるわけない！

engChrName: He's been missing ever since the incident. I know him—he's not about to sit on his hands and wait!
engSearchText:
He's been missing ever since the incident. I know
him—he's not about to sit on his hands and wait!
jpnChrName: あれから何処かに行っちゃったし、 下手したら一人で敵陣に突っ込みかねないわ！
jpnSearchText:
あれから何処かに行っちゃったし、
下手したら一人で敵陣に突っ込みかねないわ！

engChrName: Are you both really just going to let him go it alone?!
engSearchText: Are you both really just going to let him go it alone?!
jpnChrName: 爷爷（イェイェ）や爸爸（パパ）は彼を見捨てるつもりなの！？
jpnSearchText: 爷爷（イェイェ）や爸爸（パパ）は彼を見捨てるつもりなの！？

engChrName: Of course we don't want to abandon him. However, it's plain to see this situation is balanced on a knife's edge.
engSearchText:
Of course we don't want to abandon him.
However, it's plain to see this situation is balanced on
a knife's edge.
jpnChrName: ……無論そのつもりはない。 だが難しい状況なのも確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
……無論そのつもりはない。
だが難しい状況なのも確かだ。

engChrName: Our foes will expect retribution, so we only have one chance to get this right.
engSearchText:
Our foes will expect retribution, so we only have one
chance to get this right.
jpnChrName: これだけの仕掛け──私たちの報復を “彼ら”は当然予測していることになる。
jpnSearchText:
これだけの仕掛け──私たちの報復を
“彼ら”は当然予測していることになる。
っ……

engChrName: I get what you mean.
engSearchText: I get what you mean.
jpnChrName: ……ま、そうでしょうね。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、そうでしょうね。

engChrName: They must have an idea of what that retribution will look like—and a way to counter it.
engSearchText:
They must have an idea of what that retribution will
look like—and a way to counter it.
jpnChrName: 報復すら折り込み済みなら それを見越した次の手も……
jpnSearchText:
報復すら折り込み済みなら
それを見越した次の手も……

engChrName: Yeah, I've seen traps like these before.
engSearchText: Yeah, I've seen traps like these before.
jpnChrName: はい……戦場でも 幾つか使われる戦術です。
jpnSearchText:
はい……戦場でも
幾つか使われる戦術です。

engChrName: I see there's no need for me to explain further.
engSearchText: I see there's no need for me to explain further.
jpnChrName: フフ……無駄な 説明をせずに済んで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……無駄な
説明をせずに済んで何よりだ。

engChrName: However, I must append one note—a warning: leave this city by dawn tomorrow.
engSearchText:
However, I must append one note—a warning: leave
this city by dawn tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 最後に一つ忠告しよう── 明日未明までに煌都を離れるがよい。
jpnSearchText:
最後に一つ忠告しよう──
明日未明までに煌都を離れるがよい。

engChrName: So that's when you're settin' loose your shadow warriors, huh?
engSearchText:
So that's when you're settin' loose your shadow
warriors, huh?
jpnChrName: ……噂の“裏”の使い手か。
jpnSearchText: ……噂の“裏”の使い手か。

engChrName: I hear you didn't even send 'em out when you were beefing with the Red Constellation.
engSearchText:
I hear you didn't even send 'em out when you were
beefing with the Red Constellation.
jpnChrName: 《星座》の襲撃時すら温存していた 虎の子を繰り出すとはな。
jpnSearchText:
《星座》の襲撃時すら温存していた
虎の子を繰り出すとはな。

engChrName: You are remarkably well informed. That altercation was simply a consequence of another family's poor decisions.
engSearchText:
You are remarkably well informed. That altercation
was simply a consequence of another family's
poor decisions.
jpnChrName: クク、よく知っておる── あれは他家が下手を打っただけよ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、よく知っておる──
あれは他家が下手を打っただけよ。

engChrName: Had Cao failed to quell the incursion, our shadows would have been released without a second thought.
engSearchText:
Had Cao failed to quell the incursion, our shadows
would have been released without a second thought.
jpnChrName: ツァオが手打ちをしくじっていたら 容赦なく放っていた所だったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ツァオが手打ちをしくじっていたら
容赦なく放っていた所だったわ。

engChrName: Lucky for everyone that jaegers have more sense than Almata, I guess.
engSearchText:
Lucky for everyone that jaegers have more sense than
Almata, I guess.
jpnChrName: そりゃ良かった──かの団が アルマータよりまだ理性的でよ。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ良かった──かの団が
アルマータよりまだ理性的でよ。

engChrName: I am beginning to understand what Cao sees in you. Perhaps I will enlist your services again one day.
engSearchText:
I am beginning to understand what Cao sees in you.
Perhaps I will enlist your services again one day.
jpnChrName: フフ、流石ツァオが見込んだ男。 此度はともあれ、いずれ声を掛けよう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、流石ツァオが見込んだ男。
此度はともあれ、いずれ声を掛けよう。

engChrName: With that, I bid you farewell. Fair travels on your return to the capital.
engSearchText:
With that, I bid you farewell. Fair travels on your
return to the capital.
jpnChrName: ──それではな。 精々、生きて首都へ戻るがよい。
jpnSearchText:
──それではな。
精々、生きて首都へ戻るがよい。

engChrName: Wh-Why didn't you warn us they were here?!
engSearchText: Wh-Why didn't you warn us they were here?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、呼んでたなら一言言ってよ！？
jpnSearchText: ちょ、呼んでたなら一言言ってよ！？

engChrName: ...Got one last question for you, old man.
engSearchText: ...Got one last question for you, old man.
jpnChrName: ──ところでアンタ、 随分あの跳ねっ返りに冷たいな？
jpnSearchText:
──ところでアンタ、
随分あの跳ねっ返りに冷たいな？

engChrName: What's with the cold shoulder to the kid? He's been sulkin' about it.
engSearchText:
What's with the cold shoulder to the kid? He's been
sulkin' about it.
jpnChrName: アイツの方は拗ねてたぜ？
jpnSearchText: アイツの方は拗ねてたぜ？

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.

engChrName: Simply put, Heiyue is a complex organization.
engSearchText: Simply put, Heiyue is a complex organization.
jpnChrName: まあ色々あるのよ、我ら黒月にもな。
jpnSearchText: まあ色々あるのよ、我ら黒月にもな。

engChrName: This crisis presents an opportunity to let external woes reveal internal wounds.
engSearchText:
This crisis presents an opportunity to let external
woes reveal internal wounds.
jpnChrName: ──此度の一件、外禍を通じ 内患を見定める機会でもあろう。
jpnSearchText:
──此度の一件、外禍を通じ
内患を見定める機会でもあろう。

engChrName: Perhaps you will understand this, too, in due time.
engSearchText: Perhaps you will understand this, too, in due time.
jpnChrName: その気ならヌシも見極めてみるがよい。
jpnSearchText: その気ならヌシも見極めてみるがよい。

engChrName: Well, if the elders say we aren't acting today, then that's that.
engSearchText:
Well, if the elders say we aren't acting today, then
that's that.
jpnChrName: ──聞いた通り、 まだ黒月（私たち）が動く時ではない。
jpnSearchText:
──聞いた通り、
まだ黒月（私たち）が動く時ではない。

engChrName: I'll leave it up to you to decide how and to what degree you investigate last night's tragedy.
engSearchText:
I'll leave it up to you to decide how and to what
degree you investigate last night's tragedy.
jpnChrName: 昨夜の事件の調査も含めて、 どう動くかは君たちに任せるよ。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜の事件の調査も含めて、
どう動くかは君たちに任せるよ。

engChrName: My only request is that you look out for Aaron as much as possible.
engSearchText:
My only request is that you look out for Aaron as
much as possible.
jpnChrName: ただ……アーロンは なるべくフォローしてあげて欲しい。
jpnSearchText:
ただ……アーロンは
なるべくフォローしてあげて欲しい。

engChrName: I feel the same. His friends were like family to him.
engSearchText: I feel the same. His friends were like family to him.
jpnChrName: あいつは……仲間たちのことを 本当の家族のように思っていて……
jpnSearchText:
あいつは……仲間たちのことを
本当の家族のように思っていて……

engChrName: He'll be willing to pay any price to avenge them.
engSearchText: He'll be willing to pay any price to avenge them.
jpnChrName: その敵討ちのためなら、きっとどんな 代償も躊躇うことはないでしょうね……
jpnSearchText:
その敵討ちのためなら、きっとどんな
代償も躊躇うことはないでしょうね……

engChrName: That makes sense. He was overtaken with rage before.
engSearchText:
That makes sense. He was overtaken with
rage before.
jpnChrName: ……あの怒りは 尋常ではありませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
……あの怒りは
尋常ではありませんでした。

engChrName: I'm worried about him being out there on his own.
engSearchText: I'm worried about him being out there on his own.
jpnChrName: はい…… ちょっと放っておけません。
jpnSearchText:
はい……
ちょっと放っておけません。

engChrName: Speakin' of worried, I'm gettin' worried about you gettin' back to Edith on time.
engSearchText:
Speakin' of worried, I'm gettin' worried about you
gettin' back to Edith on time.
jpnChrName: ったく、心配っつうならお前もだろ。 とっとと首都に帰ったらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
ったく、心配っつうならお前もだろ。
とっとと首都に帰ったらどうだ？

engChrName: If you don't make it back in time, a certain bracer's gonna bite my head off.
engSearchText:
If you don't make it back in time, a certain bracer's
gonna bite my head off.
jpnChrName: 俺がエレインにどやされるんだが。
jpnSearchText: 俺がエレインにどやされるんだが。

engChrName: Sorry, but please let me stay until the end of the day.
engSearchText: Sorry, but please let me stay until the end of the day.
jpnChrName: それは……すみません。 今日一杯は付き合わせて下さい。
jpnSearchText:
それは……すみません。
今日一杯は付き合わせて下さい。

engChrName: There's something on my mind that I need to see through.
engSearchText:
There's something on my mind that I need to
see through.
jpnChrName: “あの件”もありますし……
jpnSearchText: “あの件”もありますし……

engChrName: Figures. All right, you've got till the last train tonight. No more extensions.
engSearchText:
Figures. All right, you've got till the last train tonight.
No more extensions.
jpnChrName: ハン……いずれにせよ 今日の夜行までがデッドラインだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……いずれにせよ
今日の夜行までがデッドラインだ。

engChrName: I understand.
engSearchText: I understand.
jpnChrName: はい、分かっています。
jpnSearchText: はい、分かっています。

engChrName: Do be careful, everyone. If you need support, we'll do what we can.
engSearchText:
Do be careful, everyone. If you need support, we'll do
what we can.
jpnChrName: お嬢さんたちもくれぐれも気をつけて。 こちらも出来る限りの便宜を図ろう。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢さんたちもくれぐれも気をつけて。
こちらも出来る限りの便宜を図ろう。

engChrName: I'm counting on you, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: I'm counting on you, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: それでは頼んだよ、アークライド君。
jpnSearchText: それでは頼んだよ、アークライド君。

engChrName: Aaron's in your hands now.
engSearchText: Aaron's in your hands now.
jpnChrName: アーロンのことをお願いね。
jpnSearchText: アーロンのことをお願いね。

engChrName: So long as it's the kinda work a spriggan like me can do, I'll see this through.
engSearchText:
So long as it's the kinda work a spriggan like me can
do, I'll see this through.
jpnChrName: ああ──つっても 裏解決屋としての範囲内でな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──つっても
裏解決屋としての範囲内でな。

engChrName: All right. Bet you already know the game plan for today, right?
engSearchText:
All right. Bet you already know the game plan for
today, right?
jpnChrName: さて──今日の方針だが、 分かっているな？
jpnSearchText:
さて──今日の方針だが、
分かっているな？

engChrName: First, we need to investigate what happened last night—in particular, where that strange fog came from.
engSearchText:
First, we need to investigate what happened last
night—in particular, where that strange fog
came from.
jpnChrName: まずは昨夜の事件の調査、ですね。 特に“霧”の原因が気になります。
jpnSearchText:
まずは昨夜の事件の調査、ですね。
特に“霧”の原因が気になります。

engChrName: It's possible there is a Genesis involved.
engSearchText: It's possible there is a Genesis involved.
jpnChrName: ……やはり《ゲネシス》とも 関係しているかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
……やはり《ゲネシス》とも
関係しているかもしれません。

engChrName: We need to track down Aaron, too.
engSearchText: We need to track down Aaron, too.
jpnChrName: それとアーロンさんの行方ですね。
jpnSearchText: それとアーロンさんの行方ですね。

engChrName: For all we know, he's already charged headfirst into the enemy base.
engSearchText:
For all we know, he's already charged headfirst into
the enemy base.
jpnChrName: 恐らく犯人──今の所《アルマータ》の 可能性が一番高そうですが──
jpnSearchText:
恐らく犯人──今の所《アルマータ》の
可能性が一番高そうですが──

engChrName: That enemy likely being Almata.
engSearchText: That enemy likely being Almata.
jpnChrName: その本拠地に突入した可能性もありそうです。
jpnSearchText: その本拠地に突入した可能性もありそうです。

engChrName: Not bad. You got all the big stuff.
engSearchText: Not bad. You got all the big stuff.
jpnChrName: 上出来だ、その二つで合ってる。
jpnSearchText: 上出来だ、その二つで合ってる。

engChrName: While we work on the information gatherin', we'll knock out any other small tasks that come our way.
engSearchText:
While we work on the information gatherin', we'll
knock out any other small tasks that come our way.
jpnChrName: とりあえずは情報収集だな。 必要なら４ｓｐｇにも対応していく。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえずは情報収集だな。
必要なら４ｓｐｇにも対応していく。

engChrName: I wanna check in with Jack, too. And we may as well hit up the cops and the guild while we're at it.
engSearchText:
I wanna check in with Jack, too. And we may as well
hit up the cops and the guild while we're at it.
jpnChrName: ジャックからの続報も聞きたいし、 ギルドや警察のネタも知りたい所だ。
jpnSearchText:
ジャックからの続報も聞きたいし、
ギルドや警察のネタも知りたい所だ。

engChrName: Long story short, we've gotta roll with the punches.
engSearchText: Long story short, we've gotta roll with the punches.
jpnChrName: 臨機応変に動いて行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: 臨機応変に動いて行くぞ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はい！
jpnSearchText: はい！

engChrName: Hey, Jack. You got a sec?
engSearchText: Hey, Jack. You got a sec?
jpnChrName: ジャック、聞きたい事がある。
jpnSearchText: ジャック、聞きたい事がある。

engChrName: Well, look who decided to drop by.
engSearchText: Well, look who decided to drop by.
jpnChrName: ……いきなりだな。
jpnSearchText: ……いきなりだな。

engChrName: Been a little busy, as you might imagine. Let's get straight to it.
engSearchText:
Been a little busy, as you might imagine. Let's get
straight to it.
jpnChrName: こういう状況だからな。 時間がない、本題に入るぞ。
jpnSearchText:
こういう状況だからな。
時間がない、本題に入るぞ。

engChrName: A big warehouse was rented out the same day the Messeldam Trading Company moved in across town.
engSearchText:
A big warehouse was rented out the same day the
Messeldam Trading Company moved in across town.
jpnChrName: ──《メッセルダム商事》と同じ日に 契約が結ばれた港湾区の大型倉庫……
jpnSearchText:
──《メッセルダム商事》と同じ日に
契約が結ばれた港湾区の大型倉庫……

engChrName: I wanna know where it is, and who the renter is.
engSearchText: I wanna know where it is, and who the renter is.
jpnChrName: その場所と、借主の名前が知りたい。
jpnSearchText: その場所と、借主の名前が知りたい。

engChrName: Had a feelin' this might happen.
engSearchText: Had a feelin' this might happen.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりか。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱりか。

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?
jpnChrName: なに……？
jpnSearchText: なに……？

engChrName: Aaron asked us the exact same thing this morning.
engSearchText: Aaron asked us the exact same thing this morning.
jpnChrName: ──実は今朝、アーロンから 同じことを聞かれたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──実は今朝、アーロンから
同じことを聞かれたぜ。

engChrName: He told us not to mention his visit, but since you know so much, there's no point hiding it now.
engSearchText:
He told us not to mention his visit, but since you
know so much, there's no point hiding it now.
jpnChrName: 本当は口止めされたんだけど…… ここまで追いつかれたらもう同じよね。
jpnSearchText:
本当は口止めされたんだけど……
ここまで追いつかれたらもう同じよね。

engChrName: He was here?!
engSearchText: He was here?!
jpnChrName: アーロンさんが……！
jpnSearchText: アーロンさんが……！

engChrName: We've finally found his trail!
engSearchText: We've finally found his trail!
jpnChrName: ついに辿り着きましたね……！
jpnSearchText: ついに辿り着きましたね……！

engChrName: As for the place, I started payin' attention when the realtor went belly up under suspicious circumstances.
engSearchText:
As for the place, I started payin' attention when the
realtor went belly up under suspicious circumstances.
jpnChrName: ……俺がそのネタに気付いたのは とある不動産業者が変死した事からだ。
jpnSearchText:
……俺がそのネタに気付いたのは
とある不動産業者が変死した事からだ。

engChrName: That was about three weeks ago—around the end of August.
engSearchText:
That was about three weeks ago—around the end
of August.
jpnChrName: ８月末──３週間くらい前だな。
jpnSearchText: ８月末──３週間くらい前だな。

engChrName: Keepin' track of these kinda things is a side business of mine, so I kept my ears open and got a list of the realtor's other properties.
engSearchText:
Keepin' track of these kinda things is a side business
of mine, so I kept my ears open and got a list of the
realtor's other properties.
jpnChrName: あくまで副業の一環でそいつの周辺を洗って 最近の取引物件なんかも控えてたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで副業の一環でそいつの周辺を洗って
最近の取引物件なんかも控えてたんだが。

engChrName: Imagine my shock noticin' the guy croaked the same day Messeldam Trading Company moved in.
engSearchText:
Imagine my shock noticin' the guy croaked the same
day Messeldam Trading Company moved in.
jpnChrName: まさかそれが《メッセルダム商事》と 同じ日に借りられてたなんてね……
jpnSearchText:
まさかそれが《メッセルダム商事》と
同じ日に借りられてたなんてね……

engChrName: The place was rented out by another realtor, so I didn't put the pieces together until our red-headed friend came knocking.
engSearchText:
The place was rented out by another realtor, so I
didn't put the pieces together until our red-headed
friend came knocking.
jpnChrName: 業者も別だし、アーロンに言われるまで 私たちも気付かなかったよ。
jpnSearchText:
業者も別だし、アーロンに言われるまで
私たちも気付かなかったよ。

engChrName: So Aaron's been following the same line of logic as we have.
engSearchText:
So Aaron's been following the same line of logic as
we have.
jpnChrName: では、アーロンさんも同じ線を……
jpnSearchText: では、アーロンさんも同じ線を……

engChrName: And the realtor did end up being silenced after all...
engSearchText: And the realtor did end up being silenced after all...
jpnChrName: ……それと やっぱり不動産業者の方は……
jpnSearchText:
……それと
やっぱり不動産業者の方は……

engChrName: So c'mon. Where is it? And who rented it?
engSearchText: So c'mon. Where is it? And who rented it?
jpnChrName: ──で、借主と倉庫の場所は？
jpnSearchText: ──で、借主と倉庫の場所は？

engChrName: Startin' with question two, it was rented by the 'Tharbad Transportation Company.'
engSearchText:
Startin' with question two, it was rented by the
'Tharbad Transportation Company.'
jpnChrName: ああ…… まず借主は《サルバッド通運》だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
まず借主は《サルバッド通運》だ。

engChrName: Tharbad? As in the city in southeast Calvard?
engSearchText: Tharbad? As in the city in southeast Calvard?
jpnChrName: サルバッドというと…… カルバードの南東部にある？
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドというと……
カルバードの南東部にある？

engChrName: That's right. Some call it the gate to the Central East. It makes sense that you're familiar with it.
engSearchText:
That's right. Some call it the gate to the Central East.
It makes sense that you're familiar with it.
jpnChrName: ええ、大陸中東部への 玄関口でもある街ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、大陸中東部への
玄関口でもある街ですけど……

engChrName: Another generic company name, huh? Bet this one's a dummy, too.
engSearchText:
Another generic company name, huh? Bet this one's a
dummy, too.
jpnChrName: また妙な名前が出てきたな。 ……いや、当然それも偽名か。
jpnSearchText:
また妙な名前が出てきたな。
……いや、当然それも偽名か。

engChrName: Probably. When I looked into it, there were no records of a company registered with that name.
engSearchText:
Probably. When I looked into it, there were no records
of a company registered with that name.
jpnChrName: うん、調べてみたらそんな会社、 どこにも登録されていなくてね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、調べてみたらそんな会社、
どこにも登録されていなくてね。

engChrName: I never did figure out why they picked Tharbad of all places, though.
engSearchText:
I never did figure out why they picked Tharbad of all
places, though.
jpnChrName: サルバッドっていう名前に 何の意味があるかは分からないけど。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドっていう名前に
何の意味があるかは分からないけど。

engChrName: Coulda chose with a map and a dartboard for all we know. Anyway, back to question one.
engSearchText:
Coulda chose with a map and a dartboard for all
we know. Anyway, back to question one.
jpnChrName: 適当かもしれねぇしな。 ──それと肝心の倉庫の場所だが。
jpnSearchText:
適当かもしれねぇしな。
──それと肝心の倉庫の場所だが。

engChrName: Lemme send the location to your Xipha.
engSearchText: Lemme send the location to your Xipha.
jpnChrName: ザイファを出せ、位置を送ってやる。
jpnSearchText: ザイファを出せ、位置を送ってやる。

engChrName: Heh. Ain't you prepared.
engSearchText: Heh. Ain't you prepared.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、用意周到じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、用意周到じゃねえか。

engChrName: Hold on. It's at the wharf right next to New Town!
engSearchText:
Hold on. It's at the wharf right next to
New Town!
jpnChrName: って、新市街を抜けた先の 波止場の近くじゃねえか……！？
jpnSearchText:
って、新市街を抜けた先の
波止場の近くじゃねえか……！？

engChrName: Really?!
engSearchText: Really?!
jpnChrName: 本当ですかっ……！？
jpnSearchText: 本当ですかっ……！？

engChrName: Hmm. We haven't been there today...
engSearchText: Hmm. We haven't been there today...
jpnChrName: きょ、今日はまだ あちらには行ってませんが……
jpnSearchText:
きょ、今日はまだ
あちらには行ってませんが……

engChrName: ...but I don't remember seeing anything strange the last time we were there.
engSearchText:
...but I don't remember seeing anything strange the
last time we were there.
jpnChrName: さっき立ち寄った際には 気づきませんでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
さっき立ち寄った際には
気づきませんでしたが……

engChrName: All right. Let's get a move on.
engSearchText: All right. Let's get a move on.
jpnChrName: よし── とにかく行ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
よし──
とにかく行ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Aye, aye!
engSearchText: Aye, aye!
jpnChrName: はいっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！

engChrName: Thank you both for your help!
engSearchText: Thank you both for your help!
jpnChrName: ジャックさん、ハルさんも ありがとうございました……！
jpnSearchText:
ジャックさん、ハルさんも
ありがとうございました……！

engChrName: I hesitated about tellin' you guys, to be honest.
engSearchText: I hesitated about tellin' you guys, to be honest.
jpnChrName: いや……俺も迷ったんだがな。
jpnSearchText: いや……俺も迷ったんだがな。

engChrName: Aaron moved like a man possessed when he was here. Given what happened, I can't really blame him.
engSearchText:
Aaron moved like a man possessed when he was here.
Given what happened, I can't really blame him.
jpnChrName: アーロン……無理もないけど かなり思い詰めてる様子だった。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン……無理もないけど
かなり思い詰めてる様子だった。

engChrName: Please help him through all this if you can.
engSearchText: Please help him through all this if you can.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、アニエスにフェリも できれば彼の力になってあげて？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、アニエスにフェリも
できれば彼の力になってあげて？

engChrName: That's the plan. The Lu family already requested the same thing.
engSearchText:
That's the plan. The Lu family already requested the
same thing.
jpnChrName: ああ、ルウ家にも頼まれてるしな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ルウ家にも頼まれてるしな。

engChrName: We want to help him, too, of course.
engSearchText: We want to help him, too, of course.
jpnChrName: それに、放っておけませんから。
jpnSearchText: それに、放っておけませんから。

engChrName: You can count on us!
engSearchText: You can count on us!
jpnChrName: わたしたちも力を尽くします！
jpnSearchText: わたしたちも力を尽くします！

engChrName: September 21st, 3:05PM
engSearchText: September 21st, 3:05PM

engChrName: I hope Aaron's going to be all right...
engSearchText: I hope Aaron's going to be all right...
jpnChrName: アーロンさん、大丈夫でしょうか……
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん、大丈夫でしょうか……

engChrName: The doctor said his life isn't in danger, at least.
engSearchText: The doctor said his life isn't in danger, at least.
jpnChrName: ……先生のお話だと、 命の危険はないとのことです。
jpnSearchText:
……先生のお話だと、
命の危険はないとのことです。

engChrName: He's going to need to stay off his feet for a while, though.
engSearchText:
He's going to need to stay off his feet for a
while, though.
jpnChrName: しばらく安静にしておく 必要はありそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
しばらく安静にしておく
必要はありそうですけど……

engChrName: Thank you for bringing him back.
engSearchText: Thank you for bringing him back.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、ヴァンさんたち。 アーロンを連れ帰ってくれて……
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、ヴァンさんたち。
アーロンを連れ帰ってくれて……

engChrName: Wish he was a little less battered and bruised.
engSearchText: Wish he was a little less battered and bruised.
jpnChrName: ま、あのザマだがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、あのザマだがな。

engChrName: What's important is that he's still alive.
engSearchText: What's important is that he's still alive.
jpnChrName: ううん、生きて帰ってきてくれただけでも……
jpnSearchText: ううん、生きて帰ってきてくれただけでも……

engChrName: Left to his own devices, he would've just kept fighting even if it cost him his life.
engSearchText:
Left to his own devices, he would've just kept fighting
even if it cost him his life.
jpnChrName: あのバカのことだから、返り討ちに遭っても 最後まで退かなかっただろうし……
jpnSearchText:
あのバカのことだから、返り討ちに遭っても
最後まで退かなかっただろうし……

engChrName: *sigh* I knew he was a firebrand, but maybe he's just plain reckless.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I knew he was a firebrand, but maybe he's just
plain reckless.
jpnChrName: ……ったく、危なっかしいヤツとは 知ってたがここまでだったとは……
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、危なっかしいヤツとは
知ってたがここまでだったとは……

engChrName: If the circumstances were any different, I think he'd have been more levelheaded.
engSearchText:
If the circumstances were any different, I think he'd
have been more levelheaded.
jpnChrName: うん……いつものアーロンなら もう少し冷静に判断できると思ったよ。
jpnSearchText:
うん……いつものアーロンなら
もう少し冷静に判断できると思ったよ。

engChrName: Yeah. This just goes to show how important his friends were to him...
engSearchText:
Yeah. This just goes to show how important his
friends were to him...
jpnChrName: それは……それだけセイたちが 大切だったってことだと思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
それは……それだけセイたちが
大切だったってことだと思うけど……

engChrName: Either way, looks like an all-out war between Heiyue and Almata is inevitable now.
engSearchText:
Either way, looks like an all-out war between Heiyue
and Almata is inevitable now.
jpnChrName: ……ヤツのことはともかく、 これで全面戦争が確定したみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
……ヤツのことはともかく、
これで全面戦争が確定したみたいだな。

engChrName: And both sides are ready to throw down!
engSearchText: And both sides are ready to throw down!
jpnChrName: 黒月は勿論、アルマータの幹部どもも 本気でやり合うつもりらしい。
jpnSearchText:
黒月は勿論、アルマータの幹部どもも
本気でやり合うつもりらしい。

engChrName: Those people we fought in the warehouse were strong, but do they really stand a chance against Heiyue?
engSearchText:
Those people we fought in the warehouse were
strong, but do they really stand a chance
against Heiyue?
jpnChrName: 確かに恐るべき腕前みたいでしたが それでも黒月に敵うのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
確かに恐るべき腕前みたいでしたが
それでも黒月に敵うのでしょうか？

engChrName: I still can't believe they'd do...that to their own people...
engSearchText:
I still can't believe they'd do...that to their
own people...
jpnChrName: ……そうですね…… 配下の人たちもあんな風にして……
jpnSearchText:
……そうですね……
配下の人たちもあんな風にして……

engChrName: Normally, I'd say hell no. Heiyue's got too much of an upper hand on their home turf.
engSearchText:
Normally, I'd say hell no. Heiyue's got too much of
an upper hand on their home turf.
jpnChrName: 普通に考えれば無理だろう。 煌都における黒月の戦力は圧倒的だ。
jpnSearchText:
普通に考えれば無理だろう。
煌都における黒月の戦力は圧倒的だ。

engChrName: Meaning A's gotta have an ace up their sleeve.
engSearchText: Meaning A's gotta have an ace up their sleeve.
jpnChrName: だとすると、不確定要素である 《銀》の存在すら折り込み済みで──
jpnSearchText:
だとすると、不確定要素である
《銀》の存在すら折り込み済みで──

engChrName: Something that's got them believin' they can take down Heiyue even with Yin in the fray.
engSearchText:
Something that's got them believin' they can take
down Heiyue even with Yin in the fray.
jpnChrName: その上でなお“勝算”があると 連中が見込んでいることになる。
jpnSearchText:
その上でなお“勝算”があると
連中が見込んでいることになる。

engChrName: What're you thinkin'? That weird fog? Or is it somethin' else?
engSearchText:
What're you thinkin'? That weird fog? Or is it
somethin' else?
jpnChrName: 何らかの切り札（ジョーカー）── さしずめ昨日の“霧”か……？
jpnSearchText:
何らかの切り札（ジョーカー）──
さしずめ昨日の“霧”か……？

engChrName: Who knows.
engSearchText: Who knows.
jpnChrName: ま、それは分からんが。
jpnSearchText: ま、それは分からんが。

engChrName: Either way, we can't drag you into this any further.
engSearchText: Either way, we can't drag you into this any further.
jpnChrName: ……いずれにせよ、貴方たちを これ以上は付き合わせられないわね。
jpnSearchText:
……いずれにせよ、貴方たちを
これ以上は付き合わせられないわね。

engChrName: Once the fighting begins, Heiyue will hunt Almata to their last without a shred of mercy.
engSearchText:
Once the fighting begins, Heiyue will hunt Almata to
their last without a shred of mercy.
jpnChrName: いざ黒月（ウチ）が動き始めたら徹底的に 一切の容赦なく彼らを狩り立てると思う。
jpnSearchText:
いざ黒月（ウチ）が動き始めたら徹底的に
一切の容赦なく彼らを狩り立てると思う。

engChrName: Neither the police nor the guild will be able to intervene—and unfortunately, there will be casualties.
engSearchText:
Neither the police nor the guild will be able to
intervene—and unfortunately, there will be casualties.
jpnChrName: 警察にもギルドにも止められないし、 かなりの犠牲が伴うでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
警察にもギルドにも止められないし、
かなりの犠牲が伴うでしょう。

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...

engChrName: At the very least, I'd wager Fan'll be thinkin' about the common folk. Can't say the same about Gien, though.
engSearchText:
At the very least, I'd wager Fan'll be thinkin' about
the common folk. Can't say the same about
Gien, though.
jpnChrName: ま、ギエン老はともかくファン大人は 町の衆のことは考えてそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ギエン老はともかくファン大人は
町の衆のことは考えてそうだしな。

engChrName: The cops and the guild will be on the case, so I'd say your role in all this is over.
engSearchText:
The cops and the guild will be on the case, so I'd say
your role in all this is over.
jpnChrName: ギルドや警察も最低限は動くだろうし お前らの出る幕じゃなくなるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドや警察も最低限は動くだろうし
お前らの出る幕じゃなくなるだろう。

engChrName: Why not call it a trip and head on home?
engSearchText: Why not call it a trip and head on home?
jpnChrName: ここらが潮時なんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: ここらが潮時なんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Jack...
engSearchText: Jack...
jpnChrName: ジャック……
jpnSearchText: ジャック……

engChrName: You've got a point, I guess. Outta work reasons for stayin'.
engSearchText:
You've got a point, I guess. Outta work reasons
for stayin'.
jpnChrName: ハン……まあ裏解決屋としての 足場が消えちまったのは確かか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……まあ裏解決屋としての
足場が消えちまったのは確かか。

engChrName: Our other business 'round here can wait till this mess blows over.
engSearchText:
Our other business 'round here can wait till this mess
blows over.
jpnChrName: “別件”についてもゴタゴタが 片付いてから探る手もありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
“別件”についてもゴタゴタが
片付いてから探る手もありそうだ。

engChrName: Though, it'll just have to be me and Feri.
engSearchText: Though, it'll just have to be me and Feri.
jpnChrName: 無論、俺とフェリだけでな。
jpnSearchText: 無論、俺とフェリだけでな。

engChrName: Ah. I suppose so...
engSearchText: Ah. I suppose so...
jpnChrName: ……はい。
jpnSearchText: ……はい。

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: Then how about I give you a reason to stick around?
engSearchText: Then how about I give you a reason to stick around?
jpnChrName: ならその“足場”…… 俺が用意してやるよ……
jpnSearchText:
ならその“足場”……
俺が用意してやるよ……

engChrName: I've got a job for you, spriggan!
engSearchText: I've got a job for you, spriggan!
jpnChrName: 依頼だ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）──！
jpnSearchText: 依頼だ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）──！

engChrName: Aaron?!
engSearchText: Aaron?!
jpnChrName: アーロン、目を覚ましたの！？
jpnSearchText: アーロン、目を覚ましたの！？

engChrName: You shouldn't be out of bed yet—your wounds may reopen!
engSearchText:
You shouldn't be out of bed yet—your wounds
may reopen!
jpnChrName: む、無茶しちゃダメだって……！
jpnSearchText: む、無茶しちゃダメだって……！

engChrName: I don't have time to sit around and feel sorry for myself.
engSearchText:
I don't have time to sit around and feel sorry
for myself.
jpnChrName: ……黒月もアルマータも 腹に一物二物あるみてぇだ……
jpnSearchText:
……黒月もアルマータも
腹に一物二物あるみてぇだ……

engChrName: Almata and Heiyue are up to some shit. My friends are dead 'cause of it.
engSearchText:
Almata and Heiyue are up to some shit.
My friends are dead 'cause of it.
jpnChrName: だがオレは認めねえ！　あいつらが死んだってのに 下らねえ駆け引きなんざッ！
jpnSearchText:
だがオレは認めねえ！　あいつらが死んだってのに
下らねえ駆け引きなんざッ！

engChrName: I couldn't avenge them on my own.
engSearchText: I couldn't avenge them on my own.
jpnChrName: だが俺はどこまでも半端モンだ……
jpnSearchText: だが俺はどこまでも半端モンだ……

engChrName: All I have to show for my efforts are some new scars.
engSearchText: All I have to show for my efforts are some new scars.
jpnChrName: イキがって一人で突っ込んで 挙句の果てに返り討ちに遭って……
jpnSearchText:
イキがって一人で突っ込んで
挙句の果てに返り討ちに遭って……

engChrName: If I'd just teamed up with you, maybe my friends would still be alive.
engSearchText:
If I'd just teamed up with you, maybe my friends
would still be alive.
jpnChrName: さっきだってアンタと共闘してりゃあ 連中に食い下がれたかもしれねえ……！
jpnSearchText:
さっきだってアンタと共闘してりゃあ
連中に食い下がれたかもしれねえ……！

engChrName: Those thugs in the warehouse, too.
engSearchText: Those thugs in the warehouse, too.
jpnChrName: ……あの半グレ共も あんな終わり方をさせることなく──
jpnSearchText:
……あの半グレ共も
あんな終わり方をさせることなく──

engChrName: They could've atoned and made something of their lives.
engSearchText:
They could've atoned and made something of
their lives.
jpnChrName: 生かしたまま落とし前だって 付けさせられたかもしれねえ……！！
jpnSearchText:
生かしたまま落とし前だって
付けさせられたかもしれねえ……！！
……あ………

engChrName: Aaron...
engSearchText: Aaron...
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……

engChrName: What do I have to say to convince you?!
engSearchText: What do I have to say to convince you?!
jpnChrName: アンタ、裏解決屋なんだろ……？
jpnSearchText: アンタ、裏解決屋なんだろ……？

engChrName: Mom loved this town so much. And so did my friends...
engSearchText:
Mom loved this town so much. And so did
my friends...
jpnChrName: あいつらが……オフクロが愛した この街のモヤを晴らすためにも……
jpnSearchText:
あいつらが……オフクロが愛した
この街のモヤを晴らすためにも……

engChrName: So please! Help me kick those bastards out of our town and make things right!
engSearchText:
So please! Help me kick those bastards out of our
town and make things right!
jpnChrName: 頼む──ヤツらをこの手で 追い払うのを手伝ってくれねえか！？
jpnSearchText:
頼む──ヤツらをこの手で
追い払うのを手伝ってくれねえか！？

engChrName: Oh, Aaron...
engSearchText: Oh, Aaron...
jpnChrName: アーロン……
jpnSearchText: アーロン……

engChrName: Finally dropping the pride, huh?
engSearchText: Finally dropping the pride, huh?
jpnChrName: ったく…… やっと素直になりやがって。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
やっと素直になりやがって。

engChrName: I've got one condition.
engSearchText: I've got one condition.
jpnChrName: ──条件がある。
jpnSearchText: ──条件がある。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: 条件……だと？
jpnSearchText: 条件……だと？

engChrName: We ain't killing anyone.
engSearchText: We ain't killing anyone.
jpnChrName: ああ、殺しは無しだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、殺しは無しだ。

engChrName: Goes for that pair of Almata execs, too. We either force 'em to retreat, or hand 'em over to Heiyue.
engSearchText:
Goes for that pair of Almata execs, too. We either
force 'em to retreat, or hand 'em over to Heiyue.
jpnChrName: あの幹部どもも、完全撤退させるか、 黒月に引き渡すだけにしろ。
jpnSearchText:
あの幹部どもも、完全撤退させるか、
黒月に引き渡すだけにしろ。

engChrName: You've gotta be kidding me!
engSearchText: You've gotta be kidding me!
jpnChrName: ッ…… 仇討ちも許さねえってのか！？
jpnSearchText:
ッ……
仇討ちも許さねえってのか！？

engChrName: If you were a member of Heiyue, I wouldn't stop you.
engSearchText: If you were a member of Heiyue, I wouldn't stop you.
jpnChrName: 黒月入りしてるなら止めねえよ。 手伝いもしないがな。
jpnSearchText:
黒月入りしてるなら止めねえよ。
手伝いもしないがな。

engChrName: But right now, you're just a nobody.
engSearchText: But right now, you're just a nobody.
jpnChrName: だがお前は何者でもねぇ。
jpnSearchText: だがお前は何者でもねぇ。

engChrName: Ain't gonna let a kid who's still findin' his way become a murderer.
engSearchText:
Ain't gonna let a kid who's still findin' his way
become a murderer.
jpnChrName: ケツの定まってねえガキの手を 染めさせるのは流儀じゃないんでな。
jpnSearchText:
ケツの定まってねえガキの手を
染めさせるのは流儀じゃないんでな。

jpnChrName: ッッ……！
jpnSearchText: ッッ……！

jpnChrName: （ヴァンさん……）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァンさん……）

engChrName: (Even with stakes this high, he never really changes, does he?)
engSearchText:
(Even with stakes this high, he never really changes,
does he?)
jpnChrName: （……やっぱりヴァンさんは   ヴァンさんですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（……やっぱりヴァンさんは
ヴァンさんですね……）

engChrName: Fine. I accept your condition!
engSearchText: Fine. I accept your condition!
jpnChrName: ……分かった。 どうか頼む──！！
jpnSearchText:
……分かった。
どうか頼む──！！

engChrName: I'll try to figure out what Heiyue is planning— though, I may not be able to do much.
engSearchText:
I'll try to figure out what Heiyue is planning—
though, I may not be able to do much.
jpnChrName: ……あたしは爸爸（パパ）たちの動きを探ってみる。 無駄かもしれないけど爷爷（イェイェ）も。
jpnSearchText:
……あたしは爸爸（パパ）たちの動きを探ってみる。
無駄かもしれないけど爷爷（イェイェ）も。

engChrName: We'll poke around and see if our contacts know anything.
engSearchText:
We'll poke around and see if our contacts
know anything.
jpnChrName: こっちも裏のツテで情報を集めてみるよ。
jpnSearchText: こっちも裏のツテで情報を集めてみるよ。

engChrName: Don't plan on us swoopin' in to save you, all right?
engSearchText: Don't plan on us swoopin' in to save you, all right?
jpnChrName: ま、あんま期待すんなよ？
jpnSearchText: ま、あんま期待すんなよ？

engChrName: Heh. I know better than to bet on you.
engSearchText: Heh. I know better than to bet on you.
jpnChrName: ああ、所詮は副業、 期待半分にしておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、所詮は副業、
期待半分にしておくぜ。

engChrName: Listen, Aaron.
engSearchText: Listen, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロン──
jpnSearchText: アーロン──

engChrName: I know that if Auntie Yuefa were here, she'd let you go fight those monsters.
engSearchText:
I know that if Auntie Yuefa were here, she'd let you
go fight those monsters.
jpnChrName: 無茶するなとは言わないけど ちゃんと生きて戻ってきなさいよ！
jpnSearchText:
無茶するなとは言わないけど
ちゃんと生きて戻ってきなさいよ！

engChrName: So I'm not going to stop you, either, but you better not die out there, okay?
engSearchText:
So I'm not going to stop you, either, but you better
not die out there, okay?
jpnChrName: 死んだりしたらユエファ小母さんに代わって どやしつけてやるんだから！
jpnSearchText:
死んだりしたらユエファ小母さんに代わって
どやしつけてやるんだから！

engChrName: It's a promise.
engSearchText: It's a promise.
jpnChrName: ハッ──ったりめーだろ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ──ったりめーだろ！

engChrName: Looking better already.
engSearchText: Looking better already.
jpnChrName: うん、こんな所ですね。
jpnSearchText: うん、こんな所ですね。

engChrName: *sigh* I really didn't want to resort to using this salve.
engSearchText: *sigh* I really didn't want to resort to using this salve.
jpnChrName: ふう……本当なら 使いたくはなかったんじゃが。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……本当なら
使いたくはなかったんじゃが。

engChrName: Wow!
engSearchText: Wow!
jpnChrName: おお……
jpnSearchText: おお……

engChrName: You were limping and ragged just moments ago.
