engSearchText: You were limping and ragged just moments ago.
jpnChrName: さっきまで動くだけでも 辛そうだったのに……
jpnSearchText:
さっきまで動くだけでも
辛そうだったのに……

engChrName: What the heck did you put in that salve? Some kind of secret Eastern recipe?
engSearchText:
What the heck did you put in that salve? Some kind
of secret Eastern recipe?
jpnChrName: 凄いな……東方医術に伝わる “秘伝の軟膏”だったか。
jpnSearchText:
凄いな……東方医術に伝わる
“秘伝の軟膏”だったか。

engChrName: Indeed. It's a precise blend of crushed dragon bone, Soul Moss, and Divine Powder.
engSearchText:
Indeed. It's a precise blend of crushed dragon bone,
Soul Moss, and Divine Powder.
jpnChrName: うむ、龍骨に羅神粉に界霊苔を 独自の割合で調合したものじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、龍骨に羅神粉に界霊苔を
独自の割合で調合したものじゃ。

engChrName: It revitalizes the body and dulls its pain receptors.
engSearchText: It revitalizes the body and dulls its pain receptors.
jpnChrName: ある程度までのダメージならば 一時的に帳消しする活力を与える。
jpnSearchText:
ある程度までのダメージならば
一時的に帳消しする活力を与える。

engChrName: However, there are big repercussions for you using it.
engSearchText: However, there are big repercussions for you using it.
jpnChrName: 代わりに反動も物凄いですけどね。
jpnSearchText: 代わりに反動も物凄いですけどね。

engChrName: You'd better be ready to spend a couple of weeks in bed once this is over, Aaron.
engSearchText:
You'd better be ready to spend a couple of weeks in
bed once this is over, Aaron.
jpnChrName: 多分、半月くらいはベッドで 寝たきりになりますよ、アーロン。
jpnSearchText:
多分、半月くらいはベッドで
寝たきりになりますよ、アーロン。

engChrName: Damn. That's some intense stuff.
engSearchText: Damn. That's some intense stuff.
jpnChrName: そんなにかよ……
jpnSearchText: そんなにかよ……

engChrName: I could definitely use some in a pinch... It's a little scary sounding, though.
engSearchText:
I could definitely use some in a pinch... It's a little
scary sounding, though.
jpnChrName: 使いたいような ……そうでもないような。
jpnSearchText:
使いたいような
……そうでもないような。

engChrName: Bring it on. It'll take more than some medicine to stop the Crimson Khan.
engSearchText:
Bring it on. It'll take more than some medicine to
stop the Crimson Khan.
jpnChrName: 上等だ──ここで踏ん張らないで 何が《羅州の小覇王》だっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
上等だ──ここで踏ん張らないで
何が《羅州の小覇王》だっつーの。

engChrName: ...Actually, I'm done calling myself those edgy nicknames.
engSearchText:
...Actually, I'm done calling myself those
edgy nicknames.
jpnChrName: いや…… そのイキった名前ももう卒業だ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……
そのイキった名前ももう卒業だ。

engChrName: Anyway, I owe you both big time.
engSearchText: Anyway, I owe you both big time.
jpnChrName: ──恩に着るぜ、 老先生にシェンリーも。
jpnSearchText:
──恩に着るぜ、
老先生にシェンリーも。

engChrName: It's no wonder Heiyue holds you guys in such high regard.
engSearchText:
It's no wonder Heiyue holds you guys in such
high regard.
jpnChrName: 流石は黒月からも 一目置かれてる名医サマだ。
jpnSearchText:
流石は黒月からも
一目置かれてる名医サマだ。

engChrName: Heh. You really know how to butter an old doctor up, don't you?
engSearchText:
Heh. You really know how to butter an old doctor up,
don't you?
jpnChrName: まったく調子のいい……だが お前は孫みたいなもんじゃしな。
jpnSearchText:
まったく調子のいい……だが
お前は孫みたいなもんじゃしな。

engChrName: I must admit, I never imagined the two of you would end up working together, Arkride.
engSearchText:
I must admit, I never imagined the two of you would
end up working together, Arkride.
jpnChrName: アークライド、お前さんと 縁が出来るとは思わなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
アークライド、お前さんと
縁が出来るとは思わなかったが。

engChrName: But look at him now, relying on outsiders through and through. It's hardly my place, but please help him.
engSearchText:
But look at him now, relying on outsiders through
and through. It's hardly my place, but please
help him.
jpnChrName: どうかこの悪タレが本懐を遂げるのを 手伝ってやって欲しい。
jpnSearchText:
どうかこの悪タレが本懐を遂げるのを
手伝ってやって欲しい。

engChrName: Consider it me finally payin' you back.
engSearchText: Consider it me finally payin' you back.
jpnChrName: 了解だ──先生には何度か 世話になっちまってるしな。
jpnSearchText:
了解だ──先生には何度か
世話になっちまってるしな。

engChrName: How the hell does this guy know everybody? Have you met before, Shenli?
engSearchText:
How the hell does this guy know everybody?
Have you met before, Shenli?
jpnChrName: しかし本当に顔が広いなてめぇ。 シェンリーも知ってんのか？
jpnSearchText:
しかし本当に顔が広いなてめぇ。
シェンリーも知ってんのか？

engChrName: We sure have. I've been hoping we could spar for a long time, even.
engSearchText:
We sure have. I've been hoping we could spar for a
long time, even.
jpnChrName: ええ、前々から一度手合わせを お願いしたいと思っていまして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、前々から一度手合わせを
お願いしたいと思っていまして。

engChrName: Gonna have to call a rain check on that one. I know you'd put up a real fight.
engSearchText:
Gonna have to call a rain check on that one. I know
you'd put up a real fight.
jpnChrName: 勘弁してくれよ…… アンタ相当やりそうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
勘弁してくれよ……
アンタ相当やりそうじゃねえか。

engChrName: (This city is so awesome! The food is great, and everyone is so strong!)
engSearchText:
(This city is so awesome! The food is great, and
everyone is so strong!)
jpnChrName: （どこを見ても使い手ばかり……   ご飯も美味しいし素敵な街ですねっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（どこを見ても使い手ばかり……
ご飯も美味しいし素敵な街ですねっ！）

engChrName: (I was right with you until that last point...)
engSearchText: (I was right with you until that last point...)
jpnChrName: （素敵というのは同意ですけど   その基準はどうかと……）
jpnSearchText:
（素敵というのは同意ですけど
その基準はどうかと……）

engChrName: Well, Aaron. Arkride.
engSearchText: Well, Aaron. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ──アーロン、 それにアークライド。
jpnSearchText:
──アーロン、
それにアークライド。

engChrName: The outsiders may be dangerous, but you should be wary of Elder Gien as well.
engSearchText:
The outsiders may be dangerous, but you should be
wary of Elder Gien as well.
jpnChrName: 余所者も脅威じゃろうが ギエン殿には気をつけるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
余所者も脅威じゃろうが
ギエン殿には気をつけるがいい。

engChrName: His xiongshou are a force of nature.
engSearchText: His xiongshou are a force of nature.
jpnChrName: 彼の抱える凶手部隊もじゃが……
jpnSearchText: 彼の抱える凶手部隊もじゃが……

engChrName: Furthermore, he's also the oldest of Heiyue's elders who have long ruled this town. You would be wise not to underestimate him.
engSearchText:
Furthermore, he's also the oldest of Heiyue's elders
who have long ruled this town. You would be wise
not to underestimate him.
jpnChrName: 長きにわたりこの街を治めてきた 最古老を決して侮らぬようにな。
jpnSearchText:
長きにわたりこの街を治めてきた
最古老を決して侮らぬようにな。

engChrName: Why do you think he warned us about Lǎo Yéye?
engSearchText: Why do you think he warned us about Lǎo Yéye?
jpnChrName: 老先生…… どうしてギエン爺さんの事を。
jpnSearchText:
老先生……
どうしてギエン爺さんの事を。

engChrName: Good question. Gien did give me that kinda vibe, though.
engSearchText:
Good question. Gien did give me that kinda
vibe, though.
jpnChrName: ま、恐ろしい爺さんだとは 会ってみて思ったけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、恐ろしい爺さんだとは
会ってみて思ったけどな。

engChrName: I also have a feelin' even one of his xiongshou would put up a hell of a fight.
engSearchText:
I also have a feelin' even one of his xiongshou would
put up a hell of a fight.
jpnChrName: あの凶手どもにしても 一人一人が達人クラスだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
あの凶手どもにしても
一人一人が達人クラスだろうし。

engChrName: Yeah...
engSearchText: Yeah...
jpnChrName: はい……
jpnSearchText: はい……

engChrName: They seem to be as fearsome a force as Yin...
engSearchText: They seem to be as fearsome a force as Yin...
jpnChrName: ……《銀（イン）》に並ぶほどの 黒月の切り札、でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
……《銀（イン）》に並ぶほどの
黒月の切り札、でしたか。

engChrName: Eh, whatever. We're better off focusing on Almata anyway.
engSearchText:
Eh, whatever. We're better off focusing on
Almata anyway.
jpnChrName: ──まあいい、 今は身内よりアルマータどもだ。
jpnSearchText:
──まあいい、
今は身内よりアルマータどもだ。

engChrName: Much as I'd like to call the shots, though, you're in charge now.
engSearchText:
Much as I'd like to call the shots, though, you're in
charge now.
jpnChrName: 不本意だが下駄を預けた身、 まずはてめぇらの方針に従う。
jpnSearchText:
不本意だが下駄を預けた身、
まずはてめぇらの方針に従う。

engChrName: So, what's the plan?
engSearchText: So, what's the plan?
jpnChrName: それでどう動く──裏解決屋？
jpnSearchText: それでどう動く──裏解決屋？

engChrName: First off, there weren't enough thugs at the warehouse for that to be all of 'em.
engSearchText:
First off, there weren't enough thugs at the warehouse
for that to be all of 'em.
jpnChrName: 前提として、あの倉庫にいた 半グレどもの数が足りてねえ。
jpnSearchText:
前提として、あの倉庫にいた
半グレどもの数が足りてねえ。

engChrName: Meanin' the rest, and maybe those execs, have gotta be somewhere else.
engSearchText:
Meanin' the rest, and maybe those execs, have gotta
be somewhere else.
jpnChrName: 幹部２人以外に残りの半グレ共、 正式な構成員も来ているかもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
幹部２人以外に残りの半グレ共、
正式な構成員も来ているかもしれん。

engChrName: So you think they have yet another base in the city?
engSearchText: So you think they have yet another base in the city?
jpnChrName: でしたら、あの倉庫以外にも 別の拠点が市内に……？
jpnSearchText:
でしたら、あの倉庫以外にも
別の拠点が市内に……？

engChrName: That makes sense. They need somewhere big to prepare their forces.
engSearchText:
That makes sense. They need somewhere big to
prepare their forces.
jpnChrName: はい、黒月との戦争に向けた 最後の準備を整えてそうです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、黒月との戦争に向けた
最後の準備を整えてそうです。

engChrName: There aren't many places they could be, though.
engSearchText: There aren't many places they could be, though.
jpnChrName: そいつは俺も同感だ── だがこうなって来ると限られる。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは俺も同感だ──
だがこうなって来ると限られる。

engChrName: The Eastern Quarter's outta the question, and Heiyue's got their eyes on New Town now.
engSearchText:
The Eastern Quarter's outta the question, and
Heiyue's got their eyes on New Town now.
jpnChrName: 東方人街は論外だし、 新市街は黒月もカバーしている。
jpnSearchText:
東方人街は論外だし、
新市街は黒月もカバーしている。

engChrName: And after all the shit that went down at the docks, we can probably rule there out, too.
engSearchText:
And after all the shit that went down at the docks, we
can probably rule there out, too.
jpnChrName: 港湾区も……こうなっちまった以上、 外しちまっても良さそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
港湾区も……こうなっちまった以上、
外しちまっても良さそうだしな。

engChrName: What about the naval port next to it?
engSearchText: What about the naval port next to it?
jpnChrName: その……隣接する軍港内という 可能性は考えられないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
その……隣接する軍港内という
可能性は考えられないでしょうか？

engChrName: Though, that would mean the navy is somehow involved in all this, which is...disconcerting to say the least.
engSearchText:
Though, that would mean the navy is somehow
involved in all this, which is...disconcerting to say
the least.
jpnChrName: アルマータが海軍を利用している、 最悪の前提ではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータが海軍を利用している、
最悪の前提ではありますが……

engChrName: Hmm... That's definitely a possibility.
engSearchText: Hmm... That's definitely a possibility.
jpnChrName: なるほど……可能性は ゼロでは無さそうです。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……可能性は
ゼロでは無さそうです。

engChrName: Well, damn. The little lady's got a dark imagination.
engSearchText: Well, damn. The little lady's got a dark imagination.
jpnChrName: ハン、お上品な小娘かと思えば エグい線を突くじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン、お上品な小娘かと思えば
エグい線を突くじゃねえか？

engChrName: I would've thought Heiyue'd have the navy in their back pocket by now.
engSearchText:
I would've thought Heiyue'd have the navy in their
back pocket by now.
jpnChrName: 目の付け所はいいが 黒月の鼻薬の嗅がせ方次第だな。
jpnSearchText:
目の付け所はいいが
黒月の鼻薬の嗅がせ方次第だな。

engChrName: What do you think?
engSearchText: What do you think?
jpnChrName: そのあたりはどんなもんだ？
jpnSearchText: そのあたりはどんなもんだ？

engChrName: Fan's been greasing the navy's palms for a while now. Far as I know, they're still loyal to Heiyue.
engSearchText:
Fan's been greasing the navy's palms for a while now.
Far as I know, they're still loyal to Heiyue.
jpnChrName: ファンのオッサンの配慮で 海軍には便宜が図られてるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ファンのオッサンの配慮で
海軍には便宜が図られてるはずだ。

engChrName: They've got folks on the inside, too. Something this big wouldn't go unnoticed.
engSearchText:
They've got folks on the inside, too. Something this
big wouldn't go unnoticed.
jpnChrName: 現地採用の従業員も多いし、 “目”も十分行き届いてんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
現地採用の従業員も多いし、
“目”も十分行き届いてんだろ。

engChrName: I see... That option's off the table, then.
engSearchText: I see... That option's off the table, then.
jpnChrName: なるほど……でしたら 一旦除外してもよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……でしたら
一旦除外してもよさそうですね。

engChrName: (The navy being bribed by one group and not the other is hardly comforting, though...)
engSearchText:
(The navy being bribed by one group and not the
other is hardly comforting, though...)
jpnChrName: （それはそれで問題な気もしますが……）
jpnSearchText: （それはそれで問題な気もしますが……）

engChrName: Well, it's just past four. We've still got time left.
engSearchText: Well, it's just past four. We've still got time left.
jpnChrName: ──４時過ぎか。 まだ何とか動きようはあるな。
jpnSearchText:
──４時過ぎか。
まだ何とか動きようはあるな。

engChrName: All right. It's time for a practical exam, kid.
engSearchText: All right. It's time for a practical exam, kid.
jpnChrName: アーロン・ウェイ。 こうなったら決め手はお前だ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン・ウェイ。
こうなったら決め手はお前だ。

engChrName: I showed you how we work last night.
engSearchText: I showed you how we work last night.
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋》の仕事は昨夜見せた。
jpnSearchText: 《裏解決屋》の仕事は昨夜見せた。

engChrName: You've got till this evening to find us those mobsters.
engSearchText: You've got till this evening to find us those mobsters.
jpnChrName: その作法をお前なりに想像しながら 夕方まで好きなように回ってみろ。
jpnSearchText:
その作法をお前なりに想像しながら
夕方まで好きなように回ってみろ。

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: なに……？
jpnSearchText: なに……？

engChrName: My instincts are tellin' me we have almost all the pieces we need to find their other base.
engSearchText:
My instincts are tellin' me we have almost all the
pieces we need to find their other base.
jpnChrName: 俺のカンだが、連中の拠点を 特定するための材料はほぼ揃ってる。
jpnSearchText:
俺のカンだが、連中の拠点を
特定するための材料はほぼ揃ってる。

engChrName: But I've got a hunch what we're missin' is something only you can find.
engSearchText:
But I've got a hunch what we're missin' is something
only you can find.
jpnChrName: だが最後のピースが欠けている── それを揃えられるのはお前だけだ。
jpnSearchText:
だが最後のピースが欠けている──
それを揃えられるのはお前だけだ。

engChrName: You've lived here the longest and know this place's scent like the back of your hand.
engSearchText:
You've lived here the longest and know this place's
scent like the back of your hand.
jpnChrName: この街を愛し、皆と共に生きてきた お前だからこそ気付く匂いや違和感……
jpnSearchText:
この街を愛し、皆と共に生きてきた
お前だからこそ気付く匂いや違和感……

engChrName: So we'll back you up, but I'm handin' you the reins on this case.
engSearchText:
So we'll back you up, but I'm handin' you the reins on
this case.
jpnChrName: サポートはしてやる── 何とかそれを嗅ぎ取ってみせろ。
jpnSearchText:
サポートはしてやる──
何とかそれを嗅ぎ取ってみせろ。

engChrName: Heh. Sniffing around like a dog isn't my style...
engSearchText: Heh. Sniffing around like a dog isn't my style...
jpnChrName: ハッ、犬ッコロみたいな真似は 俺様の流儀じゃねえが……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、犬ッコロみたいな真似は
俺様の流儀じゃねえが……

engChrName: ...but what the hell. I'm not about to pass up a chance to steal your thunder!
engSearchText:
...but what the hell. I'm not about to pass up a chance
to steal your thunder!
jpnChrName: いいだろう──てめぇのお株、 きっちり奪ってやろうじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
いいだろう──てめぇのお株、
きっちり奪ってやろうじゃねえか！

engChrName: Heh. Ain't you a smartass?
engSearchText: Heh. Ain't you a smartass?
jpnChrName: ヘッ、口の減らねえ小僧が。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、口の減らねえ小僧が。

engChrName: I'll need to catch my train later, but I can help until then!
engSearchText:
I'll need to catch my train later, but I can help
until then!
jpnChrName: ふふっ……私も夜中までは 付き合わせていただきます！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……私も夜中までは
付き合わせていただきます！

engChrName: Then what are we waiting for? Let's go!
engSearchText: Then what are we waiting for? Let's go!
jpnChrName: それでは活動再開、ですねっ。
jpnSearchText: それでは活動再開、ですねっ。

engChrName: Aaron joined the party.
engSearchText: Aaron joined the party.
jpnChrName: アーロンがパーティに加わった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アーロンがパーティに加わった。

engChrName: After they finished asking around, the group reconvened to consider their findings.
engSearchText:
After they finished asking around, the group
reconvened to consider their findings.
jpnChrName: その後、一通りの聞き込みを終えたヴァンたちは 改めて情報を整理することにした。
jpnSearchText:
その後、一通りの聞き込みを終えたヴァンたちは
改めて情報を整理することにした。

engChrName: ...Think you've got it?
engSearchText: ...Think you've got it?
jpnChrName: ……どうやら見えてきたみてぇだな？
jpnSearchText: ……どうやら見えてきたみてぇだな？

engChrName: Yeah. Those bastards got us good.
engSearchText: Yeah. Those bastards got us good.
jpnChrName: 考えてみりゃあ盲点だったぜ。
jpnSearchText: 考えてみりゃあ盲点だったぜ。

engChrName: Picking somewhere us folks in the Eastern Quarter are so used to seeing that we don't even think about it.
engSearchText:
Picking somewhere us folks in the Eastern Quarter
are so used to seeing that we don't even think
about it.
jpnChrName: 俺たち東方人街の人間にとっちゃ、 見慣れた風景──
jpnSearchText:
俺たち東方人街の人間にとっちゃ、
見慣れた風景──

engChrName: Or more accurately, somewhere we were told not to think about because it's supposed to be cursed.
engSearchText:
Or more accurately, somewhere we were told not to
think about because it's supposed to be cursed.
jpnChrName: いや……目に映っていても 意識から外していた“禁忌”の場所。
jpnSearchText:
いや……目に映っていても
意識から外していた“禁忌”の場所。

engChrName: Heilong Cheng Zhai...
engSearchText: Heilong Cheng Zhai...
jpnChrName: 《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》……４０年前まで 採掘で賑わっていたという場所ですか。
jpnSearchText:
《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》……４０年前まで
採掘で賑わっていたという場所ですか。

engChrName: A large-scale mining facility where droves of miners lived and worked until forty years ago.
engSearchText:
A large-scale mining facility where droves of miners
lived and worked until forty years ago.
jpnChrName: 大勢の鉱員の方々が住んでいたけど 今では誰も住んでいないという……
jpnSearchText:
大勢の鉱員の方々が住んでいたけど
今では誰も住んでいないという……

engChrName: Yeah. Now it's deserted, and all you hear about it are all sorts of creepy stories.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Now it's deserted, and all you hear about it
are all sorts of creepy stories.
jpnChrName: ああ……薄気味悪い言い伝えもあってな。
jpnSearchText: ああ……薄気味悪い言い伝えもあってな。

engChrName: People here grow up being told to stay the hell out because the place is haunted with ghosts and demons and shit.
engSearchText:
People here grow up being told to stay the hell out
because the place is haunted with ghosts and demons
and shit.
jpnChrName: 鬼やら亡霊やらがいるって、大抵のヤツは ガキの頃に親から脅かされたモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
鬼やら亡霊やらがいるって、大抵のヤツは
ガキの頃に親から脅かされたモンだ。

engChrName: We learned that those rumors were first spread by the elders of Heiyue.
engSearchText:
We learned that those rumors were first spread by the
elders of Heiyue.
jpnChrName: ……その噂をそもそも 広めたのが黒月の長老さんたち……
jpnSearchText:
……その噂をそもそも
広めたのが黒月の長老さんたち……

engChrName: And not even the police or guild would go there because nobody lives there anymore.
engSearchText:
And not even the police or guild would go there
because nobody lives there anymore.
jpnChrName: 現地の警察やギルドも基本無人なので ほぼ立ち入らない場所、ですか。
jpnSearchText:
現地の警察やギルドも基本無人なので
ほぼ立ち入らない場所、ですか。

engChrName: Makeshift bases don't get much better than that place.
engSearchText:
Makeshift bases don't get much better than
that place.
jpnChrName: まさに“戦争”をやるには 打ってつけの場所ってことだな。
jpnSearchText:
まさに“戦争”をやるには
打ってつけの場所ってことだな。

engChrName: For someone who doesn't like sniffin' around, you've got a hell of a nose. Nice work, kid.
engSearchText:
For someone who doesn't like sniffin' around, you've
got a hell of a nose. Nice work, kid.
jpnChrName: ──嗅ぎ当てたじゃねえか、小僧。
jpnSearchText: ──嗅ぎ当てたじゃねえか、小僧。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ハッ……
jpnSearchText: ハッ……

engChrName: Fancy running into you again!
engSearchText: Fancy running into you again!
jpnChrName: なんだ、よく会うじゃないか。
jpnSearchText: なんだ、よく会うじゃないか。

engChrName: It's the red...something!
engSearchText: It's the red...something!
jpnChrName: あっ、“ぜっとわん”の……
jpnSearchText: あっ、“ぜっとわん”の……

engChrName: What's with the shades?
engSearchText: What's with the shades?
jpnChrName: ……本当に良く会うな。 アンタ一応有名人だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
……本当に良く会うな。
アンタ一応有名人だろうが。

engChrName: I wear them to suppress my natural charm. Though, since you recognized me, it seems my star power is undeniable.
engSearchText:
I wear them to suppress my natural charm.
Though, since you recognized me, it seems my star
power is undeniable.
jpnChrName: フッ、一応サングラスをしてるが どうしてもオーラが滲み出るものでね。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、一応サングラスをしてるが
どうしてもオーラが滲み出るものでね。

engChrName: (Who's this guy think he is? Wait... This dumbass was at last night's show.)
engSearchText:
(Who's this guy think he is? Wait... This dumbass
was at last night's show.)
jpnChrName: （コイツは……   ああ、昨日観に来てた馬鹿か。）
jpnSearchText:
（コイツは……
ああ、昨日観に来てた馬鹿か。）

engChrName: Hold the phone... Is that Aaron?!
engSearchText: Hold the phone... Is that Aaron?!
jpnChrName: え！？　まさかアーロンさん！？
jpnSearchText: え！？　まさかアーロンさん！？

engChrName: It totally is!
engSearchText: It totally is!
jpnChrName: きゃあ～っ、アーロン！！
jpnSearchText: きゃあ～っ、アーロン！！

engChrName: Figures we'd bump into some fans eventually.
engSearchText: Figures we'd bump into some fans eventually.
jpnChrName: ハッ……俺様のファンか何かか？
jpnSearchText: ハッ……俺様のファンか何かか？

engChrName: Come now, girls. You'll make me jealous if you stare too much.
engSearchText:
Come now, girls. You'll make me jealous if you stare
too much.
jpnChrName: ちょっと君たち…… 僕と一緒なのにそれはないだろう？
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと君たち……
僕と一緒なのにそれはないだろう？

engChrName: Aww, we didn't mean to, Maxi-poo!
engSearchText: Aww, we didn't mean to, Maxi-poo!
jpnChrName: もちろんですよマクシムさ～ん。
jpnSearchText: もちろんですよマクシムさ～ん。

engChrName: We only have eyes for you!
engSearchText: We only have eyes for you!
jpnChrName: ウチらもうメロメロなんで～。
jpnSearchText: ウチらもうメロメロなんで～。

engChrName: Well, I'll admit he's not too bad, but doesn't hold a candle to me, naturally.
engSearchText:
Well, I'll admit he's not too bad, but doesn't hold a
candle to me, naturally.
jpnChrName: ま、僕ほどじゃないにしても なかなかハンサムなのは認めるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、僕ほどじゃないにしても
なかなかハンサムなのは認めるけどね。

engChrName: ...Wait, why do I feel like I've seen your face somewhere before?
engSearchText:
...Wait, why do I feel like I've seen your face
somewhere before?
jpnChrName: ん、なんだか見覚えがあるような……？
jpnSearchText: ん、なんだか見覚えがあるような……？

engChrName: Gee, I wonder.
engSearchText: Gee, I wonder.
jpnChrName: ああ、俺もアンタには見覚えあるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、俺もアンタには見覚えあるぜ。

engChrName: (He totally has no clue, does he?)
engSearchText: (He totally has no clue, does he?)
jpnChrName: （……マクシムさん、   気付いてないらしいねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……マクシムさん、
気付いてないらしいねぇ。）

engChrName: (Imagine if he knew the 'girl' he was catcalling at the theater was Aaron...)
engSearchText:
(Imagine if he knew the 'girl' he was catcalling at the
theater was Aaron...)
jpnChrName: （うん、華劇場のオキニが   目の前のカレだって……）
jpnSearchText:
（うん、華劇場のオキニが
目の前のカレだって……）

engChrName: No time for pondering. We're about to set off on a little adventure, you see.
engSearchText:
No time for pondering. We're about to set off on a
little adventure, you see.
jpnChrName: まあいい…… これからちょっとした冒険でね。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい……
これからちょっとした冒険でね。

engChrName: That darn reporter took up so much of my time yesterday that I've got to make up for lost time tonight!
engSearchText:
That darn reporter took up so much of my time
yesterday that I've got to make up for lost
time tonight!
jpnChrName: 昨日は妙な記者の子に付きまとわれたし、 夜まで存分に楽しまないとな！
jpnSearchText:
昨日は妙な記者の子に付きまとわれたし、
夜まで存分に楽しまないとな！

engChrName: Ahaha... That sounds rough.
engSearchText: Ahaha... That sounds rough.
jpnChrName: あはは……大変でしたね。
jpnSearchText: あはは……大変でしたね。

engChrName: I know, why don't I treat you girls to a nice dinner when we get back?
engSearchText:
I know, why don't I treat you girls to a nice dinner
when we get back?
jpnChrName: 君たちも仕事ばかりでご苦労サン。 帰ったらディナーでも奢ってあげよう！
jpnSearchText:
君たちも仕事ばかりでご苦労サン。
帰ったらディナーでも奢ってあげよう！

engChrName: As for the men... Well, I'm sure we can spare some schnibbles.
engSearchText:
As for the men... Well, I'm sure we can spare
some schnibbles.
jpnChrName: 野郎もおこぼれに預からせてあげるからサ☆
jpnSearchText: 野郎もおこぼれに預からせてあげるからサ☆

engChrName: Start your engines, ladies! I've got to show off my wide array of driving skills on the way to the sea cave!
engSearchText:
Start your engines, ladies! I've got to show off my
wide array of driving skills on the way to the sea cave!
jpnChrName: 目指すは夕暮れの海蝕洞！ ボートでも華麗な運転を披露してあげよう！
jpnSearchText:
目指すは夕暮れの海蝕洞！
ボートでも華麗な運転を披露してあげよう！

engChrName: Really?!
engSearchText: Really?!
jpnChrName: きゃあああっ！！
jpnSearchText: きゃあああっ！！

engChrName: You're the best!
engSearchText: You're the best!
jpnChrName: マクシムさん、ステキ～っ！！
jpnSearchText: マクシムさん、ステキ～っ！！

engChrName: Guy's got a boatin' license, I guess. Funny that we're kinda headed that way, too.
engSearchText:
Guy's got a boatin' license, I guess. Funny that we're
kinda headed that way, too.
jpnChrName: これからボートに乗んのか。 微妙に行き先が被りそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
これからボートに乗んのか。
微妙に行き先が被りそうだが……

engChrName: The two places aren't that close together, though, so I doubt we'll run into them again.
engSearchText:
The two places aren't that close together, though, so I
doubt we'll run into them again.
jpnChrName: こちらの目的地よりは手前ですし、 たぶん大丈夫では？
jpnSearchText:
こちらの目的地よりは手前ですし、
たぶん大丈夫では？

engChrName: Right. I hope they don't have any trouble with the monsters...
engSearchText:
Right. I hope they don't have any trouble with
the monsters...
jpnChrName: そうですね…… 魔獣には気をつけて欲しいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……
魔獣には気をつけて欲しいですけど。

engChrName: Meh. They'll have a guide. Let the blond idiot do his thing.
engSearchText:
Meh. They'll have a guide. Let the blond idiot do
his thing.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ショウ（ガイド）も弁えてんだろ。 あんな馬鹿なんざどうだっていい。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ショウ（ガイド）も弁えてんだろ。
あんな馬鹿なんざどうだっていい。

engChrName: We've got to focus on Heilong Cheng Zhai. This shit ends today.
engSearchText:
We've got to focus on Heilong Cheng Zhai. This shit
ends today.
jpnChrName: ──目指すは《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》。 今日中に何とかケリを付けてやる。
jpnSearchText:
──目指すは《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》。
今日中に何とかケリを付けてやる。

engChrName: I'm counting on you, Van!
engSearchText: I'm counting on you, Van!
jpnChrName: 改めて手を貸してもらおうか、 ヴァン・アークライド！
jpnSearchText:
改めて手を貸してもらおうか、
ヴァン・アークライド！

engChrName: Course. What about you two?
engSearchText: Course. What about you two?
jpnChrName: ハッ、いいだろう。 ──お前らは………
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、いいだろう。
──お前らは………

engChrName: We're coming, too. I have a feeling my other goal might be there as well.
engSearchText:
We're coming, too. I have a feeling my other goal
might be there as well.
jpnChrName: 当然、ご一緒します。 “目当て”もありそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
当然、ご一緒します。
“目当て”もありそうですし。

engChrName: Once we're ready, we should hurry to the dock!
engSearchText: Once we're ready, we should hurry to the dock!
jpnChrName: 各種装備を調えたら 船着き場に向かいましょう！
jpnSearchText:
各種装備を調えたら
船着き場に向かいましょう！

engChrName: Bah. You best be ready for ANYTHING, got it?!
engSearchText: Bah. You best be ready for ANYTHING, got it?!
jpnChrName: ったく…… 準備は万全にしとけよ！
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
準備は万全にしとけよ！

engChrName: We'll be sailin' right into the belly of the beast. Are we ready?
engSearchText:
We'll be sailin' right into the belly of the beast.
Are we ready?
jpnChrName: （ここから先は完全に敵地だ。   《黒龍城砦》に向かうか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（ここから先は完全に敵地だ。
《黒龍城砦》に向かうか……？）

engChrName: Choosing to embark toward Heilong Cheng Zhai will advance the main story.
engSearchText:
Choosing to embark toward Heilong Cheng Zhai
will advance the main story.
jpnChrName: 黒龍城砦に向かうと、 メインのストーリーが進行します。
jpnSearchText:
黒龍城砦に向かうと、
メインのストーリーが進行します。

engChrName: As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen sub-events will disappear.
engSearchText:
As a result, all unfinished quests and unseen
sub-events will disappear.
jpnChrName: クエスト・サブイベントが 全て消滅するので注意して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
クエスト・サブイベントが
全て消滅するので注意して下さい。

engChrName: September 21st, 5:02PM
engSearchText: September 21st, 5:02PM

engChrName: So, who's driving?
engSearchText: So, who's driving?
jpnChrName: さてと……どっちが運転する？
jpnSearchText: さてと……どっちが運転する？

engChrName: I'm happy to do it, but I don't want to hear any whining when I put the pedal to the metal.
engSearchText:
I'm happy to do it, but I don't want to hear any
whining when I put the pedal to the metal.
jpnChrName: 俺が運転してもいいが 飛ばしちまっても文句言うなよ？
jpnSearchText:
俺が運転してもいいが
飛ばしちまっても文句言うなよ？

engChrName: Sounds fun!
engSearchText: Sounds fun!
jpnChrName: わたしは多分大丈夫ですが……
jpnSearchText: わたしは多分大丈夫ですが……

engChrName: Umm. I-I'd prefer if you were a little more careful.
engSearchText: Umm. I-I'd prefer if you were a little more careful.
jpnChrName: で、出来れば安全運転で。
jpnSearchText: で、出来れば安全運転で。

engChrName: You've got a license, huh?
engSearchText: You've got a license, huh?
jpnChrName: ハン、たしか運転免許も 持ってるって話だったか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、たしか運転免許も
持ってるって話だったか。

engChrName: If we bomb in at top speed, they'll notice us for sure. Lemme show you how it's done.
engSearchText:
If we bomb in at top speed, they'll notice us for sure.
Lemme show you how it's done.
jpnChrName: 派手に乗り込んだら気付かれそうだし 俺が手本を見せてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
派手に乗り込んだら気付かれそうだし
俺が手本を見せてやるよ。

engChrName: Have it your way.
engSearchText: Have it your way.
jpnChrName: そんじゃお手並み拝見だな。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃお手並み拝見だな。

engChrName: Mind if I tag along as well?
engSearchText: Mind if I tag along as well?
jpnChrName: ──私も一緒にいいかしら？
jpnSearchText: ──私も一緒にいいかしら？

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: エレインさん……！
jpnSearchText: エレインさん……！

engChrName: You know where we're going?
engSearchText: You know where we're going?
jpnChrName: も、もしかして 私たちの目的地のことを……
jpnSearchText:
も、もしかして
私たちの目的地のことを……

engChrName: Heilong Cheng Zhai: Almata's base and—if we don't hurry—tomorrow's battlefield.
engSearchText:
Heilong Cheng Zhai: Almata's base and—if we don't
hurry—tomorrow's battlefield.
jpnChrName: ええ──《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》。 アルマータの拠点にして明日の戦場ね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》。
アルマータの拠点にして明日の戦場ね。

engChrName: Nice sleuthin'.
engSearchText: Nice sleuthin'.
jpnChrName: 流石だな……俺たちとは 別方面から探り当てやがったか。
jpnSearchText:
流石だな……俺たちとは
別方面から探り当てやがったか。

engChrName: I owe this hypothesis to the others at the guild.
engSearchText: I owe this hypothesis to the others at the guild.
jpnChrName: ええ、他の支部のメンバーにも 色々知恵を借りてではあったけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、他の支部のメンバーにも
色々知恵を借りてではあったけど。

engChrName: Since you all are here, too, it would seem I'm on the right track.
engSearchText:
Since you all are here, too, it would seem I'm on the
right track.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちが向かおうとしているという事は 当たりだったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちが向かおうとしているという事は
当たりだったみたいね。

engChrName: No hiding it now.
engSearchText: No hiding it now.
jpnChrName: バレました……
jpnSearchText: バレました……

engChrName: You sure a bracer should be taking this on, though?
engSearchText: You sure a bracer should be taking this on, though?
jpnChrName: だが、いいのか？
jpnSearchText: だが、いいのか？

engChrName: Figure Heiyue wouldn't take kindly to that.
engSearchText: Figure Heiyue wouldn't take kindly to that.
jpnChrName: ギルドのお前が出張ったら 黒月の顔を潰す可能性もあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドのお前が出張ったら
黒月の顔を潰す可能性もあるだろう。

engChrName: Civilians died last night. Our code demands action.
engSearchText: Civilians died last night. Our code demands action.
jpnChrName: 昨夜、民間人に死者が出た時点で ギルドの規約はクリアしているわ。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜、民間人に死者が出た時点で
ギルドの規約はクリアしているわ。

engChrName: We can't allow any further bloodshed—be it innocent bystander or otherwise.
engSearchText:
We can't allow any further bloodshed—be it innocent
bystander or otherwise.
jpnChrName: ……それに殺された半グレにしても これ以上の暴虐は見過ごせない。
jpnSearchText:
……それに殺された半グレにしても
これ以上の暴虐は見過ごせない。

engChrName: Furthermore, you've chosen to bring ordinary people into this. So, I'm going, and that's final.
engSearchText:
Furthermore, you've chosen to bring ordinary people
into this. So, I'm going, and that's final.
jpnChrName: アニエスさん達やそちらの彼もいるし、 Ａ級遊撃士として強制介入させてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさん達やそちらの彼もいるし、
Ａ級遊撃士として強制介入させてもらう。

engChrName: We appreciate the help.
engSearchText: We appreciate the help.
jpnChrName: エレインさん……
jpnSearchText: エレインさん……

engChrName: Hold on, Elaine. I know you've already made up your mind, but we've gotta clear this with our client.
engSearchText:
Hold on, Elaine. I know you've already made up your
mind, but we've gotta clear this with our client.
jpnChrName: ……ったく、一度決めたら 曲げないところは相変わらずだな。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、一度決めたら
曲げないところは相変わらずだな。

engChrName: Whaddaya say, chief?
engSearchText: Whaddaya say, chief?
jpnChrName: どうする──依頼者殿？
jpnSearchText: どうする──依頼者殿？

engChrName: Yesterday, I saw exactly how strong you really are firsthand.
engSearchText:
Yesterday, I saw exactly how strong you really
are firsthand.
jpnChrName: ……アンタの腕前は昨日見た。
jpnSearchText: ……アンタの腕前は昨日見た。

engChrName: If you'd asked me this morning, I'd have told you to piss off.
engSearchText:
If you'd asked me this morning, I'd have told you to
piss off.
jpnChrName: 今朝までの俺だったら 問答無用で突っぱねてる所だが……
jpnSearchText:
今朝までの俺だったら
問答無用で突っぱねてる所だが……

engChrName: Now... I'm not about to bat away a helping hand.
engSearchText: Now... I'm not about to bat away a helping hand.
jpnChrName: 本当のケジメを付ける目的のためにも 力を貸すってんなら拒む理由はねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
本当のケジメを付ける目的のためにも
力を貸すってんなら拒む理由はねぇ。

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……

engChrName: You'll be a real help!
engSearchText: You'll be a real help!
jpnChrName: 戦力的には大助かりですっ。
jpnSearchText: 戦力的には大助かりですっ。

engChrName: But let me make one thing clear: I'm not some little pup that needs protecting.
engSearchText:
But let me make one thing clear: I'm not some little
pup that needs protecting.
jpnChrName: だが勘違いすんな──！ 俺は守られる“民間人”じゃねえ！
jpnSearchText:
だが勘違いすんな──！
俺は守られる“民間人”じゃねえ！

engChrName: I've got the weight of the whole city on my shoulders right now.
engSearchText:
I've got the weight of the whole city on my shoulders
right now.
jpnChrName: 煌都を見舞うこの災厄に 街を背負ってケリを付ける“当事者”だ！
jpnSearchText:
煌都を見舞うこの災厄に
街を背負ってケリを付ける“当事者”だ！
……！

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: I'm leading the charge here, so you better not look down on me, you old—
engSearchText:
I'm leading the charge here, so you better not look
down on me, you old—
jpnChrName: その意味で主導はあくまで俺だ！ そこは弁えてもらうぜ、剣のオバハ──
jpnSearchText:
その意味で主導はあくまで俺だ！
そこは弁えてもらうぜ、剣のオバハ──

engChrName: ...pro who's much more skilled than me.
engSearchText: ...pro who's much more skilled than me.
jpnChrName: ……弁えてくださいよ剣のお姉さん………
jpnSearchText: ……弁えてくださいよ剣のお姉さん………

engChrName: Perish the thought.
engSearchText: Perish the thought.
jpnChrName: ええ、善処するわ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、善処するわ。

engChrName: (I didn't even see her loose her blade.)
engSearchText: (I didn't even see her loose her blade.)
jpnChrName: （見えませんでした……）
jpnSearchText: （見えませんでした……）

engChrName: (So, uh, aren't you and Elaine the same age? Twenty-four, I believe.)
engSearchText:
(So, uh, aren't you and Elaine the same age?
Twenty-four, I believe.)
jpnChrName: （えっと、ヴァンさんと同い年なら   まだ２４歳ですよね……？）
jpnSearchText:
（えっと、ヴァンさんと同い年なら
まだ２４歳ですよね……？）

engChrName: (Yeah. She's a bit more touchy about it than I am, though.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah. She's a bit more touchy about it than I
am, though.)
jpnChrName: （ま、微妙なお年頃ってことだ。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、微妙なお年頃ってことだ。）

engChrName: It's clear from your story that there's more going on here than you're letting on.
engSearchText:
It's clear from your story that there's more going on
here than you're letting on.
jpnChrName: ……私の見ていない所で 今回も色々あったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
……私の見ていない所で
今回も色々あったみたいね。

engChrName: And while we managed to avoid the worst-case scenario, people lost their lives here.
engSearchText:
And while we managed to avoid the worst-case
scenario, people lost their lives here.
jpnChrName: 無事だったのは何よりだけど…… “綱渡り”は何時までも続かないわよ？
jpnSearchText:
無事だったのは何よりだけど……
“綱渡り”は何時までも続かないわよ？

engChrName: Considering that, it's becoming increasingly difficult to ignore your participation in all of this, Agnès.
engSearchText:
Considering that, it's becoming increasingly difficult
to ignore your participation in all of this, Agnès.
jpnChrName: そしてアニエスさん──やっぱり民間人の 貴女が危険に近付くのは見過ごせないわ。
jpnSearchText:
そしてアニエスさん──やっぱり民間人の
貴女が危険に近付くのは見過ごせないわ。

engChrName: It doesn't have to be right this moment, but please consider having the guild take over this case of yours, okay?
engSearchText:
It doesn't have to be right this moment, but please
consider having the guild take over this case of
yours, okay?
jpnChrName: “相談事”についても……そのうち ギルドに切り替えることを検討してみて。
jpnSearchText:
“相談事”についても……そのうち
ギルドに切り替えることを検討してみて。

engChrName: I don't see anything that looks super urgent.
engSearchText: I don't see anything that looks super urgent.
jpnChrName: 緊急度が高そうな案件はないみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: 緊急度が高そうな案件はないみたいですね。

engChrName: Me, neither.
engSearchText: Me, neither.
jpnChrName: ああ、出された依頼はなるべく片付けたいが、 絶対にってほどでもねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、出された依頼はなるべく片付けたいが、
絶対にってほどでもねえだろ。

engChrName: We have our pick of the litter.
engSearchText: We have our pick of the litter.
jpnChrName: 後はこっちの状況次第だな。
jpnSearchText: 後はこっちの状況次第だな。

engChrName: Is something the matter, Van?
engSearchText: Is something the matter, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、どうかしたんですか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、どうかしたんですか？

engChrName: Nah. I was just thinkin' back on old times.
engSearchText: Nah. I was just thinkin' back on old times.
jpnChrName: いや、下積み時期のことを ちょっと思い出してな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、下積み時期のことを
ちょっと思い出してな。

engChrName: When I first came here, I was just a greenhorn, and now I'm the one leading greenhorns on my return trip.
engSearchText:
When I first came here, I was just a greenhorn, and
now I'm the one leading greenhorns on my
return trip.
jpnChrName: あの時は裏解決屋のひよっこだった俺が 今はひよっこの引率をしているとは。
jpnSearchText:
あの時は裏解決屋のひよっこだった俺が
今はひよっこの引率をしているとは。

engChrName: Life comes at you fast. In both good and bad ways.
engSearchText: Life comes at you fast. In both good and bad ways.
jpnChrName: 人生どうなるか分からねえもんだな。 いい意味でも悪い意味でも。
jpnSearchText:
人生どうなるか分からねえもんだな。
いい意味でも悪い意味でも。

engChrName: Abi once said the very same thing to me.
engSearchText: Abi once said the very same thing to me.
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）も同じような話を したことがあります。
jpnSearchText:
お父さん（アブ）も同じような話を
したことがあります。

engChrName: I had no idea what he meant—and I still don't—but that's okay. I always love hearing wise old man sayings!
engSearchText:
I had no idea what he meant—and I still don't—but
that's okay. I always love hearing wise old
man sayings!
jpnChrName: わたしには分かりませんでしたが、 さすがヴァンさん、としのこう、ですね！
jpnSearchText:
わたしには分かりませんでしたが、
さすがヴァンさん、としのこう、ですね！

engChrName: I'll pretend I didn't hear the 'old man' part.
engSearchText: I'll pretend I didn't hear the 'old man' part.
jpnChrName: お前の親父さんほど年取ってねえよ……
jpnSearchText: お前の親父さんほど年取ってねえよ……

engChrName: Anyway, let's get to work. We'll probably run into some familiar faces along the way.
engSearchText:
Anyway, let's get to work. We'll probably run into
some familiar faces along the way.
jpnChrName: まあとにかく行くか、 いくつか懐かしい顔も見られそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあとにかく行くか、
いくつか懐かしい顔も見られそうだ。

engChrName: Hey, Jack. You look better than you usually do this time of morning.
engSearchText:
Hey, Jack. You look better than you usually do this
time of morning.
jpnChrName: よう、今日は珍しく朝から元気みたいだな。
jpnSearchText: よう、今日は珍しく朝から元気みたいだな。

engChrName: I'll take that as a compliment.
engSearchText: I'll take that as a compliment.
jpnChrName: 元気なわけねえだろうが。
jpnSearchText: 元気なわけねえだろうが。

engChrName: I just figured that now's not the best time to be hungover.
engSearchText:
I just figured that now's not the best time to
be hungover.
jpnChrName: 状況が状況だから、 潰れてる場合じゃないだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
状況が状況だから、
潰れてる場合じゃないだけだ。

engChrName: How are you guys holding up?
engSearchText: How are you guys holding up?
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちも、早速動き始めたみたいね。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンたちも、早速動き始めたみたいね。

engChrName: We're doing okay, given the circumstances. What about you?
engSearchText:
We're doing okay, given the circumstances.
What about you?
jpnChrName: ハルさん……その、大丈夫ですか？
jpnSearchText: ハルさん……その、大丈夫ですか？

engChrName: I won't lie, I'm pretty shaken up. Some of the victims were regulars of ours.
engSearchText:
I won't lie, I'm pretty shaken up. Some of the victims
were regulars of ours.
jpnChrName: 犠牲者の中にこの店の常連もいたからね。 さすがにちょっと堪えてるけど……
jpnSearchText:
犠牲者の中にこの店の常連もいたからね。
さすがにちょっと堪えてるけど……

engChrName: But you don't need to worry about me. I'll be fine.
engSearchText: But you don't need to worry about me. I'll be fine.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫よ、心配してくれてありがとう。
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫よ、心配してくれてありがとう。

engChrName: If you say so...
engSearchText: If you say so...
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Is there anything you can tell us about the victims?
engSearchText: Is there anything you can tell us about the victims?
jpnChrName: できれば無理のない範囲でいい、 被害者たちについて話してくれねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
できれば無理のない範囲でいい、
被害者たちについて話してくれねぇか？

engChrName: A little, though probably nothing you don't already know. The thing they all had in common was that they were friends of Aaron's.
engSearchText:
A little, though probably nothing you don't
already know. The thing they all had in common was
that they were friends of Aaron's.
jpnChrName: すでに察しているだろうが、 一言で言えば、全員アーロンの仲間だ。
jpnSearchText:
すでに察しているだろうが、
一言で言えば、全員アーロンの仲間だ。

engChrName: And now, he's out for blood. Either he wants to get revenge for them...
engSearchText:
And now, he's out for blood. Either he wants to get
revenge for them...
jpnChrName: 先日の件の報復…… いや、見せしめって所だろうな。
jpnSearchText:
先日の件の報復……
いや、見せしめって所だろうな。

engChrName: ...or he wants to make a declaration of war on A.
engSearchText: ...or he wants to make a declaration of war on A.
jpnChrName: もしくは……宣戦布告、か。
jpnSearchText: もしくは……宣戦布告、か。

engChrName: I'm worried about him flyin' off the handle and doin' something he'd regret.
engSearchText:
I'm worried about him flyin' off the handle and doin'
something he'd regret.
jpnChrName: なんにしろアーロンの奴が 暴走しないか心配だな。
jpnSearchText:
なんにしろアーロンの奴が
暴走しないか心配だな。

engChrName: You guys have any idea where he is? Has he dropped by?
engSearchText:
You guys have any idea where he is? Has he
dropped by?
jpnChrName: どこにいるか掴んでたりしねぇか？ ここを訪ねてきたとか。
jpnSearchText:
どこにいるか掴んでたりしねぇか？
ここを訪ねてきたとか。

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: We haven't been able to locate him, no.
engSearchText: We haven't been able to locate him, no.
jpnChrName: 生憎、俺たちも掴めてなくてな。
jpnSearchText: 生憎、俺たちも掴めてなくてな。

engChrName: Could be that he's at the clinic. They're treating the sole survivor of the attack as we speak.
engSearchText:
Could be that he's at the clinic. They're treating the
sole survivor of the attack as we speak.
jpnChrName: ただ被害者の中に一人だけ生き残りがいる── 今は療法院で治療を受けているはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ被害者の中に一人だけ生き残りがいる──
今は療法院で治療を受けているはずだ。

engChrName: Might be worth checking that place out.
engSearchText: Might be worth checking that place out.
jpnChrName: そっちに行ったんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: そっちに行ったんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Nah, we already went. They said we just missed him.
engSearchText: Nah, we already went. They said we just missed him.
jpnChrName: いや、もう行ったが 入れ違いになったみたいでな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、もう行ったが
入れ違いになったみたいでな。

engChrName: Good idea. We'll head over there later.
engSearchText: Good idea. We'll head over there later.
jpnChrName: 療法院か、後で行ってみてもよさそうだな。
jpnSearchText: 療法院か、後で行ってみてもよさそうだな。

engChrName: I don't have any other info for you. Wish I could've been more help.
engSearchText:
I don't have any other info for you. Wish I could've
been more help.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、今提供できる情報は これくらいしかない。
jpnSearchText:
悪いな、今提供できる情報は
これくらいしかない。

engChrName: Nah, it's cool. If you learn anything new, hit me up.
engSearchText: Nah, it's cool. If you learn anything new, hit me up.
jpnChrName: 昨日の今日だしな…… 何か分かったら連絡してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日の今日だしな……
何か分かったら連絡してくれ。

engChrName: You got it.
engSearchText: You got it.
jpnChrName: ああ。
jpnSearchText: ああ。

engChrName: You here to visit him, too, Arkride?
engSearchText: You here to visit him, too, Arkride?
jpnChrName: アークライド、お前さんもこやつの見舞いか？
jpnSearchText: アークライド、お前さんもこやつの見舞いか？

engChrName: Yeah. Jack told me that someone survived the attack. Guessin' he's that someone.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Jack told me that someone survived the attack.
Guessin' he's that someone.
jpnChrName: まあそんなところだ。 ジャックから聞いてな。
jpnSearchText:
まあそんなところだ。
ジャックから聞いてな。

engChrName: Wait... That's one of Aaron's friends. Did he survive the attack?
engSearchText:
Wait... That's one of Aaron's friends. Did he survive
the attack?
jpnChrName: ロンカイ先生…… その若いのはもしかして？
jpnSearchText:
ロンカイ先生……
その若いのはもしかして？

engChrName: Yes. The fact that he's still breathing is nothing short of a miracle.
engSearchText:
Yes. The fact that he's still breathing is nothing short
of a miracle.
jpnChrName: アーロンの連れの一人じゃ。 奇蹟的に生き残ったようでな。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンの連れの一人じゃ。
奇蹟的に生き残ったようでな。

engChrName: So he's going to make it?
engSearchText: So he's going to make it?
jpnChrName: ！　そうだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: ！　そうだったんですか……

engChrName: His condition looks stable, at least.
engSearchText: His condition looks stable, at least.
jpnChrName: 昨夜の被害者の中、 唯一の生き残り……
jpnSearchText:
昨夜の被害者の中、
唯一の生き残り……

engChrName: He gonna wake up anytime soon?
engSearchText: He gonna wake up anytime soon?
jpnChrName: 様子はどうなんだ？
jpnSearchText: 様子はどうなんだ？

engChrName: I don't know. The boy has yet to regain consciousness. He just barely managed to hang on.
engSearchText:
I don't know. The boy has yet to regain
consciousness. He just barely managed to
hang on.
jpnChrName: 見ての通り、まだ意識を取り戻しておらぬ。 何とか一命はとりとめたがの。
jpnSearchText:
見ての通り、まだ意識を取り戻しておらぬ。
何とか一命はとりとめたがの。

engChrName: There's a limit to what I can do here. I plan on having him moved to a hospital immediately.
engSearchText:
There's a limit to what I can do here. I plan on having
him moved to a hospital immediately.
jpnChrName: ここの設備では限界がある。 すぐに大きな病院に移させるつもりじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ここの設備では限界がある。
すぐに大きな病院に移させるつもりじゃ。

engChrName: Heiyue is handling things on that end, thankfully.
engSearchText: Heiyue is handling things on that end, thankfully.
jpnChrName: その辺のことは黒月が 上手く手配しているようじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
その辺のことは黒月が
上手く手配しているようじゃな。

engChrName: I'm relieved that someone survived...but it's doubtful that we'll be able to ask him about what happened.
engSearchText:
I'm relieved that someone survived...but it's doubtful
that we'll be able to ask him about what happened.
jpnChrName: 生き残った方がいたのは良かったですが…… 話を聞くのは無理、みたいですね……
jpnSearchText:
生き残った方がいたのは良かったですが……
話を聞くのは無理、みたいですね……

engChrName: Yeah, it's too bad. We might've gotten some good info from him.
engSearchText:
Yeah, it's too bad. We might've gotten some good
info from him.
jpnChrName: ああ、有力な情報が聞けただろうが。
jpnSearchText: ああ、有力な情報が聞けただろうが。

engChrName: It looks like he lost consciousness from a blow to the back of the head. It's possible he didn't even see the attacker's face.
engSearchText:
It looks like he lost consciousness from a blow to the
back of the head. It's possible he didn't even see the
attacker's face.
jpnChrName: 後頭部を鈍器で殴られ昏倒したようじゃ。 相手の顔すら見えなかったかもしれぬの。
jpnSearchText:
後頭部を鈍器で殴られ昏倒したようじゃ。
相手の顔すら見えなかったかもしれぬの。

engChrName: The killers probably didn't realize he was just unconscious. Might be the only reason he's still alive.
engSearchText:
The killers probably didn't realize he was
just unconscious. Might be the only reason he's
still alive.
jpnChrName: 一番最初に倒れたんだろ、そのまま気絶して 犯人たちの目を逃れたってところか。
jpnSearchText:
一番最初に倒れたんだろ、そのまま気絶して
犯人たちの目を逃れたってところか。

engChrName: Hope he doesn't have survivor's guilt after this...
engSearchText: Hope he doesn't have survivor's guilt after this...
jpnChrName: ……一生消えないトラウマに なるかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
……一生消えないトラウマに
なるかもしれませんね。

engChrName: I can only treat the physical wounds. Whether his mental scars will heal is entirely up to him.
engSearchText:
I can only treat the physical wounds. Whether his
mental scars will heal is entirely up to him.
jpnChrName: フム、儂に出来るのは命を繋いでやることのみ、 立ち直れるかどうかはこやつ次第じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
フム、儂に出来るのは命を繋いでやることのみ、
立ち直れるかどうかはこやつ次第じゃ。

engChrName: By the way, has Aaron come by to visit?
engSearchText: By the way, has Aaron come by to visit?
jpnChrName: ところで、先生。 アーロンはここに来なかったか？
jpnSearchText:
ところで、先生。
アーロンはここに来なかったか？

engChrName: He came at sunrise, but he left shortly after.
engSearchText: He came at sunrise, but he left shortly after.
jpnChrName: 夜が明けぬうちに来たぞ。 すぐにまた出て行ったがの。
jpnSearchText:
夜が明けぬうちに来たぞ。
すぐにまた出て行ったがの。

engChrName: Do you have any idea where he went?
engSearchText: Do you have any idea where he went?
jpnChrName: 行き先については……？
jpnSearchText: 行き先については……？

engChrName: Not in the slightest. He didn't say a word the entire time, which is very unlike him.
engSearchText:
Not in the slightest. He didn't say a word the entire
time, which is very unlike him.
jpnChrName: 行き先どころか、何も話さなかった。 あんなアーロンは初めて見たわい。
jpnSearchText:
行き先どころか、何も話さなかった。
あんなアーロンは初めて見たわい。

engChrName: He must be tormenting himself...
engSearchText: He must be tormenting himself...
jpnChrName: 相当思い詰めていたのじゃろう…… 無理もない。
jpnSearchText:
相当思い詰めていたのじゃろう……
無理もない。

engChrName: Yeah...
engSearchText: Yeah...
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: Try and help him if you can. He needs to be surrounded by friends now more than ever.
engSearchText:
Try and help him if you can. He needs to be
surrounded by friends now more than ever.
jpnChrName: お前さんたちも、もし見かけたら 気にかけてやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんたちも、もし見かけたら
気にかけてやってくれ。

engChrName: Right.
engSearchText: Right.
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: We'll make sure he's okay.
engSearchText: We'll make sure he's okay.
jpnChrName: そのつもりです。
jpnSearchText: そのつもりです。

engChrName: Oh, hey, you guys.
engSearchText: Oh, hey, you guys.
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンたち。
jpnSearchText: あ、ヴァンたち。

engChrName: Huh? What're you doing here, Ashen?
engSearchText: Huh? What're you doing here, Ashen?
jpnChrName: なんだ、アシェンもこっちに来てたのかよ。
jpnSearchText: なんだ、アシェンもこっちに来てたのかよ。

engChrName: I'm just exchanging some information with them.
engSearchText: I'm just exchanging some information with them.
jpnChrName: 色々と情報交換にね。
jpnSearchText: 色々と情報交換にね。

engChrName: Did y'all figure anything out?
engSearchText: Did y'all figure anything out?
jpnChrName: それで、何か分かったのか？
jpnSearchText: それで、何か分かったのか？

engChrName: Patience, bud. Barely any time has passed since you last came here.
engSearchText:
Patience, bud. Barely any time has passed since you
last came here.
jpnChrName: そんなすぐに分かるわけねえだろ。
jpnSearchText: そんなすぐに分かるわけねえだろ。

engChrName: That said, I'm startin' to piece things together— thanks in no small part to Heiyue.
engSearchText:
That said, I'm startin' to piece things together—
thanks in no small part to Heiyue.
jpnChrName: ま、黒月の方の話も合わせて、 色々見えてきてはいるがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、黒月の方の話も合わせて、
色々見えてきてはいるがな。

engChrName: Really?!
engSearchText: Really?!
jpnChrName: ！　本当ですか……！？
jpnSearchText: ！　本当ですか……！？

engChrName: Can you share what you've learned so far?
engSearchText: Can you share what you've learned so far?
jpnChrName: いったいなにが……
jpnSearchText: いったいなにが……

engChrName: I suppose that can't hurt.
engSearchText: I suppose that can't hurt.
jpnChrName: 実は倉庫のことが分かった後……
jpnSearchText: 実は倉庫のことが分かった後……

engChrName: After we learned about the storehouse, Jack, Halle, and I spoke with the realtors in Langport.
engSearchText:
After we learned about the storehouse, Jack, Halle,
and I spoke with the realtors in Langport.
jpnChrName: あたしとジャックたちで改めて ラングポートの不動産屋を洗ってみたの。
jpnSearchText:
あたしとジャックたちで改めて
ラングポートの不動産屋を洗ってみたの。

engChrName: The only places that seemed suspect were the Messeldam Trading Company's building and that storehouse.
engSearchText:
The only places that seemed suspect were the
Messeldam Trading Company's building and
that storehouse.
jpnChrName: 結果、怪しいと言えるようなものは 例の倉庫と《メッセルダム商事》のビルだけだった。
jpnSearchText:
結果、怪しいと言えるようなものは
例の倉庫と《メッセルダム商事》のビルだけだった。

engChrName: Are you sure those are the only possible hideouts?
engSearchText: Are you sure those are the only possible hideouts?
jpnChrName: 他に拠点になるような 物件はない、というわけですか。
jpnSearchText:
他に拠点になるような
物件はない、というわけですか。

engChrName: We're pretty sure. The three of us pored through all the contracts over the last few months.
engSearchText:
We're pretty sure. The three of us pored through all
the contracts over the last few months.
jpnChrName: この数ヶ月の契約案件だけを見れば、 そうなるわね。
jpnSearchText:
この数ヶ月の契約案件だけを見れば、
そうなるわね。

engChrName: ...Although, I guess they could have purchased a place over a year ago, now that I think about it.
engSearchText:
...Although, I guess they could have purchased a place
over a year ago, now that I think about it.
jpnChrName: もっと前、それこそ一年以上前から 仕込んだものなら可能性はあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
もっと前、それこそ一年以上前から
仕込んだものなら可能性はあるけど……

engChrName: I think that's unlikely.
engSearchText: I think that's unlikely.
jpnChrName: 大型の物件で、それも長い期間 放置されたものなら──
jpnSearchText:
大型の物件で、それも長い期間
放置されたものなら──

engChrName: If a large piece of real estate was bought and left alone for that long, Heiyue would've known about it.
engSearchText:
If a large piece of real estate was bought and left alone
for that long, Heiyue would've known about it.
jpnChrName: それはそれで、こっちの“目”に 引っかかったはずなんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
それはそれで、こっちの“目”に
引っかかったはずなんだけど。

engChrName: What if they rented multiple small to medium-size properties instead?
engSearchText:
What if they rented multiple small to medium-size
properties instead?
jpnChrName: 大型に限らず、複数の中小物件を 借りている可能性はないのか？
jpnSearchText:
大型に限らず、複数の中小物件を
借りている可能性はないのか？

engChrName: Hmm... If they did that, then yes, it would've escaped our notice.
engSearchText:
Hmm... If they did that, then yes, it would've escaped
our notice.
jpnChrName: ああ……それなら確かに 把握しきれていないものが結構あるかも。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……それなら確かに
把握しきれていないものが結構あるかも。

engChrName: Even still, I doubt they made that play.
engSearchText: Even still, I doubt they made that play.
jpnChrName: どうだかな…… 契約関連のものはそうかもしれねえが……
jpnSearchText:
どうだかな……
契約関連のものはそうかもしれねえが……

engChrName: While it's true that they could've duped Heiyue with the paperwork, the civilians would've known somethin' was up.
engSearchText:
While it's true that they could've duped Heiyue with
the paperwork, the civilians would've known
somethin' was up.
jpnChrName: 中小物件で言うと、ほとんどが普通の住宅街や オフィス街にあるもんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
中小物件で言うと、ほとんどが普通の住宅街や
オフィス街にあるもんだろ。

engChrName: Most of the small to medium-size properties are in the Residential District and the Business District.
engSearchText:
Most of the small to medium-size properties are in
the Residential District and the Business District.
jpnChrName: 頻繁にそんなとこに出入りして、 しかも複数ってなると……
jpnSearchText:
頻繁にそんなとこに出入りして、
しかも複数ってなると……

engChrName: There's a lotta people coming and going in those places.
engSearchText:
There's a lotta people coming and going in
those places.
jpnChrName: 隠すには、周りの住民の協力が 必要不可欠だ。
jpnSearchText:
隠すには、周りの住民の協力が
必要不可欠だ。

engChrName: Right. If there was a bunch of abandoned sites all over the place, they'd have known about it.
engSearchText:
Right. If there was a bunch of abandoned sites all
over the place, they'd have known about it.
jpnChrName: つまり、その線も薄いか。
jpnSearchText: つまり、その線も薄いか。

engChrName: And they'd be talking about it, too. No way they'd keep quiet on account of some shithead gangsters.
engSearchText:
And they'd be talking about it, too. No way they'd
keep quiet on account of some shithead gangsters.
jpnChrName: フン、東方人街はもとより、新市街の人間も 半グレ共なんぞに手を貸すわけねーだろ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、東方人街はもとより、新市街の人間も
半グレ共なんぞに手を貸すわけねーだろ。

engChrName: Also, Heiyue would know if the people were being threatened.
engSearchText:
Also, Heiyue would know if the people were
being threatened.
jpnChrName: 脅されてってのもナシだ。 それこそ黒月に知れ渡るだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
脅されてってのもナシだ。
それこそ黒月に知れ渡るだろうしな。

engChrName: Feels like we hit a brick wall...
engSearchText: Feels like we hit a brick wall...
jpnChrName: ふう、なんだか手詰まりな感じですね……
jpnSearchText: ふう、なんだか手詰まりな感じですね……

engChrName: For the record, when I said I was piecin' things together, I just meant I had chucked a few possibilities off the game board.
engSearchText:
For the record, when I said I was piecin' things
together, I just meant I had chucked a few
possibilities off the game board.
jpnChrName: まあな……見えてきたっつっても、 精々間違った答えをいくつか排除できただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあな……見えてきたっつっても、
精々間違った答えをいくつか排除できただけだ。

engChrName: Sorry, you guys. Wish we had more to share.
engSearchText: Sorry, you guys. Wish we had more to share.
jpnChrName: なんかごめんね。
jpnSearchText: なんかごめんね。

engChrName: No, no. You've all been a huge help.
engSearchText: No, no. You've all been a huge help.
jpnChrName: いえ、十分有用な情報でした。
jpnSearchText: いえ、十分有用な情報でした。

engChrName: Thanks to you, we're gettin' closer to solving this mystery.
engSearchText:
Thanks to you, we're gettin' closer to solving
this mystery.
jpnChrName: まだピースは足りねえが、 確実に近づいてはいるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
まだピースは足りねえが、
確実に近づいてはいるはずだ。

engChrName: Call us up if you figure anything else out.
engSearchText: Call us up if you figure anything else out.
jpnChrName: また何か分かったら連絡をくれ。
jpnSearchText: また何か分かったら連絡をくれ。

engChrName: Will do. Just watch your asses out there, all right?
engSearchText: Will do. Just watch your asses out there, all right?
jpnChrName: ああ、任せとけ。 そっちもくれぐれも気を付けて行けよ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、任せとけ。
そっちもくれぐれも気を付けて行けよ？

engChrName: Oh, Heavenly Mother... Have mercy on us.
engSearchText: Oh, Heavenly Mother... Have mercy on us.
jpnChrName: ああ……天上聖母さま、 どうかお救いを……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……天上聖母さま、
どうかお救いを……

engChrName: Please calm the Tyrant's rage...
engSearchText: Please calm the Tyrant's rage...
jpnChrName: 《大君（タイクン）》の怒りを どうか鎮めておくれ……
jpnSearchText:
《大君（タイクン）》の怒りを
どうか鎮めておくれ……

engChrName: This must be our punishment. Langport... Langport is...
engSearchText:
This must be our punishment. Langport...
Langport is...
jpnChrName: ……これはきっと報いじゃ…… ……煌都は……煌都は………
jpnSearchText:
……これはきっと報いじゃ……
……煌都は……煌都は………

engChrName: Uhh... You okay, Pao?
engSearchText: Uhh... You okay, Pao?
jpnChrName: 婆さん、どうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText: 婆さん、どうしたんだ？

engChrName: What's with all the doom and gloom?
engSearchText: What's with all the doom and gloom?
jpnChrName: おいおい、大丈夫かよ？ いつになく取り乱してるみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、大丈夫かよ？
いつになく取り乱してるみてぇだが。

engChrName: Van, Aaron... Oh, it's just too cruel...
engSearchText: Van, Aaron... Oh, it's just too cruel...
jpnChrName: ヴァンにアーロン…… ああ……なんとおいたわしい……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンにアーロン……
ああ……なんとおいたわしい……

engChrName: You shouldn't have to bear the weight of our sins... Why must you suffer for our wrongdoing...
engSearchText:
You shouldn't have to bear the weight of our sins...
Why must you suffer for our wrongdoing...
jpnChrName: この街への報いが、こんな若い子たちに 降りかかるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
この街への報いが、こんな若い子たちに
降りかかるなんて……

engChrName: Everything's going to be okay, ma'am. No one here is suffering.
engSearchText:
Everything's going to be okay, ma'am. No one here
is suffering.
jpnChrName: お婆さん、落ち着いてください。 ヴァンさんたちは大丈夫ですから。
jpnSearchText:
お婆さん、落ち着いてください。
ヴァンさんたちは大丈夫ですから。

engChrName: That mist brought back memories from that horrific day forty years ago...
engSearchText:
That mist brought back memories from that horrific
day forty years ago...
jpnChrName: 昨日のあの霧は、４０年前と同じじゃ。 忘れもしない、あの時と……
jpnSearchText:
昨日のあの霧は、４０年前と同じじゃ。
忘れもしない、あの時と……

engChrName: I'm certain his fury has rekindled due to the taboo.
engSearchText: I'm certain his fury has rekindled due to the taboo.
jpnChrName: 禁忌の場所から、あの方の怒りが 煌都に降り注いだに違いまいて……
jpnSearchText:
禁忌の場所から、あの方の怒りが
煌都に降り注いだに違いまいて……

engChrName: This is all divine retribution for our sins. I'm so sorry that you all will pay the price, too...
engSearchText:
This is all divine retribution for our sins. I'm so sorry
that you all will pay the price, too...
jpnChrName: これは罰じゃ……あの方を見捨てた この街への罰なんじゃ………
jpnSearchText:
これは罰じゃ……あの方を見捨てた
この街への罰なんじゃ………

engChrName: Okay, I'm totally lost. What do you mean by 'taboo' and 'divine retribution'?
engSearchText:
Okay, I'm totally lost. What do you mean by 'taboo'
and 'divine retribution'?
jpnChrName: 禁忌？　あの方？ 一体何の話ですか？
jpnSearchText:
禁忌？　あの方？
一体何の話ですか？

engChrName: It's...umm... I mustn't say!
engSearchText: It's...umm... I mustn't say!
jpnChrName: ……それは、それは…… 言ってはならんのじゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
……それは、それは……
言ってはならんのじゃ……！

engChrName: This city's abominable history will be buried with us. It cannot be passed to the next generation.
engSearchText:
This city's abominable history will be buried with us.
It cannot be passed to the next generation.
jpnChrName: この街の忌まわしい歴史、 次の世代に伝えるわけには……
jpnSearchText:
この街の忌まわしい歴史、
次の世代に伝えるわけには……

engChrName: Okay... Well, if you don't wanna share, we won't force you.
engSearchText:
Okay... Well, if you don't wanna share, we won't
force you.
jpnChrName: よく分からねえが、霧のことなら 俺たちがなんとかする。
jpnSearchText:
よく分からねえが、霧のことなら
俺たちがなんとかする。

engChrName: In any case, we'll take care of the mist.
engSearchText: In any case, we'll take care of the mist.
jpnChrName: 一応、心当たりはあるしな。
jpnSearchText: 一応、心当たりはあるしな。

engChrName: That's right. We've even gathered a few leads on it.
engSearchText: That's right. We've even gathered a few leads on it.
jpnChrName: はい、どうか任せてください。
jpnSearchText: はい、どうか任せてください。

engChrName: You can leave it to us. I'm not gonna let anything happen to this city.
engSearchText:
You can leave it to us. I'm not gonna let anything
happen to this city.
jpnChrName: ま、この街のことは 絶対に俺が守るからよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、この街のことは
絶対に俺が守るからよ。

engChrName: So keep your chin up, Pao. I can't stand seeing you like this.
engSearchText:
So keep your chin up, Pao. I can't stand seeing you
like this.
jpnChrName: だから安心しろ。 婆さんがこんなんじゃ調子狂うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だから安心しろ。
婆さんがこんなんじゃ調子狂うぜ。

engChrName: I... I understand. Thank you for reassuring me.
engSearchText: I... I understand. Thank you for reassuring me.
jpnChrName: そうか……そうか……… それを聞いて安心じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……そうか………
それを聞いて安心じゃ。

engChrName: You've grown up so much, Aaron. You remind me so much of her when she was younger...
engSearchText:
You've grown up so much, Aaron. You remind me so
much of her when she was younger...
jpnChrName: アーロン、あんたはまるで若かりし頃の……
jpnSearchText: アーロン、あんたはまるで若かりし頃の……

engChrName: Promise me you'll be careful, okay?
engSearchText: Promise me you'll be careful, okay?
jpnChrName: いや……ともあれ、気を付けておくれ。
jpnSearchText: いや……ともあれ、気を付けておくれ。

engChrName: Aha! Found you!
engSearchText: Aha! Found you!
jpnChrName: ああっ！　見つけました……！
jpnSearchText: ああっ！　見つけました……！

engChrName: Here we go again...
engSearchText: Here we go again...
jpnChrName: またお前さんか……
jpnSearchText: またお前さんか……

engChrName: I've been looking all over for you guys!
engSearchText: I've been looking all over for you guys!
jpnChrName: 貴方たちのことを探してたんです！
jpnSearchText: 貴方たちのことを探してたんです！

engChrName: You have? Why?
engSearchText: You have? Why?
jpnChrName: わ、私たちを……？
jpnSearchText: わ、私たちを……？

engChrName: What do you mean, 'why?' Because of what happened last night, of course!
engSearchText:
What do you mean, 'why?' Because of what happened
last night, of course!
jpnChrName: 用件なんて決まっています！ 昨夜あれだけの事件があったんですから！
jpnSearchText:
用件なんて決まっています！
昨夜あれだけの事件があったんですから！

engChrName: I heard you guys arrived at the scene super quick.
engSearchText: I heard you guys arrived at the scene super quick.
jpnChrName: 聞けば貴方たちがいち早く 現場に駆け付けたそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
聞けば貴方たちがいち早く
現場に駆け付けたそうですね。

engChrName: I want the full lowdown, and I'm not leaving until you give me all the juicy details!
engSearchText:
I want the full lowdown, and I'm not leaving until
you give me all the juicy details!
jpnChrName: 当時の状況をぜひ詳しく聞かせてください！
jpnSearchText: 当時の状況をぜひ詳しく聞かせてください！

engChrName: Uhh. Who the hell is this chick?
engSearchText: Uhh. Who the hell is this chick?
jpnChrName: 何なんだこいつは？
jpnSearchText: 何なんだこいつは？

engChrName: She's a reporter lady.
engSearchText: She's a reporter lady.
jpnChrName: 記者の方だそうです。
jpnSearchText: 記者の方だそうです。

engChrName: Got'cha. Word of advice, little girl. You should stick your nose someplace else—or you're gonna wind up hurt.
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Word of advice, little girl. You should stick
your nose someplace else—or you're gonna wind
up hurt.
jpnChrName: ハン、小娘が嗅ぎ回ってんじゃねえよ。 下手に首突っ込まねぇ方が身のためだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、小娘が嗅ぎ回ってんじゃねえよ。
下手に首突っ込まねぇ方が身のためだぜ。

engChrName: L-Little girl?! I'll have you know I'm twenty-one!
engSearchText: L-Little girl?! I'll have you know I'm twenty-one!
jpnChrName: こ、小娘ですってえ！？ れっきとした２１歳ですけど！？
jpnSearchText:
こ、小娘ですってえ！？
れっきとした２１歳ですけど！？

engChrName: Wait, are you seriously older than me? Damn, girl. You're rocking a real baby face there.
engSearchText:
Wait, are you seriously older than me? Damn, girl.
You're rocking a real baby face there.
jpnChrName: ってまさかの年上かよ……
jpnSearchText: ってまさかの年上かよ……

engChrName: Anyway, it's my duty to find the truth and report it to the world!
engSearchText:
Anyway, it's my duty to find the truth and report it to
the world!
jpnChrName: とにかく、私はジャーナリストとして真実を 正しく世の中に伝える義務があります！
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、私はジャーナリストとして真実を
正しく世の中に伝える義務があります！

engChrName: So I'm gonna stick to you like glue until I get a story I can print.
engSearchText:
So I'm gonna stick to you like glue until I get a story I
can print.
jpnChrName: 昨日だって結局《紅い流星》の スクープを掴めなかったですし……
jpnSearchText:
昨日だって結局《紅い流星》の
スクープを掴めなかったですし……

engChrName: I wasted all of yesterday pursuing a dead lead, so I've got to make up for lost time!
engSearchText:
I wasted all of yesterday pursuing a dead lead, so I've
got to make up for lost time!
jpnChrName: 今回の件こそ、ちゃんと真相を掴まないと！
jpnSearchText: 今回の件こそ、ちゃんと真相を掴まないと！

engChrName: Yeah... That was definitely on us.
engSearchText: Yeah... That was definitely on us.
jpnChrName: あれは……なんだかすみません。
jpnSearchText: あれは……なんだかすみません。

engChrName: I'm also just curious on a personal level. That mist last night was so unsettling.
engSearchText:
I'm also just curious on a personal level. That mist last
night was so unsettling.
jpnChrName: あと、個人的にも気になるんです。 昨夜のあの霧は絶対変ですから。
jpnSearchText:
あと、個人的にも気になるんです。
昨夜のあの霧は絶対変ですから。

engChrName: Maybe it really did come from a ghost ship...
engSearchText: Maybe it really did come from a ghost ship...
jpnChrName: やっぱり幽霊船の仕業なんでしょうか……
jpnSearchText: やっぱり幽霊船の仕業なんでしょうか……

engChrName: Wait. What'd you just say?
engSearchText: Wait. What'd you just say?
jpnChrName: ちょっと待て、いま何つった？
jpnSearchText: ちょっと待て、いま何つった？

engChrName: Huh? I said the mist was unsettling.
engSearchText: Huh? I said the mist was unsettling.
jpnChrName: え？　あの霧は変だって……
jpnSearchText: え？　あの霧は変だって……

engChrName: No, the part after that.
engSearchText: No, the part after that.
jpnChrName: いや、その後だ。
jpnSearchText: いや、その後だ。

engChrName: Oh, I was wondering if the mist came from a ghost ship...
engSearchText:
Oh, I was wondering if the mist came from a
ghost ship...
jpnChrName: ですから、幽霊船の仕業だと……
jpnSearchText: ですから、幽霊船の仕業だと……

engChrName: Why would you assume that?
engSearchText: Why would you assume that?
jpnChrName: ゆ、幽霊船……？ どういうことですか？
jpnSearchText:
ゆ、幽霊船……？
どういうことですか？

engChrName: When that mist showed up, I peered out at the ocean, and I could just barely make out the silhouette of a ship.
engSearchText:
When that mist showed up, I peered out at the ocean,
and I could just barely make out the silhouette of
a ship.
jpnChrName: 実は、あの霧が出ていた頃に、 ぼんやりと海の方に船のような影が見えたんです。
jpnSearchText:
実は、あの霧が出ていた頃に、
ぼんやりと海の方に船のような影が見えたんです。

engChrName: I couldn't find any other witnesses at the harbor...
engSearchText: I couldn't find any other witnesses at the harbor...
jpnChrName: 港の何人かに聞いてみましたが、 誰も知らないみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
港の何人かに聞いてみましたが、
誰も知らないみたいで……

engChrName: But I know what I saw, and it was totally a ghost ship!
engSearchText:
But I know what I saw, and it was totally a
ghost ship!
jpnChrName: となると、あれは幽霊船に違いありません！ 南の海にそんな伝説があるって聞いたことがあります！
jpnSearchText:
となると、あれは幽霊船に違いありません！
南の海にそんな伝説があるって聞いたことがあります！

engChrName: There's also a legend about it: 'The crew of every merchant vessel that crosses paths with a ghost ship in the mist will be slaughtered.'
engSearchText:
There's also a legend about it: 'The crew of every
merchant vessel that crosses paths with a ghost ship in
the mist will be slaughtered.'
jpnChrName: 霧の夜に現れる幽霊船、遭遇した 商船の人は一人残らず殺されるって……！
jpnSearchText:
霧の夜に現れる幽霊船、遭遇した
商船の人は一人残らず殺されるって……！

engChrName: Th-That sounds scary!
engSearchText: Th-That sounds scary!
jpnChrName: ほ、本当ですか！？ そんなものがあるなんて！
jpnSearchText:
ほ、本当ですか！？
そんなものがあるなんて！

engChrName: I KNOW I'm right! I've just gotta be!
engSearchText: I KNOW I'm right! I've just gotta be!
jpnChrName: 間違いありません！
jpnSearchText: 間違いありません！

engChrName: There's one teensy little snag in my theory, though. The ship was kinda...small. It's a far cry from the giant, hulking ghost ship I imagined.
engSearchText:
There's one teensy little snag in my theory, though.
The ship was kinda...small. It's a far cry from the
giant, hulking ghost ship I imagined.
jpnChrName: まあ、思ったよりは小さい船 だったような気もしますが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、思ったよりは小さい船
だったような気もしますが……

engChrName: That's not the only snag.
engSearchText: That's not the only snag.
jpnChrName: ……どう考えてもただの都市伝説だろ。
jpnSearchText: ……どう考えてもただの都市伝説だろ。

engChrName: If it slaughters the crew of every ship it comes across, no one could've lived to tell the tale. So how'd the story come about?
engSearchText:
If it slaughters the crew of every ship it comes across,
no one could've lived to tell the tale. So how'd the
story come about?
jpnChrName: そもそも誰も生き残ってねえなら 誰がその話を伝えたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
そもそも誰も生き残ってねえなら
誰がその話を伝えたんだ？

engChrName: Uhh... W-Well, maybe a super amazing reporter found out about it...somehow.
engSearchText:
Uhh... W-Well, maybe a super amazing reporter
found out about it...somehow.
jpnChrName: そ、それは…… どこかの凄腕の記者……とか？
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは……
どこかの凄腕の記者……とか？

engChrName: There's another thing. I believe the mist mostly appeared on land—not the ocean.
engSearchText:
There's another thing. I believe the mist mostly
appeared on land—not the ocean.
jpnChrName: ですが霧があったのは海というよりは 東方人街の街の方ですし……
jpnSearchText:
ですが霧があったのは海というよりは
東方人街の街の方ですし……

engChrName: Are you sure you weren't just seeing things?
engSearchText: Are you sure you weren't just seeing things?
jpnChrName: 見間違いなのでは？
jpnSearchText: 見間違いなのでは？

engChrName: *sigh* I guess it was pretty dark that night. Maybe my eyes were playing tricks on me after all...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I guess it was pretty dark that night. Maybe my
eyes were playing tricks on me after all...
jpnChrName: 暗い夜の中ですから、そう言われると そう思えてきたような……
jpnSearchText:
暗い夜の中ですから、そう言われると
そう思えてきたような……

engChrName: Sorry to burst your bubble. We also don't have much to share about the incident last night.
engSearchText:
Sorry to burst your bubble. We also don't have much
to share about the incident last night.
jpnChrName: ともかくだ、俺たちはたまたま現場の 近くにいただけで、大したことは知らない。
jpnSearchText:
ともかくだ、俺たちはたまたま現場の
近くにいただけで、大したことは知らない。

engChrName: Might be better off pokin' the cops or the bracers.
engSearchText: Might be better off pokin' the cops or the bracers.
jpnChrName: そういうことは警察か 遊撃士にでも聞くんだな。
jpnSearchText:
そういうことは警察か
遊撃士にでも聞くんだな。

engChrName: Aww... Fine. I'll let you off the hook this time.
engSearchText: Aww... Fine. I'll let you off the hook this time.
jpnChrName: むうう…… 残念ですが仕方ありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
むうう……
残念ですが仕方ありませんね。

engChrName: But if you happen to find any leads, please let me in on it!
engSearchText:
But if you happen to find any leads, please let me in
on it!
jpnChrName: では皆さん、また何かスクープのネタがありましたら、 ぜひ私に知らせてください！
jpnSearchText:
では皆さん、また何かスクープのネタがありましたら、
ぜひ私に知らせてください！

engChrName: This is my time to shine! When this story lands on the front page, Dingo will HAVE to take notice of me!
engSearchText:
This is my time to shine! When this story lands on
the front page, Dingo will HAVE to take notice
of me!
jpnChrName: 今度こそ、ディンゴさんに 見直してもらうチャンスなんだから……！
jpnSearchText:
今度こそ、ディンゴさんに
見直してもらうチャンスなんだから……！

engChrName: Okay, that time you really did lie to her, Van. That's not right.
engSearchText:
Okay, that time you really did lie to her, Van.
That's not right.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、またあんな風に 彼女を誤魔化して……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、またあんな風に
彼女を誤魔化して……

engChrName: Hey, if you ask me, I'm being nice. Even if I did spill the beans, she wouldn't have been able to report on the info.
engSearchText:
Hey, if you ask me, I'm being nice. Even if I did spill
the beans, she wouldn't have been able to report on
the info.
jpnChrName: おいそれと報道できないことばかりだ。
jpnSearchText: おいそれと報道できないことばかりだ。

engChrName: It's also in her best interest to stay far, faaar away from the mafia.
engSearchText:
It's also in her best interest to stay far, faaar away
from the mafia.
jpnChrName: それよりマフィアから遠ざけた方が 彼女のためだろ。
jpnSearchText:
それよりマフィアから遠ざけた方が
彼女のためだろ。

engChrName: I guess I can't argue with you there.
engSearchText: I guess I can't argue with you there.
jpnChrName: それは……確かに。
jpnSearchText: それは……確かに。

engChrName: Anyway, you look like you're having a light-bulb moment, Aaron.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you look like you're having a light-bulb
moment, Aaron.
jpnChrName: それより、何か思い当たる所が あったようだな。
jpnSearchText:
それより、何か思い当たる所が
あったようだな。

engChrName: Yep. Her story helped me put two and two together on something.
engSearchText:
Yep. Her story helped me put two and two together
on something.
jpnChrName: ああ、さっきのあの女の話で、 ようやく合点がいったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、さっきのあの女の話で、
ようやく合点がいったぜ。

engChrName: Well, don't keep us in suspense. Share!
engSearchText: Well, don't keep us in suspense. Share!
jpnChrName: もしかして、幽霊船の話ですか？
jpnSearchText: もしかして、幽霊船の話ですか？

engChrName: Fact of the matter is, there shouldn't be any ships out and about in Langport at night.
engSearchText:
Fact of the matter is, there shouldn't be any ships out
and about in Langport at night.
jpnChrName: そうだ、そもそも煌都にあんな時間に 寄港する船なんかねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、そもそも煌都にあんな時間に
寄港する船なんかねえからな。

engChrName: I can count the number of times I've seen that on one hand.
engSearchText:
I can count the number of times I've seen that on
one hand.
jpnChrName: よく夜遊びであちこち回ってる 俺が言うんだから間違いねえ。
jpnSearchText:
よく夜遊びであちこち回ってる
俺が言うんだから間違いねえ。

engChrName: And if the people at the harbor didn't see it, then this definitely sounds fishy.
engSearchText:
And if the people at the harbor didn't see it, then this
definitely sounds fishy.
jpnChrName: 港の人間も知らないってんなら 尚更プンプン臭うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
港の人間も知らないってんなら
尚更プンプン臭うぜ。

engChrName: Do you suspect the gangsters escaped Langport in a boat?
engSearchText:
Do you suspect the gangsters escaped Langport in
a boat?
jpnChrName: あの夜、半グレたちは海路でラングポート から脱出したということですか。
jpnSearchText:
あの夜、半グレたちは海路でラングポート
から脱出したということですか。

engChrName: If that's the case, it's no wonder Heiyue can't find them. They've had their eyes on land this whole time.
engSearchText:
If that's the case, it's no wonder Heiyue can't
find them. They've had their eyes on land this
whole time.
jpnChrName: 確かにそれなら、陸路を監視している 黒月の目も届きません。
jpnSearchText:
確かにそれなら、陸路を監視している
黒月の目も届きません。

engChrName: Nah, I doubt they fled. They have to be close by.
engSearchText: Nah, I doubt they fled. They have to be close by.
jpnChrName: いや、脱出はしてねえ、 まだいるんだよ、近くに。
jpnSearchText:
いや、脱出はしてねえ、
まだいるんだよ、近くに。

engChrName: Probably just waiting for this whole thing to blow over before they strike Langport again.
engSearchText:
Probably just waiting for this whole thing to blow
over before they strike Langport again.
jpnChrName: 虎視眈々と煌都を狙ってな。
jpnSearchText: 虎視眈々と煌都を狙ってな。

engChrName: But where would they set up shop?
engSearchText: But where would they set up shop?
jpnChrName: でも、拠点になるような場所は……
jpnSearchText: でも、拠点になるような場所は……

engChrName: There's only one place I can think of.
engSearchText: There's only one place I can think of.
jpnChrName: あるんだよそれが。
jpnSearchText: あるんだよそれが。

engChrName: I think they're holed up on a remote island. Outsiders wouldn't know about it since it's off the map.
engSearchText:
I think they're holed up on a remote island.
Outsiders wouldn't know about it since it's off
the map.
jpnChrName: よそ者じゃあそもそも知る余地もねえ、 地図からも抹消された場所。
jpnSearchText:
よそ者じゃあそもそも知る余地もねえ、
地図からも抹消された場所。

engChrName: The old fossils around here refuse to talk about it, but it comes up in rumors every now and then.
engSearchText:
The old fossils around here refuse to talk about it, but
it comes up in rumors every now and then.
jpnChrName: 年寄りたちが揃って口を閉ざして語りたがらねえ、 今では噂で聞くくらいが精々の“禁忌”の地。
jpnSearchText:
年寄りたちが揃って口を閉ざして語りたがらねえ、
今では噂で聞くくらいが精々の“禁忌”の地。

engChrName: It's an abandoned mining town called Heilong Cheng Zhai.
engSearchText:
It's an abandoned mining town called Heilong
Cheng Zhai.
jpnChrName: 海を少し隔てた向こうにある 廃棄された鉱山町──《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》ってのがな。
jpnSearchText:
海を少し隔てた向こうにある
廃棄された鉱山町──《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》ってのがな。

engChrName: We'll need to talk with the ferryman and see if he'll let us borrow a boat.
engSearchText:
We'll need to talk with the ferryman and see if he'll
let us borrow a boat.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ改めて 渡し守からボートを借りるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあ改めて
渡し守からボートを借りるとすっか。

engChrName: I can handle that.
engSearchText: I can handle that.
jpnChrName: ハッ、話なら俺がつけてやるよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、話なら俺がつけてやるよ。

engChrName: You can now travel to Heilong Cheng Zhai.
engSearchText: You can now travel to Heilong Cheng Zhai.
jpnChrName: ボートを使って黒龍城砦に行けるようになった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ボートを使って黒龍城砦に行けるようになった。

engChrName: Hey. We're here to look into that Neil guy's request.
engSearchText: Hey. We're here to look into that Neil guy's request.
jpnChrName: よう、そういやニールとやらの 依頼を見て来たんだが。
jpnSearchText:
よう、そういやニールとやらの
依頼を見て来たんだが。

engChrName: Hoho. Good to hear. He's in quite a bind, so he could use your help.
engSearchText:
Hoho. Good to hear. He's in quite a bind, so he could
use your help.
jpnChrName: ほほ、そう言ってくれるのを待っておったよ。 どうかあの子を助けてやっておくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ほほ、そう言ってくれるのを待っておったよ。
どうかあの子を助けてやっておくれ。

engChrName: So, he a friend of yours or something?
engSearchText: So, he a friend of yours or something?
jpnChrName: ちなみに依頼主と婆さんは どういう関係なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに依頼主と婆さんは
どういう関係なんだ？

engChrName: Not quite. Neil is a traveler of sorts. He had a troubled look on his face, so I called out to him.
engSearchText:
Not quite. Neil is a traveler of sorts. He had a
troubled look on his face, so I called out to him.
jpnChrName: いやなに、ニールは旅行者でね。 困ってるようだったから声をかけたんじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
いやなに、ニールは旅行者でね。
困ってるようだったから声をかけたんじゃ。

engChrName: That's when I learned he was being pursued by Heiyue.
engSearchText:
That's when I learned he was being pursued
by Heiyue.
jpnChrName: そしたらなんと──とある事情で 《黒月》から追われてるそうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
そしたらなんと──とある事情で
《黒月》から追われてるそうじゃないか。

engChrName: It all seemed like a big misunderstanding, so I wanted to assist him however I could.
engSearchText:
It all seemed like a big misunderstanding, so I wanted
to assist him however I could.
jpnChrName: 誤解があるみたいだから、 なんとか助けてあげたいと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
誤解があるみたいだから、
なんとか助けてあげたいと思ってね。

engChrName: What?! How did he become a target of Heiyue?
engSearchText: What?! How did he become a target of Heiyue?
jpnChrName: へ、《黒月（ヘイユエ）》に追われてるんですか！？
jpnSearchText: へ、《黒月（ヘイユエ）》に追われてるんですか！？

engChrName: Did he do something bad?
engSearchText: Did he do something bad?
jpnChrName: よっぽどの事がなければ、 そんな事態にはならないと思いますけど……
jpnSearchText:
よっぽどの事がなければ、
そんな事態にはならないと思いますけど……

engChrName: I think it'd be faster if you heard the details straight from the horse's mouth.
engSearchText:
I think it'd be faster if you heard the details straight
from the horse's mouth.
jpnChrName: 詳しい事は、本人から 話を聞いた方が早いだろうね。
jpnSearchText:
詳しい事は、本人から
話を聞いた方が早いだろうね。

engChrName: Also, you never know who may be listening in out here.
engSearchText:
Also, you never know who may be listening in
out here.
jpnChrName: そうさな、どこか人目を避けられる 場所があるといいんじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
そうさな、どこか人目を避けられる
場所があるといいんじゃが……

engChrName: Then how about we meet in our room back at Guihua Fandian?
engSearchText:
Then how about we meet in our room back at
Guihua Fandian?
jpnChrName: それなら、俺達が泊まってる 桂花飯店の個室はどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
それなら、俺達が泊まってる
桂花飯店の個室はどうだ？

engChrName: Doubt Heiyue would be able to eavesdrop on us there.
engSearchText:
Doubt Heiyue would be able to eavesdrop on
us there.
jpnChrName: あそこなら《黒月》の連中も 聞き耳を立てにくいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
あそこなら《黒月》の連中も
聞き耳を立てにくいだろ。

engChrName: An excellent idea.
engSearchText: An excellent idea.
jpnChrName: ああ、そこなら都合が良さそうじゃな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そこなら都合が良さそうじゃな。

engChrName: I'll tell Neil to head over right away.
engSearchText: I'll tell Neil to head over right away.
jpnChrName: ニールにはそちらに向かうよう 伝えておくとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
ニールにはそちらに向かうよう
伝えておくとしよう。

engChrName: Or would that be a problem? Do you want me to contact him now or later?
engSearchText:
Or would that be a problem? Do you want me to
contact him now or later?
jpnChrName: ヴァン、早速連絡しても大丈夫かね？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、早速連絡しても大丈夫かね？

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: It'd be best if you heard the details of the request directly from Neil.
engSearchText:
It'd be best if you heard the details of the request
directly from Neil.
jpnChrName: 依頼内容については ニールから直接聞いた方がいいじゃろう。
jpnSearchText:
依頼内容については
ニールから直接聞いた方がいいじゃろう。

engChrName: Would it be a problem if I got in touch with him now?
engSearchText:
Would it be a problem if I got in touch with
him now?
jpnChrName: ヴァン、早速連絡しても大丈夫かね？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、早速連絡しても大丈夫かね？

engChrName: Sorry, but could you hold off for a bit?
engSearchText: Sorry, but could you hold off for a bit?
jpnChrName: 悪いが、もう少しだけ待ってくれるか？
jpnSearchText: 悪いが、もう少しだけ待ってくれるか？

engChrName: That's no problem at all.
engSearchText: That's no problem at all.
jpnChrName: ああ、構わないよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、構わないよ。

engChrName: Though bear in mind, the situation will only get worse as time goes by.
engSearchText:
Though bear in mind, the situation will only get
worse as time goes by.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、時間が経つほどに 難しい状況になってしまいそうじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、時間が経つほどに
難しい状況になってしまいそうじゃ。

engChrName: The sooner I can get in touch with him and get this underway, the better.
engSearchText:
The sooner I can get in touch with him and get this
underway, the better.
jpnChrName: なるべく早めに連絡を させてくれると助かるのう。
jpnSearchText:
なるべく早めに連絡を
させてくれると助かるのう。

engChrName: Go right ahead.
engSearchText: Go right ahead.
jpnChrName: ああ、問題ない。 今から依頼主を呼び出してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、問題ない。
今から依頼主を呼び出してくれ。

engChrName: Very well, then.
engSearchText: Very well, then.
jpnChrName: ああ、任せとくれ。 よろしく頼むよ……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、任せとくれ。
よろしく頼むよ……！

engChrName: Quest Special Delivery started!
engSearchText: Quest Special Delivery started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【とある荷物についての相談】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>とある荷物についての相談<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: It's a pleasure to meet you all. My name is Neil.
engSearchText: It's a pleasure to meet you all. My name is Neil.
jpnChrName: 初めまして、ニールです。 皆さんが《裏解決屋》の……？
jpnSearchText:
初めまして、ニールです。
皆さんが《裏解決屋》の……？

engChrName: And I'm Van from Arkride Solutions. These two are my assistants.
engSearchText:
And I'm Van from Arkride Solutions. These two are
my assistants.
jpnChrName: ああ、《アークライド解決事務所》のヴァンだ。 こっちは助手たちになる。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《アークライド解決事務所》のヴァンだ。
こっちは助手たちになる。

engChrName: Let's get right into it. Can you give us the details of your request?
engSearchText:
